scn aaGenericAmbushTriggerSCRIPT ; basic script that enables linked reference
short DoOnce ref myLink
begin onTriggerEnter Player
if doOnce == 0 set myLink to getLinkedRef myLink.enable set doOnce to 1 disable markfordelete endif
end

scn aaHSIntroTriggerSCRIPT
Short DoOnce
Begin OnTrigger Player
If DoOnce == 0 aaHendershotRef.enable set aaRussellMission01.HSGreeted to 1 setstage aaRussellMission01 35 aaHendershotRef.evp set DoOnce to 1 disable markfordelete endif
END

scn aaChollaMtTunnelAttack01TriggerSCRIPT
Short DoOnce
Begin OnTrigger Player
IF DoOnce == 0 If GetStage aaRussellMission01 == 36 aaChollaTunnelerAttackParentRef.enable aaRussellRef.Sayto Player aaRussellMission01TunnelerBark set DoOnce to 1 disable markfordelete endif endif
END

scn aaChollaTunnelerScript
Begin OnDeath
set aaRussellMission01.TunnelerCount to aaRussellMission01.TunnelerCount + 1
END

scn aaRussellNPCScript
Short HasBeenHired Short DoOnce
int Waiting ; 0 = Not waiting, 1 = Waiting int CombatStyleMelee ; 0 = Not melee, 1= Melee int CombatStyleRanged ; 0 = Not ranged, 1 = Ranged int IsFollowingDefault ; 0 = Not following default, 1 = Is following default range int IsFollowingLong ; 0 = Not following long, 1 = Is following long int FollowerSwitchAggressive ; 0 = Passive (wait on player), 1 = Aggressive (attack when see enemies)
;---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
begin OnCombatEND
if GetPlayerTeammate == 1 resethealth restoreav perceptioncondition 100 restoreav endurancecondition 100 restoreav leftattackcondition 100 restoreav leftmobilitycondition 100 restoreav rightattackcondition 100 restoreav rightmobilitycondition 100 endif
end
;---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Begin Gamemode
If (DoOnce != 1) set HasBeenHired to 0 set CombatStyleRanged to 1 set CombatStyleMelee to 0 set IsFollowingDefault to 0 set IsFollowingLong to 0 set FollowerSwitchAggressive to 0 set Waiting to 0 set DoOnce to 1 endif
END
Begin OnDeath
If HasBeenHired == 1 showmessage aaMessageDeadRussell set SomeguyMaster.JoaquinStatus to 0 stopquest aaRussellQuest stopquest aaRussellBark endif
If GetStage aaRussellMission01 < 190 setstage aaRussellMission01 200 endif
END

scn aaDismemberCodeBoxSCRIPT
; This trigger has a script that runs a 50% chance of dismembering each body part of its linkedRef
ref linkedRef short doOnce short n
Begin onLoad if doOnce == 0 set linkedRef to getLinkedRef
; if no linked ref, do it to myself if linkedRef == 0 set linkedRef to GetSelf endif
set n to getRandomPercent if n > 50 linkedRef.killactor linkedRef 1 ;dismember Head endif
set n to getRandomPercent if n < 50 linkedRef.killactor linkedRef 3 ;dismember Left Arm endif
set n to getRandomPercent if n < 50 linkedRef.killactor linkedRef 7 ;dismember Left Leg endif
set n to getRandomPercent if n > 50 linkedRef.killactor linkedRef 10 ;dismember Right Leg endif
set n to getRandomPercent if n > 50 linkedRef.killactor linkedRef 5 ;dismember Right Arm endif
set doOnce to 1 ;Trigger is only set off one time disable markfordelete endif End

END

scn aaGenericDismembermentSCRIPT
; This trigger has a script that will dismember the right leg and right arm of its linkedRef
ref linkedRef short doOnce
Begin onLoad if doOnce == 0 set linkedRef to getLinkedRef linkedRef.killactor linkedRef 1 ;dismember Head linkedRef.killactor linkedRef 3 ;dismember Left Arm linkedRef.killactor linkedRef 7 ;dismember Left Leg linkedRef.killactor linkedRef 10 ;dismember Right Leg linkedRef.killactor linkedRef 5 ;dismember Right Arm set doOnce to 1 ;Trigger is only set off one time endif disable markfordelete End

scriptname aaGenericRandomKillSCRIPT
ref linkedRef short doOnce short n
Begin onLoad if doOnce == 0 set linkedRef to getLinkedRef
; if no linked ref, do it to myself if linkedRef == 0 set linkedRef to GetSelf endif
set n to getRandomPercent if n > 50 linkedRef.killactor linkedRef 1 ;dismember Head endif
set n to getRandomPercent if n < 50 linkedRef.killactor linkedRef 3 ;dismember Left Arm endif
set n to getRandomPercent if n < 50 linkedRef.killactor linkedRef 7 ;dismember Left Leg endif
set n to getRandomPercent if n > 50 linkedRef.killactor linkedRef 10 ;dismember Right Leg endif
set n to getRandomPercent if n > 50 linkedRef.killactor linkedRef 5 ;dismember Right Arm endif
set doOnce to 1 ;Trigger is only set off one time disable markfordelete endif End

scn aaSwarmQuestSCRIPT
Short AntCount ; Ants killed Short AttackState ; regulates stages
Begin GameMode
If AttackState == 1 aaSwarmPoint01REF.placeatme aaAntSoldierSWARM 2 0 aaSwarmPoint02REF.placeatme aaAntSoldierSWARM 2 0 aaSwarmPoint03REF.placeatme aaAntSoldierSWARM 2 0 aaSwarmPoint04REF.placeatme aaAntSoldierSWARM 2 0 aaSwarmPoint05REF.placeatme aaAntSoldierSWARM 2 0 set AttackState to 2 endif
If AttackState == 2 If AntCount >= 8; 10 aaSwarmPoint01REF.placeatme aaAntSoldierSWARM 3 0 aaSwarmPoint02REF.placeatme aaAntSoldierSWARM 3 0 aaSwarmPoint03REF.placeatme aaAntSoldierSWARM 3 0 aaSwarmPoint04REF.placeatme aaAntSoldierSWARM 3 0 aaSwarmPoint05REF.placeatme aaAntSoldierSWARM 3 0 set AttackState to 3 endif endif
If AttackState == 3 If AntCount >= 22; 25 aaSwarmPoint01REF.placeatme aaAntSoldierSWARM 4 0 aaSwarmPoint02REF.placeatme aaAntSoldierSWARM 4 0 aaSwarmPoint03REF.placeatme aaAntSoldierSWARM 4 0 aaSwarmPoint04REF.placeatme aaAntSoldierSWARM 4 0 aaSwarmPoint05REF.placeatme aaAntSoldierSWARM 4 0 set AttackState to 4 endif endif
If AttackState == 4 If AntCount >= 40; 45 aaSwarmPoint01REF.placeatme aaAntSoldierSWARM 5 0 aaSwarmPoint02REF.placeatme aaAntSoldierSWARM 5 0 aaSwarmPoint03REF.placeatme aaAntSoldierSWARM 5 0 aaSwarmPoint04REF.placeatme aaAntSoldierSWARM 5 0 aaSwarmPoint05REF.placeatme aaAntSoldierSWARM 5 0 set AttackState to 5 endif endif
If AttackState == 5 If AntCount >= 60; 70 aaSwarmPoint01REF.placeatme aaAntSoldierSWARM 4 0 aaSwarmPoint02REF.placeatme aaAntSoldierSWARM 4 0 aaSwarmPoint03REF.placeatme aaAntSoldierSWARM 4 0 aaSwarmPoint04REF.placeatme aaAntSoldierSWARM 4 0 aaSwarmPoint05REF.placeatme aaAntSoldierSWARM 4 0 set AttackState to 6 endif endif
If AttackState == 6 If AntCount >= 82; 90 aaSwarmPoint01REF.placeatme aaAntSoldierSWARM 3 0 aaSwarmPoint02REF.placeatme aaAntSoldierSWARM 3 0 aaSwarmPoint03REF.placeatme aaAntSoldierSWARM 3 0 aaSwarmPoint04REF.placeatme aaAntSoldierSWARM 3 0 aaSwarmPoint05REF.placeatme aaAntSoldierSWARM 3 0 set AttackState to 7 endif endif
If AttackState == 7 If AntCount >= 98; 105 aaSwarmPoint01REF.placeatme aaAntSoldierSWARM02 2 0 aaSwarmPoint02REF.placeatme aaAntSoldierSWARM02 2 0 aaSwarmPoint03REF.placeatme aaAntSoldierSWARM02 2 0 aaSwarmPoint04REF.placeatme aaAntSoldierSWARM02 2 0 aaSwarmPoint05REF.placeatme aaAntSoldierSWARM02 2 0 set AttackState to 8 stopquest aaSwarmQuest endif endif
END

scn aaAntSoldierSwarmSCRIPT
float timer short DoOnce
BEGIN OnDeath
If DoOnce == 0 Set aaSwarmQuest.AntCount to aaSwarmQuest.AntCount + 1 set Timer to 12 set DoOnce to 1 endif
END
Begin GameMode
set Timer to ( Timer - GetSecondsPassed )
if ( Timer <= 2 ) && ( DoOnce == 1 ) set DoOnce to 2 disable markfordelete endif
END

scn aaRussellQuestScript
short bRussellHireable short bRussellDoOnce
short BarkLocation ; regulates trigger for Russell's specific, trigger-based barks
int Loyalty ;regulates Russell's affinity for the player short background ; regulates Russell's anecdotes about his background short Ranger; regulates Russell's willingness to discuss his military experience short Titus; regulates Russell's divulgence of his contact with Titus Vulcanus short Killer; regulates the killing topic short Upgrade; regulates whether he's recieved upgraded armor short Boone; regulates his animosity towards Boone short GrowUp; regulates topic short Glanton; regulates topic
Begin Gamemode
If (bRussellDoOnce != 1) aaRussellRef.addperk aaRussellNPCPerk set bRussellHireable to 0 set bRussellDoOnce to 1 endif
END

scn aaRussellMission01QuestScript
short Qualified short IsLegion
short Bloodstate short Bloodstartday
short VickersGreeted short VickersSaid short VickersFate; 1 = Gets Clean, 2 = Dies, 3 = Player fuels addiction, 4 = Terrifying Presence
short HandleyMet
short HSGreeted short HSBackup
short SecurityFixed short TunnelerCount short TunnelerBeaten
short TunnelerFate; 1 = Tunnelers invade Cholla Mountain, HS killed; 2 = Tunnelers Sealed off, still show up periodically; 3 = Queen killed, Tunnelers gone
short SolomonFate; 1 = Dead, 2 = Scared off
Short Volunteer
short BloodCool short GlantonGreeted short GlantonChose ; 1 = chose to help Glanton, 2 = convinced him to leave short GlantonKilled short GlantonLeft
short FuckYouGeck short RecruitHobo short RecruitDobbs short RecruitSullivan short RecruitKat short RecruitBriggs short RecruitParmley
short SWPeace short RWTGreeted
short MayorBackup
short SlaveGreeted short TitusGreeted short RussellPast
short PostTitus short KillMayor
short Dueled
short FinalDecision
Begin Gamemode
If GetStage aaRussellMission01 == 10 If Player.GetHasNote aaGlantonSafeNote == 1 aaRussellRef.Startconversation player, aaMission01RussellShackFoundNote setstage aaRussellMission01 15 endif endif
If GetStage aaRussellMission01 == 36 If TunnelerBeaten == 0 If TunnelerCount >= 10 setstage aaRussellMission01 41 set TunnelerBeaten to 1 endif endif endif
If GetStage aaRussellMission01 == 49 If Player.GetHasNote aaHSGlantonNote setstage aaRussellMission01 50 endif endif
If GetStage aaRussellMission01 == 60 If Player.GetHasNote aaPGODoyleNote setstage aaRussellMission01 65 endif endif
If GetStage aaRussellMission01 == 90 if Player.GetHasNote aaGlantonGangCanyonNote setstage aaRussellMission01 100 aaRussellRef.startconversation player, aaMission01RussellFoundCanyonNote endif endif
If Bloodstate == 1 Set Bloodstartday to GameDaysPassed Set Bloodstate to 2 ElseIf Bloodstate == 2 if GameDaysPassed - Bloodstartday >= .25 Set Bloodstate to 3 EndIf endif
If RecruitSullivan == 10 If aaSullivanREF.GetDistance aaCaruthersCanyonEntryTunnelMarkerREF <= 512 aaSullivanREF.killactor aaSullivanREF 1 aaSullivanREF.removeallitems set RecruitSullivan to 11 endif endif
END

SCN aaRussellBarkScript
Float ftimer Float fRandom
Int iCounter Short bRussellBarked Short bQuestDelayFast Short bRegionSection ;Regions divided into different script sections. An error occurs if sections exceeds 10 if/else nests.
Float fSpeakTime
Begin GameMode
If aaRussellRef.HasBeenHired != 1 ; Kill code if Russell is not in party. Return ElseIf Player.IsInCombat == 1 Return ElseIf (bRussellBarked == 1) && (GameDaysPassed >= fSpeakTime + .25) Set bRussellBarked to 0 Return ;;;Region Section ;Goodsprings first ElseIf bRussellBarked == 0 && IsPlayerInRegion VMapGoodspringsRegion == 1 aaRussellRef.SayTo aaRussellRef aaRussellLocGoodsprings 1 Set fSpeakTime to GameDaysPassed Set bRussellBarked to 1 Return ;Jacobstown Region Next ElseIf bRussellBarked == 0 && IsPlayerInRegion VMapJacobstownRegion == 1 AaRussellRef.SayTo AaRussellRef aaRussellLocJacobstown 1 Set fSpeakTime to GameDaysPassed Set bRussellBarked to 1 Return ;NCRCF Region next ElseIf bRussellBarked == 0 && IsPlayerInRegion VMapNCRCFRegion == 1 AaRussellRef.SayTo AaRussellRef aaRussellLocNCRNF 1 Set fSpeakTime to GameDaysPassed Set bRussellBarked to 1 Return ;Novac Region next ElseIf bRussellBarked == 0 && IsPlayerInRegion VMapNovacRegion == 1 AaRussellRef.SayTo AaRussellRef aaRussellLocNovac 1 Set fSpeakTime to GameDaysPassed Set bRussellBarked to 1 Return ;Fiend Region next ElseIf bRussellBarked == 0 && IsPlayerInRegion vMapVault3FiendRegion == 1 AaRussellRef.SayTo AaRussellRef aaRussellLocFiends 1 Set fSpeakTime to GameDaysPassed Set bRussellBarked to 1 Return ;Nellis Region next ElseIf bRussellBarked == 0 && IsPlayerInRegion vMapNellisAFBRegion == 1 AaRussellRef.SayTo AaRussellRef aaRussellLocNellis 1 Set fSpeakTime to GameDaysPassed Set bRussellBarked to 1 Return ;Boulder City next ElseIf bRussellBarked == 0 && IsPlayerInRegion VMapBoulderCityRegion == 1 AaRussellRef.SayTo AaRussellRef aaRussellLocBoulderCity 1 Set fSpeakTime to GameDaysPassed Set bRussellBarked to 1 Return ;Camp Forlorn Hope next ElseIf bRussellBarked == 0 && IsPlayerInRegion VMapCampForlornHopeRegion == 1 AaRussellRef.SayTo AaRussellRef aaRussellLocForlornHope 1 Set fSpeakTime to GameDaysPassed Set bRussellBarked to 1 Return ;Nelson Region next ElseIf bRussellBarked == 0 && IsPlayerInRegion vMapNelsonRegion == 1 AaRussellRef.SayTo AaRussellRef aaRussellLocNelson 1 Set fSpeakTime to GameDaysPassed Set bRussellBarked to 1 Return ElseIf bRussellBarked == 0 && (IsPlayerInRegion vMapRSAlphaRegion == 1 || IsPlayerInRegion vMapRSBravoRegion == 1 || IsPlayerInRegion vMapRSCharlieRegion == 1 || IsPlayerInRegion vMapRSDeltaRegion == 1 || IsPlayerInRegion vMapRSEchoRegion == 1 || IsPlayerInRegion vMapRSFoxtrotRegion == 1) Set fRandom to GetRandomPercent If fRandom <= 50 AaRussellRef.SayTo AaRussellRef aaRussellLocRangerStation 1 Set fSpeakTime to GameDaysPassed Set bRussellBarked to 1 Return Else ;50% chance that NCRlocation line is barked AaRussellRef.SayTo AaRussellRef aaRussellLocNCR 1 Set fSpeakTime to GameDaysPassed Set bRussellBarked to 1 Return Endif ;ElseIf bRussellBarked == 0 && IsPlayerInRegion VMapTheFortRegion == 1 ;Fort Region ;Set fRandom to GetRandomPercent ;If fRandom <= 50 ;50% chance that Fort line is barked ;AaRussellRef.SayTo AaRussellRef VCassLocationFort 1 ;Set fSpeakTime to GameDaysPassed ;Set bRussellBarked to 1 ;Return ;Else ;50% chance that Fort2 line is barked ;AaRussellRef.SayTo AaRussellRef VCassLocationFort2 1 ;Set fSpeakTime to GameDaysPassed ;Set bRussellBarked to 1 ;Return ;Bittersprings Region next ;Endif ElseIf bRussellBarked == 0 && IsPlayerInRegion VMAPBitterSpringsRegion == 1 AaRussellRef.SayTo AaRussellRef aaRussellLocBitterSprings 1 Set fSpeakTime to GameDaysPassed Set bRussellBarked to 1 Return ;Hoover Dam next ElseIf bRussellBarked == 0 && IsPlayerInRegion MapHooverDam == 1 AaRussellRef.SayTo AaRussellRef aaRussellLocHooverDam 1 Set fSpeakTime to GameDaysPassed Set bRussellBarked to 1 Return ;Mojave Outpost next ElseIf bRussellBarked == 0 && IsPlayerInRegion vMapMojaveOutpostRegion == 1 AaRussellRef.SayTo AaRussellRef aaRussellLocMojaveOutpost 1 Set fSpeakTime to GameDaysPassed Set bRussellBarked to 1 Return ;Red Rock Canyon next ElseIf bRussellBarked == 0 && IsPlayerInRegion VMapRedRockCanyonRegion == 1 AaRussellRef.SayTo AaRussellRef aaRussellLocRedRockCanyon 1 Set fSpeakTime to GameDaysPassed Set bRussellBarked to 1 Return ;Camp Guardian next ElseIf bRussellBarked == 0 && IsPlayerInRegion vMapCampGuardianRegion == 1 AaRussellRef.SayTo AaRussellRef aaRussellLocCampGuardian 1 Set fSpeakTime to GameDaysPassed Set bRussellBarked to 1 Return ;Nipton next ElseIf bRussellBarked == 0 && IsPlayerinRegion vMapNiptonRegion == 1 AaRussellRef.SayTo AaRussellRef aaRussellLocNipton 1 Set fSpeakTime to GameDaysPassed Set bRussellBarked to 1 Return ;Cottonwood Next ElseIf bRussellBarked == 0 && IsPlayerinRegion vMapCottonwoodCove == 1 AaRussellRef.SayTo AaRussellRef aaRussellLocCottonwood 1 Set fSpeakTime to GameDaysPassed Set bRussellBarked to 1 Return ;Black Mountain Next ElseIf bRussellBarked == 0 && IsPlayerinRegion vMapBlackMtnRegion == 1 AaRussellRef.SayTo AaRussellRef aaRussellLocBlackMt 1 Set fSpeakTime to GameDaysPassed Set bRussellBarked to 1 Return ;Quarry Junction Next ElseIf bRussellBarked == 0 && IsPlayerinRegion vMapQuarryJunctionRegion == 1 AaRussellRef.SayTo AaRussellRef aaRussellLocQuarryJunction 1 Set fSpeakTime to GameDaysPassed Set bRussellBarked to 1 Return ;Hidden Valley Next ElseIf bRussellBarked == 0 && IsPlayerinRegion VMapHiddenValleyRegion == 1 AaRussellRef.SayTo AaRussellRef aaRussellLocHiddenValley 1 Set fSpeakTime to GameDaysPassed Set bRussellBarked to 1 Return ;Primm Next ElseIf bRussellBarked == 0 && IsPlayerinRegion MapPrimm == 1 AaRussellRef.SayTo AaRussellRef aaRussellLocPrimm 1 Set fSpeakTime to GameDaysPassed Set bRussellBarked to 1 Return ;Camp Golf next ElseIf bRussellBarked == 0 && IsPlayerinRegion vMapRegionCampGolf == 1 AaRussellRef.SayTo AaRussellRef aaRussellLocGolf 1 Set fSpeakTime to GameDaysPassed Set bRussellBarked to 1 Return ;The Strip next ElseIf bRussellBarked == 0 && Player.GetInWorldSpace TheStripWorldNew == 1 ;50% chance that Fort line is barked AaRussellRef.SayTo AaRussellRef aaRussellLocStrip 1 Set fSpeakTime to GameDaysPassed Set bRussellBarked to 1 Return ;Freeside next ElseIf bRussellBarked == 0 && (Player.GetInWorldSpace FreesideWorld == 1 || Player.GetInWorldSpace FreesideNorthWorld == 1) AaRussellRef.SayTo AaRussellRef aaRussellLocFreeside 1 Set fSpeakTime to GameDaysPassed Set bRussellBarked to 1 Return Elseif bRussellBarked == 0 && IsPlayerinRegion VMapCampSearchlightRegion == 1 aaRussellRef.SayTo aaRussellRef aaRussellLocSearchlight 1 Set fSpeakTime to GameDaysPassed set bRussellBarked to 1 Return ElseIf bRussellBarked == 0 && Player.GetInWorldSpace TheStripWorldNew == 1 ;50% chance that Fort line is barked AaRussellRef.SayTo AaRussellRef aaRussellLocStrip 1 Set fSpeakTime to GameDaysPassed Set bRussellBarked to 1 Return ;;;;;;;;; Elseif bRussellBarked == 0 AaRussellRef.SayTo AaRussellRef aaRussellGeneralIdle 1 Set fSpeakTime to GameDaysPassed Set bRussellBarked to 1 Return EndIf End

scn aaChollaBridgeRockslideTriggerSCRIPT

scn FortCaesarScript
short Button short nPlayerMedicine short nPlayerLuck short nPlayerLuckBonus short nPlayerTotalMedicine short bEndGameButton short bStartedEndGame short bDoOnce
Short bSaveGame; Float fSaveTimer; Short nSaveEvent;
begin OnHit player
if (GetStageDone VMQ02 110 == 0) SetEnemy vCaesarsLegionTheFortFaction PlayerFaction SetStage VMQ02 110 endif
if (GetQuestCompleted VMS35 == 0) SetStage VMS35 255 endif
end
begin OnStartCombat player
if (bDoOnce == 0) && (GetStageDone VMQ02 110 == 0) SetEnemy vCaesarsLegionTheFortFaction PlayerFaction SetStage VMQ02 110 set bDoOnce to 1 EnableFastTravel 1 endif
end
begin OnActivate
if IsActionRef player
if VFreeformTheFort.bCaesarInComa && (FortCaesarRef.GetDead == 0)
if (GetStageDone VMS35 255 == 1) ; Failed state return
; Player doesn't have a Doctor's Bag or Surgical Tools elseif (player.GetItemCount NVDoctorBag == 0) && (player.GetItemCount VMS35SurgicalTools == 0) ShowMessage FortCaesarComaNoToolsNoBagMsg
; Player doesn't have a Doctor's Bag elseif (player.GetItemCount NVDoctorBag == 0) && (player.GetItemCount VMS35SurgicalTools > 0) ShowMessage FortCaesarComaNoBagMsg ; Player doesn't have the Surgical Tools
elseif (player.GetItemCount NVDoctorBag > 0) && (player.GetItemCount VMS35SurgicalTools == 0) ShowMessage FortCaesarComaNoToolsMsg
; Player has both a Doctor's Bag and Surgical Tools else ShowMessage FortCaesarComaMsg endif elseif (FortCaesarRef.GetDead == 0) && (player.IsSneaking) && (GetStageDone VMQ02 7 == 0) FortCaesarRef.StartCombat player else Activate endif
endif
end
begin MenuMode 1001
if bEndGameButton == 0 set Button to GetButtonPressed
if (Button == 1)
VMS35AutoDocRef.SetDestroyed 1 if (player.GetItemCount VMS35AutomaticSurgicalUnit > 0) player.RemoveItem VMS35AutomaticSurgicalUnit 1000 endif
player.RemoveItem VMS35SurgicalTools 1000
if player.GetAV Medicine >= 75 ; Caesar cured through Medical skill. set VMS35.nSurgeryStatus to 1 ShowMessage FortCaesarSurgerySuccess set VFreeformTheFort.bCaesarInComa to 0 FortCaesarRef.SetRestrained 0 FortCaesarRef.IgnoreCrime 0 set VStoryEventCaesarCured to 1 SetStage VMS35 100 elseif player.GetAV Medicine < 75 && player.GetAV Medicine >= 25 ; Caesar dies. set VMS35.nSurgeryStatus to 2 ShowMessage FortCaesarSurgeryDeath set VFreeformTheFort.bCaesarInComa to 0 FortCaesarRef.KillActor FortCaesarRef FortLuciusRef.AddScriptPackage FortLuciusConfrontPlayerPackage set VStoryEventCaesarKilled to 2 SetObjectiveDisplayed VMS35 15 0 SetObjectiveCompleted VMS35 20 1 SetObjectiveDisplayed VMS35 25 0 SetObjectiveDisplayed VMS35 30 0 SetObjectiveDisplayed VMS35 35 0 SetObjectiveDisplayed VMS35 40 0 SetObjectiveDisplayed VMS35 50 0 SetStage VMS35 101 else ; Caesar dies violently. set VMS35.nSurgeryStatus to 3 ShowMessage FortCaesarSurgeryDeath set VFreeformTheFort.bCaesarInComa to 0 FortCaesarRef.KillActor FortCaesarRef 1 FortLuciusRef.AddScriptPackage FortLuciusConfrontPlayerPackage set VStoryEventCaesarKilled to 2 SetObjectiveDisplayed VMS35 15 0 SetObjectiveCompleted VMS35 20 1 SetObjectiveDisplayed VMS35 25 0 SetObjectiveDisplayed VMS35 30 0 SetObjectiveDisplayed VMS35 35 0 SetObjectiveDisplayed VMS35 40 0 SetObjectiveDisplayed VMS35 50 0 SetStage VMS35 101 endif
elseif (Button == 2)
VMS35AutoDocRef.SetDestroyed 1 if (player.GetItemCount VMS35AutomaticSurgicalUnit > 0) player.RemoveItem VMS35AutomaticSurgicalUnit 1000 endif
player.RemoveItem VMS35SurgicalTools 1000
if (GetObjectiveDisplayed VMS35 15 == 1) SetObjectiveDisplayed VMS35 15 0 endif SetObjectiveDisplayed VMS35 20 0 SetObjectiveCompleted VMS35 25 1
; Caesar dies deliberately. set VMS35.nSurgeryStatus to 4 ShowMessage FortCaesarSurgeryDeath FortCaesarRef.KillActor FortCaesarRef set VFreeformTheFort.bCaesarInComa to 0 FortLuciusRef.AddScriptPackage FortLuciusConfrontPlayerPackage SetStage VMS35 101 set VStoryEventCaesarKilled to 2
elseif (Button == 3)
VMS35AutoDocRef.SetDestroyed 1 if (player.GetItemCount VMS35AutomaticSurgicalUnit > 0) player.RemoveItem VMS35AutomaticSurgicalUnit 1000 endif
player.RemoveItem VMS35SurgicalTools 1000
; Player succeeded through sheer luck. set VMS35.nSurgeryStatus to 5 ShowMessage FortCaesarSurgerySuccess set VFreeformTheFort.bCaesarInComa to 0 FortCaesarRef.SetRestrained 0 FortCaesarRef.IgnoreCrime 0 set VStoryEventCaesarCured to 1 SetStage VMS35 100
endif endif end
begin OnDeath
set VStoryEventCaesarKilled to 1
if (VStoryState < 40) Set VStoryState to 40 endif
if (GetObjectiveDisplayed VMQ02 90 == 1) SetObjectiveDisplayed VMQ02 90 0 endif
if (VNPCFollowers.bBooneHired) set VDialogueCraigBoone.nOpenness to VDialogueCraigBoone.nOpenness + 2; CraigBooneREF.SayTo player VDialogueCraigBooneCaesarDead; set VDialogueCraigBoone.bGreetCaesarDead to 1; endif
If aaRussellRef.HasBeenHired == 1 set aaRussellQuest.Loyalty to aaRussellQuest.Loyalty + 1 aaRussellRef.SayTo FortCaesarREF aaRussellBarkCaesarDead endif
; Player killed Caesar before surgery if (VMS35.nSurgeryStatus == 0) SetStage VMQ02 110 ; Player killed Caesar after curing him elseif (VMS35.nSurgeryStatus == 1) || (VMS35.nSurgeryStatus == 5) || (VMS35.nSurgeryStatus == 7) || (VMS35.nSurgeryStatus == 8) SetStage VMQ02 110 endif
; Caesar's bed and throne are now property of the player. Hail, Courier! FortCaesarThroneRef.SetOwnership CaesarBedRef.SetOwnership
; --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- \/ (10_30_10) Added to fix bug 38597 -ETB
if ( FortCaesarRef.GetItemCount VPlatinumChip > 0 ) FortCaesarRef.RemoveItem VPlatinumChip 1000
if ( player.getitemcount vplatinumchip == 0 ) player.additem vplatinumchip 1 if ( GetQuestRunning VMQHouse1 ) SetObjectiveCompleted VMQHouse1 12 1 SetObjectiveDisplayed VMQHouse1 20 1 endif endif endif
; --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- /\
end
BEGIN GameMode
;This code runs the savegame. If (bSaveGame == 1) If (fSaveTimer > 0) Set fSaveTimer to fSaveTimer - GetSecondsPassed Else If (nSaveEvent == 0)
SystemSave; Set fSaveTimer to 1.0; Set nSaveEvent to 1;
ElseIf (nSaveEvent == 1)
EnablePlayerControls;
;Show Message Script ShowMessage VEndGameWarningMsgLegion;
Set nSaveEvent to 0; Set bSaveGame to 2; EndIf EndIf EndIf
if bEndGameButton == 1 if ( bStartedEndGame == 0 ) set Button to GetButtonPressed if ( Button == 0 ) ;Reset Dialog Options So Caesar Redoes the "Are you ready" stuff. elseif ( Button == 1 ) set bStartedEndGame to 1
;Start Legion Stuff Set VHDBattleController.iBattleState to 2 VHDLegionLegateCampPreBattleEnableMarker.enable
player.MoveTo VHDLegateStartMarker
;Move Companions with the Player if (VNPCFollowers.bBooneHired) CraigBooneREF.MoveTo VHDLegateCampTPCompanionMarker endif if (VNPCFollowers.bCassHired) RoseofSharonCassidyREF.MoveTo VHDLegateCampTPCompanionMarker endif if (VNPCFollowers.bVeronicaHired) VeronicaREF.MoveTo VHDLegateCampTPCompanionMarker endif if (VNPCFollowers.bLilyHired) LilyREF.MoveTo VHDLegateCampTPCompanionMarker endif if (VNPCFollowers.RaulHired) RaulREF.MoveTo VHDLegateCampTPCompanionMarker endif if (VNPCFollowers.ArcadeHired) ArcadeREF.MoveTo VHDLegateCampTPCompanionMarker endif if (VNPCFollowers.bEDEHired) if EDE1Ref.GetDisabled == 0 EDE1Ref.MoveTo VHDLegateCampTPCompanionMarker; elseif EDE2Ref.GetDisabled == 0 EDE2Ref.MoveTo VHDLegateCampTPCompanionMarker; elseif EDE3Ref.GetDisabled == 0 EDE3Ref.MoveTo VHDLegateCampTPCompanionMarker; endif endif if (VNPCFollowers.RexHired) RexREF.MoveTo VHDLegateCampTPCompanionMarker endif
; Disable fast travel EnableFastTravel 0 0 1
; Reduce the delay in processing the Legion Hoover Dam script SetQuestDelay VHDLegionBattle 0.5
AutoSave
endif endif endif END

Short DoOnce
Begin OnTrigger Player
If GetStage aaRussellMission01 == 162 ;NOTE: Remember to script in cleanup if they pursue Glanton! ;;;Faction bullshit setally aaSilverwoodFaction playerfaction aaSWMilitia01REF.sifh 1 aaSWMilitia02REF.sifh 1 aaSWTurret01REF.sifh 1 aaSWTurret02REF.sifh 1 if aaRussellMission01.RecruitKat == 1 aaMissKatREF.sifh 1 endif if aaRussellMission01.RecruitHobo == 1 aaHoboCharlieREF.sifh 1 endif if aaRussellMission01.RecruitSullivan == 1 aaSullivanREF.sifh 1 endif
;;;AI Package bullshit aaSWMilitia01REF.removescriptpackage DefaultPatrolWeaponDrawn aaSWMilitia02REF.removescriptpackage DefaultPatrolWeaponDrawn ;aaSWMilitia03REF.removescriptpackage DefaultPatrolWeaponDrawn ;aaSWMilitia04REF.removescriptpackage DefaultPatrolWeaponDrawn aaSWMilitia01REF.addscriptpackage aaGuardLinkedNoMovementRussellModPackage aaSWMilitia02REF.addscriptpackage aaGuardLinkedNoMovementRussellModPackage ;aaSWMilitia03REF.addscriptpackage aaGuardLinkedNoMovementRussellModPackage ;aaSWMilitia04REF.addscriptpackage aaGuardLinkedNoMovementRussellModPackage
;;;start Legion attack! THIS IS SILVERWOOD!!! aaRussellRef.SayTo Player aaRussellMission01BattleStartBark01 set aaSheriffCapturedREF.Killed to 1 aaFlamerDecanusREF.enable aaFlamerDecanusREF.evp startquest aaSWLegionAttack set aaSWLegionAttack.WaveSent to 1 set DoOnce to 1 disable markfordelete endif
END

scn aaSWLegionAttackSCRIPT
Short WaveSent Short LegionCount Short FinalCount Short n
Begin GameMode
If WaveSent == 1 aaSWLegionSpawnPoint01REF.placeatme aaLvlSWLegionaryRecruit 1 128 0 aaSWLegionSpawnPoint01REF.placeatme aaLvlSWLegionaryRecruit 1 128 1 aaSWLegionSpawnPoint03REF.placeatme aaLvlSWLegionaryRecruit 1 128 2 aaSWLegionSpawnPoint03REF.placeatme aaLvlSWLegionaryRecruit 1 128 3 aaSWLegionSpawnPoint01REF.placeatme aaLvlSWLegionaryRecruit 1 256 0 set WaveSent to 2 endif
If WaveSent == 2 && LegionCount >= 4 ; 5 ;showmessage genericdebugmsg aaSheriffCapturedREF.kill aaSWLegionSpawnPoint02REF.placeatme aaLvlSWLegionaryDecanus 1 128 0 aaSWLegionSpawnPoint02REF.placeatme aaLvlSWLegionaryRecruit 1 128 1 aaSWLegionSpawnPoint04REF.placeatme aaLvlSWLegionaryRecruit 1 128 2 aaSWLegionSpawnPoint04REF.placeatme aaLvlSWLegionaryRecruit 1 128 3 aaSWLegionSpawnPoint02REF.placeatme aaLvlSWLegionaryRecruit 1 256 0 set WaveSent to 3 endif
If WaveSent == 3 && LegionCount >= 8; 10 aaSWLegionSpawnPoint01REF.placeatme aaLvlSWLegionaryDecanus 1 128 0 aaSWLegionSpawnPoint01REF.placeatme aaLvlSWLegionaryPrime 1 128 1 aaSWLegionSpawnPoint03REF.placeatme aaLvlSWLegionaryPrime 1 128 2 aaSWLegionSpawnPoint03REF.placeatme aaLvlSWLegionaryRecruit 1 128 3 aaSWLegionSpawnPoint01REF.placeatme aaLvlSWLegionaryRecruit 1 256 0 set WaveSent to 4 endif
If WaveSent == 4 && LegionCount >=12; 15 aaSWLegionSpawnPoint04REF.placeatme aaLvlSWLegionaryDecanus 1 128 0 aaSWLegionSpawnPoint04REF.placeatme aaLvlSWLegionaryPrime 1 128 1 aaSWLegionSpawnPoint02REF.placeatme aaLvlSWLegionaryPrime 1 128 2 aaSWLegionSpawnPoint02REF.placeatme aaLvlSWLegionaryPrime 1 128 3 aaSWLegionSpawnPoint04REF.placeatme aaLvlSWLegionaryPrime 1 256 0 set WaveSent to 5 endif
If WaveSent == 5 && LegionCount >=17; 20 aaSWLegionSpawnPoint03REF.placeatme aaLvlSWLegionaryDecanus 1 128 0 aaSWLegionSpawnPoint03REF.placeatme aaLvlSWLegionaryVeteran 1 128 1 aaSWLegionSpawnPoint01REF.placeatme aaLvlSWLegionaryVeteran 1 128 2 aaSWLegionSpawnPoint01REF.placeatme aaLvlSWLegionaryPrime 1 128 3 aaSWLegionSpawnPoint03REF.placeatme aaLvlSWLegionaryPrime 1 256 0 set WaveSent to 6 endif
If WaveSent == 6 && LegionCount >=22; 25 aaSWLegionSpawnPoint01REF.placeatme aaLvlSWLegionaryDecanus 1 128 0 aaSWLegionSpawnPoint01REF.placeatme aaLvlSWLegionaryVeteran 1 128 1 aaSWLegionSpawnPoint03REF.placeatme aaLvlSWLegionaryVeteran 1 128 2 aaSWLegionSpawnPoint03REF.placeatme aaLvlSWLegionaryVeteran 1 128 3 aaSWLegionSpawnPoint04REF.placeatme aaLvlSWLegionaryVeteran 1 256 0 set WaveSent to 7 endif
If WaveSent == 7 && LegionCount >=28; 30 aaSWLegionSpawnPoint02REF.placeatme aaLvlSWLegionaryCenturionLast 1 128 0 aaSWLegionSpawnPoint03REF.placeatme aaLvlSWLegionaryCenturionLast 1 128 1 aaSWLegionSpawnPoint02REF.placeatme aaLvlSWLegionaryVeteranLast 1 128 2 aaSWLegionSpawnPoint03REF.placeatme aaLvlSWLegionaryVeteranLast 1 128 3 aaSWLegionSpawnPoint02REF.placeatme aaLvlSWLegionaryVeteranLast 1 256 0 aaSWLegionSpawnPoint03REF.placeatme aaLvlSWLegionaryVeteranLast 1 256 0 set WaveSent to 8 endif
If WaveSent == 8 && FinalCount >= 6 ; 6 aaRussellRef.SayTo player aaRussellMission01AttackFinished aaTitusSlaveREF.enable setobjectivecompleted aaRussellMission01 162 1 set aaRussellMission01.SlaveGreeted to 1 aaTitusSlaveREF.evp set WaveSent to 10 stopquest aaSWLegionAttack endif
END

scn aaGenericCleanupRussellModScript
short deadstate short deadstartday
Begin OnDeath
If deadstate == 0 Set deadstartday to GameDaysPassed Set deadstate to 1 endif
END
Begin Gamemode
If deadstate == 1 if GameDaysPassed - deadstartday >= 2 disable markfordelete Set deadstate to 2 EndIf endif
END

SCN SheriffCapturedSCRIPT
Short Freed Short ThankedPlayer Short Button Short DoOnce
Short Killed
Float Timer
short deadstate short deadstartday
BEGIN OnLoad
if ( Freed == 1 ) disable else ( Freed == 0 ) RemoveFromFaction WastelandFreedCaptiveFACTION ; ignore crime so that I won't respond to friendly fire IgnoreCrime 1 ; reset restrained state so I can get back into position after load set DoOnce to 0 setRestrained 0 endif
END
Begin OnDeath
Set Killed to 2 aaFlamerDecanusREF.addtofaction VCaesarsLegionFaction 1 aaFlamerDecanusREF.addtofaction GeneralHostileToPlayerFaction 1 aaFlamerDecanusREF.addscriptpackage aaSWLegionAttackPackage
If deadstate == 0 Set deadstartday to GameDaysPassed Set deadstate to 1 ElseIf deadstate == 1 if GameDaysPassed - deadstartday >= 2 disable markfordelete Set deadstate to 2 EndIf endif
END

scn aaTitusSlaveScript
short deadstate short deadstartday
float timer short DoOnce
Begin OnDeath
setstage aaRussellMission01 164
If deadstate == 0 Set deadstartday to GameDaysPassed Set deadstate to 1 ElseIf deadstate == 1 if GameDaysPassed - deadstartday >= 2 disable markfordelete Set deadstate to 2 EndIf endif
If DoOnce == 1 set Timer to 4 aaRussellRef.Look aaTitusSlaveREF aaRussellRef.SayTo player aaRussellMission01SlaveExplodeBark set DoOnce to 2 else placeatme C4explosion 1, 2, 0 placeatme C4explosion 1, 2, 1 endif
END
Begin GameMode
set Timer to ( Timer - GetSecondsPassed )
If DoOnce == 1 set Timer to 4 aaRussellRef.SayTo player aaRussellMission01SlaveExplodeBark aaTitusSlaveRef.playidle MQ05RadDeath2HR02 set DoOnce to 2 endif
if ( Timer <= 1 ) && ( DoOnce == 2 ) set DoOnce to 3 aaRussellREF.stoplook placeatme C4explosion 1, 2, 0 placeatme C4explosion 1, 2, 1 endif
END

scn aaSuicideSlaveSCRIPT
float timer short DoOnce short detonated
BEGIN OnDeath
placeatme c4explosion 1, 2, 0 placeatme c4explosion 1, 2, 1
If DoOnce == 0 set Timer to 12 set DoOnce to 1 endif
END
Begin GameMode
If GetDistance Player <= 256 If Detonated == 0 removeitem SlaveCollar 1 kill set detonated to 1 endif endif
set Timer to ( Timer - GetSecondsPassed )
if ( Timer <= 2 ) && ( DoOnce == 1 ) set DoOnce to 2 disable markfordelete endif
END

scn aaSWLegionMongrelSCRIPT
float timer short DoOnce
BEGIN OnDeath
If DoOnce == 0 set Timer to 12 set DoOnce to 1 endif
END
Begin GameMode
set Timer to ( Timer - GetSecondsPassed )
if ( Timer <= 2 ) && ( DoOnce == 1 ) set DoOnce to 2 disable markfordelete endif
END

scn aaBridgeQuestSCRIPT
short GhoulCount short WaveSent
Begin Gamemode
If WaveSent == 1 If GhoulCount >= 10 ;12 ;enable wave 2 aaChollaBridgeGhoulsSouth02ParentRef.enable aaChollaBridgeGhoulsNorth02ParentRef.enable set WaveSent to 2 endif endif
if WaveSent == 2 If GhoulCount >= 20 ;24 ;enable wave 3 aaChollaBridgeGhoulsSouth03ParentRef.enable aaChollaBridgeGhoulsNorth03ParentRef.enable ;disable wave 1 aaChollaBridgeGhoulsSouth01ParentRef.enable aaChollaBridgeGhoulsSouth01ParentRef.markfordelete aaChollaBridgeGhoulsNorth01ParentRef.enable aaChollaBridgeGhoulsNorth01ParentRef.markfordelete set WaveSent to 3 endif endif
if WaveSent == 3 If GhoulCount >= 32 ;36 ;enable wave 4 aaChollaBridgeGhoulsSouth04ParentRef.enable aaChollaBridgeGhoulsNorth04ParentRef.enable ;disable wave 2 aaChollaBridgeGhoulsSouth02ParentRef.enable aaChollaBridgeGhoulsSouth02ParentRef.markfordelete aaChollaBridgeGhoulsNorth02ParentRef.enable aaChollaBridgeGhoulsNorth02ParentRef.markfordelete set WaveSent to 4 endif endif
if WaveSent == 4 If GhoulCount >= 42 ;48 ;enable wave 5 aaChollaBridgeGhoulsSouth05ParentRef.enable aaChollaBridgeGhoulsNorth05ParentRef.enable ;disable wave 3 aaChollaBridgeGhoulsSouth03ParentRef.enable aaChollaBridgeGhoulsSouth03ParentRef.markfordelete aaChollaBridgeGhoulsNorth03ParentRef.enable aaChollaBridgeGhoulsNorth03ParentRef.markfordelete set WaveSent to 5 endif endif
if WaveSent == 5 If GhoulCount >= 54 ;60 ;enable wave 6 aaChollaBridgeGhoulsSouth06ParentRef.enable aaChollaBridgeGhoulsNorth06ParentRef.enable ;disable wave 4 aaChollaBridgeGhoulsSouth04ParentRef.enable aaChollaBridgeGhoulsSouth04ParentRef.markfordelete aaChollaBridgeGhoulsNorth04ParentRef.enable aaChollaBridgeGhoulsNorth04ParentRef.markfordelete set WaveSent to 6 stopquest aaBridgeQuest endif endif
END

scn aaDobbsNPCSCRIPT
short CrippleRandomizer short bIsCrippled
BEGIN OnLoad if bIsCrippled == 0 set CrippleRandomizer to GetRandomPercent if CrippleRandomizer <= 25 SetActorValue LeftMobilityCondition 0 set bIsCrippled to 1 elseif CrippleRandomizer > 25 && CrippleRandomizer <=50 SetActorValue RightMobilityCondition 0 set bIsCrippled to 1 endif endif
END

scn aaSullivanNPCSCRIPT
short deadstate short deadstartday

scn aaTitusIntroTriggerSCRIPT
Short DoOnce
Begin OnTrigger Player
If GetStage aaRussellMission01 == 164 If DoOnce == 0 set aaRussellMission01.TitusGreeted to 1 aaRussellREF.Sayto Player aaRussellMission01RussellWhereAsshole aaTitusVulcanusREF.enable aaTitusBadass01REF.enable aaTitusBadass02REF.enable aaTitusVulcanusREF.evp aaTitusBadass01REF.evp aaTitusBadass02REF.evp ;aaRussellREF.SetCombatStyle FollowersCombatStyleMelee ;set aaRussellREF.CombatStyleRanged to 0 ;set aaRussellREF.CombatStyleMelee to 1 aaSWCampCrittersParentREF.disable aaSWCampCrittersParentREF.markfordelete set doOnce to 1
If aaRussellMission01.RecruitKat == 1 If aaMissKatREF.GetDead == 0 set aaSWUnmarked.KatFate to 2 endif endif
If aaRussellMission01.RecruitParmley == 1 If aaSWCourierREF.GetDead == 0 set aaSWUnmarked.ParmleyFate to 2 endif endif
If aaRussellMission01.RecruitHobo == 1 If aaHoboCharlieREF.GetDead == 0 If aaSWUnmarked.CharlieFate < 2 set aaSWUnmarked.CharlieFate to 5 elseif aaSWUnmarked.CharlieFate == 2 set aaSWUnmarked.CharlieFate to 6 endif endif endif
disable markfordelete endif endif
END

If deadstate == 0 Set deadstartday to GameDaysPassed Set deadstate to 1 ElseIf deadstate == 1 if GameDaysPassed - deadstartday >= 2 disable markfordelete Set deadstate to 2 EndIf endif

scn aaSWUnmarkedQuestSCRIPT
short CharlieFate; 1 = started; 2 = records on the way/Did not fight, no records, 3 = Died in battle (records), 4 = Died in battle (no records); 5 = Fought, no records; 6 = Fought, records short FinleyFate; 1 = subject came up, 2 = stays with Khans, 3 = Fiends, 4 = Followers, 5 = Dead short HendershotFate; 1 = Thriving; 2 = Abandoned; 3 = Dead short BriggsFate; 1 = invests, succeeds in California; 2 = saves, stays in Silverwood, disappointed, 3 = Died in battle short KatFate; 1 = avoids battle, run out of town; 2 = fights in battle, remains successful, 3 = Died in battle short MayorFate; 1 = stays as Mayor; 2 = opens practice in Cali; 3 = becomes preacher; 4 = Dead short SullivanFate; 1 = remains worker; 2 = becomes foreman, dies; 3 = opens boxing gym in Reno, 4 = Died in battle short ParmleyFate; 1 = remains courier, disappears; 2 = joins NCR, thrives, 3 = Died in battle

ScriptName aaRussellEndingSCRIPT
; Used for the End Slides
Short bSlideShowStarted; ; Used to initialize what's needed for the start of the End Slides (prevent the player from doing anything and teleport them to the "theatre") Float fTimer; ; Timer used to delay the start of the Ending Slide sequence Short Triggered; ; Used to play the "abridged" version of the Ending Slide sequence
;Used for dumbass topic progression - JAW, 06.11.2014
short BriggsTopic short CharlieTopic short FinleyTopic short GlantonTopic short HendershotTopic short KatTopic short MayorTopic short ParmleyTopic short RussellTopic short SandWolvesTopic short SilverwoodTopic short StartTopic short SullivanTopic short VickersTopic
BEGIN GameMode
If ( bSlideShowStarted == 0 ) ; Has the initialization run yet?
DisablePlayerControls 0 0 1 0 0 0 1;
If ( Triggered == 1 ) ; Do we want to skip the delay? Set fTimer To .9; ; Set the timer to start the sequence EndIf
Set fTimer To ( fTimer + GetSecondsPassed ); ; Increment the delay timer
If ( fTimer >= 1 ) ; Delay to allow the Tunnel Collapse sequence to finish Set bSlideShowStarted to 1; ; Prevent the script from running again
Player.DispelAllSpells; ; Removes all chem effects RemoveImageSpaceModifier NVDLC02SacredDaturaPoisonISFX; ; Removes Dark Datura poison visual effect Player.CastImmediateOnSelf NVDLC02RestUp; ; Restore the player's Dehydration, Sleep Deprivation, and Starvation Player.ResetHealth; ; Heal the player and remove any crippling damage PipBoyRadioOff; ; Turn off PipBoy radio
PlayMusic EndSlideShow;
SetInCharGen 1; ; Keep the player from leveling during the show Player.AddScriptPackage NVDLC02PlayerNoSavePackage; ; Prevent the player from saving the game DisablePlayerControls 1 1 1 1 1 1 1; ; Prevent the player from disrupting the show
Set aaRussellSlideshowTriggerREF.bRunScript To 1; ; Set Trigger's variable to let Ending Slide sequence run. Player.MoveTo aaEndingWaitMarkerREF; ; Send the player to the "theatre" to begin slide show
EndIf
EndIf
END
ScriptName aaRussellNarratorSCRIPT

ScriptName aaRussellSlideshowEndTriggerSCRIPT
; Used to reset player controls once the Ending Slide sequence is over.
BEGIN OnTriggerEnter Player
If ( GetQuestRunning aaRussellEnding == 1 )
; Reset control to player SetInCharGen 0; ; Let the player level Player.RemoveScriptPackage NVDLC02PlayerNoSavePackage; ; Let the player save the game EnablePlayerControls 1 1 1 1 1 1 1; ; Give control back to the player
setstage aaRussellMission01 190 aaRussellRef.enable aaRussellREF.removescriptpackage aaConvoPostMayorPackage aaRussellREF.removescriptpackage aaConvoKillMayorPackage aaRussellRef.moveto aaRussellCompanionReturnMarkerREF aaHartTunnelMojaveExtDoorREF.lock 255 set SomeguyMaster.MartinStatus to 1 if aaRussellQuest.loyalty >= 6 showmessage aaRussellUpgradeMessage aaRussellRef.additem aaRussellDRArmor 1 100 set aaRussellQuest.Upgrade to 1 endif StopQuest aaRussellEnding; ; No need to keep the quest running since we're done with it
Disable; markfordelete
EndIf
END

scn aaCaruthersCanyonDoorREF
;used to initiate slideshow
short Button short Chose
BEGIN OnActivate player If Getstage aaRussellMission01 == 185 ShowMessage aaCaruthersDoorMessage else activate endif END
BEGIN GameMode
set Button to GetButtonPressed
if (Getstage aaRussellMission01 == 185) && (Chose == 0)
if ( Button == 1 ) DisablePlayerControls 1 1 1 1 1 1; StartQuest aaRussellEnding set Chose to 1 endif
if ( Button == 2 ) setstage aaRussellMission01 190 ;aaRussellRef.enable player.moveto aaRussellEndReturnMarkerREF aaRussellRef.moveto aaRussellCompanionReturnMarkerREF aaHartTunnelMojaveExtDoorREF.lock 255 if aaRussellQuest.loyalty >= 6 showmessage aaRussellUpgradeMessage aaRussellRef.additem aaRussellDRArmor 1 100 set aaRussellQuest.Upgrade to 1 startquest aaSWVengeance set aaSWVengeance.state to 1 endif set Chose to 1 StopQuest aaRussellEnding; ; No need to keep the quest running since we're done with it endif
endif
END

END
