ESP.ORIGINAL: Baby, I'm reborn.
ESP.TRADUIT: 宝贝，我重生了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_Regenerating_00008544_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Good as new.
ESP.TRADUIT: 完好如新。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_Regenerating_00008545_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: OnFire
{Screaming}
ESP.TRADUIT: {尖叫}
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Screaming}
ESP.TRADUIT: {尖叫}
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Fear

ESP.ORIGINAL: Poison
ESP.TRADUIT: 中毒

ESP.ORIGINAL: Can't walk straight, vision is off.
ESP.TRADUIT: 走不直，视力不好。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQuest_Poisoned_0000853E_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Something's in my bloodstream, and it ain't scotch.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我血液里有东西，但不是威士忌。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQuest_Poisoned_0000853F_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Messed around and got poisoned.
ESP.TRADUIT: 胡闹，还中毒了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQuest_Poisoned_00008540_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm gonna be sick.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我要吐了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQuest_Poisoned_00008542_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: FollowersOverburdened
Christ, I can hear my back popping.
ESP.TRADUIT: 天啊，我都能听到我的后背在跳了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Puzzled Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_FollowersOverbu_00005C3B_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's not happening.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不会发生的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Puzzled Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_FollowersOverbu_00005C3C_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Honestly, how much of this shit do you really need?
ESP.TRADUIT: 说实话，你到底需要多少这玩意？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Puzzled Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_FollowersOverbu_00005C3D_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ever heard of "Overencumbered Man"? That's me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 听说过“超重侠”吗?那就是我。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Puzzled Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_FollowersOverbu_000112E1_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: PLAYERENTERSIRONSIGHTS
FollowersStealthing
Not a noise.
ESP.TRADUIT: 并非噪音。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_FollowersStealt_00005C3E_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's the way.
ESP.TRADUIT: 就是这样。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_FollowersStealt_00005C3F_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Swift and silent.
ESP.TRADUIT: 静谧速度.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_FollowersStealt_00005C40_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I need to get going.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我得走了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Later.
ESP.TRADUIT: 回见。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaRussellGOODBY_00005C03_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What brings you to the Mojave?
ESP.TRADUIT: 什么风把你吹到莫哈韦来了？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I followed a bounty here not long ago, but the trail ran cold. I've been getting by working as a caravan guard, but it's not the same.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不久前我追着一个悬赏到了这里，但没找到线索。只能一直靠给商队当守卫过活，但那不一样。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaRussellWhatBr_00005BFD_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I should get back on the hunt, but I just don't know... I used to pride myself on finding every mark I was after, but I lost him.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我应该重新开始狩猎，但我不知道...我以前很骄傲能找到我要找的每一个目标，但我没找到他。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaRussellWhatBr_00005BFD_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Good. I guess we'll start where I left off, up north of town. Trader by the name of Tonopah Tim said he sighted Glanton up there.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好。我们就从上次的地方开始吧，镇子北边。一个叫托诺帕·蒂姆的商人说他在那边看到了格兰顿。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaRussellWhatBr_00005C2A_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I followed a lead to some old shack, but couldn't find shit. Might as well give it another look.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我顺着一条路到了一间旧棚屋，但什么也没找到。还是再看一眼吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaRussellWhatBr_00005C2A_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaRussellQuest.bRussellHireable to 1 Set aaRussellREF.Waiting to 0 Set aaRussellREF.IsFollowingDefault to 1 Set aaRussellREF.IsFollowingLong to 0 Set aaRussellREF.CombatStyleRanged to 1 Set aaRussellREF.CombatStyleMelee to 0 Set aaRussellREF.HasBeenHired to 1 aaRussellREF.SetPlayerTeammate 1 aaRussellREF.SetIgnoreFriendlyHits 1 aaRussellRef.IgnoreCrime 1 aaRussellRef.AddToFaction FollowerFaction 1 aaRussellRef.SetFactionRank TeammateFaction 1 Player.AddPerk aaRussellPerk aaRussellREF.evp startquest aaRussellMission01
showmessage aaMessagePerkRussellAdd startquest aaRussellBark set SomeguyMaster.JoaquinStatus to 1 setstage aaRussellMission01 5
I'm ready to go after that bounty now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我准备好去拿那笔赏金了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ok, for starters, I might remember the time I was enslaved and branded as a child, then get a sudden urge to cut your fucking throat.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，首先，我可能记得我小时候曾被奴役和烙上烙印，然后突然有一种冲动想要割了你他妈的喉咙。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaRussellWhatBr_00005C2B_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Or it could be this nice scar on my face, or the eye that was taken by a centurion. You start crowing for the Legion, and I just might snap.
ESP.TRADUIT: 也可能是我脸上的伤疤，或者是被一个百夫长带走的眼睛。你开始为军团欢呼可能会让我崩溃。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaRussellWhatBr_00005C2B_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: But you know what, I think people have the power to change. I'll strike you a deal.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但你知道吗，我认为人们有能力改变。我和你做个交易。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaRussellWhatBr_00005C2B_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you publicly renounce Caesar, Lanius, and the Legion, then I'll consider the matter settled, and we can team up. Deal?
ESP.TRADUIT: 但你知道吗，我认为人们有能力改变。我和你做个交易。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaRussellWhatBr_00005C2B_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: How does my loyalty to the Legion keep us from working together?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我对军团的忠诚为何阻碍了我们的合作?

ESP.ORIGINAL: What happened to your face?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你的脸怎么了？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Nothing. My face is just fine.
ESP.TRADUIT: 什么都没有。我的脸很好。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaRussellFaceIn_000057FB_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sorry, I didn't mean anything. I was just curious.
ESP.TRADUIT: 对不起，我没别的意思。我只是好奇。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah, well, curiosity killed the cocksucker, or something like that.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是啊，好奇害死了那个混蛋什么的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaRussellFaceCo_000057FE_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'd prefer not to discuss it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不想讨论这个问题。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaRussellFaceCo_000057FE_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Uh, you know that your face looks like roast beef, right? I'm just saying.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你知道你的脸看起来像烤牛肉，对吧？我就是说说。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Asshole, you better stop right there, or I'll play tic-tac-toe on your face with my knife.
ESP.TRADUIT: 混蛋，你最好给我站住，不然我就用刀在你脸上玩井字游戏。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaRussellFaceDi_000057FF_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Where are you from?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你从哪儿来的？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Everywhere and nowhere, partner. Does it really matter?
ESP.TRADUIT: 到处都是，伙计。这真的重要吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaRussellNotHir_00005C02_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Tell me about the bounty you were after.
ESP.TRADUIT: 跟我说说你在追的悬赏。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Might as well, he's long gone.
ESP.TRADUIT: 还是算了，他早就走了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaRussellNotHir_00005C0D_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Fellah by the name of Glanton, used to work as a scalphunter for the NCR.
ESP.TRADUIT: 一个叫格兰顿的家伙，曾在NCR做过猎头者。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaRussellNotHir_00005C0D_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: See, back when the republic was brushing up against some nasty tribals and raiders down south, they hired Glanton to clean them out.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当共和国在南部遭遇一些讨厌的部落和掠夺者时，他们雇了格兰顿来清除他们。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaRussellNotHir_00005C0D_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Glanton and his gang were making so much money that pretty soon they stopped caring about whose scalp they took, be it women or children.
ESP.TRADUIT: 格兰顿和他的团伙赚了很多钱，很快他们就不再在乎他们剥了谁的头皮，是女人还是孩子。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaRussellNotHir_00005C0D_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Brass tried to put a lid on it, declared him an outlaw, but it didn't matter. Settlers loved Glanton, made him into a hero.
ESP.TRADUIT: 布拉斯想要封杀他，宣布他是逃犯，但这无关紧要。移民者喜欢格兰顿，把他捧成了英雄。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaRussellNotHir_00005C0D_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If settlers or miners run into trouble with tribals, they hire Glanton. Wasn't until recently that the government got serious about him.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果定居者或矿工跟部落发生冲突，他们都会去找格兰顿。直到最近政府才对他认真起来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaRussellNotHir_00005C0D_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: A few months back, the NCR finally put a bounty of ten thousand caps on his head. I decided it would be worth my while to go after him.
ESP.TRADUIT: 几个月前，NCR终于给他开出了一万瓶盖的悬赏。我觉得值得花时间去追他。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest

ESP.ORIGINAL: Just my luck, he drifted south of the Mojave when I was trailing him. Rumor is that he was meeting up with some old accomplice, Judge Richter.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我很幸运，我跟踪他的时候他流落到了莫哈韦沙漠的南部。有传言说他要去见一个老同伙，审判官里克特。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaRussellNotHir_00005C0D_8.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Apparently this guy ran with Glanton years ago. You don't by chance know anything about him, do you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 显然这家伙几年前和格兰顿在一起。你不会碰巧了解他吧?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaRussellNotHir_00005C0D_9.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaRussellNotHiredNVBCheck
Wait, that was you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 等等，是你吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaRussellNotHir_00005C0E_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I heard the Judge was killed by a pack of geckos, ripped him to pieces. They're very territorial, you know?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我听说审判官被一群蜥蜴杀了，把他撕成了碎片。它们的领地意识很强，你知道吗?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaRussellNotHir_00005C0E_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I killed the Judge.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我杀了审判官。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Damn, that seems to be the consensus around here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 该死，这似乎是这里的共识。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaRussellNotHir_00005C0F_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: No, I don't know him.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不，我不认识他。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaRussellNotHiredREPUTATION
Then we have nothing more to talk about.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那我们就没什么好说的了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaRussellNotHir_00005C1D_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaRussellMission01.IsLegion to 1
Yes, I remain true to Caesar. What of it?
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，我忠于凯撒。怎么了？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaRussellNotHiredSpeech
I'll respectfully disagree, but I gather you're pretty persuasive. That could help if we get in a tight spot.
ESP.TRADUIT: 恕我不同意，但我想你很有说服力。如果我们陷入困境那会有帮助的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaRussellNotHir_00005C1B_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I do have to ask, though - you're not in bed with Caesar's Legion, are you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 但我得问你，你不是凯撒军团的人吧?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaRussellNotHir_00005C1B_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaRussellMission01.Qualified to 1
Sometimes a silver tongue is more useful than any weapon.
ESP.TRADUIT: 有时候，能言善辩比任何武器都有用。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I can put a round through a bloatfly's eye at three hundred yards.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我能在三百码外射穿巨大苍蝇的眼睛。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Now you're talking. I think you'll work out just fine.
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在你说话。我想你会做得很好的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaRussellNotHir_00005C17_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I do have to ask, though - you're not in bed with Caesar's Legion, are you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 但我得问你，你不是凯撒军团的人吧?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaRussellNotHir_00005C17_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaRussellMission01.Qualified to 1
Did you say scalp-hunting? That's right up my alley.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你是说剥头皮吗？那正合我意。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, we won't exactly be scalping people, but I get your drift. Being handy with a blade is damn useful in the bush. You'll do.
ESP.TRADUIT: 虽然我们不是在剥人的头皮，但我明白你的意思。在丛林中，能熟练使用刀片是非常有用的。你会的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaRussellNotHir_00005C1A_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I do have to ask, though - you're not in bed with Caesar's Legion, are you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 但我得问你，你不是凯撒军团的人吧?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaRussellNotHir_00005C1A_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaRussellMission01.Qualified to 1
People tell me I have an intimidating presence.
ESP.TRADUIT: 人们都说我很吓人。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hell yes, you've got that crazy look in your eyes, like a wild animal. That could be useful. Would you stop looking at me like that?
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，你的眼神很疯狂，就像野兽一样。这可能有用，但你能别这样看着我吗?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Fear Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaRussellNotHir_00005C18_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I do have to ask, though - you're not in bed with Caesar's Legion, are you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 但我得问你，你不是凯撒军团的人吧?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaRussellNotHir_00005C18_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaRussellMission01.Qualified to 1
I can turn all our enemies into gelatinous, glowing goo.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我可以把我们的敌人都变成发光的胶状黏液。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Damn energy weapons are more trouble than they're worth, but I suppose that'll do.
ESP.TRADUIT: 该死的能量武器带来的麻烦比它们的价值还多，但我觉得那也够了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaRussellNotHir_00005C15_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I do have to ask, though - you're not in bed with Caesar's Legion, are you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 但我得问你，你不是凯撒军团的人吧?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaRussellNotHir_00005C15_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaRussellMission01.Qualified to 1
I find that blowing shit up solves a lot of problems.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我发现爆炸可以解决所有问题。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I have a similar outlook. That'll do just fine.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我也有类似的看法。就这样吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaRussellNotHir_00005C16_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I do have to ask, though - you're not in bed with Caesar's Legion, are you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 但我得问你，你不是凯撒军团的人吧?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaRussellNotHir_00005C16_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaRussellMission01.Qualified to 1
aaRussellNotHiredSurvival
I have considerable medical experience.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我有丰富的医疗经验。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Excellent. I know how to cook up some tribal remedies, but nothing beats real medicine.
ESP.TRADUIT: 太好了。我知道如何调制一些部落草药，但没有什么比真正的药更好的了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaRussellNotHir_00005C19_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I do have to ask, though - you're not in bed with Caesar's Legion, are you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 但我得问你，你不是凯撒军团的人吧?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaRussellNotHir_00005C19_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaRussellMission01.Qualified to 1
aaRussellNotHiredProposeTeamUp
Not a bad idea, especially considering your background. Anybody who can take down Richter is qualified in my book.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这主意不错，尤其是考虑到你的背景。在我看来，任何能打倒里克特的人都是合格的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaRussellNotHir_00005C13_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I do have to ask, though - you're not in bed with Caesar's Legion, are you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 但我得问你，你不是凯撒军团的人吧?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaRussellNotHir_00005C13_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaRussellMission01.Qualified to 1
Why don't we work together? We can split the bounty on Glanton.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们为什么不一起工作呢?我们可以平分格兰顿的赏金。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Teaming up would have its advantages, but I need to make sure you can handle yourself. What are your qualifications?
ESP.TRADUIT: 合作当然是有好处的，但我得确保你能搞定你自己。你有什么资历?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaRussellNotHir_00005C14_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaRussellMission01.Qualified to 1
Why don't we work together? We can split the bounty on Glanton.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们为什么不一起工作呢?我们可以平分格兰顿的赏金。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaRussellNotHiredRepHouse
House? The piss-drinker up in the tower? Suit yourself.
ESP.TRADUIT: 豪斯吗?那个在塔里撒尿的家伙?随便你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaRussellNotHir_00005C1E_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Look, I'd like to get started after Glanton right away. Are you ready to go?
ESP.TRADUIT: 听着，我想马上开始处理格兰顿的案子。你准备好出发了吗?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaRussellNotHir_00005C1E_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: No, I'm actually working with Mr. House.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不，我是豪斯先生的同事。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaRussellNotHiredRepNCR
Yeah, you and every other swinging dick in this valley. Fucking NCR, I should've expected it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是，你和这个山谷里所有其他摆动的鸡巴。 该死的NCR，我早该预料到的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaRussellNotHir_00005C23_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Look, I'd like to get started after Glanton right away. Are you ready to go?
ESP.TRADUIT: 听着，我想马上开始处理格兰顿的案子。你准备好出发了吗?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaRussellNotHir_00005C23_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hardly. I work for the NCR.
ESP.TRADUIT: 几乎没有。我在NCR工作。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaRussellNotHiredRepInd
Really? Good luck with that. I'd love to see it happen, but you'll pardon me if I'm a little skeptical.
ESP.TRADUIT: 真的吗?祝你好运。我很想看到它发生，但请原谅我有点怀疑。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaRussellNotHir_00005C24_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Look, I'd like to get started after Glanton right away. Are you ready to go?
ESP.TRADUIT: 听着，我想马上开始处理格兰顿的案子。你准备好出发了吗?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaRussellNotHir_00005C24_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: No, I'm trying to make New Vegas independent.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不，我想让新维加斯独立。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaRussellNotHiredRepNoDecision
Good to know. I can respect that.
ESP.TRADUIT: 很高兴知道。我尊重这一点。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaRussellNotHir_00005C27_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Look, I'd like to get started after Glanton right away. Are you ready to go?
ESP.TRADUIT: 听着，我想马上开始处理格兰顿的案子。你准备好出发了吗?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaRussellNotHir_00005C27_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I haven't committed to any faction just yet.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我还没有加入任何派别。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sure, let's go.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当然，咱们走吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Good, I guess we'll start where I left off, up north of town. Trader by the name of Tonopah Tim said he sighted Glanton up there.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好。我们就从上次的地方开始吧，镇子北边。一个叫托诺帕·蒂姆的商人说他在上面看到了格兰顿。.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaRussellMissio_00005C28_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaRussellQuest.bRussellHireable to 1 Set aaRussellREF.Waiting to 0 Set aaRussellREF.IsFollowingDefault to 1 Set aaRussellREF.IsFollowingLong to 0 Set aaRussellREF.CombatStyleRanged to 1 Set aaRussellREF.CombatStyleMelee to 0 Set aaRussellREF.HasBeenHired to 1 aaRussellREF.SetPlayerTeammate 1 aaRussellREF.SetIgnoreFriendlyHits 1 aaRussellRef.IgnoreCrime 1 aaRussellRef.AddToFaction FollowerFaction 1 aaRussellRef.SetFactionRank TeammateFaction 1 Player.AddPerk aaRussellPerk aaRussellREF.evp startquest aaRussellMission01
showmessage aaMessagePerkRussellAdd startquest aaRussellBark set SomeguyMaster.JoaquinStatus to 1 setstage aaRussellMission01 5
I need some time to get ready.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我需要一些时间来准备。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Every second we wait allows Glanton to cover more ground. Hurry up.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们每等一秒格兰顿就能找到更多地方。快点。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaRussellMissio_00005C29_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Very well. I, [%], publically renounce Caesar, Lanius, and the Legion.
ESP.TRADUIT: 很好。我，[%]，公开宣布放弃凯撒，拉尼尔斯和军团。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You know, this partnership might just work out after all.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你知道吗，我们的合作会有结果的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaRussellLegion_00005C32_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Look, I'd like to get started after Glanton right away. Are you ready to go?
ESP.TRADUIT: 听着，我想马上开始处理格兰顿的案子。你准备好出发了吗?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaRussellLegion_00005C32_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: addreputation RepNVCaesarsLegion 0 25
set aaRussellMission01.IsLegion to 0
You would dare ask me to impugn the Son of Mars? I'll have your head, profligate! <Attack>
ESP.TRADUIT: 你竟敢让我去指责玛尔斯之子？我要砍了你的头，堕落者！<攻击>

ESP.ORIGINAL: Partner, you just made my day.
ESP.TRADUIT: 搭档，你让我今天很开心。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaRussellLegion_00005C2F_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: startcombat aaRussellRef
I won't do that.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不会那么做的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Then walk on, meretrix.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那就走吧，娼妓。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaRussellLegion_00005C30_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Then walk on, culus.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那就走吧，小屁眼。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaRussellLegion_00005C31_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'd like to ask you something.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想问你点事。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Like what?
ESP.TRADUIT: 比如？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaRussellAskYou_00027184_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaRussellNipton
Fucking Legion.
ESP.TRADUIT: 操他妈的军团。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaRussellLocNip_00006066_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Nipton wasn't perfect, but it sure didn't deserve this.
ESP.TRADUIT: 尼普顿并不完美，但它也不该变成这样。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaRussellLocNip_00006067_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Legion are a bunch of savages.
ESP.TRADUIT: 军团是一群野蛮人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaRussellLocNip_00006068_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Legion has cruelty down to an art.
ESP.TRADUIT: 军团把残忍当作一门艺术。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaRussellLocNip_00006069_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaBARKNVLocation
Watch for traps in here. Fiends might be high, but they aren't entirely stupid.
ESP.TRADUIT: 注意这里的陷阱。恶魔帮也许嗑药了，但他们也不傻。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaBARKNVLocatio_000060F3_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaRussellQuest.BarkLocation to 0
Miss Wientraub, you are a sight for sore, uh... eye. I mean, nice vault suit, yeah.
ESP.TRADUIT: 温特罗布小姐，见到你真...呃...高兴！我是说，不错的金库套装，对。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaBARKNVLocatio_000060F7_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaRussellQuest.BarkLocation to 0
It wasn't enough to kill the Khans - they had to subjugate and humiliate them. That's the NCR way.
ESP.TRADUIT: 杀死大汗帮是不够的，我们必须征服和羞辱他们。这就是NCR的方法。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaBARKNVLocatio_000060F8_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaRussellQuest.BarkLocation to 0
God, look at this place. Maybe the Khans should do themselves a favor and give up. Better than following a used-up drunk like Papa.
ESP.TRADUIT: 天啊，看看这个地方。也许大汗帮应该帮自己个忙，放弃这个地方。总比跟在像爸爸这样的酒鬼后面好。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaBARKNVLocatio_000060FC_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaRussellQuest.BarkLocation to 0
Welcome to the puzzle palace.
ESP.TRADUIT: 欢迎来到五角大楼。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaBARKNVLocatio_00006104_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaRussellQuest.BarkLocation to 0
Might have to find myself a card game in here, chief. Very tempting.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我得在这里找个玩牌的机会了，头儿。很诱人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaBARKNVLocatio_00006108_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaRussellQuest.BarkLocation to 0
The Followers are good people, just a touch idealistic at times. I hope the NCR doesn't run them off.
ESP.TRADUIT: 天启追随者们都是好人，只是偶尔有点理想主义。我希望NCR不会把他们赶走。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaBARKNVLocatio_0000610C_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaRussellQuest.BarkLocation to 0
This guy rubs me the wrong way.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这家伙惹毛我了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaBARKNVLocatio_00006110_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaRussellQuest.BarkLocation to 0
Hallelujah for air conditioning. Feels great in here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 上帝的冷空气！在这里感觉很棒！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaBARKNVLocatio_00006114_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaRussellQuest.BarkLocation to 0
I gotta admit, chief - I'm jealous of the mutants living up here. Secluded, cool climate. Reminds me of the north rim, when I was a kid.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我得承认，长官，我嫉妒住在这里的变种人。隐蔽的,凉爽的气候。让我想起了我小时候的北缘。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaBARKNVLocatio_00006532_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaRussellQuest.BarkLocation to 0
Have to give credit to the Boomers for looking after their kids' education. Just wish more people could do it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不得不承认大炮族对孩子的照顾和教育。真希望能有更多的人这样做。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaBARKNVLocatio_00006537_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaRussellQuest.BarkLocation to 0
Mark my words - one day the Legion is gonna swallow every ounce of shit they've heaped on everyone else. Fucking savages, all of them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 记住我的话，总有一天军团会把他们堆在别人身上的每一盎司屎都吞下去。该死的野蛮人，全都是。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaBARKNVLocatio_0000653B_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaRussellQuest.BarkLocation to 0
Do not fuck up in here. Deathclaws will shit on your world.
ESP.TRADUIT: 别在这里搞砸了。死亡爪会在你的世界里拉屎的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Fear Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaBARKNVLocatio_0000653F_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaRussellQuest.BarkLocation to 0
Fucking Legion. I say we pay it back to those cocksuckers with interest.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他妈的军团。要我说，我们会连本带利还给那些混蛋的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaBARKNVLocatio_00006543_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaRussellQuest.BarkLocation to 0
This wouldn't be a bad duty station. Beats roasting down by the river, waiting to get bushwhacked by the Legion.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是个不错的工作地点。比在河边烧烤，等着被军团砍死要好。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaBARKNVLocatio_00006547_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaRussellQuest.BarkLocation to 0
You know this is a Deathclaw den, right? Right? You're gonna get me killed, you crazy fuck.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你知道这是死亡爪的巢穴吧?对吧?你会害死我的，你个疯子。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Fear Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaBARKNVLocatio_0000654B_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaRussellQuest.BarkLocation to 0
Ah, the Jackals... shitstain of the Mojave.
ESP.TRADUIT: 啊,豺狼帮......莫哈韦废土的狗屎。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaBARKNVLocatio_0000654F_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaRussellQuest.BarkLocation to 0
I wish the Rangers could've had some of the Enclave's technology. The thought of air support against the Legion... it gives me a hard-on.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我希望游骑兵能拥有英克雷的一些技术。比如空中支援军团...它让我硬了起来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaBARKNVLocatio_00006553_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaRussellQuest.BarkLocation to 0
Cazadors are the fucking worst. Saw a guy get stung by one, swelled up like ripe fruit, then bled out from every orifice. You're on point, right?
ESP.TRADUIT: 巨大苍蝇是他妈的最糟糕的。 看到一个人被蜇伤，然后就像成熟的水果一样膨胀，接着从身体里的每个孔流血。 你说得是对的，对吧？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaBARKNVLocatio_00006557_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaRussellQuest.BarkLocation to 0
Damn vaults are a death trap, if you ask me. Were they even meant to save anyone?
ESP.TRADUIT: 要我说，该死的保险库是个死亡陷阱。他们是为了救人吗?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaBARKNVLocatio_0000655B_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaRussellQuest.BarkLocation to 0
Hey, you saw that sign outside, right? It said, "The plants kill." You don't really care, do you? Fuck me, I should've stayed at the 188.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你看到外面的牌子了吧?上面写着:“植物会杀人。”你根本不在乎，对吧?我操，我应该待在188贸易站。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Fear Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaBARKNVLocatio_0000655F_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaRussellQuest.BarkLocation to 0
If the dead could speak, they'd say... fuck the NCR.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果死人能说话，他们会说......操他妈的NCR。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaBARKNVLocatio_00006563_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaRussellQuest.BarkLocation to 0
For the record, Ulysses was a royal cunt. Good on you for offing him.
ESP.TRADUIT: 事先声明，尤利西斯是个皇家王八蛋。很高兴你杀了他。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaBARKNVLocatio_00006981_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaRussellQuest.BarkLocation to 0
Looks like somebody had too much time on their hands.
ESP.TRADUIT: 看来某人有太多闲工夫了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaBARKNVLocatio_00006DBF_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaRussellQuest.BarkLocation to 0
aaRussellBarkCaesarDead
Sic semper tyrannis, motherfucker.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这就是暴君的下场，操你妈的
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaRussellBarkCa_0000699E_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaRussellQuest.Loyalty to aaRussellQuest.Loyalty +1
aaRussellBarkVulpesNiptonDead
Lex talionis, fox-fucker.
ESP.TRADUIT: 同态复仇，福克斯蠢蛋。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaRussellBarkVu_00006DBC_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaRussellLocGoodsprings
Feeling nostalgic about your near-death experience?
ESP.TRADUIT: 怀念你的濒死体验吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaRussellLocGoo_00007062_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Good people here. Hopefully they can keep the Powder Gangers out.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这里的人好。希望他们能把炸药帮挡在外面。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaRussellLocGoo_00007063_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You met Sunny Smiles? Not much for conversation, but she's easy on the eyes.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你见过微笑桑尼了?她话不多，但她长得很好看。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaRussellLocGoo_00007064_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Where's Easy Pete? I always liked jawing with that old fart.
ESP.TRADUIT: 简单皮特在哪儿?我一直喜欢听那个老家伙唠叨。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaRussellLocGoo_00007065_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaRussellLocJacobstown
Damn, it feels great up here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 妈的，在这感觉真好。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaRussellLocJac_00007067_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Reminds me of Flagstaff. Fucking beautiful.
ESP.TRADUIT: 让我想起了旗杆市。真他妈的漂亮。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaRussellLocJac_00007068_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Air seems cleaner in the mountains. I love it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 山里的空气似乎比较干净。我爱它。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaRussellLocJac_00007069_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If the mutants were looking for seclusion, they found it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果变种人想隐居，他们找到好地方了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaRussellLocJac_0000706A_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Been a while since I've seen real trees.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我很久没见过真正的树了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaRussellLocJac_0000706B_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaRussellLocN
Powder Gangers. What a fucking joke.
ESP.TRADUIT: 炸药帮。真是他妈的笑话。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaRussellLocNCR_0000706D_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Looks like the clink is closed.
ESP.TRADUIT: 看来酒吧关门了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaRussellLocNCR_0000706E_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What a shithole. Powder Gangers couldn't take care of a wet dream.
ESP.TRADUIT: 什么狗屎。"炸药帮"连个春梦都解决不了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaRussellLocNCR_0000706F_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaRussellLocNovac
Where's that crazy sonofabitch, No-Bark?
ESP.TRADUIT: 那个狗娘养的疯子，不叫了？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaRussellLocNov_00007071_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: That gecko's mouth looks like a nifty perch.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那只蜥蜴的嘴看起来像一条漂亮的鲈鱼。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaRussellLocNov_00007072_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Lot of caravans pass through here. Good spot for finding work.
ESP.TRADUIT: 很多商队会经过这里。找工作的好地方。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaRussellLocNov_00007073_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Humming with hunger}Hmm, I think they're grilling steaks in that tent.
ESP.TRADUIT: {饥饿地哼唱}嗯，我想他们在那个帐篷里烤牛排。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaRussellLocNov_00007074_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaRussellLocFiends
Where do the Fiends get their energy weapons? Makes no fucking sense.
ESP.TRADUIT: 恶魔帮的能量武器是从哪里来的?这说不通啊。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaRussellLocFie_00007076_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Goddamn Fiends.
ESP.TRADUIT: 该死的恶魔帮。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaRussellLocFie_00007077_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hmm... chems, burning tires, and human shit. That's the smell of Fiends.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯...毒品，燃烧的轮胎，还有人类的粪便。那就是恶魔帮的味道。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaRussellLocFie_00007078_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Fuck the Khans for giving chems to these animals.
ESP.TRADUIT: 去他妈的大汗帮给这些畜生喂药。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaRussellLocFie_0000707A_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You ever heard of Eileen? That Fiend cunt likes to cut off dicks and keep them as souvenirs.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你听说过艾琳吗?那个恶魔帮女人喜欢割下鸡巴留作纪念品。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaRussellLocFie_00007079_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaRussellLocNellis
Boomers are a bunch of nutjobs. I hear they're all inbred.
ESP.TRADUIT: 大炮族就是一群疯子。我听说他们都是近亲繁殖。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaRussellLocNel_0000707C_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: These people have too much weaponry for their own damn good.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这些人拥有的武器太多了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaRussellLocNel_0000707D_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Watch it, these fuckers will drop shells on a radroach that gets in their killzone.
ESP.TRADUIT: 小心，这些混蛋会把炮弹扔到一只进入他们杀戮区的蟑螂身上。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaRussellLocNel_0000707E_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Maybe I should marry a Boomer girl. God knows I'd get some badass weapons out of the arrangement.
ESP.TRADUIT: 也许我该娶个出生在大炮族的女孩。天知道我能从中得到什么厉害的武器。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaRussellLocNel_0000707F_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'd pay good money to see the Legion try to attack this place. I doubt an entire cohort could pull it off.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我愿意付一大笔钱看军团攻击这里，不过我怀疑他们做不到。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaRussellLocNel_00007080_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaRussellLocBoulderCity
I could go for a shot at the Big Horn.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我可以去大角酒吧喝一杯。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaRussellLocBou_00007082_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: NCR did a number on this town.
ESP.TRADUIT: NCR在镇上做了不少事。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaRussellLocBou_00007083_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Nice memorial. I guess the Desert Rangers don't rate one.
ESP.TRADUIT: 漂亮的纪念碑，我想沙漠游骑兵不会评价这个。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaRussellLocBou_00007084_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Must have been a hell of a fight here back in '77.
ESP.TRADUIT: 77年的时候这里一定打得很激烈吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaRussellLocBou_00007085_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaRussellLocForlornHope
Welcome to Camp Suicide.
ESP.TRADUIT: 欢迎来到自杀营地。

ESP.ORIGINAL: NCR conscripts are useless as tits on a gecko.
ESP.TRADUIT: NCR新兵就像蜥蜴的奶头一样没用。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaRussellLocFor_00007088_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sometimes I think the NCR might beat the Legion. Then I see this place.
ESP.TRADUIT: 有时我觉得NCR可能会打败军团。然后我看到了这个地方。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaRussellLocFor_00007089_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: This garrison couldn't fight its way out of a shithouse.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这支守军连从厕所打出来的能力都没有。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaRussellLocFor_0000708A_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The OIC should be ashamed. No morale, no discipline. Fucking heinous.
ESP.TRADUIT: 主管人员应该感到羞耻。没有士气，没有纪律。他妈的令人发指。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaRussellLocFor_0000708B_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Lanius would smile if he saw this cesspool.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果拉尼尔斯看到这个粪坑，他会笑的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaRussellLocFor_0000708C_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaRussellLocNelson
NCR has no excuse for giving the Legion a toehold here.
ESP.TRADUIT: NCR没有理由让军团在这里立足。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaRussellLocNel_0000708E_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: How the fuck did the Legion ever manage to take this place?
ESP.TRADUIT: 他妈的军团是怎么占领这里的?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaRussellLocNel_0000708F_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Fucking Legion.
ESP.TRADUIT: 操他妈的军团。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaRussellLocRangerStation
The one true hope for the NCR: Rangers.
ESP.TRADUIT: NCR唯一的希望是:游骑兵。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I might have run ops with some of these guys and gals back in the day.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我以前可能和这些人一起执行过任务。

ESP.ORIGINAL: At least the rangers are squared away.
ESP.TRADUIT: 至少游骑兵都准备好了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Looks relatively secure.
ESP.TRADUIT: 看起来相对安全。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaRussellLocRan_00007095_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaRussellLocNCR
NCR is everywhere these days.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如今NCR无处不在。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaRussellLocNCR_00007097_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Can't go five miles without running into the damn bear.
ESP.TRADUIT: 走不到五英里就会碰到那只该死的熊。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaRussellLocNCR_00007098_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaRussellLocBitterSprings
Goddamn, you can smell the piss for miles.
ESP.TRADUIT: 该死的，你可以闻到几英里的尿味。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaRussellLocBit_0000709A_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: NCR taxpayer dollars, hard at work.
ESP.TRADUIT: 纳税人的钱，努力工作。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaRussellLocBit_0000709B_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: These poor saps should head for Red Rock.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这些可怜的笨蛋应该去红石峡谷。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaRussellLocBit_0000709D_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The Khans used to be badasses of the wastes. Makes you think, huh?
ESP.TRADUIT: 大汗帮从前就是废土上的混蛋，让你有些想法了，哈？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaRussellLocBit_0000709E_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaRussellLocHooverDam
They built some amazing shit in the old world, didn't they?
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们在旧世界造了些很棒的东西，不是吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaRussellLocHoo_000070A0_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Dumbass legion wouldn't know what to do with the dam even if they had it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 就算军团的傻逼有水坝也不知道该拿它怎么办。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaRussellLocHoo_000070A1_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'd like to toss a Legionary over the side, watch his head come apart on the concrete. Just a thought.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我真想把一个军团兵扔出去，看着他的头摔在水泥地上。就是想想
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaRussellLocHoo_000070A2_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why the fuck should the NCR or the Legion keep the dam? It belongs to New Vegas.
ESP.TRADUIT: 为什么NCR或者军团要占领水坝？它属于新维加斯。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaRussellLocHoo_000070A3_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: They should get that gun working, use it on the Legion.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们应该把枪修好，用在军团身上。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaRussellLocHoo_000070A4_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaRussellLocMojaveOutpost
I didn't shake their fucking hand. Monument is bullshit.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我他妈的没跟他们握手。纪念碑纯粹胡说。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaRussellLocMoj_000070A6_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why do you even bring me here? You know that thing pisses me off.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你为什么带我来这里?你知道那东西让我很生气。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaRussellLocMoj_000070A7_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So the Desert Rangers are immortalized in the form of a rusty, four-story mannequin? Great.
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以沙漠游骑兵是以一个生锈的四层楼高的人体模型而不朽的吗?真棒。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaRussellLocMoj_000070A8_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: NCR can take that monument and ram it up Kimball's ass.
ESP.TRADUIT: NCR可以把那座纪念碑塞到金博尔的屁股里。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaRussellLocMoj_000070A9_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaRussellLocRedRockCanyon
Whoo! Somebody is cooking jet.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哇！有人在煮杰特。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaRussellLocRed_000070AB_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I guess the Khans still have their pride. They don't have shit else.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我猜大汗帮还有点自尊心，他们也没有什么别的东西了
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaRussellLocRed_000070AC_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The Great Khans. Bit of an oxymoron now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 大汗帮，现在有点矛盾了
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaRussellLocRed_000070AD_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I bet this place was something to see before the Khans moved in.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我打赌这地方在大汗帮搬进来之前是值得一看的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaRussellLocRed_000070AE_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaRussellLocCampGuardian
How the fuck do you get killed by lakelurks? Honestly.
ESP.TRADUIT: 说真的，你他妈怎么会被湖沼蟹打死的？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaRussellLocCam_000070B0_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: NCR was reaching when they put a garrison way out here.
ESP.TRADUIT: NCR在这里设置了一条驻军通道。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaRussellLocCam_000070B1_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hell of a view up here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这里的景色真不错。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaRussellLocCam_000070B2_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Not a soul left in camp.
ESP.TRADUIT: 营地里连个鬼都没有。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaRussellLocCam_000070B3_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: This is why you have to take sentry duty seriously. I bet somebody fell asleep.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这就是为什么你要认真把守哨岗。我打赌有人睡着了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaRussellLocCam_000070B4_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaRussellLocCottonwood
I just wish there were more of them to kill.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我只希望能杀更多的人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaRussellLocCot_000070B6_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Motherfuckers need to stay on their side of the river.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那些混蛋得待在河那边。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaRussellLocCot_000070B7_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I guess they gave up on this place.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我猜他们放弃了这个地方。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaRussellLocCot_000070B8_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I say we burn it all down and piss on the ashes.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我建议我们把它烧了，然后在灰上撒泡尿。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaRussellLocCot_00013A9F_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaRussellLocBlackMt
Hope you brought Rad-X.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我希望你带了防辐射药
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaRussellLocBla_000070BA_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Heard this place is occupied by hostile mutants. Watch your step.
ESP.TRADUIT: 听说这里被敌对的变种人占领了。小心你的脚步。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaRussellLocBla_000070BB_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Mutants up here are armed to the teeth.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这里的变种人全副武装。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaRussellLocBla_000070BC_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I just want to meet the lunatic who's broadcasting from up top. Great stuff.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我只是想见见那个在上面广播的疯子。很棒的东西。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaRussellLocBla_000070BD_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaRussellLocQuarryJunction
Fuck me, Deathclaws.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我操，死亡爪。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Fear Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaRussellLocQua_000070BF_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Please tell me you brought some real firepower.
ESP.TRADUIT: 拜托告诉我你带了真正的武器。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Fear Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaRussellLocQua_000070C0_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Careful, I don't want to end up Deathclaw shit.
ESP.TRADUIT: 小心点，我可不想最后变成死亡爪的屎。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Fear Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaRussellLocQua_000070C1_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaRussellLocHiddenValley
What the fuck is up with the storms in this place?
ESP.TRADUIT: 这地方的风暴他妈的是怎么回事？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaRussellLocHid_000070C3_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Should have brought goggles. Fucking sand.
ESP.TRADUIT: 应该带护目镜的，该死的沙子。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaRussellLocHid_000070C4_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Scorpions all over this bitch.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这婊子身上全是蝎子。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaRussellLocHid_000070C5_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaRussellLocPrimm
Heard a bounty hunting firm was near here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 听说附近有家赏金猎人公司。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaRussellLocPri_00007CBE_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Wasn't Randall and Associates near Primm?
ESP.TRADUIT: 兰道尔赏金事务所不是在普瑞姆附近吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaRussellLocPri_00007CBF_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Bison Steve doesn't look too lucky to me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 野牛史蒂夫旅馆在我看来不太幸运。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaRussellLocPri_00007CC0_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Looks like a train to nowhere. Why the hell did they build shit like that in the Old World?
ESP.TRADUIT: 看起来像是一列去不了任何地方的火车。他们为什么要在旧世界造这种破东西？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaRussellLocPri_00007CC1_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Maybe I should run for sheriff.
ESP.TRADUIT: 也许我该竞选警长。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaRussellLocPri_00007CC2_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: NCR can't even keep the Powder Gangers away. Pathetic.
ESP.TRADUIT: NCR连炸药帮都挡不住，可悲。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaRussellLocPri_00007CC3_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Met Deputy Beagle once. He might be good for stopping bullets, but that's about it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 见过比格尔警官一次。他也许能挡子弹，但仅此而已。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaRussellLocPri_00007CC4_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I think the Mojave Express owes you some worker's comp.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我觉得莫哈韦快递欠你一些工人补偿。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaRussellLocPri_00007CC5_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaRussellLocGolf
So much clean water. Amazing.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这么多干净的水，很神奇。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaRussellLocGol_00007CC7_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Who the fuck is Golf?
ESP.TRADUIT: 谁他妈的是高尔夫？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaRussellLocGol_00007CC8_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: These shitbirds can't even keep the place squared away.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这些混蛋连这地方都收拾不好。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaRussellLocGol_00007CC9_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hanlon is setting a hell of an example here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 汉隆在这里树立了一个好榜样。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaRussellLocGol_00007CCA_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You seen the miscarriages, er, misfits, whatever they're called?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你见到那些流产的，不适应生存环境的，他们叫什么来着？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaRussellLocGol_00007CCB_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Let me run this camp. I'd PT these POG's so much that fighting the Legion would be a welcome reprieve.
ESP.TRADUIT: 让我来管理这个营地，我会练到他们觉得与军团作战是一种解脱。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaRussellLocGol_00007CCC_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Fucking heinous.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他妈的令人发指。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaRussellLocGol_00007CCD_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaRussellLocStrip
Lot of fortunes lost right here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在这里损失了巨款。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaRussellLocStr_00007CCF_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: NCR trooper just showed me her tits. I'm liking this place more every day.
ESP.TRADUIT: 一个NCR士兵给我看了她的奶子。我一天比一天喜欢这个地方。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaRussellLocStr_00007CD0_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hookers are calling my name.
ESP.TRADUIT: 妓女们在叫我的名字。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaRussellLocStr_00007CD1_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't trust those damn robots.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不相信那些该死的机器人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaRussellLocStr_00007CD2_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Every been to Vault 21? Pretty girl works the counter there.
ESP.TRADUIT: 去过21号避难所吗？漂亮女孩在那边的柜台工作。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaRussellLocStr_00007CD3_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Damn, I'm in the wrong line of work. Should've opened a casino.
ESP.TRADUIT: 该死，我做错了工作。应该开个赌场。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaRussellLocStr_00007CD4_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Can we meet Mr. New Vegas? I want to punch him in the throat.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们能见见新维加斯先生吗？我真想一拳打在他喉咙上。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaRussellLocStr_00007CD5_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I bet the locals get really sick of this music after a while.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我打赌当地人过一段时间就会厌倦这种音乐。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaRussellLocStr_00007CD6_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaRussellLocSearchlight
What the bloody fuck happened here?
ESP.TRADUIT: 这里到底发生了什么？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaRussellLocSea_00007CE0_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Zombies.
ESP.TRADUIT: 僵尸。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaRussellLocSea_00007CE1_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Might want to pop Rad-X. Rads are rising.
ESP.TRADUIT: 也许得吃点防辐射药，辐射剂量正在上升。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaRussellLocSea_00007CE2_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Heard the Legion might have chemical weapons, but this is different.
ESP.TRADUIT: 听说军团可能有化学武器，但这是不同的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaRussellLocSea_00007CE3_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Let's put these poor fucks out of their misery.
ESP.TRADUIT: 让这些可怜的家伙从痛苦中解脱吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaRussellLocSea_00007CE4_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: No way Lanius or Caesar planned this. My money's on Mr. Vulpes Inculta, that slimy shit.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不可能是拉纽斯或凯撒计划的。我赌是沃尔普斯·因库塔先生，那个混蛋。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaRussellLocSea_00007CE5_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Rads read like a warhead went off here, but there's no blast damage. Fucking weird.
ESP.TRADUIT: 雷达显示像是有弹头爆炸了，但没有爆炸造成伤害。他妈的奇怪。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaRussellLocSea_00007CE6_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaRussellLocFreeside
Kings? Queens, if you ask me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 猫王帮？女王帮！如果你问我的话。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaRussellLocFre_00007CD9_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Van Graffs are a bunch of snakes.
ESP.TRADUIT: 范·格拉夫家族是一群阴险的人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaRussellLocFre_00007CDA_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Kings spend money on clothes and hair gel while kids are eating rats in the street. Nice.
ESP.TRADUIT: 猫王帮的家伙把钱花在衣服和发胶上，而孩子们却在街上吃老鼠，棒极了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaRussellLocFre_00007CDB_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Followers are the only bright spot around here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 天启追随者是这里唯一的亮点。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaRussellLocFre_00007CDC_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The locals look hungry and desperate. We'd best watch our step.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当地人看起来又饿又绝望。我们最好小心点。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaRussellLocFre_00007CDD_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Mick and Ralph's is a good shop. They're pretty square dealers.
ESP.TRADUIT: 米克和拉尔夫的商店很好，他们是正直的商人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaRussellLocFre_00007CDE_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I always had a soft spot for the Atomic Wrangler. It reminds me of most of the women I've known - sleazy, but fun.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我一直很喜欢原子牛仔。他们让我想起了我认识的大多数女人--虽然不体面，但很有趣。
