ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaRussellLocFre_00007CDF_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaRussellGeneralIdle
This beats the hell out of sitting at the 188.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这比坐在188号公路上强多了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaRussellGenera_00007CE8_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Good to be on the road.
ESP.TRADUIT: 上路的感觉真好。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaRussellGenera_00007CE9_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Watch out for Legion assassins. Fuckers pop up at the worst times.
ESP.TRADUIT: 小心军团刺客。最糟糕的时候总会有混蛋出现。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaRussellGenera_00007CEA_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I gotta piss.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我要去撒尿。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaRussellGenera_00007CEC_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I could go for a Nuka Cola.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想来杯核子可乐。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaRussellGenera_00007CED_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Damn dust gets in everything here. Gonna have to clean my rifle again.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这里到处都是灰尘。我得再擦一遍我的步枪。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaRussellGenera_00007CEE_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Feels good to stretch my legs again.
ESP.TRADUIT: 再伸伸腿感觉真好。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaRussellGenera_00013A93_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hope I can kill a Legionary today.
ESP.TRADUIT: 希望我今天能干掉一个军团兵。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaRussellGenera_00013A9A_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Goddamn heat is making my balls itch.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他妈的热得我蛋蛋都痒了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaRussellGenera_00013A9C_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Shouldn't have eaten that iguana last night. Ugh.
ESP.TRADUIT: 昨晚不该吃那只鬣蜥的。啊！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Puzzled Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaRussellGenera_000060DE_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Raul, you smell like a burned-out shithouse.
ESP.TRADUIT: 劳尔，你闻起来像个烧焦的厕所。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaRussellGenera_000060E0_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Raul might be the one bastard in the Mojave who's uglier than me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 劳尔可能是莫哈韦沙漠里比我还丑的混蛋。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaRussellGenera_000060E3_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: First Recon. Please.
ESP.TRADUIT: 第一侦察营。请。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaRussellGenera_000060E1_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If aaRussellQuest.Boone == 0 set aaRussellQuest.Boone to 1 endif
I think you need a drink, Boone. You are one morose motherfucker.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我觉得你需要喝一杯，布恩。你真是个郁闷的混蛋。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaRussellGenera_000060E2_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If aaRussellQuest.Boone == 0 set aaRussellQuest.Boone to 1 endif
So, does all of First Recon keep a fence post wedged up their ass, or is it just you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 第一侦察营的所有人都把屁股钉在栅栏上吗，还是只有你？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaRussellGenera_000060E4_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If aaRussellQuest.Boone == 0 set aaRussellQuest.Boone to 1 endif
Boone, did the NCR give you a commendation for blasting Khan kiddies? That's right, keep on eye-fucking me, asshole.
ESP.TRADUIT: 布恩，NCR表彰过你炸死大汗帮的孩子吗？没错，看着我，混蛋。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaRussellGenera_000060E5_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If aaRussellQuest.Boone == 0 set aaRussellQuest.Boone to 1 endif
This mouthy broad is going to give me an ulcer.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这个大嘴巴会让我溃疡的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaRussellGenera_000060E6_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Damn robots on the strip have more firepower than a squad of grunts. You really trust them?
ESP.TRADUIT: 长街上这些该死的机器人火力比一小队步兵还强。你真的信任他们？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaRussellGenera_000060E8_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Arcade, any chance you could fix me up with a badass, cybernetic eyeball?
ESP.TRADUIT: 阿卡德，你能不能给我介绍个厉害的眼球机器人？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaRussellGenera_000060E7_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm sweating like a whore in church.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我像在教堂里的妓女一样出汗。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaRussellGenera_000060DF_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't understand the fuss over Sunset Sasparilla. Tastes like rancid fruit to me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不明白为什么这么关心夕阳沙士。尝起来像发臭的水果。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaRussellGenera_000060E9_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You ever talk to that kid underneath the 188? You know, that one with the squirrel trap on his dome? Creeps me the fuck out.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你跟188贸易站下面的那个孩子谈过吗？就是头顶上有捕鼠器的那个？吓死我了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaRussellGenera_000060EB_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You got any spare tobacco? Never enough of it to go around.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你有多余的烟草吗?钱总是不够用。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaRussellGenera_000060ED_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: People around here complain about the Fiends, but they're nothing compared to the 80's.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这里的人都在抱怨恶魔帮，但和80年代帮相比，他们算不了什么。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaRussellGenera_000060EE_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Just once... I'd like to see it rain in this shithole.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哪怕一次......我想看这鬼地方下雨。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaRussellGenera_000060EC_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Somebody told me a nest of Deathclaws lives on a ridge across the river. Probably just bullshit.
ESP.TRADUIT: 有人告诉我有一窝死亡爪住在河对岸的山脊上。可能只是废话。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaRussellGenera_000060EA_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: This beats guarding shitty caravans any day.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这总比看守破车队强。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaRussellGenera_00013A9D_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'd like a drink.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想喝一杯。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You got it, partner.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你懂的，伙计。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joe Briggs [0400AE6B] (mod) Quest : ([0400B29B]aaSilverwoodDialogue) Generic Dialogue for Persistent NPC's EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaSilverwo_aaBriggsBuyDrin_0000B29E_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: showbartermenu
aaRussellMission01AlmostCanyonBark
That should be the exit up ahead. Funny how time flies when you travel underground.
ESP.TRADUIT: 前面应该就是出口了。真有趣，你在地下旅行时时间过得真快。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellM_aaRussellMissio_0000C375_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaRussellMission01HereCanyonBark
And here it is, Caruthers Canyon. I believe there's a town called Silverwood further ahead. Hold on, somebody's out there.
ESP.TRADUIT: 就是这里，卡拉瑟斯峡谷。我想前面有个小镇叫银木镇。等一下，有人在外面。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellM_aaRussellMissio_0000C379_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaRussellSWGateBark
It takes a lot of time and manpower to build walls like this. They must be damn scared of somebody out there.
ESP.TRADUIT: 建造这样的墙需要大量的时间和人力。他们肯定是被外面的什么人吓坏了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellM_aaRussellSWGate_0000C381_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Can I buy some medical supplies?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我能买些医疗用品吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sure can.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当然可以。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doc Hennessy [04009DCE] (mod) Quest : ([0400B29B]aaSilverwoodDialogue) Generic Dialogue for Persistent NPC's EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\MaleGenericGhoul\aaSilverwo_aaHennesseyBuyS_0000C7A5_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: showbartermenu
aaMission01GlantonIntro
Welcome to Silverwood. I've been expecting you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 欢迎来到银木镇。我一直在等你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Glanton [04010EA5] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\MaleAdult05\aaRussellM_aaMission01Glan_0000C7AA_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaRussellMission01.GlantonGreeted to 2 set aaRussellMission01.Bloodstate to 1
aaRussellMission01FoundGlantonBark
You do the talking, chief. I'll be ready if this goes south.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你来说话，头儿。如果事情搞砸了，我会准备好的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellM_aaRussellMissio_0000C7B5_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What are you doing here?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你在这干嘛？

ESP.ORIGINAL: The citizens have employed me to cleanse the canyon of a malignant band of nomads, the Sand Wolves.
ESP.TRADUIT: 居民们雇我来清理峡谷里邪恶的游牧部落，沙狼。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Glanton [04010EA5] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\MaleAdult05\aaRussellM_aaMission01Glan_0000C7BD_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Once the rest of my men arrive, I'll find and kill every one of the heathens, let these settlers live in peace.
ESP.TRADUIT: 等我剩下的人到了，我会找到并杀死所有的异教徒，让这些定居者和平生活。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Glanton [04010EA5] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\MaleAdult05\aaRussellM_aaMission01Glan_0000C7BD_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: How did you know I was tracking you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你怎么知道我在跟踪你？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Give me a little credit. First saw you outside of Primm before those grunts got the jump on us.
ESP.TRADUIT: 相信我。我们第一次在普瑞姆见到你是在那些步兵袭击我们之前。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Glanton [04010EA5] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\MaleAdult05\aaRussellM_aaMission01Glan_0000C7BA_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I was at the tunnel when you crawled out of the ant colony. Must admit I admire your determination. Didn't expect you to make it this far.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你从蚁群里爬出来的时候我在隧道里。我必须承认我佩服你的决心。没想到你能坚持到现在。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Glanton [04010EA5] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\MaleAdult05\aaRussellM_aaMission01Glan_0000C7BA_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The bounty said dead or alive. After everything you put me through, dead sounds pretty good.
ESP.TRADUIT: 悬赏是说要死的还是活的？你让我经历了这么多之后，死听起来也不错。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Throw down on me and this entire town will turn on you. I'm a hero to them, and you... you're nothing, just another parasite.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你要是敢惹我，整个镇的人都会背叛你。我是他们的英雄，而你...你什么都不是，只是另一个寄生虫。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Glanton [04010EA5] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\MaleAdult05\aaRussellM_aaMission01Glan_0000C7BB_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're strong, though - anyone can see it. Once your blood settles, speak with me again, and let's see if we can't cooperate.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不过你很坚强，谁都看得出来。等你的血债还清了，再来找我，看看我们能不能合作。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Glanton [04010EA5] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\MaleAdult05\aaRussellM_aaMission01Glan_0000C7BB_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: This is the end of the line, Glanton. I'm taking you in.
ESP.TRADUIT: 格兰顿，一切都结束了。我要带你回去。

ESP.ORIGINAL: My work is never finished, Courier. Say whatever you like, if it gives you assurance. I will not be a trophy for bureaucrats.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我的工作永远不会结束，邮差。想说什么就说什么，我只能给你保证，我不会成为官僚们的战利品。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Glanton [04010EA5] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\MaleAdult05\aaRussellM_aaMission01Glan_0000C7BC_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I answer to God, and no one else. These people... they love me as much as they hate the ineffectual lawmakers judging me from afar.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我听命于上帝，别无他人。这些人......他们爱我，就像他们恨那些在远处评判我的无能的立法者一样。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Glanton [04010EA5] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\MaleAdult05\aaRussellM_aaMission01Glan_0000C7BC_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Move on me, and they'll turn on you with a vengeance.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你敢动我，他们就会报复你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Glanton [04010EA5] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\MaleAdult05\aaRussellM_aaMission01Glan_0000C7BC_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're strong, though - anyone can see it. Once your blood settles, speak with me again, and let's see if we can't cooperate.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不过你很坚强，谁都看得出来。等你的血债还清了，再来找我，看看我们能不能合作。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Glanton [04010EA5] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\MaleAdult05\aaRussellM_aaMission01Glan_0000C7BC_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why did you hire Glanton? Aren't you aware the NCR has placed a bounty on his head?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你为什么要雇格兰顿？你不知道NCR在悬赏他的人头吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: You seem surprised by this move. Very well, I answer to hoi polloi, not feckless apparatchiks in Shady Sands.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你似乎对这一举动感到惊讶。很好，我对大众负责，而不是沙荫镇那些无能的官员。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mayor Brandon [0400B315] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\MaleAdult09\aaRussellM_aaMission01Mayo_0000D46A_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Bleeding hearts in comfortable offices may decry his methods, but Glanton was contracted due to popular demand, not furtive machinations.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在舒适办公室里的滥好人可能会谴责他的方法，但格兰顿是满足大众的需求，而不是鬼鬼祟祟的阴谋。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mayor Brandon [0400B315] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\MaleAdult09\aaRussellM_aaMission01Mayo_0000D46A_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Are you familiar with the Sand Wolves, stranger? Your impertinent line of inquiry suggests ignorance, so I'll continue under that assumption.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你熟悉沙狼吗，陌生人?你不恰当的调查方式表明你无知，所以我将在这个假设下继续。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mayor Brandon [0400B315] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\MaleAdult09\aaRussellM_aaMission01Mayo_0000D46A_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The Sand Wolves are a lot of root-sucking, truculent cunts who cling to this territory by means of violence and terrorism.
ESP.TRADUIT: 沙狼是许多通过暴力和恐怖主义手段紧紧占据这片土地的狗日的好斗的混蛋。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mayor Brandon [0400B315] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\MaleAdult09\aaRussellM_aaMission01Mayo_0000D46A_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: They are backwards, mendacious, and utterly intolerant of outsiders. All overtures at peace or reconciliation have ended in betrayal and violence.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们是落后的，虚伪的，完全不能容忍外人。所有和平或和解的提议都以背叛和暴力告终。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mayor Brandon [0400B315] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\MaleAdult09\aaRussellM_aaMission01Mayo_0000D46A_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Prospective farmers and cattlemen must linger behind the town's walls for fear of arbitrary butchery at the hands of inimical natives.
ESP.TRADUIT: 未来的农民和牧民必须在镇墙后逗留，以免遭到怀有敌意的当地人的任意屠杀。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mayor Brandon [0400B315] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\MaleAdult09\aaRussellM_aaMission01Mayo_0000D46A_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I have seen the bloody, scalped corpses of men and women, slaughtered in the night by Sand Wolves, the children taken captive.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我看到了血淋淋、剥了头皮的男人和女人的尸体，他们在夜里被沙狼屠杀，孩子们被俘虏。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mayor Brandon [0400B315] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\MaleAdult09\aaRussellM_aaMission01Mayo_0000D46A_7.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The citizens come to me, pleading for resolution, demanding safety for their families!
ESP.TRADUIT: 市民们来找我，请求解决，要求保护他们的家人安全!
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mayor Brandon [0400B315] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\MaleAdult09\aaRussellM_aaMission01Mayo_0000D46A_8.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: When I look in their eyes, I know what has to be done. Glanton will do it. The tribal menace will soon be purged from this canyon, God willing.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当我看着他们的眼睛，我知道该怎么做。格兰顿会做的。部落的威胁很快就会从峡谷中消失，但愿如此。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mayor Brandon [0400B315] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\MaleAdult09\aaRussellM_aaMission01Mayo_0000D46A_9.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setobjectivecompleted aaRussellMission01 110 1
Tell me about yourself.
ESP.TRADUIT: 和我说说你自己吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I was an attorney in Shady Sands, trying to get elected to the legislature. After a... disagreement with some business partners, I moved here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我曾是沙荫镇的律师，想竞选议员。后......因为和一些商业伙伴意见不一致，我搬到了这里。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mayor Brandon [0400B315] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\MaleAdult09\aaRussellM_aaMission01Mayo_0000D468_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: There are scant men of letters in these unsettled corners of the republic, so I was swiftly voted into office by my peers.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在共和国的这些不安定的角落里，很少有文化人，所以我很快就被我的同僚们选为市长。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mayor Brandon [0400B315] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\MaleAdult09\aaRussellM_aaMission01Mayo_0000D468_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I now serve at the pleasure of my constituents.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我现在为我的选民服务。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mayor Brandon [0400B315] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\MaleAdult09\aaRussellM_aaMission01Mayo_0000D468_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What can you tell me about Silverwood?
ESP.TRADUIT: 关于银木镇你知道什么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why, our pristine polis is one the fastest-growing municipalities in the New California Republic, buoyed by commerce and mining revenue.
ESP.TRADUIT: 为什么，因为我们的原始城市是新加州共和国增长最快的城市之一，这得益于商业和矿业收入。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mayor Brandon [0400B315] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\MaleAdult09\aaRussellM_aaMission01Mayo_0000D469_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It seems almost every day that fresh faces arrive in town, eager to assist with the taming and development of this wild country.
ESP.TRADUIT: 几乎每天都有新面孔来到这个城市，渴望帮助和发展这个原始的地区。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mayor Brandon [0400B315] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\MaleAdult09\aaRussellM_aaMission01Mayo_0000D469_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I am proud to serve as first citizen in this exciting time of transition.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我很自豪能在这个激动人心的过渡时期担任第一公民。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mayor Brandon [0400B315] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\MaleAdult09\aaRussellM_aaMission01Mayo_0000D469_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Maybe it's not too late to reach an agreement with the tribals. What if I give it a shot?
ESP.TRADUIT: 也许现在与部落的人达成协议还不算太晚。如果我给它一个机会呢？

ESP.ORIGINAL: By all means, stranger. Just so you know, the last philanthropic spirit who made an appeal to the Sand Wolves was skinned alive.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当然可以，陌生人。如你所知，上一个向沙狼呼吁和平的慈善者被活活剥了皮。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mayor Brandon [0400B315] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\MaleAdult09\aaRussellM_aaMission01Mayo_0000D472_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: But... I'm betting you'll win them over with your poise and charisma.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但是...我打赌你会用你的风度和魅力赢得他们的芳心。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mayor Brandon [0400B315] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\MaleAdult09\aaRussellM_aaMission01Mayo_0000D472_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I eagerly await news of the forthcoming cessation of hostilities.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我迫切的地等待着即将停止敌对行动的消息。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mayor Brandon [0400B315] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted

ESP.ORIGINAL: setobjectivedisplayed aaRussellMission01 112 1 set aaRussellMission01.SWPeace to 1
I agree. The Sand Wolves have to be exterminated.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我同意。必须消灭沙狼。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Exterminate's a bit harsh, but that captures the essence of what Glanton will do. Good to know we're of one mind on this.
ESP.TRADUIT: 消灭是有点残酷，但这抓住了格兰顿要做的事的精髓。很高兴知道我们在这件事上意见一致。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mayor Brandon [0400B315] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\MaleAdult09\aaRussellM_aaMission01Mayo_0000D470_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaRussellRef.startconversation player, aaMission01RussellPostMayor01Convo
I don't think that hiring Glanton is the right solution, but it's your town.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不认为雇佣格兰顿是个好办法，但这是你的地盘。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're right - it's my motherfucking town. Now take your high and mighty bullshit out my office.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你说得对，这是我的地盘。现在带着你那些趾高气扬的屁话滚出我的办公室。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mayor Brandon [0400B315] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\MaleAdult09\aaRussellM_aaMission01Mayo_0000D471_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaRussellRef.startconversation player, aaMission01RussellPostMayor01Convo
You're slime, Brandon. I'll do everything in my power to bring you down.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你真卑鄙，布兰登。我会尽我所能把你拉下马。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Do you feel better, having said that with such authority and conviction?
ESP.TRADUIT: 带着这样的权威和信念这么说，你感觉好些了吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mayor Brandon [0400B315] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\MaleAdult09\aaRussellM_aaMission01Mayo_0000D473_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I run this fucking town, and these people are my responsibility. You think you can stroll in here and judge me? You don't know fuck all, cocksucker!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我管理着这个该死的小镇，这些人是我的责任。你以为你能大摇大摆地进来评判我吗?你他妈的什么都不知道，混蛋!
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mayor Brandon [0400B315] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\MaleAdult09\aaRussellM_aaMission01Mayo_0000D473_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I want you to fuck up in here, just so I can fuck you in the ass. Do what you will, but don't waste my time, motherfucker.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我等着你在这里搞砸，这样我就能操你的屁股。随你怎么做，但别浪费我的时间，混蛋。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mayor Brandon [0400B315] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\MaleAdult09\aaRussellM_aaMission01Mayo_0000D473_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Regaining composure}Now... unless you have any more pressing concerns, I'd like to work in peace.
ESP.TRADUIT: {恢复镇静}现在...我想在和平的环境下工作，除非你有更紧急的事。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mayor Brandon [0400B315] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\MaleAdult09\aaRussellM_aaMission01Mayo_0000D473_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaRussellREF.SayTo Player aaRussellMission01MayorDickBark aaRussellRef.startconversation player, aaMission01RussellPostMayor01Convo
aaRussellMission01MayorDickBark
Gimme the word, and I'll cut that fucker from ear to ear.
ESP.TRADUIT: 给我一个命令，我就把那混蛋的耳朵割下来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellM_aaRussellMissio_0000D475_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaRussellMission01WolvesGoneBark
Some of these mountain tribes shift around with the seasons, staying close to Bighorners or other game. No telling when they'll be back.
ESP.TRADUIT: 有些山地部落会随着季节的变化而迁移，待在大角羊或其他猎物附近。不知道他们什么时候回来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellM_aaRussellMissio_0000D8DB_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Earlier you proposed that we might work together. What would I stand to gain?
ESP.TRADUIT: 之前你提议我们可以合作。我能得到什么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: There would be monetary incentive in the order of... 5000 caps. If money doesn't move you, then there's something else.
ESP.TRADUIT: 将有大约... 5000瓶盖的金钱奖励。 如果金钱没有打动你，那么还有别的东西。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Glanton [04010EA5] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\MaleAdult05\aaRussellM_aaMission01Glan_0000D8F7_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Do you believe in justice, Courier? I do, with every ounce of my being. The Sand Wolves are savages, lower than animals.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你相信正义吗，邮差?我相信，我的每一分每一秒都在为了正义而战。沙狼是禽兽不如的野蛮人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Glanton [04010EA5] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\MaleAdult05\aaRussellM_aaMission01Glan_0000D8F7_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: They prey on the weak, slaughtering innocent settlers, terrorizing law-abiding citizens. They will soon reap what they sow.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们掠夺弱者，屠杀无辜的定居者，恐吓守法的公民。他们播种什么，很快就会收获什么。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Glanton [04010EA5] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\MaleAdult05\aaRussellM_aaMission01Glan_0000D8F7_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you do believe in justice, then you'll stand by me during this sacred enterprise, money be damned. What say you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你相信正义，那你就得在这神圣的过程中支持我，钱就见鬼去吧。你说怎么样?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Glanton [04010EA5] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\MaleAdult05\aaRussellM_aaMission01Glan_0000D8F7_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Patience, I'm in no rush. Take some time to acquaint yourself with this town, these people. Know what's at stake when you make your decision.
ESP.TRADUIT: 耐心点，我不急。花点时间去熟悉一下这个城市，这些人。当你做决定的时候，知道什么是利害攸关的
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Glanton [04010EA5] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\MaleAdult05\aaRussellM_aaMission01Glan_0000F5D7_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaMission01GlantonSpeechLeave
I see your point. We all have to stand for our crimes, own up to them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我明白你的意思。我们都得忍受自己的罪行，承认罪行。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Glanton [04010EA5] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you will afford me one day to pen several letters to close relatives and friends, then I will go peacefully.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你能给我一天时间给亲朋好友写几封信，那我就安安静静地走了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Glanton [04010EA5] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaRussellMission01.GlantonChose to 2
setstage aaRussellMission01 125
Killing the Sand Wolves isn't justice, it's a vendetta. Your only shot at closure is to surrender.
ESP.TRADUIT: 杀死沙狼不是正义，而是复仇。你唯一能做的就是投降。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaMission01GlantonIntimidating
aaMission01GlantonPeaceTreaty
I'll help you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我会帮你的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Excellent. I still have preparations to make, and in all candor... we have yet to locate the Sand Wolves.
ESP.TRADUIT: 太好了。我还有准备工作要做，坦率地说...我们还没找到沙狼
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Glanton [04010EA5] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\MaleAdult05\aaRussellM_aaMission01Glan_0000D8F9_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: In the meantime, you might speak with the Sheriff. I hear he's recruiting volunteers for a scouting mission.
ESP.TRADUIT: 与此同时，你可以和治安官谈谈。我听说他在招募志愿者去执行侦察任务。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Glanton [04010EA5] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\MaleAdult05\aaRussellM_aaMission01Glan_0000D8F9_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaRussellMission01.GlantonChose to 1
setstage aaRussellMission01 125
I'm not interested.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我没兴趣。

ESP.ORIGINAL: When this is done, just remember that your betters went to stand on the ramparts of civilization while you cowered inside.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当这一切结束时，记住你的上级站在文明的城墙上，而你却躲在里面。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Glanton [04010EA5] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\MaleAdult05\aaRussellM_aaMission01Glan_0000D8F8_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You might speak with the Sheriff. I hear he's recruiting volunteers for a scouting mission, something involving the Sand Wolves.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你可以和治安官谈谈。我听说他在招募志愿者去执行跟沙狼有关的侦察任务。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Glanton [04010EA5] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\MaleAdult05\aaRussellM_aaMission01Glan_0000D8F8_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Seeing their savagery firsthand might cause a change in heart.
ESP.TRADUIT: 亲眼目睹他们的野蛮可能会改变他们的想法。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Glanton [04010EA5] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\MaleAdult05\aaRussellM_aaMission01Glan_0000D8F8_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setstage aaRussellMission01 125
I need to get going.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我得走了。

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Glanton [04010EA5] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Fine, I'll give you one day to settle your affairs.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，我给你一天时间处理私事。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Thank you, Courier. You have my word that I will not protest. Now if you'll excuse me, I have to release my men.
ESP.TRADUIT: 谢谢你,邮差。我向你保证，我不会抗议。失陪了，我得放了我的人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Glanton [04010EA5] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: In the meantime, you might speak with the Sheriff. I hear he's recruiting volunteers for a scouting mission.
ESP.TRADUIT: 与此同时，你可以和治安官谈谈。我听说他在招募志愿者去执行侦察任务。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Glanton [04010EA5] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaRussellMission01.GlantonChose to 2
setstage aaRussellMission01 125
No deal, then.
ESP.TRADUIT: 搞不定，就这样。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Then you will get nothing, least of all the bounty on my head.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那你什么也得不到，更别提悬赏我的人头了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Glanton [04010EA5] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: Nonetheless, I won't be departing for several days. Why don't you sleep on it, then give me your final decision.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不过，我要过几天才动身。你何不考虑一晚，然后告诉我你的最终决定。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Glanton [04010EA5] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: setstage aaRussellMission01 125
aaMission01MayorGlantonLeft
Looking for Glanton, I presume?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想是在找格兰顿吧?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mayor Brandon [0400B315] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\MaleAdult09\aaRussellM_aaMission01Mayo_0000D900_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: While you were out, one of Glanton's scouts discovered the Sand Wolves' new encampment. Glanton quickly departed with his gang.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当你外出时，格兰顿的一名侦察员发现了沙狼的新营地。格兰顿很快带着他的团伙离开了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mayor Brandon [0400B315] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\MaleAdult09\aaRussellM_aaMission01Mayo_0000D900_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I imagine they are well on their way to the village, no doubt steeling themselves for the bloody task to come.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想他们正在回村子的路上，毫无疑问，他们正在为即将到来的血腥任务磨炼自己。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mayor Brandon [0400B315] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\MaleAdult09\aaRussellM_aaMission01Mayo_0000D900_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I suppose you could venture forth and try to impede Glanton, but you'd be cutting it pretty close. Why bother?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我猜你可以冒险阻止格兰顿，但你的时间太短了。何苦呢?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mayor Brandon [0400B315] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\MaleAdult09\aaRussellM_aaMission01Mayo_0000D900_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I see a courier coming, excuse me...
ESP.TRADUIT: 我看到一个邮差来了，对不起...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mayor Brandon [0400B315] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\MaleAdult09\aaRussellM_aaMission01Mayo_0000D900_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaRussellMission01.MayorBackup to 1
set aaRussellMission01.GlantonLeft to 2 aaSWCourierREF.evp aaRussellRef.SayTo Player aaRussellMission01RussellStayHearThis
aaRussellMission01LEGIONCOMING
{Frantic, breathing heavy from fatigue}Sir, sir!
ESP.TRADUIT: (疯狂的，因为疲劳而呼吸沉重)先生，先生!
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Parmley [0400D902] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Puzzled Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\MaleAdult05\aaRussellM_aaRussellMissio_0000DD1E_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaRussellMission01.GlantonLeft to 3
aaMayorBrandonREF.SayTo aaSWCourierREF aaRussellMission01LEGIONCOMING
Well, spit it out, fool! I haven't got all fucking day!
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，说出来吧，傻瓜!我可没那么多时间!
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mayor Brandon [0400B315] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\MaleAdult09\aaRussellM_aaRussellMissio_0000DD1F_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaRussellMission01.GlantonLeft to 4
aaSWCourierREF.SayTo aaMayorBrandonREF aaRussellMission01LEGIONCOMING
Legion is coming... {Panting}At least one hundred men. They're coming here to help the Sand Wolves.
ESP.TRADUIT: 军团来了......(喘气)至少一百人。他们是来帮助沙狼的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Parmley [0400D902] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Puzzled Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\MaleAdult05\aaRussellM_aaRussellMissio_0000DD21_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaRussellMission01.GlantonLeft to 5
aaMayorBrandonREF.SayTo aaSWCourierREF aaRussellMission01LEGIONCOMING
It's impossible, this far inland... but if they can hit Nipton...{Coming to grips} my God. It's really happening, isn't it? Where's that fucking sheriff?
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是不可能的，在这么遥远的内陆...但如果他们能袭击尼普顿...我的上帝。这是真的，不是吗?那个该死的治安官在哪?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mayor Brandon [0400B315] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Fear Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\MaleAdult09\aaRussellM_aaRussellMissio_0000DD22_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaRussellMission01.GlantonLeft to 6
aaSWCourierREF.SayTo aaMayorBrandonREF aaRussellMission01LEGIONCOMING
I told him first, sir. He panicked, took out with most of the militia. The town's unguarded. Should we run for it?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我先告诉他的，长官，他慌了，带着大部分民兵一起跑掉了。镇上无人设防。我们应该逃跑吗?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Parmley [0400D902] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Fear Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\MaleAdult05\aaRussellM_aaRussellMissio_0000DD23_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaRussellMission01.GlantonLeft to 7
aaMayorBrandonREF.SayTo aaSWCourierREF aaRussellMission01LEGIONCOMING
What? That, that craven cunt! Oh, no, no, no! Why didn't I just stay in Shady, why? There's no time to run. Maybe we can hide in the mine...
ESP.TRADUIT: 什么?那个，那个胆小鬼!哦，不，不，不!我为什么不留在沙荫镇，为什么?没有时间跑了。也许我们可以躲在矿井里...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mayor Brandon [0400B315] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Fear Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\MaleAdult09\aaRussellM_aaRussellMissio_0000DD24_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaRussellMission01.GlantonLeft to 8
aaSWCourierREF.SayTo aaMayorBrandonREF aaRussellMission01LEGIONCOMING
That's not all, sir. Prospector said they're being led by a Centurion, got all kind of fire weapons, probably aiming to burn everyone, crucify...
ESP.TRADUIT: 还有呢，勘探者说他们由一个百夫长带领，有各种火力武器，可能打算烧死所有人，把他们钉死在十字架上......
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Parmley [0400D902] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Fear Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\MaleAdult05\aaRussellM_aaRussellMissio_0000DD27_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaRussellMission01.GlantonLeft to 9
aaMayorBrandonREF.SayTo aaSWCourierREF aaRussellMission01LEGIONCOMING
I know what they'll do, you sniveling fuck! They're going to ram red-hot sticks up our asses and sing fucking songs about it. {Screaming}Fuck!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我知道他们会怎么做，你个哭哭啼啼的混蛋!他们会用滚烫的棍子捅我们的屁股还会唱该死的歌。{尖叫}他妈的!
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mayor Brandon [0400B315] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\MaleAdult09\aaRussellM_aaRussellMissio_0000DD28_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaRussellMission01.GlantonLeft to 10
aaMayorBrandonREF.startconversation player, aaMission01MayorLearnedAboutLegion01
aaMission01MayorLearnedAboutLegion01
You, you've got to help us! We can't run, there isn't enough time! For the love of God, please don't leave us. I can't die here, not like this!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你，你得帮帮我们！我们跑不了，时间不够了！看在上帝的份上，请不要离开我们。我不能死在这里，不能这样！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mayor Brandon [0400B315] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Fear Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\MaleAdult09\aaRussellM_aaMission01Mayo_0000DD26_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Wait! Don't say anything, not in the heat of the moment. Take a minute, think about this town, the innocent children, babies crying... all dead!
ESP.TRADUIT: 等等！什么都别说，别一时冲动。花一分钟，想想这个小镇，那些无辜的孩子，哭泣的婴儿......都死了！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mayor Brandon [0400B315] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Fear Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\MaleAdult09\aaRussellM_aaMission01Mayo_0000DD26_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm going to have a drink, think of a plan, pray... yes, yes, pray!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我要喝一杯，想个计划，祈祷......是的，是的，祈祷！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mayor Brandon [0400B315] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Fear Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\MaleAdult09\aaRussellM_aaMission01Mayo_0000DD26_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setstage aaRussellMission01 150
Ok, Mayor. I'll help the town. Do you have a plan?
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，市长，我会帮助小镇的。你有什么计划吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Thank you, thank you, thank you! A plan? Well, uh... you should recruit a new militia, man the walls... and I'll move non-combatants into the mine.
ESP.TRADUIT: 谢谢，谢谢，谢谢!一个计划吗?嗯,嗯...你应该招募一支新的民兵，守卫城墙......我会让非战斗人员进入矿井。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mayor Brandon [0400B315] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\MaleAdult09\aaRussellM_aaMission01Mayo_0000E14A_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: And lay traps, mines, sharp, stabby things to cut and infect those Legion devils, yes!
ESP.TRADUIT: 设下陷阱，地雷，锋利的刺伤物来切割和感染军团的恶魔，没错!
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mayor Brandon [0400B315] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Fear Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\MaleAdult09\aaRussellM_aaMission01Mayo_0000E14A_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setstage aaRussellMission01 160 rewardkarma 25
I need to get going.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我得走了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Until next time.
ESP.TRADUIT: 直到下次。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mayor Brandon [0400B315] (mod) Quest : ([0400B29B]aaSilverwoodDialogue) Generic Dialogue for Persistent NPC's EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\MaleAdult09\aaSilverwo_aaSWMayorGOODBY_0000E144_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I need to get going.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我得走了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I need to get going.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我得走了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Finley [04021397] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I need to get going.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我得走了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Bye.
ESP.TRADUIT: 拜。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hendershot [04019FF0] (mod) Quest : ([0401BF06]aaHendershotQuest) Hendershot's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\MaleGenericGhoul\aaHendersh_aaHendershotGOO_0000E149_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Does the town have any weapons stockpiles?
ESP.TRADUIT: 镇上有武器储备吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Weapons? I'm not sure... wait, yes! The sheriff kept an arsenal in his office. Take anything you need from that coward's stash.
ESP.TRADUIT: 武器?我不确定...等等,是的!治安官在他的办公室里放了一个军火库。想要什么就拿那个懦夫的东西吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mayor Brandon [0400B315] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\MaleAdult09\aaRussellM_aaMission01Mayo_0000E14F_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: There's also a cache of explosives used for the mine. Take anything you need if it will help you. Anything else?
ESP.TRADUIT: 还有一堆用于矿场的炸药。需要什么就拿什么，如果对你有帮助的话。还有别的事吗?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mayor Brandon [0400B315] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\MaleAdult09\aaRussellM_aaMission01Mayo_0000E14F_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaMilitiaArmsContainerREF.enable
setobjectivedisplayed aaRussellMission01 157 1 player.additem aaSWMilitiaKey 1
Any ideas on who might be willing to help defend the town?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你知道谁会愿意协助保卫小镇吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: These are proud, stalwart folk. The mere hint of civic duty should move them to action. Just steer clear of the town drunk, Charlie.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们都是骄傲、坚定的人。仅仅是公民义务的暗示就应该促使他们采取行动。别在镇上喝醉了，查理。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mayor Brandon [0400B315] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\MaleAdult09\aaRussellM_aaMission01Mayo_0000E150_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I would be thrilled to spill Legion blood, but my duties require me to shepherd the helpless souls who will be massing in the mine.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我很乐意让军团流血，但我的职责是带领那些无助的灵魂聚集在矿里。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mayor Brandon [0400B315] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\MaleAdult09\aaRussellM_aaMission01Mayo_0000E150_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I was always taught that prudence is one of the hallmarks of a good leader. You will have the honor of turning back the Legion tide.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我一直被教导谨慎是优秀领导者的标志之一。你将有幸击退军团的浪潮。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mayor Brandon [0400B315] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\MaleAdult09\aaRussellM_aaMission01Mayo_0000E150_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why is the Legion attacking Silverwood?
ESP.TRADUIT: 为什么军团要攻击银木镇？

ESP.ORIGINAL: The savage Sand Wolves appealed for assistance, no doubt. I hope Glanton is strangling them with their own guts right now!
ESP.TRADUIT: 毫无疑问，野蛮的沙狼在寻求帮助。我希望格兰顿现在正用他们的肠子勒死他们!
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mayor Brandon [0400B315] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\MaleAdult09\aaRussellM_aaMission01Mayo_0000E151_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It is not unheard of for raiding parties to venture into our territory, but never this far. They likely aim to crucify or enslave us all.
ESP.TRADUIT: 突袭队冒险进入我们的领土也不是没听说过，但从来没有这么远。他们的目的可能是把我们都钉死在十字架上或奴役我们。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mayor Brandon [0400B315] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Fear Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\MaleAdult09\aaRussellM_aaMission01Mayo_0000E151_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: But I'm sure we won't come to that pass, not with you here, and with God's help! Anything else?
ESP.TRADUIT: 但我相信有你在这儿，有上帝的帮助，我们不会到达那个隘口的!还有别的事吗?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mayor Brandon [0400B315] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\MaleAdult09\aaRussellM_aaMission01Mayo_0000E151_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't have any more questions.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我没别的问题了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: We must make ready, then. Godspeed, Courier!
ESP.TRADUIT: 那么，我们必须做好准备。祝成功,邮差!
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mayor Brandon [0400B315] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\MaleAdult09\aaRussellM_aaMission01Mayo_0000E152_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaRussellREF.startconversation player, aaMission01RussellSureAboutThis01
aaRussellMission01RussellStayHearThis
Wait just a second, this might be important.
ESP.TRADUIT: 等一下，这可能很重要。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellM_aaRussellMissio_0000F1BB_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I've made all my preparations for the town's defense.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我已经做好了防守小镇的一切准备。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, God, it's starting... I'll move into the mines with all the non-combatants. We'll pray for your victory!
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，天啊，开始了...我会和所有非战斗人员一起去矿井。我们将为你的胜利祈祷!
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mayor Brandon [0400B315] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Fear Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\MaleAdult09\aaRussellM_aaMission01Mayo_0000F5D9_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setstage aaRussellMission01 162 showmessage aaSWBattleStartMessage applyimagespacemodifier FadeInFromBlack4sISFX aaMayorBrandonREF.disable aaRussellREF.startconversation player, aaMission01RussellPreBattle01
aaRussellMission01BattleStartBark01
Looks like the sheriff didn't make it out of the canyon.
ESP.TRADUIT: 看来治安官没能逃出峡谷。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellM_aaRussellMissio_0000F5EF_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaRussellSGSergioDead
That's for Ramsey, motherfucker. Vultures are gonna eat well tomorrow.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那是给拉姆齐的，混蛋。秃鹰明天会吃得很好。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaRussellSGSerg_0000FE1E_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set SomeguyMaster.JoseyStatus to 0
set SomeguyMaster.JoseyStatus to 0 aaRussellRef.Removescriptpackage aaBARKSergioDead
aaRussellMiss01ShackBark01
This is the place. I searched it up and down, couldn't find shit. Maybe some fresh eyes will do the trick.
ESP.TRADUIT: 就是这个地方。我找遍了，什么都没找到。也许有新来的人能帮上忙。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaRussellMiss01_00010EBE_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaMission01RussellShackFoundNote
Damn, if it was a snake, it would have bit me!
ESP.TRADUIT: 该死，如果是蛇，它早就咬我了!
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellM_aaMission01Russ_00010EC7_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What's the note say?
ESP.TRADUIT: 笔记上说什么？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellM_aaMission01Russ_00010EC7_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I know you only have one eye, but a blind man could have found that.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我知道你只有一只眼睛，但这个盲人也能看出来。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Fuck you, it was buried under boxes and shit. I'm a killer, not a fucking detective.
ESP.TRADUIT: 去你妈的，它被埋在箱子什么的下面了。我是个杀手，不是他妈的侦探
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellM_aaMission01Russ_00010ECA_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Let me see the note. Hmm... Hendershot. Never heard of him.
ESP.TRADUIT: 让我看看笔记。嗯...亨德肖特。从来没听说过他。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellM_aaMission01Russ_00010ECA_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If he's any kind of arms dealer, I know a fellah who can point us in the right direction.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果他是个军火商的话，我认识一个人能给我们指明正确的方向。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellM_aaMission01Russ_00010ECA_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ex-Ranger by the name of Vickers, lives in Freeside. Let's meet him and see if he can get us on track.
ESP.TRADUIT: 前游骑兵维克斯，住在自由城。让我们见见他，看看他能否帮我们走上正轨。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellM_aaMission01Russ_00010ECA_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It mentioned someone named Hendershot. Do you know him?
ESP.TRADUIT: 上面提到了一个叫亨德肖特的人，你认识他吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Never heard of him, but I know someone who might be able to point us in the right direction.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没听说过他，但我认识一个人也许能给我们指明正确的方向。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellM_aaMission01Russ_00010ECB_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ex-Ranger by the name of Vickers, lives in Freeside. Let's track him down and see if he can get us on track.
ESP.TRADUIT: 前游游骑兵维克斯，住在自由城。我们去找他，看看他能不能帮我们走上正轨。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellM_aaMission01Russ_00010ECB_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaVickersGreetRussellIntro01
aaMission01RussellVickersPlayer01
Jesus, I knew he was living on the streets, but to be strung out like this. I never imagined it. This man was strong... a fucking rock.
ESP.TRADUIT: 天啊，我知道他住在大街上，但像这样嗑药我从没想过。这个男人以前就像块石头一样强壮......
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellM_aaMission01Russ_000112CF_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: How did he end up like this? I can't even look him in the eyes.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他是怎么变成这样的?我都不敢直视他的眼睛。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellM_aaMission01Russ_000112CF_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Even the strongest fall sometimes. He just needs some help.
ESP.TRADUIT: 再强的人也会摔倒，他只是需要一些帮助。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah, maybe you're right. It's just... not what I was expecting. See if you can talk to him about getting help, then ask about the name.
ESP.TRADUIT: 也许你是对的。它只是...不是我想的那样。看看你能不能和他谈谈找人帮忙的事，然后问问他的名字。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellM_aaMission01Russ_000112D3_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaRussellQuest.Loyalty to aaRussellQuest.Loyalty +1 setstage aaRussellMission01 20
We need to find out about that name. We can help your friend later.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们需要找出那个名字。可以稍后再帮助你的朋友。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Natural hunter, aren't you? All business, all the time, huh? Fuck that, partner. You're gonna talk to this guy, see if we can help him out.
ESP.TRADUIT: 天生的猎人，不是吗?所有的事，所有的事，嗯?他妈的,伙伴。你去跟他谈谈，看我们能不能帮他。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellM_aaMission01Russ_000112D4_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Maybe he gives the name, maybe he doesn't, but we don't leave him here like this. He deserves better.
ESP.TRADUIT: 也许他说了名字，也许没说，但我们不能就这样把他丢在这里。他值得更好的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellM_aaMission01Russ_000112D4_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setstage aaRussellMission01 20
A man hooked on chems is like a dog with rabies. The only solution is a bullet in the brain.
ESP.TRADUIT: 一个沉迷于毒品的人就像一只得了狂犬病的狗，唯一的解决办法就是一枪爆头。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Say something like that again, and you'll find my knife wedged in your fucking eye socket.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你再敢这么说，我的刀就会插进你的眼窝里。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellM_aaMission01Russ_000112D5_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm gonna pretend that was a joke, and that you're just a shitty comedian. Talk to Vickers, see if we can help him out, then get the name.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我就当这是个笑话，你只是个烂喜剧演员。和维克斯谈谈，看看能不能帮到他，然后知道他的名字。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellM_aaMission01Russ_000112D5_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaRussellQuest.Loyalty to aaRussellQuest.Loyalty -1 setstage aaRussellMission01 20
I want to speak with you about your addiction.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想跟你谈谈你的毒瘾。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Addiction? Look, I'm just between jobs right now, and I get a little fix here and there to get me along. I'm fine, I swear.
ESP.TRADUIT: 上瘾吗?听着，我现在正忙着找工作，我时不时地吸点大麻来维持生活。我没事，我发誓。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vickers [04010ECC] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\MaleOld01\aaRussellM_aaMission01Vick_000112D7_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaMission01VickersPlaySpeech
I... I couldn't look myself in the face anymore, stranger. Wife left me, got nobody left. I hoped the Jet would make things easier. It never does.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我...我不能再直视自己的脸了，陌生人。妻子离开了我，没人留下来。我希望杰特能让事情变得容易些。但它从来没有过。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vickers [04010ECC] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\MaleOld01\aaRussellM_aaMission01Vick_000112DE_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'll do like you're saying, talk to the Followers. Before I head off, what was your question?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我会照你说的做，和天启追随者们谈谈。在我走之前，你的问题是什么?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vickers [04010ECC] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\MaleOld01\aaRussellM_aaMission01Vick_000112DE_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaRussellMission01.VickersFate to 1 aaVickersRef.removescriptpackage DefaultTravelToLinkedPackage aaVickersRef.addscriptpackage aaGenericSandboxMormonFortPackage
You're in denial, Vickers. It's time to man up and face your problem. Go see the Followers.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你在否认，维克斯。是时候鼓起勇气面对你的问题了。去见见天启追随者吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's why I'm using, dumbass. You even hear what you're saying?
ESP.TRADUIT: 这就是为什么我在吸毒，混蛋。你听到自己在说什么了吗?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vickers [04010ECC] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\MaleOld01\aaRussellM_aaMission01Vick_000152B0_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Get clean, and you can look forward to a few more years of pain, regret, and self-loathing!
ESP.TRADUIT: 把自己清理干净，你就可以期待之后几年的痛苦、后悔和自我厌恶!

ESP.ORIGINAL: <Give 1 Fixer> Here, use this Fixer and then go see the Followers.
ESP.TRADUIT: <给他一个瘾头解>这里，用了这个瘾头解然后去找天启追随者。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I hate this stuff, but it works. I get a damn splashing sound in my ears, can't get it out. Guess it's better than being strung out.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我讨厌这种东西，但它很管用。我耳朵里有水花溅起的声音，无法消除。我想这总比嗑药好。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vickers [04010ECC] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Fear Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\MaleOld01\aaRussellM_aaMission01Vick_000152B7_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'll do like you're saying, talk to the Followers. Before I head off, what was your question?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我会照你说的做，和天启追随者们谈谈。在我走之前，你的问题是什么?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vickers [04010ECC] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\MaleOld01\aaRussellM_aaMission01Vick_000152B7_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: player.removeitem NVFixer 1 rewardkarma 25
set aaRussellMission01.VickersFate to 1 aaVickersRef.removescriptpackage DefaultTravelToLinkedPackage aaVickersRef.addscriptpackage aaGenericSandboxMormonFortPackage
<Give 3 vials of Jet> Here, this should set you up for a spell.
ESP.TRADUIT: <给他3个杰特>给，这应该能让你施展法术。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well now ain't that a sight for sore eyes!
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，那真是令人伤心的景象!
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vickers [04010ECC] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\MaleOld01\aaRussellM_aaMission01Vick_000152B6_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You had a question about some name, right? Might as well ask before I push off.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你对某个名字有疑问，对吧?还是在我出发前问一下吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vickers [04010ECC] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\MaleOld01\aaRussellM_aaMission01Vick_000152B6_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: player.removitem jet 3 rewardkarma -25
set aaRussellMission01.VickersFate to 3
I just want the name. If you want to get strung out on Jet, that's your problem.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我只需要知道名字，如果你只是想嗨杰特，那是你的问题。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Fine. What's the name?
ESP.TRADUIT: 好的，什么名字？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vickers [04010ECC] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\MaleOld01\aaRussellM_aaMission01Vick_000152BF_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: rewardkarma -10
set aaRussellMission01.VickersFate to 3
<Give 100 caps> I'll give you caps, but only if you agree to visit the followers.
ESP.TRADUIT: <给他100个瓶盖>我会给你瓶盖，但前提是你同意去找天启追随者。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Bless you, stranger! I swear on my badge and my mother's grave, I'll see the followers. Hey, didn't you have a question that needed answering?
ESP.TRADUIT: 祝福你,陌生人!我以我的警徽和我母亲的坟墓发誓，我会去找天启追随者的。你不是有个问题需要回答吗?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vickers [04010ECC] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\MaleOld01\aaRussellM_aaMission01Vick_000152B2_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: player.removeitem caps001 100 rewardkarma 25
set aaRussellMission01.VickersFate to 2
aaMission01VickersPlayWhatHelp
aaMission01TitusSlaveIntro
Salve, profligate. I come on behalf of my master, the dread Centurion. Out of respect for your bravery, he will make no more attacks on the town.
ESP.TRADUIT: 奴隶，堕落者。我是代表我的主人，可怕的百夫长而来。出于对你勇敢的尊重，他不会再袭击这座城市了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Slave [040133D1] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Fear Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaRussellM_aaMission01Titu_000133D6_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: He entreats you to meet him in the canyon, where he will face you in a contest of arms, if you are strong enough.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他希望你到峡谷里去见他，如果你够强壮的话，他将在那里和你较量一番。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Slave [040133D1] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Puzzled Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaRussellM_aaMission01Titu_000133D6_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Upon delivery of this message, I am to be liberated... it hurts...
ESP.TRADUIT: 在传达这条信息后，我将被释放......这很伤我的心......
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Slave [040133D1] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Puzzled Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaRussellM_aaMission01Titu_000133D6_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaRussellMission01.SlaveGreeted to 2
set aaTitusSlaveRef.DoOnce to 1 aaTitusSlaveRef.playidle MQ05RadDeath2HR02
aaRussellMission01AttackFinished
Sweet Jesus on a trampoline, I hope that's it! Cease fire, cease fire!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我的天啊，蹦床上的，我希望就这样了！停火，停火！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellM_aaRussellMissio_000137FB_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaRussellCAMPFIRE
You got it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我马上照办。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaRussellCAMPFI_00013A96_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: player.showrecipemenu ReloadingBenchRecipes
I'd like to reload some ammunition.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我要装填一些弹药。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaBARKRussBHKilled
Should've used a gun, douchebag.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你应该用枪的，混蛋。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaBARKRussBount_00013EA9_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set SomeguyMaster.JoseyStatus to 0
set SomeguyMaster.JoseyStatus to 0
You can always trust a man with one eye. No, really.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你总是可以相信一只眼睛的人。不,真的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaBARKRussBount_0001469B_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set SomeguyMaster.JoseyStatus to 0
set SomeguyMaster.JoseyStatus to 0
I say we unload a few magazines into that fucker for safe measure. Jesus, what a monster!
ESP.TRADUIT: 为了安全起见，我们应该给那混蛋装几盒弹匣。天啊，真是个怪物！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaBARKRussBount_0001469C_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set SomeguyMaster.JoseyStatus to 0
set SomeguyMaster.JoseyStatus to 0
Bet you didn't prophesy that, did you, bitch?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我打赌你没有预告，对吧，婊子？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaBARKRussBount_0001469D_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set SomeguyMaster.JoseyStatus to 0
set SomeguyMaster.JoseyStatus to 0
Nothing clever to say, Rzeznik? Tell it to the devil, you piece of shit.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没什么好说的吗，雷兹尼克?去跟魔鬼说吧，你个混蛋。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaBARKRussBount_0001469E_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set SomeguyMaster.JoseyStatus to 0
set SomeguyMaster.JoseyStatus to 0
You were a willing slave to Caesar until the very end, huh? Servile cunt.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你一直都是凯撒的奴隶，是吧？奴性的女人
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaBARKRussBount_0001469F_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set SomeguyMaster.JoseyStatus to 0
set SomeguyMaster.JoseyStatus to 0
He was a nasty prick, I'll give him that. Guess that's the end of the Fiends.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他是个讨厌的混蛋，我承认。看来那是恶魔帮的末日了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaBARKRussBount_000146A0_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set SomeguyMaster.JoseyStatus to 0
set SomeguyMaster.JoseyStatus to 0
I love it when they say that "True to Caesar" garbage right before we dust them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我喜欢他们在被我们清理之前说"忠于凯撒"那句废话。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaBARKRussBount_000146A1_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set SomeguyMaster.JoseyStatus to 0
set SomeguyMaster.JoseyStatus to 0
One less slaver in the world now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 世界上少了一个奴隶贩子。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaBARKRussBount_000146A2_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set SomeguyMaster.JoseyStatus to 0
set SomeguyMaster.JoseyStatus to 0
Notice how all the Burns look the same? Limited gene pool, if you ask me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 注意到所有伯恩斯都长得一样了吗?要我说，基因库有限。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaBARKRussBount_000146A3_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set SomeguyMaster.JoseyStatus to 0
set SomeguyMaster.JoseyStatus to 0
Rifle beats pistol, you mouthy fuck.
ESP.TRADUIT: 步枪胜过手枪，你个混蛋。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaBARKRussBount_000146A4_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set SomeguyMaster.JoseyStatus to 0
set SomeguyMaster.JoseyStatus to 0
That looked painful. I guess he accumulated some bad karma.
ESP.TRADUIT: 看起来很痛苦。我猜他是积怨已久。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaBARKRussBount_000146A5_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set SomeguyMaster.JoseyStatus to 0
set SomeguyMaster.JoseyStatus to 0
He was well-dressed for a ghoul pistolero. How about loaning me that duster?
ESP.TRADUIT: 他打扮得像个食尸鬼。把那块抹布借给我怎么样?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaBARKRussBount_000146A6_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set SomeguyMaster.JoseyStatus to 0
set SomeguyMaster.JoseyStatus to 0
I'm not gonna lie to you, chief - this one just didn't feel right. Man was defending his family, his property. Fuck the NCR.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不想骗你，头儿，这次就是感觉不对劲。他是在保护他的家庭和财产。他妈的NCR。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaBARKRussBount_000146A7_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set SomeguyMaster.JoseyStatus to 0
set SomeguyMaster.JoseyStatus to 0
Man, you really pissed off the Fiends, didn't you? Funny, they just took their best shot, and all that's left is this bloody sack of shit.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你真的把恶魔帮惹毛了，对吧?有趣的是，他们已经尽力了，剩下的就只有这坨屎了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaBARKRussBount_000146A8_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set SomeguyMaster.JoseyStatus to 0
set SomeguyMaster.JoseyStatus to 0
I thought he might surrender. Oh, well... if in doubt, just kill 'em.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我以为他会投降。哦,好吧...如果有疑问，就杀了他们。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaBARKRussBount_000146A9_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set SomeguyMaster.JoseyStatus to 0
set SomeguyMaster.JoseyStatus to 0
Dibs on the sombrero.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这顶宽边帽归我了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaBARKRussBount_000146AA_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set SomeguyMaster.JoseyStatus to 0
set SomeguyMaster.JoseyStatus to 0
Once Legion, always Legion. He had it coming.
ESP.TRADUIT: 一日军团，永远军团。他是自找的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaBARKRussBount_000146AB_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set SomeguyMaster.JoseyStatus to 0
set SomeguyMaster.JoseyStatus to 0
She was sort of a disappointment. I guess the Fiends have fallen on hard times when they promote random hussies to the throne.
ESP.TRADUIT: 她有点让人失望。我猜恶魔帮的日子过得很艰难因为他们提拔妓女登上王位。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaBARKRussBount_000146AC_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set SomeguyMaster.JoseyStatus to 0
set SomeguyMaster.JoseyStatus to 0
You're gonna be famous after this one, chief.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这次之后你会出名的，老大。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaBARKRussBount_000146AD_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set SomeguyMaster.JoseyStatus to 0
set SomeguyMaster.JoseyStatus to 0
That... felt good.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那感觉很好。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaBARKRussBount_000146AE_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set SomeguyMaster.JoseyStatus to 0
set SomeguyMaster.JoseyStatus to 0
Heard of this place, but never saw it... Christ, look at the crosses. {Seething}I'm gonna burn this motherfucker to the ground.
ESP.TRADUIT: 听说过这个地方，但从没见过...天啊，看看这些十字架。{沸腾}我要把这混蛋烧成灰烬。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaBARKRussBount_000146AF_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set SomeguyMaster.JoseyStatus to 0
set SomeguyMaster.JoseyStatus to 0
Hold up for a second. It looks like they're running a mine here. There might be another entrance nearby. Check the rock faces for an opening.
ESP.TRADUIT: 等一下。看起来他们在这里开矿。附近可能有另一个入口。检查岩壁是否有缺口。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaBARKRussBount_000146B0_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set SomeguyMaster.JoseyStatus to 0
set SomeguyMaster.JoseyStatus to 0
Watch for traps and stay low. Looks like they have sentries up ahead.
ESP.TRADUIT: 注意陷阱，蹲下。他们前面好像有岗哨。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaBARKRussBount_000146B1_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set SomeguyMaster.JoseyStatus to 0
set SomeguyMaster.JoseyStatus to 0
I don't ask for much, but I'm begging you... let me kill this piece of shit.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我要求不多，但我求你...让我杀了这混蛋。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaBARKRussBount_000146B2_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set SomeguyMaster.JoseyStatus to 0
set SomeguyMaster.JoseyStatus to 0
Oh, no, no, no! The kid, he's... he's fucking wasted! You stupid motherfucker, how did you let this happen?
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，不，不，不!孩子,他...真他妈的瘦弱!你个混蛋，你怎么能让这一切发生?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaBARKRussBount_000146B3_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set SomeguyMaster.JoseyStatus to 0
set SomeguyMaster.JoseyStatus to 0
Damn, that burns... I want to carve that bitch into pieces for this. Hate to say, but I think it's the right call. Fucking kids... let's go.
ESP.TRADUIT: 妈的，烧起来了...我要把那婊子切成碎片。我不想说，但我认为这是正确的决定。他妈的孩子们...走吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaBARKRussBount_000146B4_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set SomeguyMaster.JoseyStatus to 0
set SomeguyMaster.JoseyStatus to 0
Anyway, I told her to take her thumb out, and... whoa, what the fuck? Fiends? Who... no... no fucking way. Ronnie, you slime!
ESP.TRADUIT: 不管怎样，我告诉她把拇指拿出来，然后...哇，他妈的怎么了？ 恶魔帮？ 谁...不...他妈的不行。 罗尼，你这个史莱姆！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaBARKRussBount_000146B5_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set SomeguyMaster.JoseyStatus to 0
set SomeguyMaster.JoseyStatus to 0
That's one twin down. Not sure where the other one is. Hey, that's a badass painting.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是一对双胞胎。不知道另一个在哪儿。嘿，那是一幅很厉害的画。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaBARKRussBount_000146B6_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set SomeguyMaster.JoseyStatus to 0
set SomeguyMaster.JoseyStatus to 0
Kill Legionaries and get paid for it? What's not to like?
ESP.TRADUIT: 杀了军团的人然后拿钱?有什么不喜欢的呢?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaBARKRussBount_000146B7_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set SomeguyMaster.JoseyStatus to 0
set SomeguyMaster.JoseyStatus to 0
I don't like to speak ill of Rangers, but I'm worried about Beaumont. I don't think he appreciates the shitstorm he's stirred up here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不想说游骑兵的坏话，但我很担心博蒙特。我觉得他不喜欢他在这里掀起的风波。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaBARKRussBount_000146B8_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set SomeguyMaster.JoseyStatus to 0
set SomeguyMaster.JoseyStatus to 0
Here comes Castor with the last wave! Use everything you've got!
ESP.TRADUIT: 卡斯特带着最后一波来了！ 使用你所拥有的一切！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaBARKRussBount_000146B9_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set SomeguyMaster.JoseyStatus to 0
set SomeguyMaster.JoseyStatus to 0
Castor's down. Fuck me sideways, that was some hairy shit. Gonna be burying bodies for a week.
ESP.TRADUIT: 卡斯特倒下了。去你妈的，这个多毛的狗屎。尸体得埋一个星期。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaBARKRussBount_000146BA_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set SomeguyMaster.JoseyStatus to 0
set SomeguyMaster.JoseyStatus to 0
I hate to admit it, but Cady makes sense. Fiends will never fit back into society, just have to put them all down.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不想承认，但卡迪说的是对的。恶魔帮永远不可能重新融入社会，只能把他们都放倒。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaBARKRussBount_000146BB_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set SomeguyMaster.JoseyStatus to 0
set SomeguyMaster.JoseyStatus to 0
Russell and I were hoping you could help us identify someone named "Hendershot".
ESP.TRADUIT: 拉塞尔和我希望你能帮我们指认一个叫"亨德肖特"的人。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hendershot... I think I know who that is, but... {coughing}just a second...{descends into coughing fit}
ESP.TRADUIT: 亨德肖特......我想我知道他是谁，但是...{咳嗽}等一下...{开始咳嗽}
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vickers [04010ECC] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Puzzled Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\MaleOld01\aaRussellM_aaMissions01Vic_000152AD_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaRussellRef.startconversation playerref, aaMission01RussellVickersPlayer01
Stow the self-pity, hobo. We have questions that need answering.
ESP.TRADUIT: 别自怨自艾了，流浪汉。我们有很多问题需要你回答。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hey, who you calling a hobo? I'll have you know I took part in five tours against Caesar's Legion, killed twenty men, and... {Coughing fit}
ESP.TRADUIT: 你管谁叫流浪汉?我告诉你，我参加了五次对抗凯撒军团的行动，杀了二十个人，而且......{咳嗽发作}
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vickers [04010ECC] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\MaleOld01\aaRussellM_aaMissions01Vic_000152AE_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaRussellRef.startconversation playerref, aaMission01RussellVickersPlayer01
<Give 50 caps> I'm glad to help a veteran. By the way, you ever heard the name "Hendershot"?
ESP.TRADUIT: <给他50瓶盖>我很高兴能帮助一位老兵。 顺便问一句，你听说过“亨德肖特”这个名字吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Thank you, much obliged!
ESP.TRADUIT: 谢谢，非常感谢！
