ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vickers [04010ECC] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\MaleOld01\aaRussellM_aaMissions01Vic_000152AC_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hendershot... I think I know who that is, but... {coughing}just a second...{descends into coughing fit}
ESP.TRADUIT: 亨德肖特......我想我知道他是谁，但是...{咳嗽}等一下...{开始咳嗽}
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vickers [04010ECC] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Puzzled Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\MaleOld01\aaRussellM_aaMissions01Vic_000152AC_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: rewardkarma 25 player.removeitem caps001 50
aaRussellRef.startconversation playerref, aaMission01RussellVickersPlayer01
I need to get going.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我得走了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Bye.
ESP.TRADUIT: 拜。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vickers [04010ECC] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\MaleOld01\aaRussellM_aaVickersGOODBY_000152B8_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: We're looking for a man named "Hendershot". Do you know where we can find him?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们在找一个叫"亨德肖特"的人。你知道在哪能找到他吗?

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hendershot... oh, yeah. He's a zombie arms peddler, hidden away in Cholla Mountain. Where that is exactly... I don't know.
ESP.TRADUIT: 亨德肖特......哦,是的。他是个僵尸军火贩子，藏在仙人掌山。确切的位置是...我不知道。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vickers [04010ECC] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\MaleOld01\aaRussellM_aaMission01Vick_000152B3_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Know the man who can tell you, though. Ranger by the name of Handley, used to be in Russell's unit. He'll know him.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不过，我知道谁能告诉你他在哪的人，一个叫汉德利的游骑兵，以前是拉塞尔的部下。他知道。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vickers [04010ECC] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\MaleOld01\aaRussellM_aaMission01Vick_000152B3_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: He knows the Spring Mountains better than anybody. That's why they got him up at that outpost on Mt. Charleston. Give him my regards.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他比任何人都了解春山。所以他们把他派到了查尔斯顿山的前哨站。代我向他问好。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vickers [04010ECC] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\MaleOld01\aaRussellM_aaMission01Vick_000152B3_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setstage aaRussellMission01 21 aaRussellRef.sayto player aaRussellMission01PostVickersBark
Get clean, or I'll burn you down and smoke the ashes.
ESP.TRADUIT: 收拾干净，不然我就把你烧成灰。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Good God, you're serious! I-I-I'll do it, right now!
ESP.TRADUIT: 天哪，你是认真的!我，我现在就去！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vickers [04010ECC] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Fear Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\MaleOld01\aaRussellM_aaMission01Vick_000152B5_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You got questions, I'll answer them... anything!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你有问题，我来回答...任何事情！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vickers [04010ECC] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Fear Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\MaleOld01\aaRussellM_aaMission01Vick_000152B5_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaRussellMission01.VickersFate to 1 aaVickersRef.removescriptpackage DefaultTravelToLinkedPackage aaVickersRef.addscriptpackage aaGenericSandboxMormonFortPackage
aaRussellMission01PostVickersBark
You did right by me on that one. I won't forget it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这件事上你做得对。我不会忘记的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellM_aaRussellMissio_000152BB_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaRussellQuest.Loyalty to aaRussellQuest.Loyalty +1
I hate to say it, but I think he's going to die in these streets. Let's get out of here, ok?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不想这么说，但我觉得他会死在这条街上。我们离开这里，好吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellM_aaRussellMissio_000152BC_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You just sent him to his grave, you sick fuck. I knew it was a mistake to trust you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你把他送进坟墓了，你个变态。我就知道相信你是个错误。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellM_aaRussellMissio_000152BD_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaRussellQuest.Loyalty to aaRussellQuest.Loyalty -1
Goddamn, I guess you scared him straight. Thanks for your help.
ESP.TRADUIT: 该死，我猜你吓到他了。谢谢你的帮助。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Fear Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellM_aaRussellMissio_000152BE_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaRussellQuest.Loyalty to aaRussellQuest.Loyalty +1
aaRussellMission01RockslideBark
Fuck, a rockslide! The noise is gonna attract every feral in this motherfucker!
ESP.TRADUIT: 妈的，山体滑坡！这噪音会把这附近的野鬼都他妈吸引过来！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Fear Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellM_aaRussellMissio_00015CFB_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaRussellMission01AntBark
I hear something, and it ain't ferals. Careful.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我听到了什么，不是野兽的声音。小心。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellM_aaRussellMissio_00016344_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaRussellMission01SlaveExplodeBark
Shit, they planted charges in his guts! Clear out!
ESP.TRADUIT: 妈的，他们在他肚子里放了炸药！清场！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellM_aaRussellMissio_00017703_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaMission01VeteranGuardIntro
You may proceed, profligate. The Centurion awaits you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你可以继续，堕落者。百夫长在等你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Veteran Legionary [04019684] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaRussellMission01.GuardGreeted to 2
aaMission01TitusIntro01
So the champion approaches, hopefully one worthy of my skill.
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以冠军来了，希望他能配得上我的技术。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Titus Vulcanus [04010EA6] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\MaleOld01\aaRussellM_aaMission01Titu_00019690_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: One moment, I recognize the figure with you... yes, sweet, sweet amator, it's you, isn't it? What a fortuitous turn of events.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那一刻，我认出了和你在一起的那个人...是的，亲爱的，亲爱的情人，是你，对吧?真是个意外的转折。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Titus Vulcanus [04010EA6] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\MaleOld01\aaRussellM_aaMission01Titu_00019690_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaRussellMission01.TitusGreeted to 2
So... is this your brand of humor? Silverwood sends a bleeding bitch to test me? Are you mad, wench?
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以...这是你特有的幽默吗?银木镇派了个婊子来测试我?你疯了吗，丫头?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Titus Vulcanus [04010EA6] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\MaleOld01\aaRussellM_aaMission01Titu_00019691_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: No matter... if Silverwood wishes to entrust its fortune to the weaker sex, so be it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不管了...如果银木镇想把自己的命运托付给弱者，那就交给他们吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Titus Vulcanus [04010EA6] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\MaleOld01\aaRussellM_aaMission01Titu_00019691_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: One moment, I recognize the figure with you... yes, sweet, sweet amator, it's you, isn't it? What a fortuitous turn of events.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那一刻，我认出了和你在一起的那个人...是的，亲爱的，亲爱的情人，是你，对吧?真是个意外的转折。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Titus Vulcanus [04010EA6] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\MaleOld01\aaRussellM_aaMission01Titu_00019691_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaRussellMission01.TitusGreeted to 2
Amator? Are you talking about Russell?
ESP.TRADUIT: 影迷？你是说拉塞尔？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Is that what he goes by now? To me, he'll always be my Rufus, my red lover. So soft, so sweet. He didn't tell you about us, did he?
ESP.TRADUIT: 这就是他现在的样子吗？对我来说，他永远是我的鲁弗斯，我的红色爱人。如此柔软，如此甜蜜。他没告诉你我们的事吧？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Titus Vulcanus [04010EA6] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\MaleOld01\aaRussellM_aaTitusWhoRusse_0001A00D_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I came here to fight, not talk. <Attack>
ESP.TRADUIT: 我是来打架的，不是来聊天的。 <攻击>

ESP.ORIGINAL: Very well.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那好吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Titus Vulcanus [04010EA6] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\MaleOld01\aaRussellM_aaTitusStartDue_0001E76E_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaTitusVulcanusREF.startcombat aarussellREF aaTitusBadass01REF.startcombat player aaTitusBadass02REF.startcombat player
Why do you insist on talking so much? Shut up and fight. <Attack>
ESP.TRADUIT: 你为什么非要说这么多？闭嘴，打吧。<攻击>

ESP.ORIGINAL: At once.
ESP.TRADUIT: 马上。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Titus Vulcanus [04010EA6] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\MaleOld01\aaRussellM_aaTitusStartDue_0001E76F_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaTitusVulcanusREF.startcombat aarussellREF aaTitusBadass01REF.startcombat player aaTitusBadass02REF.startcombat player
aaTitusNoDuel
Thanks for inviting me! Now I have to murder you. <Attack>
ESP.TRADUIT: 谢谢你邀请我！现在我得杀了你。<攻击>

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'll roast your guts, profligate!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我要烤了你的内脏，堕落者！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Titus Vulcanus [04010EA6] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\MaleOld01\aaRussellM_aaTitusPsycho_0001CE90_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaTitusVulcanusREF.startcombat player
So it's just you and two goons - that's it?
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以就只有你和两个打手，就这？

ESP.ORIGINAL: These are the finest warriors in my cohort, Vulso and Serranus. Each is strong in limb and a master of the great hammer.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们是我的战友中最优秀的战士，武尔索和塞尔腊努斯。每个人都有强壮的肢体同时也是伟大的锤子大师。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Titus Vulcanus [04010EA6] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\MaleOld01\aaRussellM_aaTitusWhatHapp_0001A00A_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: They will crush your skull and smash your living guts into paste. Mars will see to it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们会压碎你的头骨，把你的内脏捣成浆糊。玛尔斯会负责的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Titus Vulcanus [04010EA6] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaTitusNoDuelAffirm
aaTitusNoDuelRethink
<Charisma Check>
ESP.TRADUIT: <魅力检查>

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaTitusSpeech
I'm recruiting citizens to help defend the town. Will you man the walls?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我正在招募市民协助保卫小镇。你能看守城墙吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're goddamn right I will! Legion assholes don't scare me!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你说得对，我会的!军团的混蛋吓不倒我！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hobo Charlie [0400D8ED] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\MaleOld01\aaRussellM_aaSWRecruitHobo_0001A459_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm a little lean on firepower, though. You got anything to spare?
ESP.TRADUIT: 不过我对火力有点依赖。你有多余的吗?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hobo Charlie [0400D8ED] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\MaleOld01\aaRussellM_aaSWRecruitHobo_0001A459_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaHoboCharlieREF.setactorvalue health 350 aaHoboCharlieREF.setav guns 100 aaHoboCharlieREF.addperk Finesse aaHoboCharlieREF.addperk Cowboy set aaRussellMission01.RecruitHobo to 1 aaHoboCharlieREF.removescriptpackage aaHoboCharlieDrunkPackage aaHoboCharlieREF.evp
Let's trade gear.
ESP.TRADUIT: 让我们交易装备。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Now you're talking! Give me something big, that blows shit up!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你现在才说!给我个能爆炸的大家伙！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hobo Charlie [0400D8ED] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\MaleOld01\aaRussellM_aaSWShareHobo_0001A45B_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaHoboCharlieREF.OpenTeammateContainer 1
No, not yet.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不，还没有。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ok, just get me something when you can. I'll be on the wall, boss. You can count on me!
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，有空的时候给我拿点东西。我会在墙上的，老大。你可以相信我！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hobo Charlie [0400D8ED] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\MaleOld01\aaRussellM_aaSWRecruitHobo_0001A45C_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I need to get going.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我得走了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Okay.
ESP.TRADUIT: OK。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hobo Charlie [0400D8ED] (mod) Quest : ([0400B29B]aaSilverwoodDialogue) Generic Dialogue for Persistent NPC's EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\MaleOld01\aaSilverwo_aaSWHoboGOODBYE_0001A45E_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'd like to see your wares.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想看看你的货物。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sure.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当然。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dobbs [0400A174] (mod) Quest : ([0400B29B]aaSilverwoodDialogue) Generic Dialogue for Persistent NPC's EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\MaleAdult01Defaultb\aaSilverwo_aaDobbsBuyShit_0001B0B0_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: showbartermenu
I need repairs.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我要修理东西。

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dobbs [0400A174] (mod) Quest : ([0400B29B]aaSilverwoodDialogue) Generic Dialogue for Persistent NPC's EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: showrepairmenu
I need to get going.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我得走了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: See you later.
ESP.TRADUIT: 回头见。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dobbs [0400A174] (mod) Quest : ([0400B29B]aaSilverwoodDialogue) Generic Dialogue for Persistent NPC's EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\MaleAdult01Defaultb\aaSilverwo_aaDobbsGOODBYE_0001B0B2_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm recruiting citizens to help defend the town. Will you man the walls?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我正在招募市民协助保卫小镇。你能看守城墙吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: You for real? If there actually is a Legion attack on the way, I'm getting the hell out of here. Wait, are they really coming this time?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你说真的吗?如果军团真的要进攻，我就赶紧离开这里。等等，他们这次真的要来吗?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dobbs [0400A174] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\MaleAdult01Defaultb\aaRussellM_aaSWRecruitDobb_0001B0B4_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm recruiting citizens to help defend the town. Will you man the walls?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我正在招募市民协助保卫小镇。你能看守城墙吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Do you have the caps together?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你有钱吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dobbs [0400A174] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\MaleAdult01Defaultb\aaRussellM_aaSWRecruitDobb_0001B0C5_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I wanted to speak with you about installing the turrets.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想跟你谈谈安装炮塔的事。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hell yes, they're coming, and I need your help in defending the town.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，他们来了，我需要你的帮助来保卫这个城镇。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, God, really? All those false alarms, nobody will make it out... but I can't fight, I've got a bum knee, a bad back.
ESP.TRADUIT: 噢，天啊，真的吗？所有这些假警报，没人能逃出来...但我不能战斗，我膝盖有伤，背也不好。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dobbs [0400A174] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Fear Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\MaleAdult01Defaultb\aaRussellM_aaSWRecruitDobb_0001B0BA_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I can help out another way. I've been holding on to some ceiling turrets, I can install them if someone will cover the costs.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我可以用另一种方式帮你。我有一些天花板上的炮塔，我可以安装，如果有人能支付费用的话。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dobbs [0400A174] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\MaleAdult01Defaultb\aaRussellM_aaSWRecruitDobb_0001B0BA_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I would've put them up already, but that tightwad sheriff refused to pay an installation fee. Ridiculous.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我本来想把它们放上去的，但那个吝啬鬼治安官不肯付安装费。荒谬。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dobbs [0400A174] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\MaleAdult01Defaultb\aaRussellM_aaSWRecruitDobb_0001B0BA_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I can put them up for 500 caps, no sweat.
ESP.TRADUIT: 500瓶盖我就把它们装上去，不费力。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dobbs [0400A174] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\MaleAdult01Defaultb\aaRussellM_aaSWRecruitDobb_0001B0BA_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaRussellMission01.RecruitDobbs to 1
Nevermind, this was just a drill.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没关系，这只是一次演习。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Good to hear! You had me going for a second there.
ESP.TRADUIT: 很高兴听到这个，你让我上去待一会儿
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dobbs [0400A174] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\MaleAdult01Defaultb\aaRussellM_aaSWRecruitDobb_0001B0BB_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Will you share some medical supplies with the militia?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你愿意和民兵分享一些医疗用品吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaSWRecruitDobbsUseless
aaSWRecruitDobbsTurretPay
Thanks, I'll get them installed right away.
ESP.TRADUIT: 谢谢，我马上去安装。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dobbs [0400A174] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\MaleAdult01Defaultb\aaRussellM_aaSWRecruitDobb_0001B0C2_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: player.removeitem caps001 500 applyimagespacemodifier FadeToBlackAndBackISFX showmessage aaSWTurretsMessage aaSWTurret01REF.enable aaSWTurret02REF.enable set aaRussellMission01.RecruitDobbs to 2 aaRussellREF.SayTo Player aaMission01RussellTurretBark
Here are the caps <Pay 500 caps>.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这儿是瓶盖 <支付500瓶盖>。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Look, just hurry and get the cash together, and then I'll install the turrets.
ESP.TRADUIT: 听着，赶紧把钱凑齐，然后我去安装炮塔。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dobbs [0400A174] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\MaleAdult01Defaultb\aaRussellM_aaSWRecruitDobb_0001B0C4_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't have 500 caps.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我没有500瓶盖。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaSWRecruitDobbsTurretBarter
Okay, 250 it is. I'll get them up right away.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，250。我马上去拿。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dobbs [0400A174] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\MaleAdult01Defaultb\aaRussellM_aaSWRecruitDobb_0001B0C6_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: player.removeitem caps001 250 applyimagespacemodifier FadeToBlackAndBackISFX showmessage aaSWTurretsMessage aaSWTurret01REF.enable aaSWTurret02REF.enable set aaRussellMission01.RecruitDobbs to 2 aaRussellREF.SayTo Player aaMission01RussellTurretBark
This is your only shot at getting scratch for those turrets. 250 caps, take it or leave it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是你获得这些炮塔的唯一机会。 250瓶盖，不要就算了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaSWRecruitDobbsTurretSpeech
Ok, I'll put them up. Consider it my good deed for the year.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，我把它们装上。就当是我今年做的好事吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dobbs [0400A174] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\MaleAdult01Defaultb\aaRussellM_aaSWRecruitDobb_0001B0C8_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: player.removeitem caps001 250 applyimagespacemodifier FadeToBlackAndBackISFX showmessage aaSWTurretsMessage aaSWTurret01REF.enable aaSWTurret02REF.enable set aaRussellMission01.RecruitDobbs to 2 aaRussellREF.SayTo Player aaMission01RussellTurretBark
You want to risk people's lives over a few hundred caps? Do the right thing, Dobbs.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你想为了几百瓶盖就拿别人的生命冒险吗?做正确的事，多布斯。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaSWRecruitDobbsTurretScience
{Surprised by the player's expertise}Okay, okay. I guess it's not that big a deal. I'm just trying to eat, right? I'll put them up right now.
ESP.TRADUIT: {对玩家的专业知识表示惊讶}好吧，好吧。我想这没什么大不了的。我只是想吃饭，对吧?我现在就把它们装上。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dobbs [0400A174] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\MaleAdult01Defaultb\aaRussellM_aaSWRecruitDobb_0001B0C7_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: applyimagespacemodifier FadeToBlackAndBackISFX showmessage aaSWTurretsMessage aaSWTurret01REF.enable aaSWTurret02REF.enable set aaRussellMission01.RecruitDobbs to 2 aaRussellREF.SayTo Player aaMission01RussellTurretBark
Ceiling turrets are self-contained units. All you have to do is screw them in place.
ESP.TRADUIT: 天花板的炮塔是独立的单元。你所要做的就是把它们固定好。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaSWRecruitDobbsWallSpeech
aaSWRecruitDobbsWallIntimidate
<Recruit Sullivan>
There ain't gonna be no Legion attack. Mayor and sheriff are always talking that bullshit, trying to stir everybody up.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不会有军团的攻击。市长和治安官总是说这种屁话，想煽动大家。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sullivan [0401B0D0] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaRussellM_aaSWSullivanRec_0001B0D5_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm recruiting citizens to help defend the town. Will you man the walls?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我正在招募市民协助保卫小镇。你能看守城墙吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Weren't you just asking me about that? Look, if the Legion shows, I'm outta here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你刚才不是在问我吗?听着，如果军团出现，我就走。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sullivan [0401B0D0] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaRussellM_aaSWSullivanRec_0001B0E9_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I want to talk with you about joining the militia.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想和你谈谈加入民兵的事。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hell yes.
ESP.TRADUIT: 见鬼，是的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sullivan [0401B0D0] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaRussellM_aaSWSullivanRec_0001B0EC_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaSullivanREF.OpenTeammateContainer 1
I want to exchange gear with you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想和你换换装备。

ESP.ORIGINAL: This isn't a drill. A Legion force is en route to sack the town. We need your help.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这不是演习。一支军团正赶来攻占小镇。我们需要你的帮助。

ESP.ORIGINAL: What? Holy shit, we've got to get out of here! You aren't thinking of fighting them, are you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 什么？我的天，我们得离开这里!你不会是想跟他们斗吧?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sullivan [0401B0D0] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaRussellM_aaSWSullivanFor_0001B0DB_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Nevermind, it's just a drill.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没关系，只是演习而已。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Jagoff.
ESP.TRADUIT: 傻逼。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sullivan [0401B0D0] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaRussellM_aaSWSullivanJus_0001B0DC_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaSWSullivanSpeech
Whoa, fucko, who do you think you're talking to? Are you calling me chickenshit? Fine. Anybody comes through that gate is gonna get waylaid.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哇，操，你以为你在和谁说话？你叫我鸡屎？好的。任何人从那扇门进来都会被拦住的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sullivan [0401B0D0] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaRussellM_aaSWSullivanSpe_0001B0E7_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaRussellMission01.RecruitSullivan to 5 aaSullivanREF.removescriptpackage DefaultSandboxEditorLocation256 aaSullivanREF.removescriptpackage aaSullivanFleePackage aaSullivanREF.evp
Women and children are in danger, and you want to run? You call yourself a man, you sonofabitch?
ESP.TRADUIT: 妇女和儿童有危险，你却想逃跑?你还说自己是男人，你个狗娘养的?

ESP.ORIGINAL: This conversation is over.
ESP.TRADUIT: 谈话到此结束。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sullivan [0401B0D0] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaRussellM_aaSWSullivanSpe_0001BD50_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaRussellMission01.RecruitSullivan to 5
Ask not what you can do for your country, but, uh... just don't ask?
ESP.TRADUIT: 不要问你能为你的国家做什么，但是...只是不要问？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Asshole, if you don't get on that wall, I'm going to rip off your balls and serve them on ice.
ESP.TRADUIT: 混蛋，如果你不爬上那堵墙，我就把你的蛋蛋扯下来放在冰上给你吃。

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Fearful, repulsed}Shit, Ok!
ESP.TRADUIT: {害怕，排斥}该死，好吧！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sullivan [0401B0D0] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Fear Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaRussellM_aaSWSullivanRec_0001B0EB_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Uh, pardon me for asking, but do you have any spare armor? Just in case, you know? With all due respect.
ESP.TRADUIT: 恕我冒昧，你有备用的盔甲吗?以防万一，你知道吗？恕我直言。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sullivan [0401B0D0] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Fear Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaRussellM_aaSWSullivanRec_0001B0EB_2.ogg

aaSWSullivanRecruitUnarmed
You need me, huh? Fine, go ahead and count me in. One thing, though - you got some armor or a power fist you can loan me?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你需要我吗?好吧，算我一个。不过有件事，你能借我一件盔甲或一把武器吗?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sullivan [0401B0D0] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaRussellM_aaSWSullivanRec_0001B0EA_1.ogg

I understand the importance of close-quarters combat. The militia needs someone with your skills.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我明白近身格斗的重要性。民兵需要你这样的人。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I just wanted to give you fair warning. Make a run for it if you want.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我只是想给你个警告。你想逃就逃吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You better believe it!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你最好相信它！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sullivan [0401B0D0] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Fear Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaRussellM_aaSWSullivanRec_0001B0DE_1.ogg

set aaRussellMission01.RecruitSullivan to 10 aaSullivanREF.evp
I need to get going.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我得走了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Bye.
ESP.TRADUIT: 拜。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sullivan [0401B0D0] (mod) Quest : ([0400B29B]aaSilverwoodDialogue) Generic Dialogue for Persistent NPC's EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaSilverwo_aaSullivanGOODB_0001B0E5_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: <Lie> We're uncertain about the size of the Legion force. Just stay put.
ESP.TRADUIT: <说谎> 我们不确定军团的规模。 就站在原地别动。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sounds like another bullshit drill to me. I ain't going anywhere.
ESP.TRADUIT: 听起来像是又一次狗屁演习。我哪儿也不去。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sullivan [0401B0D0] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaRussellM_aaSWSullivanSta_0001B0E8_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaRussellMission01.RecruitSullivan to 1
Sorry, I don't have anything to share with you right now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 对不起，我现在没有什么可以和你分享的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Damn shame. Hook me up as soon as you get something.
ESP.TRADUIT: 该死的耻辱。你一有消息就通知我。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sullivan [0401B0D0] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaRussellM_aaSWSullivanNoS_0001B0EE_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: How much for your "services"?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你的“服务”多少钱？

ESP.ORIGINAL: 100 caps, darling. No bullshit, no haggling, no trading. Just the caps.
ESP.TRADUIT: 100瓶盖,亲爱的。不扯淡，不讨价还价，不换东西，只收瓶盖。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Miss Kat [04005CB2] (mod) Quest : ([0400B29B]aaSilverwoodDialogue) Generic Dialogue for Persistent NPC's EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\FemaleAdult09\aaSilverwo_aaMissKatServic_0001B0F2_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaMissKatServiceAffirm
Thank you, sweetie. Let's get down to business, shall we?
ESP.TRADUIT: 谢谢你,亲爱的。让我们开始做生意，好吗?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Miss Kat [04005CB2] (mod) Quest : ([0400B29B]aaSilverwoodDialogue) Generic Dialogue for Persistent NPC's EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\FemaleAdult09\aaSilverwo_aaMissKatServic_0001B0F6_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: player.removeitem caps001 100
applyimagespacemodifier FadeToBlackAndBackISFX Player.CIOS WellRestedSpell
Here are the caps <Pay 100 caps>.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这儿是瓶盖 <支付100瓶盖>。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm sorry, honey. This pussy doesn't purr for free.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我很抱歉,亲爱的。这屄可不是免费的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Miss Kat [04005CB2] (mod) Quest : ([0400B29B]aaSilverwoodDialogue) Generic Dialogue for Persistent NPC's EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\FemaleAdult09\aaSilverwo_aaMissKatServic_0001B0F7_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't have enough caps.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我没有足够的瓶盖。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm not interested.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我没兴趣。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well move along, if you please.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你愿意，我们可以走了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Miss Kat [04005CB2] (mod) Quest : ([0400B29B]aaSilverwoodDialogue) Generic Dialogue for Persistent NPC's EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\FemaleAdult09\aaSilverwo_aaMissKatServic_0001B0F3_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I need to get going.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我得走了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'll be here if you need me, sugar.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你需要我，我就在这，甜心。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Miss Kat [04005CB2] (mod) Quest : ([0400B29B]aaSilverwoodDialogue) Generic Dialogue for Persistent NPC's EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\FemaleAdult09\aaSilverwo_aaMissKatGoobye_0001B0F5_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're right, you should stay out of it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你说得对，你应该置身事外。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Thanks for understanding, sugar.
ESP.TRADUIT: 谢谢你的理解，甜心。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Miss Kat [04005CB2] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\FemaleAdult09\aaRussellM_aaSWMissKatRecr_0001B0FC_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: A Legion force is inbound and I need more volunteers for the militia. Are you in?
ESP.TRADUIT: 一支军团部队正在入境，我需要更多的民兵志愿者。 你能加入吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Me? Ha!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我？哈！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Miss Kat [04005CB2] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\FemaleAdult09\aaRussellM_aaSWMissKatRecr_0001B0FB_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sheriff was always talking about the Legion raping and pillaging, gonna defile the women if we aren't vigilant.
ESP.TRADUIT: 治安官总是说军团会奸淫掳掠，如果我们不保持警惕就会被他们玷污。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Miss Kat [04005CB2] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\FemaleAdult09\aaRussellM_aaSWMissKatRecr_0001B0FB_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Shit, I get defiled ten times a day, feel like I've been fucked by a freight train half the time.
ESP.TRADUIT: 妈的，我一天被玷污十次，一半的时间感觉像被货运火车干过一样。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Miss Kat [04005CB2] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\FemaleAdult09\aaRussellM_aaSWMissKatRecr_0001B0FB_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Legion dick is still dick, and if they pay, I don't care.
ESP.TRADUIT: 军团的屌也是屌，只要他们付钱，我根本不在乎。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Miss Kat [04005CB2] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\FemaleAdult09\aaRussellM_aaSWMissKatRecr_0001B0FB_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaSWMissKatRecruitEnslaveYou
Whoa, they're gonna do what? This little snatch is a prized commodity, and I don't give out free samples to nobody.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们要做什么?这小玩意可值钱了，我可不会给任何人免费样品。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Miss Kat [04005CB2] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\FemaleAdult09\aaRussellM_aaSWMissKatRecr_0001B0FD_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Slave? I'll rot in fucking hell before I'm somebody's lap dog. Give me a gun, motherfucker!
ESP.TRADUIT: 奴隶吗?我宁愿烂在地狱里也不愿成为别人的哈巴狗。给我枪，混蛋!
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Miss Kat [04005CB2] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\FemaleAdult09\aaRussellM_aaSWMissKatRecr_0001B0FD_2.ogg

You don't understand, Kat - the Legion is going to enslave you. Women are cattle to them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你不明白，凯特，军团要奴役你。对他们来说，女人就是牲畜。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't need a break, I need steady work! How else will I pay my way to Dayglow? Shit.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不需要休息，我需要稳定的工作！不然我怎么去日耀城？该死。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Miss Kat [04005CB2] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\FemaleAdult09\aaRussellM_aaSWMissKatRecr_0001B0FE_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I hear Legionaries prefer fucking each other. You'll get a break!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我听说军团士兵更喜欢互相操。 你可以得到休息！

ESP.ORIGINAL: Let's trade gear.
ESP.TRADUIT: 让我们交易装备。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, yes.
ESP.TRADUIT: 噢，好的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Miss Kat [04005CB2] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\FemaleAdult09\aaRussellM_aaSWMissKatShar_0001B102_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaMissKatREF.OpenTeammateContainer 1
I don't have anything to share with you just yet.
ESP.TRADUIT: 目前还没有什么可以告诉你的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well get on it! I need to do more than just queef in their general direction!
ESP.TRADUIT: 那就去吧!我需要做的不仅仅是对着他们的大致方向哼哼！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Miss Kat [04005CB2] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\FemaleAdult09\aaRussellM_aaSWMissKatShar_0001B101_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaMissKatREF.evp
aaMission01HendershotIntro01
Don't move a motherfuckin' muscle, meatbag! The Van Graffs sent you, didn't they? Didn't they? Answer me!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你他妈动都别动，肉袋!范·格拉夫派你来的，对吗？是不是？回答我！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hendershot [04019FF0] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\MaleGenericGhoul\aaRussellM_aaMission01Hend_0001BF0A_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaRussellMission01.HSGreeted to 2
Easy, I'm not with the Van Graffs. I want to talk with you about Glanton.
ESP.TRADUIT: 别激动，我不是范·格拉夫的人。我只想和你谈谈格兰顿的事。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Wait, you walked into a radioactive deathtrap overrun by feral ghouls just to ask me about Glanton?
ESP.TRADUIT: 等等，你走进一个到处都是凶残食尸鬼的放射性死亡陷阱就为了问我格兰顿的事？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hendershot [04019FF0] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\MaleGenericGhoul\aaRussellM_aaMission01Hend_0001C710_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Laughing}You must be out of your goddamn mind! All that... for Glanton. {Laughing}
ESP.TRADUIT: (笑)你一定是疯了!所有......格兰顿。{笑}
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hendershot [04019FF0] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\MaleGenericGhoul\aaRussellM_aaMission01Hend_0001C710_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: No, really. Why are you here?
ESP.TRADUIT: 不，说真的。你为什么来这里？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hendershot [04019FF0] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\MaleGenericGhoul\aaRussellM_aaMission01Hend_0001C710_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaRussellMission01.HSGreeted to 5 aaHendershotRef.evp
Point that piece at somebody else, zombie. I'm here about Glanton.
ESP.TRADUIT: 把枪对准别人，僵尸。我是为了格兰顿来的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Wait, you walked into a radioactive deathtrap overrun by feral ghouls just to ask me about Glanton?
ESP.TRADUIT: 等等，你走进一个到处都是凶残食尸鬼的放射性死亡陷阱就为了问我格兰顿的事？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hendershot [04019FF0] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\MaleGenericGhoul\aaRussellM_aaMission01Hend_0001C711_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Laughing}You must be out of your goddamn mind! All that... for Glanton. {Laughing}
ESP.TRADUIT: (笑)你一定是疯了!所有......格兰顿。{笑}
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hendershot [04019FF0] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\MaleGenericGhoul\aaRussellM_aaMission01Hend_0001C711_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: No, really. Why are you here?
ESP.TRADUIT: 不，说真的。你为什么来这里？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hendershot [04019FF0] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\MaleGenericGhoul\aaRussellM_aaMission01Hend_0001C711_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaRussellMission01.HSGreeted to 5 aaHendershotRef.evp
<Lie> Yes, I'm with the Van Graffs, and we're about to make a... hostile takeover! <Attack>
ESP.TRADUIT: <说谎> 是的，我和范·格拉夫家族一起，我们即将进行......恶意收购！ <攻击>

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm gonna feed you to the ferals, motherfucker!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我要把你喂给野兽，混蛋！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hendershot [04019FF0] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\MaleGenericGhoul\aaRussellM_aaMission01Hend_0001C70F_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaHendershotRef.Startcombat player
Wait, the Van Graffs are after you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 等等，范·格拉夫家族在找你？

ESP.ORIGINAL: No shit, they're after me. Notice the traps on the way in? It's a pain in the ass rigging that shit up, let me tell you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不是吧，他们在追我。注意到进来的陷阱了吗?我跟你说，搞这破玩意儿真让人头疼。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hendershot [04019FF0] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\MaleGenericGhoul\aaRussellM_aaMission01Hend_0001C712_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: But we ain't talking about me... we're talking about you and the Van Graffs. I know they sent you. Can't handle the competition!
ESP.TRADUIT: 但我们说的不是我...我们说的是你和范·格拉夫一家。我知道是他们派你来的。他们应付不了与我竞争！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hendershot [04019FF0] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\MaleGenericGhoul\aaRussellM_aaMission01Hend_0001C712_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm trying to locate Glanton, and you're the only lead I've got.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想找到格兰顿，你是我唯一的线索。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Damn, you must really want that bounty, huh?
ESP.TRADUIT: 该死，你一定很想要那笔赏金吧？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hendershot [04019FF0] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\MaleGenericGhoul\aaRussellM_aaMission01Hend_0001CBB8_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I think we can do business, but everything costs, so it's a matter of... just a second, got to check something.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想我们可以做生意，但一切都要花钱，所以这是...等一下，我得查点东西。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hendershot [04019FF0] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\MaleGenericGhoul\aaRussellM_aaMission01Hend_0001CBB8_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: startquest aaHendershotQuest
setstage aaRussellMission01 36 set aaRussellMission01.HSBackup to 1
I don't like repeating myself, asshole. I need information on Glanton's whereabouts.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不想重复我的话，混蛋。我需要关于格兰顿下落的信息。

ESP.ORIGINAL: No need to get agitated. Look at it from my perspective - some smoothskin travels through a subterranean hellhole to ask about a client. That's nuts.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没必要激动。从我的角度来看--一个滑皮穿过一个地下地狱去询问一个客户的情况。这太狂热了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hendershot [04019FF0] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\MaleGenericGhoul\aaRussellM_aaMission01Hend_0001CBBA_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I think we can do business, but everything costs, so it's a matter of... just a second, got to check something.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想我们可以做生意，但一切都要花钱，所以这是...等一下，我得查点东西。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hendershot [04019FF0] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\MaleGenericGhoul\aaRussellM_aaMission01Hend_0001CBBA_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: startquest aaHendershotQuest
setstage aaRussellMission01 36 set aaRussellMission01.HSBackup to 1
aaRussellMission01HSTunnelBark01
Let me see... no, it can't be. I sealed it off, but they found a way... with the security down, we're fucked! We're fucked!
ESP.TRADUIT: 让我看看...不，不可能。我把它封起来了，但他们找到了办法...安全系统坏了，我们完蛋了！我们受骗了！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hendershot [04019FF0] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Fear Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\MaleGenericGhoul\aaRussellM_aaRussellMissio_0001CBBC_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaRussellMission01.HSGreeted to 6 aaHendershotREf.evp
aaMission01HendershotTunnelAlert01
They're here, those things from The Divide! Ferals won't hold them off for long - I need your help, now!
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们来了，那些来自分水岭的家伙！野狗不会拖住他们太久的-我需要你的帮助，马上！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hendershot [04019FF0] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Fear Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\MaleGenericGhoul\aaRussellM_aaMission01Hend_0001CBBF_1.ogg

set aaRussellMission01.HSGreeted to 7
Of course I'll help. Where do you need me?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我当然会帮忙。你需要我去哪里？

ESP.ORIGINAL: This place has a derelict security network - robots, turrets and shit, but I could never get it online. See if you can get it working.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这地方有一个废弃的安全网络，机器人，炮塔什么的，但我从来没能把它连上网。看看你能不能让它工作。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hendershot [04019FF0] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\MaleGenericGhoul\aaRussellM_aaMission01Hend_0001CBC3_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Don't fuck around with that too long. I need you outside, clearing those fuckers out before they show up in strength.
ESP.TRADUIT: 别他妈花太久时间。我需要你在外面，赶在那些混蛋出现之前把他们赶出去。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hendershot [04019FF0] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Fear Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\MaleGenericGhoul\aaRussellM_aaMission01Hend_0001CBC3_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'll cover you from up top, now get to it!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我从上面掩护你，快去！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hendershot [04019FF0] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\MaleGenericGhoul\aaRussellM_aaMission01Hend_0001CBC3_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaHendershotREF.evp set aaRussellMission01.SecurityFixed to 1
You promise me information on Glanton, and I'll help you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你向我保证提供格兰顿的信息，我就帮你。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Fine, motherfucker! I'll give you everything I've got on that scalp-hunting sonofabitch! We can have a nice chat after this bullshit!
ESP.TRADUIT: 很好，操他妈的!我把我掌握的一切都告诉你!我们可以在这破事之后好好聊聊！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hendershot [04019FF0] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\MaleGenericGhoul\aaRussellM_aaMission01Hend_0001CBC4_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Start with the security network - robots, turrets and shit... I could never get it online. See if you can get it working.
ESP.TRADUIT: 从安全网络开始--机器人、炮塔等等...我从来没有把它们连上网络过。看看你能不能让它工作。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hendershot [04019FF0] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Fear Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\MaleGenericGhoul\aaRussellM_aaMission01Hend_0001CBC4_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Don't fuck around with that too long. I need you outside, clearing those fuckers out before they show up in strength.
ESP.TRADUIT: 别他妈花太久时间。我需要你在外面，赶在那些混蛋出现之前把他们赶出去。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hendershot [04019FF0] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\MaleGenericGhoul\aaRussellM_aaMission01Hend_0001CBC4_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'll cover you from up top, now get to it!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我从上面掩护你，快去！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hendershot [04019FF0] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\MaleGenericGhoul\aaRussellM_aaMission01Hend_0001CBC4_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaHendershotREF.evp set aaRussellMission01.SecurityFixed to 1
I'll save us both some trouble and give you a quick death. Problem solved. <Attack>
ESP.TRADUIT: 我给咱俩省点麻烦，让你死得痛快点。问题解决了。<攻击>

ESP.ORIGINAL: Motherfucker!
ESP.TRADUIT: 操你妈！ !
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hendershot [04019FF0] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\MaleGenericGhoul\aaRussellM_aaMission01Hend_0001CBC5_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaHendershotRef.startcombat playerref
Not another word about Russell, you depraved fuck. <Attack>
ESP.TRADUIT: 别再提拉塞尔了，你这个堕落的混蛋。<攻击>

ESP.ORIGINAL: You take umbrage at my words. I only speak the truth, champion. He burned me in love, just as I burned his flesh. Perhaps I will burn you, too.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你对我的话感到生气。我只说真话，战士。他用爱情烧死了我，就像我烧死了他的肉。也许我会把你也烧了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Titus Vulcanus [04010EA6] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\MaleOld01\aaRussellM_aaTitusWhoRusse_0002AF33_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaTitusVulcanusREF.startcombat aarussellREF aaTitusBadass01REF.startcombat player aaTitusBadass02REF.startcombat player
Whatever you say, bub. Can we get this over with? <Attack>
ESP.TRADUIT: 随你怎么说，伙计。我们能快点结束吗？<攻击>

ESP.ORIGINAL: Post haste.
ESP.TRADUIT: 尽可能快
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Titus Vulcanus [04010EA6] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\MaleOld01\aaRussellM_aaTitusWhoRusse_0001CE8A_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaTitusVulcanusREF.startcombat aarussellREF aaTitusBadass01REF.startcombat player aaTitusBadass02REF.startcombat player
aaTitusWhoRussellToldMe
Whatever happened in the past is just that - past. Russell is my friend now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 无论之前发生了什么，都已经过去了。拉塞尔现在是我的朋友了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: How charming, like Damon and Pythias. Did he tell you how he screamed when I pressed my blade against his flesh? He'll never hide his scars.
ESP.TRADUIT: 多迷人啊，就像达蒙和皮西厄斯。他有没有告诉你当我用剑抵住他的肉时他是怎么尖叫的?他永远不会隐藏他的伤疤。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Titus Vulcanus [04010EA6] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\MaleOld01\aaRussellM_aaTitusWhoRusse_0002AF32_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I didn't come here to talk about Russell.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不是来这里谈论拉塞尔的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Very well. Anything else before we begin?
ESP.TRADUIT: 很好。在我们开始之前还有什么事吗?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Titus Vulcanus [04010EA6] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\MaleOld01\aaRussellM_aaTitusWhoRusse_0001E770_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Agreed.
ESP.TRADUIT: 同意。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Splendid! Move, men!
ESP.TRADUIT: 精彩！移动！男人！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Titus Vulcanus [04010EA6] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: applyimagespacemodifier FadeToBlackAndBackISFX showmessage aaRussellSoldMessage Player.RemovePerk aaRussellPerk ShowMessage aaMessagePerkRussellRemove aaRussellREF.disable aaRussellREF.markfordelete stopquest aaRussellBark set SomeguyMaster.JoaquinStatus to 0 stopquest aaRussellQuest aaTitusVulcanusREF.disable aaTitusVulcanusREF.markfordelete
That's not what I had in mind. Forget I said that.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这不是我想要的。忘了我说过的话吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: A pity.
ESP.TRADUIT: 遗憾。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Titus Vulcanus [04010EA6] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\MaleOld01\aaRussellM_aaTitusWhoRusse_0001CE8F_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaRussellMission01TunnelerBark
What the fuck are these things? Are they really worse than the ferals?
ESP.TRADUIT: 这些他妈是什么东西？ 他们真的比野鬼还猛吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Fear Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellM_aaRussellMissio_0001DFBE_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I think that's the last of them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想这是最后一个了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah, for now. I owe you a few, stranger. Damn things showed up a few months back, burrowing through the tunnels, killing ferals.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的,现在。我欠你几个人情，陌生人。几个月前出现了些该死的东西，在隧道里挖洞，杀野兽。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hendershot [04019FF0] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\MaleGenericGhoul\aaRussellM_aaMission01Hend_0001E3DE_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Damnable thing is that they'll be back. You've already bailed me out once, but would you be willing to help me again? I'll make it worth your while.
ESP.TRADUIT: 该死的是，他们还会回来的。你已经帮过我一次了，但你愿意再帮我一次吗?我会让你觉得值得的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hendershot [04019FF0] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\MaleGenericGhoul\aaRussellM_aaMission01Hend_0001E3DE_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setstage aaRussellMission01 42
What's in it for me?
ESP.TRADUIT: 这对我有什么好处？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Caps, weapons, and you'll be on my client list. I'll give you a discount on everything in my inventory. That enough?
ESP.TRADUIT: 瓶盖，武器，并且你会是我的VIP客户。我库存里的东西都会给你打折的。这足够了吗?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hendershot [04019FF0] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\MaleGenericGhoul\aaRussellM_aaMission01Hend_0001E3E2_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sure, I'll help you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当然，我会帮你的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Good on you, stranger. I won't forget it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 干得好，陌生人。我不会忘记的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hendershot [04019FF0] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\MaleGenericGhoul\aaRussellM_aaMission01Hend_0001E3E3_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I think they've got some sort of hive down in that corridor. If it's anything like ants, you just need to kill the mama.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我觉得他们在走廊里有个巢穴。如果是巨型蚂蚁，你只要杀了蚁后就行了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hendershot [04019FF0] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\MaleGenericGhoul\aaRussellM_aaMission01Hend_0001E3E3_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'd go with you, but frankly, those things just about make me shit my pants. I've still got the shakes from the last bunch.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我也想跟你一起去，但说实话，那些东西简直让我尿裤子了。我还记得上次那的颤抖。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hendershot [04019FF0] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Fear Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\MaleGenericGhoul\aaRussellM_aaMission01Hend_0001E3E3_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Here, take this stuff. Hopefully it should get you through there without being detected. Good luck.
ESP.TRADUIT: 给，拿着这个。希望它能让你在不被发现的情况下通过。祝你好运。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hendershot [04019FF0] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\MaleGenericGhoul\aaRussellM_aaMission01Hend_0001E3E3_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: player.additem StealthBoy 1 player.additem radX 2 player.additem radaway 2 player.additem NVCateye 2 player.additem NVDLC04WeapGrenadeFlashBang 2
We had an agreement. I want the information on Glanton, then I leave.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们有一个协议。我想要关于格兰顿的信息，然后我就离开。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ok, asshole.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，混蛋。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hendershot [04019FF0] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\MaleGenericGhoul\aaRussellM_aaMission01Hend_0001E3E4_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Glanton bought a dickload of guns and then went to meet with Finley, his man in the Khans.
ESP.TRADUIT: 格兰顿买了一堆枪然后去见芬利，这人是大汗帮的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hendershot [04019FF0] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\MaleGenericGhoul\aaRussellM_aaMission01Hend_0001E3E4_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Now get the fuck out of here. I've got a business to run.
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在给我滚出去。我有生意要做。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hendershot [04019FF0] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\MaleGenericGhoul\aaRussellM_aaMission01Hend_0001E3E4_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaRussellMission01.TunnelerFate to 1 setstage aaRussellMission01 50
I need volunteers to help defend the town. Will you join the militia?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我需要志愿者来保卫小镇。你愿意加入民兵吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: You got to wake up earlier in the morning to pull one on Joe. I heard all these hysterics about the Legion before, nothing comes of it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你早上得早点起来，给乔来一枪。我以前听过这些关于军团的歇斯底里，但毫无结果。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joe Briggs [0400AE6B] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaRussellM_aaSWRecruitBrig_0001FCC3_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Whoo doggy!
ESP.TRADUIT: 哇哦，小狗！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joe Briggs [0400AE6B] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaRussellM_aaSWRecruitBrig_0001FCC6_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaBriggsREF.OpenTeammateContainer 1
Let's trade gear.
ESP.TRADUIT: 让我们交易装备。

ESP.ORIGINAL: There are at least one hundred Legionaries on the way here, right now. We need you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在至少有一百名军团士兵在来这里的路上。我们需要你。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hell fire! I've got to pack my bags and skedaddle! I didn't sign on for no massacre, thank you very much!
ESP.TRADUIT: 地狱之火!我得收拾行李走人了!我不是来参加大屠杀的，非常感谢!
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joe Briggs [0400AE6B] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaRussellM_aaRecruitBriggs_0001FCC8_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Forget it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 算了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ok, partner.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好的，搭档。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joe Briggs [0400AE6B] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaRussellM_aaRecruitBriggs_0001FCC7_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaRecruitBriggsSpeech
Get on that wall or I'll make the final act of your life hell on earth.
ESP.TRADUIT: 快爬上那堵墙，否则我就把你人生的最后一幕变成地狱。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Good gravy, you got it!
ESP.TRADUIT: 天啊，你说对了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joe Briggs [0400AE6B] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Fear Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaRussellM_aaRecruitBriggs_0001FCCF_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Just, uh, one thing - you got any firepower to lend me? Uh, only if it's ok with you, of course.
ESP.TRADUIT: 就一件事，你有什么武器可以借给我吗？当然，只有你同意才行。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joe Briggs [0400AE6B] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Fear Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaRussellM_aaRecruitBriggs_0001FCCF_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaRussellMission01.RecruitBriggs to 1 aaBriggsREF.removescriptpackage aaJoeBriggsBarkeepPackage aaBriggsREF.removescriptpackage aaJoeBriggsFleePackage aaBriggsREF.evp
aaRecruitBriggsBlackWidow
aaRecruitBriggsBribe
Well, I do need to buy a new jukebox. What the heck, you can count me in.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯，我确实需要买一个新的点唱机。管他呢，算我一个。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joe Briggs [0400AE6B] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaRussellM_aaRecruitBriggs_0001FCD3_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaRussellMission01.RecruitBriggs to 1 aaBriggsREF.removescriptpackage aaJoeBriggsBarkeepPackage aaBriggsREF.removescriptpackage aaJoeBriggsFleePackage aaBriggsREF.evp player.removeitem caps001 500 aaBriggsREF.additem caps001 500
I'll give you 500 caps to join the militia. <Pay 500 caps>
ESP.TRADUIT: 我给你五百瓶盖，你加入民兵。<支付500瓶盖>

ESP.ORIGINAL: <Lie> Gotcha! Just another drill, Joe.
ESP.TRADUIT: <说谎> 骗到你了！ 乔，又是一次演习。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Whew, I about had a heart attack over that one.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哇，我差点心脏病发作了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joe Briggs [0400AE6B] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaRussellM_aaRecruitBriggs_0001FCCE_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sorry, I've got nothing to share with you right now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 对不起，我现在没有什么可以和你分享的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's ok, partner. Just don't forget about me. I'd like to do more than just chunk rocks at 'em.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没关系,搭档。别忘了我。我想做的不仅仅是朝他们扔石头。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joe Briggs [0400AE6B] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaRussellM_aaRecruitBriggs_0001FCD1_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I need to get going.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我得走了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Okey dokey.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好的，好的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joe Briggs [0400AE6B] (mod) Quest : ([0400B29B]aaSilverwoodDialogue) Generic Dialogue for Persistent NPC's EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaSilverwo_aaBriggsGOODBYE_0001FCD5_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I killed the Tunneler Queen.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我杀死了挖掘者女王。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I was getting ready to seal the tunnel again if you didn't show. Had half a mind just to leave this place altogether.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你不出现，我准备再封住隧道一次。我差点就想离开这里了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hendershot [04019FF0] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\MaleGenericGhoul\aaRussellM_aaMission01Hend_000203A1_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Thanks to you I'll be able to keep my life and my livelihood. Anything you need, I'll do my best to help you out from here on.
ESP.TRADUIT: 多亏了你，我才能维持我的生活和生计。无论你需要什么，从现在开始我会尽力帮你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hendershot [04019FF0] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\MaleGenericGhoul\aaRussellM_aaMission01Hend_000203A1_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: As for Glanton, he bought a dickload of guns and then went to meet with Finley, his man in the Khans.
ESP.TRADUIT: 至于格兰顿，他买了一堆枪然后去见芬利，一个大汗帮的人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hendershot [04019FF0] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\MaleGenericGhoul\aaRussellM_aaMission01Hend_000203A1_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Finley is Glanton's escort when he passes through Khan territory, as Glanton is not exactly beloved by the rest of the tribe.
ESP.TRADUIT: 芬利在格兰顿穿过大汗帮领地时护送他，因为格兰顿不是完全被部落的其他成员喜欢。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hendershot [04019FF0] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\MaleGenericGhoul\aaRussellM_aaMission01Hend_000203A1_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, and you can use my old railcar any time you like. That will make the trip down here a little easier.
ESP.TRADUIT: 对了，你随时可以用我的旧轨道车。这样下去就容易多了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hendershot [04019FF0] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\MaleGenericGhoul\aaRussellM_aaMission01Hend_000203A1_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Here's a little something for your trouble. Good luck to you, stranger.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是给你的一点小礼物。祝你好运，陌生人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hendershot [04019FF0] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\MaleGenericGhoul\aaRussellM_aaMission01Hend_000203A1_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setstage aaRussellMission01 50 player.additem caps001 500 player.additem Ammo556mm 250 player.additem WeapGrenadeFrag 6 aaHendershotHandCarSTATICRef.disable aaHendershotHandCarSTATICRef.markfordelete aaChollaCavernRailcarREF.enable aaHendershotREF.removescriptpackage aaHendershotGuardPerchPackage aaHendershotREF.addscriptpackage DefaultSandboxLinkedMarker512 aaRussellRef.startconversation playerref, aaMission01RussellHendershot01 set aaHendershotQuest.Befriended to 1 set aaRussellMission01.TunnelerFate to 3
I could use your help defending the town. Any chance you'll join the militia?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我需要你帮我保卫小镇。你会加入民兵吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: No way. I know what's about to go down, even if the townsfolk don't believe it. I'm about to start making tracks. You should do the same.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不可能。我知道接下来会发生什么，尽管镇上的人不相信。我要开始铺轨了。你也应该这样做。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Parmley [0400D902] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\MaleAdult05\aaRussellM_aaSWRecruitParm_0002158F_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Now you're talking.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这就对了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Parmley [0400D902] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\MaleAdult05\aaRussellM_aaSWRecruitParm_00021591_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaSWCourierREF.OpenTeammateContainer 1
Let's trade gear.
ESP.TRADUIT: 让我们交易装备。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaSWRecruitParmleySpeech
That's might be the corniest line I've ever heard. No.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这可能是我听过的最老套的话了。不。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Parmley [0400D902] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\MaleAdult05\aaRussellM_aaSWRecruitParm_00021592_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Courier to courier, help me out here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 邮差为邮差，帮帮我。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Dammit, dammit, dammit! Why didn't I just run when that prospector gave me the word, huh? Had to warn the town, do the right thing.
ESP.TRADUIT: 该死，该死，该死！那个勘探者让我去的时候，我为什么不跑呢？必须警告全城，做正确的事。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Parmley [0400D902] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\MaleAdult05\aaRussellM_aaSWRecruitParm_00021593_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ok, I'm with you. I've got an old rifle, but not much else. Can you help me out?
ESP.TRADUIT: 好的，我同意。我只有一把旧步枪，别的就没有了。你能帮我一下吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Parmley [0400D902] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\MaleAdult05\aaRussellM_aaSWRecruitParm_00021593_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaRussellMission01.RecruitParmley to 1 aaSWCourierREF.removescriptpackage aaSWCourierSandboxSaloonPackage aaSWCourierREF.evp aaRussellREF.sayto player aaRussellMission01RecruitParmleyBark
You know the Legion has the escape routes secured. You won't make it out - might as well fight.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你知道军团已经封锁了逃生路线。你逃不掉的，还是打一架吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'll give you 1,000 caps to join the militia. <Pay 1,000 caps>
ESP.TRADUIT: 你加入民兵的话我给你1000瓶盖。<给他1000瓶盖>

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's funny, I was just thinking of sticking around a bit longer.
ESP.TRADUIT: 真有趣，我还想再多待一会儿呢。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Parmley [0400D902] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\MaleAdult05\aaRussellM_aaSWRecruitParm_00021596_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ok, I'm with you. I've got an old rifle, but not much else. Can you help me out?
ESP.TRADUIT: 好的，我同意。我只有一把旧步枪，别的就没有了。你能帮我一下吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Parmley [0400D902] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\MaleAdult05\aaRussellM_aaSWRecruitParm_00021596_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaRussellMission01.RecruitParmley to 1 aaSWCourierREF.removescriptpackage aaSWCourierSandboxSaloonPackage aaSWCourierREF.evp aaRussellREF.sayto player aaRussellMission01RecruitParmleyBark
aaSWRecruitParmleyTerrifying
aaSWRecruitParmleyGuns
aaSWRecruitParmleyJustWait
aaSWRecruitParmleyLeaveAsshole
I don't have any gear to share right now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我现在没有东西可以分享。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ok, but I don't think this old bolt-action will do much good if we get in some real shit.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，但我觉得如果我们遇到真正的麻烦，这种老式的螺栓装置不会有什么用。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Parmley [0400D902] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\MaleAdult05\aaRussellM_aaSWRecruitParm_00021595_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I need to get going.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我得走了。

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Parmley [0400D902] (mod) Quest : ([0400B29B]aaSilverwoodDialogue) Generic Dialogue for Persistent NPC's EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'd like to see your wares.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想看看你的货物。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Absolutely.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当然了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hendershot [04019FF0] (mod) Quest : ([0401BF06]aaHendershotQuest) Hendershot's Dialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\MaleGenericGhoul\aaHendersh_aaHendershotBuy_00021BAA_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Showbartermenu
Tell me where Glanton is, or I'll make Bitter Springs seem like a fucking picnic.
ESP.TRADUIT: 告诉我格兰顿在哪，不然我就让你们跟苦泉一个下场。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Please. You want information, show me caps, but don't even pretend that you might throw down here. Bluffing ain't gonna get you a discount.
ESP.TRADUIT: 拜托。你想要信息，让我看到瓶盖，但不要假装你会扔到这里。虚张声势不会给你打折的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Finley [04021397] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\MaleAdult06\aaRussellM_aaMission01Finl_00021BB1_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're some kind of bounty hunter, right? You know it's funny that the NCR wants Glanton after all he did on their behalf.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你是赏金猎人，对吧?格兰顿为他们做了那么多，NCR却想抓他。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Finley [04021397] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\MaleAdult06\aaRussellM_aaMission01Finl_00021BB1_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I guess we're all just waiting to get fucked over at some point.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想我们都在等着在某个时候完蛋。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Finley [04021397] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\MaleAdult06\aaRussellM_aaMission01Finl_00021BB1_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: 1,000 caps should be enough. Take it or leave it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 1000瓶盖应该足够了。要不要随你便。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Finley [04021397] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\MaleAdult06\aaRussellM_aaMission01Finl_00021BB1_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm trying to locate Glanton. I understand you might know his whereabouts.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我在找格兰顿，我听说你可能知道他的下落。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're some kind of bounty hunter, right? You know it's funny that the NCR wants Glanton after all he did on their behalf.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你是赏金猎人，对吧?格兰顿为他们做了那么多，NCR却想抓他。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Finley [04021397] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\MaleAdult06\aaRussellM_aaMission01Finl_00021BB0_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I guess we're all just waiting to get fucked over at some point.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想我们都在等着在某个时候完蛋。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Finley [04021397] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\MaleAdult06\aaRussellM_aaMission01Finl_00021BB0_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: 1,000 caps will be enough. Take it or leave it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 1000瓶盖就够了。要不要随你便。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Finley [04021397] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\MaleAdult06\aaRussellM_aaMission01Finl_00021BB0_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You seem pretty mellow for a Khan.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你看起来是个相当老练的大汗帮成员。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yep, that's one way of putting it. I'm just not as enthusiastic as I once was, you know, Especially after Chance bought it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，这是一种说法。我只是不像以前那么热情了，你知道，尤其是在偶然买了它之后。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Finley [04021397] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\MaleAdult06\aaRussellM_aaMission01Finl_00021BBA_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: There's a lot of bold talk in Red Rock, but not much else. We ain't like we were, probably never will be.
ESP.TRADUIT: 红石峡谷有很多大胆的言论，但除此之外就没什么了。我们已经不像以前那样了，也许永远都不会。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Finley [04021397] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\MaleAdult06\aaRussellM_aaMission01Finl_00021BBA_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Civilization just rolled right over us, we just haven't realized it yet. In the meantime, I figure I'll get paid.
ESP.TRADUIT: 文明刚刚席卷我们，只是我们还没有意识到。 与此同时，我想我会得到报酬。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Finley [04021397] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\MaleAdult06\aaRussellM_aaMission01Finl_00021BBA_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaSWUnmarked.FinleyFate to 1
Why did you help Glanton? He and the Khans seem like natural enemies.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你为什么要帮格兰顿？他和大汗帮不是死敌吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Glanton pays up front, throws in a little extra, and I forget about his past.
ESP.TRADUIT: 格兰顿先付了钱，再加点钱，我就忘了他的过去。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Finley [04021397] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\MaleAdult06\aaRussellM_aaMission01Finl_00021BBB_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Besides, only the old timers like Papa would get wound up over Glanton nowadays. Most of my generation don't even know who he is.
ESP.TRADUIT: 而且，现在只有像老爹这样的老家伙才会对格兰顿生气。我们这代人大多数都不知道他是谁。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Finley [04021397] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\MaleAdult06\aaRussellM_aaMission01Finl_00021BBB_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Either way, he plays it safe, pays me to guide him through our turf, to avoid Cazadors and stuff. It's an easy payday.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不管怎样，他都很安全，付钱让我带他穿过我们的地盘，避开杀人蜂之类的东西。这是一个轻松的发薪日。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Finley [04021397] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\MaleAdult06\aaRussellM_aaMission01Finl_00021BBB_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: <Pay Caps>
ESP.TRADUIT: <付瓶盖>

ESP.ORIGINAL: Glanton headed for Primm, went to meet with some people about a job on the Powder Gangers. I wouldn't want to be in their shoes right now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 格兰顿去了普瑞姆，去见了几个人谈一些关于炸药帮的工作。我可不想现在处于他们的境地。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Finley [04021397] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\MaleAdult06\aaRussellM_aaMission01Finl_00021BBC_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: That group of hellraisers was holed up in Spears Cavern - I'm guessing he was hired to clear them out. See you later, bounty hunter.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那群喧闹的家伙躲在长矛洞穴里，我猜他是被雇来清除他们的。待会儿见，赏金猎人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Finley [04021397] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\MaleAdult06\aaRussellM_aaMission01Finl_00021BBC_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: player.removeitem caps001 1000
setstage aaRussellMission01 60 aaRussellRef.startconversation playerref, aaMission01RussellFinley01
<Pay 1,000 caps> Here are the caps.
ESP.TRADUIT: <支付1000瓶盖> 这是瓶盖。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Then I got no info, do I? Go collect some fingers or whatever the fuck it is you do for caps, then come back.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那我就没有消息了，对吧?去拿几根手指，或者随便什么该死的瓶盖，然后回来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Finley [04021397] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\MaleAdult06\aaRussellM_aaMission01Finl_00021BBD_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't have enough caps.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我没有足够的瓶盖。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaMission01FinleyBarter
{Sardonic}Haggling over a man's life is kind of exciting, isn't it?
ESP.TRADUIT: {讽刺}为一个人的生命讨价还价很刺激，不是吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Finley [04021397] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\MaleAdult06\aaRussellM_aaMission01Finl_00021BC0_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Glanton headed for Primm, went to meet with some people about a job on the Powder Gangers. I wouldn't want to be in their shoes right now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 格兰顿去了普瑞姆，去见了几个人谈一些关于炸药帮的工作。我可不想现在处于他们的境地。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Finley [04021397] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\MaleAdult06\aaRussellM_aaMission01Finl_00021BC0_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: That group of hellraisers was holed up in Spears Cavern - I'm guessing he was hired to clear them out. See you later, bounty hunter.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那群喧闹的家伙躲在长矛洞穴里，我猜他是被雇来清除他们的。待会儿见，赏金猎人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Finley [04021397] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\MaleAdult06\aaRussellM_aaMission01Finl_00021BC0_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: player.removeitem caps001 500
setstage aaRussellMission01 60 aaRussellRef.startconversation playerref, aaMission01RussellFinley01
Make it five hundred, and I'll put in a good word for you around the Mojave.
ESP.TRADUIT: 给我五百，我就在莫哈韦为你美言几句。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaMission01FinleySpeech
That's pretty goddamn slimy. I admire that in a person.
ESP.TRADUIT: 真他妈的虚伪。我欣赏这样的人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Finley [04021397] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\MaleAdult06\aaRussellM_aaMission01Finl_00021BBE_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Glanton headed for Primm, went to meet with some people about a job on the Powder Gangers. I wouldn't want to be in their shoes right now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 格兰顿去了普瑞姆，去见了几个人谈一些关于炸药帮的工作。我可不想现在处于他们的境地。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Finley [04021397] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\MaleAdult06\aaRussellM_aaMission01Finl_00021BBE_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: That group of hellraisers was holed up in Spears Cavern - I'm guessing he was hired to clear them out. See you later, bounty hunter.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那群喧闹的家伙躲在长矛洞穴里，我猜他是被雇来清除他们的。待会儿见，赏金猎人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Finley [04021397] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\MaleAdult06\aaRussellM_aaMission01Finl_00021BBE_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setstage aaRussellMission01 60 aaRussellRef.startconversation playerref, aaMission01RussellFinley01
Tell me where Glanton went, or the elder Khans will find out about your business with Glanton.
ESP.TRADUIT: 告诉我格兰顿去了哪里，否则大汗帮的人会发现你和格兰顿的交易。

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Sarcastic}You say that with such conviction. I might have felt a twitch in my pants with that delivery. {Shifting tone}But no, I don't give a shit what he does.
ESP.TRADUIT: {讽刺}你说得很有说服力，我都觉得裤子在抽搐了。{变换音调}但是不，我不在乎他做什么。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Finley [04021397] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\MaleAdult06\aaRussellM_aaMission01Finl_00021BBF_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Glanton has massacred tribals across the Southwest. Do you really want him running free?
ESP.TRADUIT: 格兰顿屠杀了整个西南部的部落。你真的想让他逍遥法外吗?

ESP.ORIGINAL: I can't afford that. Any possibility that we could make a separate arrangement?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我负担不起，有没有其他的方法？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, now that you mention it, the NCR has got this Ranger spying on Red Rock, trying to pin down our drug shipments. We want him gone.
ESP.TRADUIT: 既然你提到了，NCR让这个游骑兵监视红石峡谷，想查清我们的毒品运输。我们想让他走。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Finley [04021397] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\MaleAdult06\aaRussellM_aaMission01Finl_00021BC1_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You got the stomach for a little wet work?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你有兴趣干点湿活儿吗?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Finley [04021397] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'll do it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我做。

ESP.ORIGINAL: He goes by the name of Solomon, he's camped out near the canyon. We don't want him scared off, ok? We want him dead.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他的名字叫所罗门，他在峡谷附近扎营。我们不想把他吓跑，好吗?我们要他死。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Finley [04021397] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\MaleAdult06\aaRussellM_aaMission01Finl_00021BC5_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaSolomonREF.enable
setobjectivedisplayed aaRussellMission01 52 1
I don't want any part of that.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我可不想掺和进来。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ok, ok. Just thought I'd throw it out there. You can't say I was unreasonable, can you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧,好吧。我只是想把它扔出去。你不能说我无理取闹，对吧?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Finley [04021397] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\MaleAdult06\aaRussellM_aaMission01Finl_00021BC6_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaRussellMission01SpearsCavernBARK
Jumpin' Jesus, they slaughtered the lot of them, carved them up like animals. These motherfuckers are for real.
ESP.TRADUIT: 上帝啊，他们屠杀了他们，把他们像动物一样剁碎了。这些混蛋是真的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellM_aaRussellMissio_000220B5_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaRussellMission01RussellWhereAsshole
Ok, where is this asshole?
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，这个混蛋在哪?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellM_aaRussellMissio_000226EA_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaRussellMission01PrimmAmbushBark
Looks like some regulars were waiting for Glanton, fucked up the ambush, turned it into a bloodbath. I don't see his body, though.
ESP.TRADUIT: 看来是有几个常客在等格兰顿，他们搞砸了埋伏，变成了一场大屠杀。但我没看到他的尸体。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellM_aaRussellMissio_00022902_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaRussellMission01AmbushCluesBark
Spent casings and blood trails all over the place. Looks like Glanton made a fighting retreat to the southeast.
ESP.TRADUIT: 到处都是废弃的弹壳和血迹。格兰顿向东南方向撤退了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellM_aaRussellMissio_00022907_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I know you hired Glanton to clean out the Powder Gangers. I need to find him.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我知道你雇了格兰顿去清理炸药帮。我要找到他。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Bounty hunter, huh? NCR has done so much for us here in the Mojave, let me tell you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 赏金猎人,嗯?我告诉你，NCR在莫哈韦为我们做了很多。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : O'Doyle [040220C1] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\MaleOld01\aaRussellM_aaMission01ODoy_00022994_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: When my daughter was held for ransom by the gangers, I went to the NCR, asked if they could help. They told me resources were stretched thin.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当我女儿被歹徒劫持勒索赎金时，我去了NCR，问他们能不能帮忙。他们告诉我资源很紧张。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : O'Doyle [040220C1] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\MaleOld01\aaRussellM_aaMission01ODoy_00022994_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Officer tells me to pay up, that it's the safe bet. So I pay up, and those sick fucks delivered her corpse, then mocked me about it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 政府官员让我付钱，说这是最安全的方法。所以我付了钱，那些变态把她的尸体送来，然后嘲笑我。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : O'Doyle [040220C1] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\MaleOld01\aaRussellM_aaMission01ODoy_00022994_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So I went to the NCR, asked for justice. They wouldn't help. Not a priority, is what they said. So for justice... I called on Glanton.
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以我去了NCR，要求伸张正义。他们不会提供帮助。他们是这么说的。所以对于正义...我拜访了格兰顿。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : O'Doyle [040220C1] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\MaleOld01\aaRussellM_aaMission01ODoy_00022994_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: O'Doyle, I want information on Glanton, or your entire family is going down.
ESP.TRADUIT: 奥多伊尔，我需要格兰顿的信息，否则你们全家都会完蛋。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I have no family now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我现在没有家人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : O'Doyle [040220C1] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\MaleOld01\aaRussellM_aaMission01ODoy_00022995_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're a bounty hunter, right? NCR has done so much for us here in the Mojave, let me tell you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你是赏金猎人，对吧?我告诉你，NCR在莫哈韦确实为我们做了很多。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : O'Doyle [040220C1] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\MaleOld01\aaRussellM_aaMission01ODoy_00022995_2.ogg
