ESP.ORIGINAL: When my daughter was held for ransom by the gangers, I went to the NCR, asked if they could help. They told me resources were stretched thin.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当我女儿被歹徒劫持勒索赎金时，我去了NCR，问他们能不能帮忙。他们告诉我资源很紧张。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : O'Doyle [040220C1] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\MaleOld01\aaRussellM_aaMission01ODoy_00022995_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Officer tells me to pay up, that it's the safe bet. So I pay up, and those sick fucks delivered her corpse, then mocked me about it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 政府官员让我付钱，说这是最安全的方法。所以我付了钱，那些变态把她的尸体送来，然后嘲笑我。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : O'Doyle [040220C1] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\MaleOld01\aaRussellM_aaMission01ODoy_00022995_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So I went to the NCR, asked for justice. They wouldn't help. Not a priority, is what they said. So for justice... I called on Glanton.
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以我去了NCR，要求伸张正义。他们不会提供帮助。他们是这么说的。所以对于正义...我拜访了格兰顿。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : O'Doyle [040220C1] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\MaleOld01\aaRussellM_aaMission01ODoy_00022995_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Glanton has killed innocents, including women and children. He has to pay for his crimes.
ESP.TRADUIT: 格兰顿杀害了很多无辜的人，包括妇女和儿童。他必须为他的罪行付出代价。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Don't we all? He went south, that's all I know. Leave me alone, please.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们不都是吗?他去南方了，我只知道这些。请不要打扰我。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : O'Doyle [040220C1] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\MaleOld01\aaRussellM_aaMission01ODoy_00022999_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setstage aaRussellMission01 70
You'll be happy to know that Glanton massacred the Powder Gangers in Spears Cavern.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你知道了格兰顿在长矛洞穴屠杀了炸药帮会很高兴的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Happy? No. Satisfied? Maybe.
ESP.TRADUIT: 快乐吗?不。满意吗?也许吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : O'Doyle [040220C1] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\MaleOld01\aaRussellM_aaMission01ODoy_0002299A_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Won't bring back Mary, but it gives me a warm feeling when I think about them squirming, screaming for mercy.
ESP.TRADUIT: 虽然救不回玛丽，但一想到他们扭动着，尖叫着求饶，我就觉得很温暖。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : O'Doyle [040220C1] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\MaleOld01\aaRussellM_aaMission01ODoy_0002299A_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What Glanton did isn't justice - it's simple butchery.
ESP.TRADUIT: 格兰顿的行为不是正义，就是单纯的屠杀。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Have you lost a child? What do you know about loss? Fuck you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你失去过孩子吗?你对失去亲人了解多少?去你妈的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : O'Doyle [040220C1] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted

ESP.ORIGINAL: What happened between you and the Gangers is none of my business. I just need to find Glanton.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你和帮派的事与我无关，我只要找到格兰顿

ESP.ORIGINAL: I suppose you'll find him one way or the other. He went south, that's all I know. Leave me alone, please.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想你总有办法找到他的。他去南方了，我只知道这些。请不要打扰我。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : O'Doyle [040220C1] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\MaleOld01\aaRussellM_aaMission01ODoy_0002299D_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setstage aaRussellMission01 70
aaMission01RWTIntro01
Steh! Outlander! {Stop, outlander!}Are you with bear? {Forceful}Are you with bear?
ESP.TRADUIT: 站住！外地人！你和熊一起的吗?{强硬}你和熊一起的吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Runs with Thunder [040234D2] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaRussellMission01.RWTGreeted to 2
No, I'm not with the bear. I just wanted to meet your tribe.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不，我不是NCR的人。我只是想见见你的部落。

ESP.ORIGINAL: This is land of Sand Wolves, not bear! Respect us, and you may pass in peace. Make trouble, and we skin you alive.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是沙狼的土地，不是熊的!尊重我们，你就能平安过去。制造麻烦，我们就活剥了你的皮。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Runs with Thunder [040234D2] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: Who are you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你是谁？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I am Runs-with-Thunder, but that no matter! Are you with bear?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我是雷霆万钧，不过没关系!你和熊一起的吗?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Runs with Thunder [040234D2] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes, I'm here on behalf of the NCR. I come in peace.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，我是代表NCR来的。我为和平而来。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Peace with bear? {Dismissive}You are mad, outsider, or have medicine. Talk with chief, he decides if you live or die. I hope... die.
ESP.TRADUIT: 与熊和平？ {不屑一顾}你疯了，外地人，或者吃药了。 与酋长交谈，他决定你是生是死。 我希望...死。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Runs with Thunder [040234D2] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: The NCR has had enough of your stone age bullshit. I'm putting you down. <Attack>
ESP.TRADUIT: NCR已经受够了你那些石器时代的废话。 我只能让你失望了， <攻击>

ESP.ORIGINAL: Alert!
ESP.TRADUIT: 警报！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Runs with Thunder [040234D2] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: startcombat player
aaMission01RWTIntro01Sneering
You are bear soldier! You die!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你是熊兵！你死定了！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Runs with Thunder [040234D2] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: startcombat player
Stand aside, savage. You're impeding the march of civilization! <Attack>
ESP.TRADUIT: 一边去,野蛮人。你在阻碍文明的前进!<攻击>

ESP.ORIGINAL: You are no friend to bear? You are are welcome here, outsider. No make trouble.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你不是朋友吗？不客气，外人。别惹麻烦。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Runs with Thunder [040234D2] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: No way, man. To hell with those bears on parade!
ESP.TRADUIT: 没门，伙计。让那些在列队的熊见鬼去吧！

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaRussellMission01AntQueenBark
Fuck me, that must be the mama up ahead. I think we'd do well to sneak past, not stir up the hive.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我操，前面一定是妈妈。我觉得我们最好溜过去，而不是搅乱巢穴。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellM_aaRussellMissio_00023781_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'd like to discuss the conflict between your tribe and Silverwood.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想谈谈你的部落和银木镇之间的冲突。

ESP.ORIGINAL: So, the bear calls it a {struggling to prounounce}kon-fleekt, huh? I see murder, stealing of land, lies... war!
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以，熊称之为{努力发音}信仰毛...顿，是吗？ 我只看到了谋杀、盗窃土地、谎言...战争！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Barking Tree [04003E17] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: Do you come with more lies on paper? Treaties and pacts? I wipe my ass with your paper!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你还会编造更多谎言吗?条约和协定?我用这些纸擦屁股!
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Barking Tree [04003E17] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaRussellMission01BarkTreeIntroWhy
aaRussellMission01BarkTreeIntroWhatTake
aaRussellMission01BarkTreeIntro01Nevermind
aaRussellMission01BarkTreeIntro01Psycho
aaRussellMission01BarkTreeIntro01Charisma
aaRussellMission01BarkTreeIntro01Speech
I took care of Solomon.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我搞定了所罗门。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well I guess that makes you a regular outlaw, don't it? Did it feel good, killing an NCR pig? I bet it did.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那你就是个逃犯了，对吧?杀一只NCR猪的感觉好吗?我敢打赌。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Finley [04021397] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\MaleAdult06\aaRussellM_aaMission01Finl_00024178_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Glanton headed for Primm, went to meet with some people about a job on the Powder Gangers. I wouldn't want to be in their shoes right now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 格兰顿去了普瑞姆，去见了几个人谈一些关于炸药帮的工作。我可不想现在处于他们的境地。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Finley [04021397] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\MaleAdult06\aaRussellM_aaMission01Finl_00024178_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: That group of hellraisers was holed up in Spears Cavern - I'm guessing he was hired to clear them out. See you later, bounty hunter.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那群喧闹的家伙躲在长矛洞穴里，我猜他是被雇来清除他们的。待会儿见，赏金猎人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Finley [04021397] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\MaleAdult06\aaRussellM_aaMission01Finl_00024178_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setstage aaRussellMission01 60 aaRussellRef.startconversation playerref, aaMission01RussellFinley01
This ends now, Glanton. I won't let you massacre the Sand Wolves.
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在该结束了，格兰顿。我不会让你屠杀沙狼的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I thought you'd be smart enough to leave me to my business. Clearly, I underestimated your stupidity.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我以为你会聪明到别管我的事。显然，我低估了你的愚蠢。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Glanton [04010EA5] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: As we speak, the Sand Wolves are holding a prospector captive, torturing the poor bastard to death. You still want to save them?
ESP.TRADUIT: 就在我们说话的时候，沙狼俘虏了一个勘探者，把这个可怜的混蛋折磨致死。你还想救他们吗?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Glanton [04010EA5] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: There's no townspeople to protect you now, Glanton. You're finished. <Attack>
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在镇上没有人保护你了，格兰顿。你完了。<攻击>

ESP.ORIGINAL: A little extra blood on my knife won't matter after this day is finished. Heads up, boys!
ESP.TRADUIT: 今天结束后，我刀上多沾点血也无所谓了。当心,孩子们!
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Glanton [04010EA5] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why'd you leave me behind? I told you I want in on this mission.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你为什么把我丢下？我告诉过你我想参与这次任务。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I wasn't sure if I could trust you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不确定能不能相信你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Glanton [04010EA5] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaMission01MayorPostBattle01
Hallelujah! Hallelujah! Our prayers are answered! The Lord sent you to repel the demonic hordes, and they are vanquished!
ESP.TRADUIT: 哈利路亚!哈利路亚!我们的祈祷应验了!上帝派你来击退恶魔大军，他们被打败了!
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mayor Brandon [0400B315] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\MaleAdult09\aaRussellM_aaMission01Mayo_00024DE8_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: We gathered in the cave, holding hands, praying for your success, and the Lord heard us! Thank you, stranger! We are forever indebted to you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们聚集在山洞里，手牵着手，祈祷你能成功，上帝听到了!谢谢你,陌生人!我们永远感激你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mayor Brandon [0400B315] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\MaleAdult09\aaRussellM_aaMission01Mayo_00024DE8_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaRussellMission01.GlantonLeft to 4
aaRussellMission01QueenDeadBark
We just fucked the dog, my friend.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们刚刚日了狗，我的朋友。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellM_aaRussellMissio_00026331_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaRussellMission01IvanpahEnterBark
Crazy bastard led them into an ant colony. Christ, he and the rest of them might just be ant shit by now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那个疯子把他们带进了蚁群。天啊，他和其他人现在可能只是一堆蚂蚁屎。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Fear Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellM_aaRussellMissio_00026337_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaRussellMission01IvanpahSOBark
Shootout in this hall must have made a racket, attracted the bugs.
ESP.TRADUIT: 大厅里的枪战一定很吵，引来了虫子。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellM_aaRussellMissio_0002638B_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaRussellMission01IvanpahLeftBark
Looks like this pair got separated, panicked. Bad place to lose your cool.
ESP.TRADUIT: 看来这两人走散了，很惊慌。这可不是让人冷静的地方。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellM_aaRussellMissio_00026390_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaRussellMission01IvanpahRockslideBark
Shit, they caved in the hall with some type of charge, also sealed off this exit. We gotta find another way out of this shithole.
ESP.TRADUIT: 该死，他们用某种炸药在通道里炸了，还封锁了出口。我们得想别的办法离开这鬼地方。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellM_aaRussellMissio_00026795_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaRussellMission01IvanpahLastStandBark
Guess the lieutenant made his last stand here. No sign of Glanton.
ESP.TRADUIT: 看来中尉在这里做了最后的抵抗。没有格兰顿的踪迹。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellM_aaRussellMissio_00026799_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaRussellMission01IvanpahEscapeBark
Glad to be out of there, but we are shit out of leads now. That asshole could be on his way to Baja or Bullhead, anywhere. Fuck.
ESP.TRADUIT: 很高兴能离开那里，但我们现在没有线索了。那混蛋可能在去巴哈或布尔海德的路上，任何地方。他妈的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellM_aaRussellMissio_000267B4_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaMission01RussellFoundCanyonNote
Damn, that is some freak luck finding that letter. Dead bastard just saved us a hell of a lot of time.
ESP.TRADUIT: 该死，能找到那封信真是太幸运了。那个死混蛋刚帮我们省了不少时间。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellM_aaMission01Russ_000267B6_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Doesn't mean it's going to be easy. Caruthers Canyon is a ways to the south, but it's not the worst stretch of Wasteland I've traveled.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这并不意味着会很容易。卡拉瑟斯峡谷是往南的一条路，但它并不是我所经历过的最糟糕的荒原。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellM_aaMission01Russ_000267B6_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Where exactly is Caruthers Canyon?
ESP.TRADUIT: 卡拉瑟斯峡谷到底在哪里？

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's nestled in a little mountain range northwest of Bullhead, not too far from Searchlight.
ESP.TRADUIT: 它坐落在布尔海德西北的一个小山脉中，离探照灯营地不远。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellM_aaMission01Russ_000267B9_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'd heard that settlers were opening up mines up there. They probably bumped into some tribals and want Glanton to clean them out.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我听说殖民者在那里开矿。他们可能遇到了一些部落，想让格兰顿把他们清除掉。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellM_aaMission01Russ_000267B9_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: How are we going to get there?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们要怎么去那里？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I know of an Old War tunnel that should get us close. Chances are Glanton is using the same one. If we move quickly, we might catch him.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我知道一条老战争时期的隧道可以让我们去那儿。格兰顿很可能用的是同一个。如果我们动作快点，也许能抓到他。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellM_aaMission01Russ_000267BA_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Don't worry, though - lots of caravans use this route. It ain't no Cholla Mountain.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不过别担心，很多商队都走这条路。这不是仙人掌山。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellM_aaMission01Russ_000267BA_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Here's the spot on your map. The sooner we get there, the better.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是你地图上的地点。我们越早到那里越好。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellM_aaMission01Russ_000267BA_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Nevermind.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没关系。

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Where did you grow up?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你是在哪里长大的？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Look, we're working right now. I'd prefer to focus on the task at hand, if you don't mind.
ESP.TRADUIT: 听着，我们现在正在工作。如果你不介意的话，我想专注于手头的工作。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaRussellAskGro_00027349_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Does it matter? Shit, ok. I was born a tribal, if you can believe it. One of the Fredonians, near the Grand Canyon.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这有关系吗?他妈的,好吧。我出生在部落里，如果你相信的话。在大峡谷附近的弗里多尼亚。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaRussellAskGro_0002734A_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Don't remember too much, other than my mother, some of the men teaching me a few things here and there, some of the language.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我记不太清了，除了我妈妈，有些男人时不时地教我一些东西，一些语言。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaRussellAskGro_0002734A_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I do remember the trees, their smell, the cool air up on the rim. People forget how different it is up at the higher elevations.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我记得那些树，它们的气味，以及边缘的凉爽空气。人们忘记了在更高的海拔上有多么不同。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaRussellAskGro_0002734A_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It all ended when the Legion showed up, though. Like a bad dream or something, they just erased the Fredonians from history.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但当军团出现时一切都结束了。就像噩梦之类的，他们把弗雷多尼亚部落从历史上抹去了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaRussellAskGro_0002734A_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I couldn't have been more than three or four when they took me, made me a slave. Got sold to a centurion, and that was my upbringing.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们把我抓去当奴隶的时候，我还不到三四岁。卖给了一个百夫长，我就是这样长大的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaRussellAskGro_0002734A_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I suppose you could call me the "Last of the Fredonians". Pretty fucking corny, huh?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想你们可以叫我"最后的弗雷多尼亚人"真他妈老土，是吧?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaRussellAskGro_0002734A_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaRussellQuest.GrowUp to 1
There's nothing left to see. All of it is under Legion control, anyway. I've never deluded myself into thinking I might stand on the rim again.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没什么可看的了。反正都在军团的控制之下。我从来没有自欺欺人地认为我会再次站在边缘。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaRussellAskGro_000513B6_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: No, Vegas is my home now. It's just pretty enough to make me forget the ugliness that's always lurking underneath... sort of like a hooker.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不，拉斯维加斯现在是我的家。它足够漂亮，足以让我忘记隐藏在它背后的丑陋...有点像妓女。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaRussellAskGro_000513B6_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaRussellQuest.GrowUp to 2
You ever thought about going back to the Grand Canyon, seeing your homeland?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你有没有想过回到大峡谷，看看你的家乡？

ESP.ORIGINAL: How can I best make use of your skills?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我怎样才能最好地利用你的技能？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Uh, point me towards the fucking bad guys?
ESP.TRADUIT: 呃，把我指给那些该死的坏蛋看？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaRussellAskFig_00027347_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Really, I've learned to make due with whatever I've got. I prefer an assault rifle, but I'm handy with a blade as well.
ESP.TRADUIT: 真的，我已经学会了应付我所拥有的一切。我更喜欢突击步枪，但我也很会用刀。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaRussellAskFig_00027347_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Just don't stick me with some dumb fucking unarmed weapon, ok? Nothing worse than charging into a shootout with your bare fists.
ESP.TRADUIT: 别给我一些愚蠢的破武器，好吗?没有比赤手空拳发起枪战更糟糕的事了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaRussellAskFig_00027347_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaRussellAskFace
Oh, you really want to know? Fuck you. I don't ask about that scar on your dome, so pay me the same courtesy, ok?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你真的想知道吗?去你妈的。我不会问你头顶上的伤疤，所以你也给我点尊重，好吗?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaRussellAskFac_00027342_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So what happened to your face? I'd really like to know.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你的脸怎么了?我真的很想知道。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're a persistent fuck, aren't you? Well, back when I was... property of a certain centurion I made the mistake of defying his instructions.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你真是个固执的混蛋，不是吗?当我还在...一个百夫长的财产我犯了一个错误，违抗了他的指示。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaRussellAskFac_00027343_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: He assaulted me, so I removed one of his eyes with a knife. In turn, he broke my legs, chained me to a wall, then tortured me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他袭击了我，所以我用刀挖掉了他的一只眼睛。反过来，他打断了我的腿，把我锁在墙上，然后折磨我。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaRussellAskFac_00027343_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: He took a shiskebab, used it to cook my eye in the socket, then he took a few hours roasting my face. That answer your question? Good.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他拿了一个羊肉串，在我的眼窝里烤了，然后他花了几个小时烤我的脸。这回答了你的问题吗?好。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaRussellAskFac_00027343_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaRussellQuest.Background to 1
Any chance you'll tell me what happened to your face now?
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在你能告诉我你的脸怎么了吗?

ESP.ORIGINAL: Titus Vulcanus, Centurion, Primum Pilus. He made a habit of repeating his station to me, so I wouldn't forget.
ESP.TRADUIT: 提图斯·伏尔甘，第一百夫长。他习惯向我重复他的地位，这样我就不会忘记。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaRussellAskFac_00027344_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's hard for most people to appreciate the depths of slavery. When you're chattel, there is no you, only the owner.
ESP.TRADUIT: 大多数人很难理解奴隶制。当你只是动产的时候，没有你自己，只有主人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaRussellAskFac_00027344_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're an extension of their estate, nothing more. You must obey in all things, without question or doubt. Titus knew this better than anyone.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你只是他们财产的延伸，仅此而已。你必须毫无疑问地服从一切。提图斯比任何人都清楚这一点。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaRussellAskFac_00027344_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: He loved to burn things, burn people, and to make others watch. Beyond that, he had only one other source of pleasure.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他喜欢烧东西，烧人，让别人看。除此之外，他只有另一种乐趣。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaRussellAskFac_00027344_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: He had a stable of boys in his tent, spent his nights... doing things to them. I was one of those boys. Wouldn't wish that on anyone.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他的帐篷里住着一群男孩，晚上在那里过夜...对他们做些什么。我就是其中之一。我不希望任何人这样。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaRussellAskFac_00027344_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaRussellQuest.Background to 2 set aaRussellQuest.Titus to aaRussellQuest.Titus + 1
Earlier you mentioned that you were enslaved. Who was your captor?
ESP.TRADUIT: 之前你提到你被奴役了。抓你的人是谁?

ESP.ORIGINAL: After he burned me, he departed on an errand for Caesar, left me to be crucified. I was almost looking forward to it at that point.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他烧了我之后，就为凯撒跑腿去了，留下我被钉在十字架上。那时候我几乎在期待了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest

ESP.ORIGINAL: When you've been burned and fucked for twelve years, crucifixion doesn't seem so bad. I was ready to die.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当你被烧和操了12年，钉死在十字架上也没那么糟糕。我已经做好了死的准备。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaRussellAskFac_00027345_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Would've died just another nameless slave in Arizona strapped to a cross, if it hadn't been for the rangers.
ESP.TRADUIT: 要不是游骑兵，他就会成为亚利桑那州另一个被钉在十字架上的无名奴隶。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaRussellAskFac_00027345_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: That was back when the Desert Rangers were at war with the Legion, and they actually took the fight them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那是在沙漠游骑兵和军团作战的时候，他们真的和军团作战了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaRussellAskFac_00027345_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: They slaughtered the Legionaries, freed the slaves, saved my life. I was fifteen, and right then and there I set out to repay them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们屠杀军团士兵，解放奴隶，救了我的命。我当时15岁，就在那时，我开始报答他们。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaRussellAskFac_00027345_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Maybe it was a debt of honor, debt of life, something. You have to pay back those things, one way or another. I was reborn a ranger that day.
ESP.TRADUIT: 也许是一笔荣誉之债，生命之债，什么的。你必须以某种方式偿还这些东西。那天我转世成为了一名游骑兵。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaRussellAskFac_00027345_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I spent the next eleven years with a ranger troop. They taught me how to fight, survive, prevail. How to be a man. They even educated me a little.
ESP.TRADUIT: 接下来的11年，我在一个游骑兵部队里度过。他们教我如何战斗，如何生存，如何取胜。如何成为一个男人。他们甚至对我进行了一些教育。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaRussellAskFac_00027345_7.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: As for Titus, I'm not sure. Heard he died at Zulu, but who the fuck knows?
ESP.TRADUIT: 至于提图斯，我不确定。听说他死在祖鲁，但谁知道呢?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaRussellAskFac_00027345_8.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If he is out there, and I find him... not God, Mars, or baby Jesus will save him from my knife, I promise you that.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果他还在，而我找到了他我向你保证，上帝、战神或小耶稣也不可能把他从我的刀下救出来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaRussellAskFac_00027345_9.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaRussellQuest.Background to 3
What became of Titus Vulcanus?
ESP.TRADUIT: 提图斯·伏尔甘后来怎么样了?

ESP.ORIGINAL: Best years of my life, no question. I was part of a family, fighting for our home, our real home, not some far-flung bullshit territory.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我生命中最美好的时光，毫无疑问。我是这个家庭的一员，为我们的家而战，我们真正的家，而不是什么荒无人烟的地方。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest

ESP.ORIGINAL: Fought in over sixty-four engagements with raiders, tribals, and Caesar's Legion, never left a man behind, not once.
ESP.TRADUIT: 经历了64次与掠夺者，部落和凯撒军团的交战，从未丢下过一个人，一次也没有。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaRussellAskFac_00027346_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Lot of outsiders will deny it, but we maintained a kill ratio of over thirty-to-one, no bullshit. Some units claimed fifty-to-one.
ESP.TRADUIT: 很多外人会否认，但我们的杀人比例保持在三十比一以上，别胡扯了。一些单位的死亡人数是51比1。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaRussellAskFac_00027346_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Man for man, I've never seen a better fighting force in my life, not in the NCR, and certainly not in the Legion.
ESP.TRADUIT: 只讨论人类，我这辈子没见过比这更好的战斗部队，不管是NCR，还是军团。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaRussellAskFac_00027346_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: We had our ranks, our discipline, but there was so much more to it. You try to tell people about it, they don't understand. Never will.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们有我们的队伍，我们的纪律，但还有更多。你想告诉别人，他们不懂。永远不会懂的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaRussellAskFac_00027346_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I guess you just had to be there.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想你只是必须在那里。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaRussellAskFac_00027346_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaRussellQuest.Background to 4
What was it like serving in the Desert Rangers?
ESP.TRADUIT: 在沙漠游骑兵服役是什么感觉?

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaRussellAskWhyHateLegion
aaRussellAskHateGhouls
If you were a Desert Ranger, why not join the NCR? You'd still be fighting the Legion.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你是沙漠游骑兵，为什么不加入NCR？你还在和军团作战。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Vegas is not NCR. The Desert Rangers fought to defend their homes, not expand some half-assed empire that touts liberty for all.
ESP.TRADUIT: 维加斯不属于NCR。沙漠游骑兵是为了保卫家园而战，而不是为了扩张那些鼓吹自由的半死不活的帝国。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaRussellAskRan_00028429_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: When you swear the oath to NCR you become another cog in their machine, nothing more.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当你向NCR宣誓时，你就成了他们机器上的另一个齿轮，仅此而已。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaRussellAskRan_00028429_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: We were in a tight spot when the Bears swooped in with their offer - that's what they do. We sold our souls for some peace of mind.
ESP.TRADUIT: 熊队突然提出报价时，我们正处于困境之中--他们就是这么做的。我们出卖灵魂，换取心灵的安宁。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaRussellAskRan_00028429_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I always thought the Desert Rangers would die in a bloody, final stand against the Legion. Instead, we got a nice, polite funeral and a monument.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我一直以为沙漠游骑兵会在与军团的血战中死去。相反，我们得到了一个体面的葬礼和一个纪念碑。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaRussellAskRan_00028429_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's why I hate that fucking thing. It tells everyone how the true rangers were neutered and filed away, forgotten.
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以我才讨厌那该死的东西。它告诉大家真正的游骑兵是如何被阉割，归档，被遗忘的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaRussellAskRan_00028429_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: We were the heart, no... the balls of the Mojave, and the NCR put the scalpel to us. Sometimes I wish I'd bought it before it happened.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们是心脏，不...莫哈韦沙漠的蛋蛋，NCR给我们下了手术刀。有时候我真希望我在事情发生之前就买下它。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaRussellAskRan_00028429_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaRussellQuest.Ranger to 2
Yeah, the Desert Rangers. Ever heard of them?
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，沙漠游骑兵。听说过他们吗?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaRussellAskRan_0002842A_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaRussellQuest.Ranger to 1
Were you in the military? You seem to know how to handle yourself.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你当过兵吗?你似乎知道如何控制自己。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Can you tell me anything else about Glanton?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你能告诉我格兰顿的其他情况吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: There's a lot of scuttlebutt about his origins, stories of his family being killed by tribals, him swearing vengeance. Probably bullshit.
ESP.TRADUIT: 关于他的出身有很多流言蜚语，他的家族被部落杀害，他发誓要复仇。也可能是胡说。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaRussellAskGla_00027348_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Not surprisingly, he's supposed to be a devil with a knife, very quick. Runs a tight crew, also, real authoritarian.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不出所料，他应该是一个手持刀的恶魔，速度很快。管理着一个严密的团队，真正的独裁者。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaRussellAskGla_00027348_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Once he sets his sights on a tribe, they're gonna get theirs one way or another. He's never failed to fulfill a contract.
ESP.TRADUIT: 一旦他盯上了一个部落，他们就会以某种方式得逞。他从来没有不履行合同过。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaRussellAskGla_00027348_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaRussellQuest.Glanton to 1
Yeah, I just wish I could've been there to see him bleed out, watch that stupid, smug grin wiped from his face. You did good.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是啊，我真希望我能亲眼看着他流血而死，看着他那愚蠢的，自以为是的笑容从脸上消失。你做的很好。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaRussellAskGla_000513B8_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: As for the bounty, it's yours. And don't fucking argue with me, just... keep it. If you're feeling guilty, just give me some scotch and chems.
ESP.TRADUIT: 至于赏金，是你的了。别他妈跟我吵，就...留着它。如果你觉得内疚，就给我来点威士忌和药。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaRussellAskGla_000513B8_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaRussellQuest.Glanton to 2
You know I collected the bounty on Glanton, right?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你知道格兰顿的赏金是我领的吧?

ESP.ORIGINAL: You ever heard of a man named Marko?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你听说过一个叫马尔科的人吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah, I heard a few stories about him.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，我听说过一些关于他的故事。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaRussellAskRan_0002F9E0_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Man told me that Marko is the fastest pistol, and the purest killer alive, maybe the devil himself.
ESP.TRADUIT: 有人告诉我，马尔科是最快的枪手，也是世上最纯粹的杀手，也许他就是恶魔。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaRussellAskRan_0002F9E0_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: With the way stories travel through the wasteland, this guy's probably just some asshole with a mean stare and gift for gab.
ESP.TRADUIT: 从废土上流传的故事来看，这家伙可能只是个眼神刻薄，能言善辩的混蛋。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaRussellAskRan_0002F9E0_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Most so-called badasses are all talk, get flustered or nervous when you put the screws to them. Then again... there's always that chance.
ESP.TRADUIT: 大多数所谓的坏蛋都只是说说而已，当你给他们施加压力时，他们会感到慌乱或紧张。再一次...机会总是有的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaRussellAskRan_0002F9E0_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I've heard plenty of hunters say they'd do this or that to Marko, and the few that actually acted on it, went after him? Gone.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我听过很多赏金猎人说他们会对马尔科做这样或那样的事，而有几个真正采取行动的人，去追他?没有一个回来的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaRussellAskRan_0002F9E0_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Somebody once told me that hell is here on earth, and we're living in it. If that's the case... maybe Marko is the devil.
ESP.TRADUIT: 有人曾告诉我，地狱就是人间，而我们正生活在其中。如果是这样的话...也许马尔科就是恶魔。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaRussellAskRan_0002F9E0_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What's your opinion of Mr. House?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你对豪斯先生的看法呢？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't like the idea of giving total control of New Vegas to a single person, much less some freak who's living in a test tube.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不喜欢把新维加斯的全部控制权交给一个人，更不用说一个住在试管里的怪胎了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest

ESP.ORIGINAL: House seems like he's shooting for perfection, and that ain't possible. No amount of securitrons can change human nature.
ESP.TRADUIT: 豪斯似乎在追求完美，但那是不可能的。再多的电子守卫也改变不了人性。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaRussellAskOpi_0002E524_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The only thing worse than a government is a government led by one man. Hell, it would be one man. That's a recipe for failure.
ESP.TRADUIT: 唯一比政府更糟糕的是由一个人领导的政府。见鬼，只有一个人。这是失败的秘诀。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaRussellAskOpi_0002E524_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What's your opinion of the Legion?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你怎么看待军团？

ESP.ORIGINAL: You know, I save opinions for things like food, guns, women, that sort of thing. The Legion doesn't rate an opinion.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你知道，我把意见留给食物，枪支，女人之类的东西。我的意见不给军团。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaRussellAskOpi_0002E525_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I shit on the fucking Legion. An army of slaves is no army at all. They're insects who worship a dirty old man.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我他妈的在军团头上拉屎。奴隶大军根本算不上什么军队。它们是崇拜肮脏老头的虫豸。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaRussellAskOpi_0002E525_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: All they have is their reputation, and let me tell you... it's bullshit. I've seen the hardest centurions piss themselves in their final moments.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们所拥有的只是他们的名声，让我告诉你...这是狗屎。我见过最强力的百夫长在最后时刻尿裤子。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaRussellAskOpi_0002E525_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: They like to pretend they're more than men, but they ain't. Stick a knife in their guts, turn it slowly, and they'll cry for their fucking mama.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们喜欢假装他们不仅仅是男人，但他们不是。 把刀插进他们的内脏，慢慢转动，他们就会哭着找妈妈。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaRussellAskOpi_0002E525_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I guess I was wrong... I do have an opinion. The Legion is an army of cunts, every last one of them, and they're going to lose.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想我错了......我确实有自己的看法。军团是一群婊子组成的军队，每一个都是，他们会输的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaRussellAskOpi_0002E525_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What's your opinion of the NCR?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你怎样看待NCR？

ESP.ORIGINAL: They're weak... and corrupt to the very marrow of their bones. A few senators hold most of the power, Kimball is just a talking head.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们软弱...腐败到的骨髓里。几个参议员掌握着大部分权力，金博尔只是个说空话的人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaRussellAskOpi_00028C73_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: They'll tax you to death but can't keep the roads safe. Towns sacrifice autonomy and self-determination, with nothing to show for it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们让你累死，却不能保证道路的安全。城镇牺牲了自治和自决，却没有任何发展。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaRussellAskOpi_00028C73_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's a giant scam that only serves a handful of cattlemen, mining barons, and other rich fucks who've paid off the bureaucrats.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是一个巨大的骗局只服务于少数的牧场主，矿业大亨，和其他买通了官僚的有钱人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaRussellAskOpi_00028C73_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: They show up to your town, throwing around bold words like, "Freedom" and "Security". People eat it up. All they get is taxes and false promises.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们出现在你的城镇，满口胡话，比如"自由"和"安全"，人们信这套，但他们得到的只有税收和虚假承诺。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaRussellAskOpi_00028C73_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Maybe that system worked for the old world, when communication was better, there were more people, something. But it doesn't cut it now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 也许这个系统对旧世界有效，那时通讯更好，人更多。但现在还不行。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaRussellAskOpi_00028C73_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You can't count on some government to help you. Self-reliance, with communities trading and working together, that's practical right now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你不能指望政府来帮你。自力更生，社区互相贸易和合作，这在现在是可行的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaRussellAskOpi_00028C73_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What do you think about the prospect of an independent New Vegas?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你认为一个独立的新维加斯前景如何？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'd fight for it, and I'm sure that others would too. Most of the locals resent the NCR. This ain't California. It's motherfucking Vegas.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我会为之奋斗，我相信其他人也会。大多数当地人都讨厌NCR。这不是加州。不要脸的拉斯维加斯。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaRussellAskOpi_00028C6E_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't trust House. Maybe a wild card is what we need. I'll take a bit of anarchy over some outsider telling me how to live my life.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不信任豪斯。也许我们需要一张万能牌。我宁愿接受一些混乱，也不愿外人告诉我该如何生活。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaRussellAskOpi_00028C6E_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: My blood is settled, but I'm still determined to take you in.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我的血脉已定，但我仍然决定收留你。

ESP.ORIGINAL: What I'm doing here is bigger than you or me... or any damn bounty, a piece of paper printed by some fat cat in Shady Sands.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我在这里做的事比你我都重要...包括任何该死的赏金，一张由沙荫镇某个有钱人打印的纸。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Glanton [04010EA5] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\MaleAdult05\aaRussellM_aaMission01Glan_00027BE2_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You've walked a lot of the same roads as me, seen this world first-hand. The rule of law is made with the gun, the blade. Not on paper.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你和我走过很多相同的路，亲眼目睹了这个世界。 法治是用枪、刀来制定的。 不是纸上谈兵。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Glanton [04010EA5] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\MaleAdult05\aaRussellM_aaMission01Glan_00027BE2_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Those Sand Wolves won't stop if I leave. They're out in the hills, waiting, watching for weakness. They don't question themselves, do they?
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果我离开了，那些沙狼也不会停止。 他们在山上，等待，观察弱点。 他们不会觉得自己有问题的，对吧？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Glanton [04010EA5] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\MaleAdult05\aaRussellM_aaMission01Glan_00027BE2_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's the paradox of civilization. We make laws, enforce the peace, bring development, but we harbor doubt, regret, guilt.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这就是文明的悖论。我们制定法律，维护和平，带来发展，但我们却怀有怀疑、遗憾和内疚。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Glanton [04010EA5] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\MaleAdult05\aaRussellM_aaMission01Glan_00027BE2_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The savage is spared from these... complications. We have to shed them in order to win, to survive. I can do that. That's why I'm here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 野蛮人免于这些...并发症。为了胜利，为了生存，我们必须摆脱它们。我可以做到。我就是为此而来的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Glanton [04010EA5] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\MaleAdult05\aaRussellM_aaMission01Glan_00027BE2_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you want the bounty, you'll have to kill me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你想要赏金，就得杀了我。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Glanton [04010EA5] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\MaleAdult05\aaRussellM_aaMission01Glan_00027BE2_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why do you hate the tribals so much?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你为什么这么讨厌部落？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I only really loved one person in my life, and they took her from me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我一生中只爱过一个人，但他们把她从我身边夺走了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Glanton [04010EA5] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\MaleAdult05\aaRussellM_aaMission01Glan_00027BEA_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't see it as hate... it's love of her memory... and justice. Every scalp I take is one less raid, one less kidnapping, one less rape.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不认为这是仇恨...这是对她记忆的爱...和正义。我每拿走一块头皮，就会少一次抢劫，少一次绑架，少一次强奸。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Glanton [04010EA5] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\MaleAdult05\aaRussellM_aaMission01Glan_00027BEA_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, and please spare me the dangers of vengeance. I've heard it ad nauseum: "It won't bring her back," or, "Dig two graves."
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，请不要让我冒复仇的危险。我已经听腻了:“这也救不了她，”或者“挖两个坟墓”。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Glanton [04010EA5] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\MaleAdult05\aaRussellM_aaMission01Glan_00027BEA_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What people don't realize is that I'm already in the grave. I'm going to drag the savages down in here with me until they cover me in dirt.
ESP.TRADUIT: 人们不知道的是，我已经在坟墓里了。我要把野蛮人拖到这里，直到他们把我埋在土里。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Glanton [04010EA5] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\MaleAdult05\aaRussellM_aaMission01Glan_00027BEA_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Stick around, and you can join me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 别走开，你可以加入我。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Glanton [04010EA5] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\MaleAdult05\aaRussellM_aaMission01Glan_00027BEA_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's not my style. I'd prefer to resolve this peacefully.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那不是我的风格。我想和平解决这件事。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Tell yourself that if you like, believe that words and chicanery can stop what's coming.
ESP.TRADUIT: 告诉自己，如果你愿意，相信言语和欺骗可以阻止即将发生的事情。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Glanton [04010EA5] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\MaleAdult05\aaRussellM_aaMission01Glan_00027BE8_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're going to have to choose between justice and anarchy. There is no middle ground here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你必须在公正和混乱之间做出选择。这里没有中间地带。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Glanton [04010EA5] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\MaleAdult05\aaRussellM_aaMission01Glan_00027BE8_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: While you mull over your peaceful intentions, you might speak to the sheriff. I understand he's recruiting volunteers for a scouting mission.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在你考虑你的和平意图时，你可以和治安官谈谈。我知道他在招募志愿者去执行侦察任务。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Glanton [04010EA5] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\MaleAdult05\aaRussellM_aaMission01Glan_00027BE8_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setstage aaRussellMission01 125
Care to step outside the walls? I'd like to avoid pissing off the entire town.
ESP.TRADUIT: 介意走出墙外吗？我不想惹怒全镇的人。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Bide your time, killer. Bide your time. I'll leave soon enough, you can meet me in the wilds.
ESP.TRADUIT: 等待时机吧，杀手。等待你的时间。我很快就会离开，你可以在荒野里见到我。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Glanton [04010EA5] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\MaleAdult05\aaRussellM_aaMission01Glan_00027BE7_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You might speak with the sheriff. I understand he's recruiting volunteers for a scouting mission, something involving the Sand Wolves.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你可以和治安官谈谈。我知道他在招募志愿者去执行跟沙狼有关的侦察任务。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Glanton [04010EA5] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\MaleAdult05\aaRussellM_aaMission01Glan_00027BE7_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setstage aaRussellMission01 125
Kill you? No problem, I'm sick of this town. <Attack>
ESP.TRADUIT: 杀了你？没问题，我受够这个小镇了。<攻击>

ESP.ORIGINAL: You never disappoint.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你永远不会失望。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Glanton [04010EA5] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\MaleAdult05\aaRussellM_aaMission01Glan_00027BE9_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: startcombat player
Yes.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah, I had a dog named Bingo. B-I-N-G-O, Bingo was his name-o!
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，我有一只叫宾果的狗。 B-I-N-G-O，宾果是他的名字哦！

ESP.ORIGINAL: No.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I thought I did, once. It was a long time ago.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我以为我做到了，有一次。那是很久以前的事了

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's none of your business.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那不关你的事。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I understand you knew Judge Richter.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我知道你认识里希特审判官。

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's a name I haven't heard in some time.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我有段时间没听到这个名字了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Glanton [04010EA5] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\MaleAdult05\aaRussellM_aaMission01Glan_00027BF2_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes, I knew the man, if you could call him that. He always seemed like something else to me, distinct.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，我认识他，如果你能这么叫他的话。对我来说，他总是与众不同，与众不同。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Glanton [04010EA5] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\MaleAdult05\aaRussellM_aaMission01Glan_00027BF2_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Whatever his faults, he had the will to enforce the law, and was utterly pitiless. He had the instincts of a wolf. Did you know him as well?
ESP.TRADUIT: 不管他有什么缺点，他都有执行法律的决心，而且是绝对无情的。他有狼的本能。你也认识他吗?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Glanton [04010EA5] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\MaleAdult05\aaRussellM_aaMission01Glan_00027BF2_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I killed him after he ordered a hit on my mentor.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在他下令暗杀我的导师后，我杀了他。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I thought it might end like that for him. He always overestimated the scope of his power and influence, contemptuous of possible reciprocity.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想他可能就这样结束了。他总是高估自己的权力和影响力，轻视可能的互惠关系。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Glanton [04010EA5] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\MaleAdult05\aaRussellM_aaMission01Glan_00027BF5_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: A man that fearless is bound to meet a violent end. I'm amazed he lasted as long as he did.
ESP.TRADUIT: 一个无所畏惧的人注定会遭遇暴力的下场。我很惊讶他能坚持那么久。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Glanton [04010EA5] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\MaleAdult05\aaRussellM_aaMission01Glan_00027BF5_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I decapitated that fat fuck.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我砍掉了那个胖子的头。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're not exaggerating, are you? He must have really wounded you somehow. Amazing what loss can make you do.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你没有夸张吧?他一定伤害了你。惊人的损失能让你做很多事。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Glanton [04010EA5] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\MaleAdult05\aaRussellM_aaMission01Glan_00027BF6_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: No. Were they like NCR Rangers?
ESP.TRADUIT: 不。他们像 NCR 游骑兵吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah, but the Desert Rangers were better, maybe the best. Long before the NCR showed up, we were protecting the Mojave.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是啊，但沙漠游骑兵更好，也许是最好的。在NCR出现之前，我们一直在保护莫哈韦沙漠。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaRussellAskRan_0002884C_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: NCR is fucking soft, all lazy conscripts waiting to finish their tours, well-supplied, armed to the teeth. We didn't have those luxuries.
ESP.TRADUIT: NCR太他妈软弱了，所有的懒兵都在等着结束他们的使命，装备齐全，全副武装。我们没有那些奢侈品。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaRussellAskRan_0002884C_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: There were never that many of us, and supplies were... uneven. We had training and discipline, though. That's why we won all our battles.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们从来没有那么多人，供给...不平衡。但我们有训练和纪律。这就是我们赢得所有战斗的原因。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaRussellAskRan_0002884C_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Plenty of former Desert Rangers are serving in the NCR now, and they're good people. That wasn't for me, though. I won't live a lie.
ESP.TRADUIT: 很多前沙漠游骑兵现在在NCR服役，他们都是好人。但那不是为我准备的。我不会活在谎言中。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaRussellAskRan_0002884C_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah. They were a militia, right?
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的。他们是民兵，对吧？

ESP.ORIGINAL: A militia, and then some. Our priority was defending locals and their property, helping the people, not serving some bureaucrats in California.
ESP.TRADUIT: 一个民兵，还有其它人。我们的首要任务是保护当地人和他们的财产，帮助人民，而不是为加州的一些官僚服务。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaRussellAskRan_0002884E_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: NCR is fucking soft, all lazy conscripts waiting to finish their tours, well-supplied, armed with new rifles. We didn't have those luxuries.
ESP.TRADUIT: NCR太他妈软弱了，所有的懒兵都在等着结束他们的使命，供应充足，配备新步枪。我们没有那些奢侈品。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaRussellAskRan_0002884E_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: There were never that many of us, and supplies were... uneven. We had training and discipline, though. That's how we survived.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们从来没有那么多人，供给...不平衡。但我们有训练和纪律。我们就是这样活下来的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaRussellAskRan_0002884E_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Plenty of former Desert Rangers are serving in the NCR now, and they're good people. That wasn't for me, though. I won't live a lie.
ESP.TRADUIT: 很多前沙漠游骑兵现在在NCR服役，他们都是好人。但那不是为我准备的。我不会活在谎言中。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaRussellAskRan_0002884E_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I've seen that monument at the Mojave Outpost, and that's it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我见过莫哈韦前哨的纪念碑，仅此而已。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Figures. That tower of scrap is our tombstone. Desert Rangers were here long before the NCR showed up. We kept the Mojave safe, or at least tried.
ESP.TRADUIT: 数字。那座废塔就是我们的墓碑。沙漠游骑兵早在NCR出现之前就在这里了。我们保证了莫哈韦沙漠的安全，至少我们尽力了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaRussellAskRan_0002884F_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: NCR is fucking soft, all lazy conscripts waiting to finish their tours, well-supplied, armed to the teeth. We didn't have those luxuries.
ESP.TRADUIT: NCR太他妈软弱了，所有的懒兵都在等着结束他们的使命，装备齐全，全副武装。我们没有那些奢侈品。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaRussellAskRan_0002884F_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: There were never that many of us, and supplies were... uneven. We had training and discipline, though. That's why we won all our battles.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们从来没有那么多人，供给...不平衡。但我们有训练和纪律。这就是我们赢得所有战斗的原因。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaRussellAskRan_0002884F_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Plenty of former Desert Rangers are serving in the NCR now, and they're good people. That wasn't for me, though. I won't live a lie.
ESP.TRADUIT: 很多前沙漠游骑兵现在在NCR服役，他们都是好人。但那不是为我准备的。我不会活在谎言中。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaRussellAskRan_0002884F_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Isn't that a band that performs in the Atomic Wrangler?
ESP.TRADUIT: 那不是在原子牛仔表演的乐队吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: What? No, you jackass. Desert Rangers were a militia, sort of. We guarded the Mojave long before the damn NCR laid their paws on Vegas.
ESP.TRADUIT: 什么?不,你这个蠢人。沙漠游骑兵算是民兵吧。在该死的NCR占领维加斯之前我们就守卫着莫哈韦沙漠了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaRussellAskRan_0002884D_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: NCR is fucking soft, all lazy conscripts waiting to finish their tours, well-supplied, armed to the teeth. We didn't have those luxuries.
ESP.TRADUIT: NCR太他妈软弱了，所有的懒兵都在等着结束他们的使命，装备齐全，全副武装。我们没有那些奢侈品。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaRussellAskRan_0002884D_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: There were never that many of us, and supplies were... uneven. We had training and discipline, though. That's why we won all our battles.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们从来没有那么多人，供给...不平衡。但我们有训练和纪律。这就是我们赢得所有战斗的原因。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaRussellAskRan_0002884D_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Plenty of former Desert Rangers are serving in the NCR now, and they're good people. That wasn't for me, though. I won't live a lie.
ESP.TRADUIT: 很多前沙漠游骑兵现在在NCR服役，他们都是好人。但那不是为我准备的。我不会活在谎言中。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaRussellAskRan_0002884D_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If they were such badasses, why did they lose?
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果他们真的那么厉害，为什么他们会输？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Listen, and listen good. We didn't lose. We were sold out to the goddamn NCR because a few of the men were pissing their pants over the Legion.
ESP.TRADUIT: 听着，认真听好了。我们没有输。我们被该死的NCR出卖了，因为有些人对军团垂涎三分。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaRussellAskRan_00028C6D_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: We won almost every battle, but we lost the war. Even if the NCR stops Lanius, the Mojave's identity will be gone, just like the Desert Rangers.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们几乎赢得了每一场战斗，但我们输掉了这场战争。即使NCR阻止了拉尼尔斯，莫哈韦人的身份也会消失，就像沙漠游骑兵一样。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest

ESP.ORIGINAL: So what happened? Why'd they join the NCR?
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以发生了什么事？ 他们为什么加入NCR？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Legion happened. It was a trickle at first, just the scouts. Then they started showing up in force. We'd kill them, and more would take their place.
ESP.TRADUIT: 军团出现了。一开始是涓涓细流，只有侦察兵。然后他们开始大批出现。我们可以杀了他们，但更多的人会取代他们。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaRussellAskRan_00028853_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Legionaries practiced total war, killing or enslaving entire towns that helped us. A lot of people started having a change of heart.
ESP.TRADUIT: 军团开始实行全面战争，杀死或奴役帮助我们的整个城镇。 许多人开始改变主意。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaRussellAskRan_00028853_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: With dwindling supplies and manpower, some of the rangers began to see our struggle as futile. We fought on, regardless.
ESP.TRADUIT: 随着供给和人力的减少，一些游骑兵开始认为我们的努力是徒劳的。不管怎样，我们继续战斗。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaRussellAskRan_00028853_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Maybe the Legion would've lost interest if we continued giving them bloody noses. I wish we'd had a nuke.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果我们继续把他们打得鼻青血肿也许军团会失去兴趣。我希望我们有核武器。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaRussellAskRan_00028853_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: We won almost every battle, but we lost the war. Even if the NCR stops Lanius, the Mojave's identity will be gone.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们几乎赢得了每一场战斗，但我们输掉了这场战争。即使NCR阻止了拉尼尔斯，莫哈韦人的身份也会消失。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaRussellAskRan_00028853_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaMission01MayorPostBattleShutUp
If the town is safe, I'm going after Glanton.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果镇子安全，我就去找格兰顿。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes, he went to chastise the idolaters. I hope he accomplished his task. Those villains will burn in hell!
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，他去惩罚拜偶像者了。我希望他完成他的任务。那些恶棍会下地狱的!
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mayor Brandon [0400B315] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\MaleAdult09\aaRussellM_aaMission01Mayo_0002AABE_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: When your business with Glanton is finished, please see me. I cannot let you depart without some type of compensation.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你和格兰顿的事办完后，请见我。我不能让你没有得到任何补偿就离开。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mayor Brandon [0400B315] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\MaleAdult09\aaRussellM_aaMission01Mayo_0002AABE_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setstage aaRussellMission01 168 aaRussellRef.SayTo Player aaRussellMission01PostBattlePostMayerBark
It had to be done.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是必须做的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Of course, and you were chosen by God to do it. The entire town is indebted to you. Your intrepid stand will be remembered for generations to come!
ESP.TRADUIT: 当然，你是被上帝选中来做这件事的。全镇都欠你的情。你们无畏的立场将被后人铭记!
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mayor Brandon [0400B315] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\MaleAdult09\aaRussellM_aaMission01Mayo_0002AABF_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Before you leave the canyon, please see me. I cannot let you depart without some type of compensation.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在你离开峡谷之前，请见我。我不能让你没有得到任何补偿就离开。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mayor Brandon [0400B315] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\MaleAdult09\aaRussellM_aaMission01Mayo_0002AABF_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setstage aaRussellMission01 168 aaRussellRef.SayTo Player aaRussellMission01PostBattlePostMayerBark
I want compensation, not preaching.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我要的是补偿，不是说教。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Correct! Correct! It is only equitable to proffer some manner of pecuniary largesse in exchange for your bold actions!
ESP.TRADUIT: 正确的!正确的!以金钱上的慷慨来换取你的大胆行动才是公平的!
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mayor Brandon [0400B315] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\MaleAdult09\aaRussellM_aaMission01Mayo_0002AAC0_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Please, just allow me to get the town's affairs in order, and see me before you depart for the Mojave. You will be amply rewarded, I swear it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 请允许我处理好镇上的事务，在你回到莫哈韦之前见我一面。你会得到丰厚的奖赏，我发誓。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mayor Brandon [0400B315] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\MaleAdult09\aaRussellM_aaMission01Mayo_0002AAC0_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setstage aaRussellMission01 168 aaRussellRef.SayTo Player aaRussellMission01PostBattlePostMayerBark
I agree with you. The NCR should mind its own business and stay in California.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我同意你的看法。NCR应该管好自己的事，呆在加州。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Glad to hear it. After the Legion is whipped, we can get to work kicking the Bear out.
ESP.TRADUIT: 很高兴听你这么说。等军团被打败后，我们就可以开始把熊赶出去了
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaRussellAskOpi_00028C77_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaRussellQuest.Loyalty to aaRussellQuest.Loyalty +1
What you're talking about isn't a long-term solution. The NCR will bring stability to the Mojave.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你说的不是长久之计。NCR将给莫哈维带来稳定。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Really? Please, let me know when it's stabilized. I want to be around to see the parade. You people really buy into all their bullshit, don't you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 真的吗?等情况稳定了告诉我。我想亲眼看看游行。你们这些人真相信他们的鬼话，对吧?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaRussellAskOpi_00028C78_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So what happens when Caesar's Legion shows up? Can a town or city-state stand up to them?
ESP.TRADUIT: 那么当凯撒军团出现时会发生什么？ 一个城镇或城邦能抗得住他们吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: We could've beaten them, maybe. If the NCR hadn't been there with their bullshit offer, we would've had no choice but to keep fighting.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们本可以打败他们的。如果不是NCR带着他们的狗屁提议出现在那里，我们除了继续战斗别无选择。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaRussellAskOpi_00028C79_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The Desert Rangers were proof that it can work, as long as these communities remain committed, and are willing to make sacrifices.
ESP.TRADUIT: 沙漠游骑兵已经证明了，只要这些社区保持忠诚，并愿意做出牺牲，它就能发挥作用。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaRussellAskOpi_00028C79_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you aren't willing to bleed to protect your home then maybe you don't rate autonomy. Maybe these saps are better off as subjects of the NCR.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你不愿意流血来保护你的家，那么也许你就不重视自主权。也许这些笨蛋作为NCR的对象会更好。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaRussellAskOpi_00028C79_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaMission01RussellHendershot01
Hey, you got a second?
ESP.TRADUIT: 嘿，你有空吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellM_aaMission01Russ_000294AD_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sure, what is it?
ESP.TRADUIT: 当然，是什么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I wasn't going to say it at the time, but I thought you were crazy to help Hendershot. Why'd you decide to bail him out? We hardly know him.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我当时不想说，但我觉得你帮亨德肖特是疯了。你为什么决定保护他?我们几乎不认识他。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellM_aaMission01Russ_000294B1_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: No, we need to keep moving.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不，我们得继续走。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Understood.
ESP.TRADUIT: 明白。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellM_aaMission01Russ_000294B0_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: His life and livelihood were in danger, and I was in a position to help. It was the right thing.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他的生命和生计处于危险之中，而我有能力帮助他。这是正确的选择。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You mean that, don't you? Haven't heard anybody talk that way since I was with my unit. Going at it alone can make you cynical, you know?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你是认真的，对吗?自从我加入部队后就没听过有人这么说话。一个人做会让你变得愤世嫉俗，知道吗?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellM_aaMission01Russ_000294B6_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Maybe I've been on my own too long, forgot what it's like to help someone without asking for payment up front. You did the right thing.
ESP.TRADUIT: 也许我独自生活太久了，忘记了帮助别人却不要求预付报酬是什么感觉。你做得对。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellM_aaMission01Russ_000294B6_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaRussellQuest.Loyalty to aaRussellQuest.Loyalty +2
If Hendershot stays in business, it's a thorn in the side of the Van Graffs.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果亨德肖特继续经营下去，他就会成为范·格拉夫家族的眼中钉。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Good point. That entire family seems rotten to the core. One more reason I don't use energy weapons.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好点子。那整个家族似乎都烂掉了。我不使用能量武器的另一个原因。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellM_aaMission01Russ_000294B8_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaRussellQuest.Loyalty to aaRussellQuest.Loyalty +1
It's always good to have an arms dealer in your corner. I figured it was worth the risk.
ESP.TRADUIT: 有个军火商站在你这边总是好的。我觉得值得冒这个险。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I can understand that. Guy with the biggest gun makes the rules, right? Good to know you're thinking ahead.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我能理解。枪最大的人说了算，对吧?很高兴知道你在提前考虑。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellM_aaMission01Russ_000294B7_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaRussellQuest.Loyalty to aaRussellQuest.Loyalty +1
I just needed a reason to kill something.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我只是需要一个杀人的理由。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaMission01RussellFinley01
Hey, can I ask you something?
ESP.TRADUIT: 嘿，我能问你点事吗?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellM_aaMission01Russ_000294BA_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's fine. What's on your mind?
ESP.TRADUIT: 这很好。你在想什么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: That Khan had a look in his eyes, reminded me of some the rangers before the treaty. He didn't want to show it, but that guy was broken inside.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那个大汗帮的眼神，让我想起了签订条约前的一些游骑兵。他不想表现出来，但那家伙内心已经崩溃了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellM_aaMission01Russ_000294BE_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Legion just kept hammering us, chipping away. At least the NCR was efficient with the Khans - one massacre and they're finished.
ESP.TRADUIT: 军团一直在打击我们。至少NCR对大汗帮的打击很有效--一场屠杀就搞定了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellM_aaMission01Russ_000294BE_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I hated the treaty, but maybe it was merciful. I see the Khans... they're just hollow dregs living in the past.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我讨厌这个条约，但也许它是仁慈的。我看到大汗帮...他们只是活在过去的空虚渣滓。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellM_aaMission01Russ_000294BE_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: But at least the Khans have their identity... and their ethos. Even if we'd all died fighting the Legion, wouldn't it have been worth it?
ESP.TRADUIT: 但至少大汗帮有他们的身份...和他们的精神。即使我们都为对抗军团而死，这难道不值得吗?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellM_aaMission01Russ_000294BE_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: No, we're too close to Glanton to stop right now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不，我们离格兰顿很近了，不能停下来。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're probably right. Let's keep moving.
ESP.TRADUIT: 也许你是对的。让我们继续前进。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellM_aaMission01Russ_000294BD_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't care, and I'm tired of hearing you piss and moan about your precious rangers. Get over it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不在乎，我也不想听你这个矫揉做作游骑兵呻吟了， 克服它。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You got a lot of fucking nerve saying that. Do you have any fucking idea what we went through? Of course not, you're fucking nasty, civilian slime.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你他妈还敢这么说。你他妈知道我们经历了什么吗?当然不是，你就是个肮脏的平民。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellM_aaMission01Russ_000294C8_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaRussellQuest.Loyalty to aaRussellQuest.Loyalty -1
The Desert Rangers were trying to hold off an entire army. Signing that treaty was right call.
