ESP.TRADUIT: 沙漠游骑兵试图阻挡整支军队。签署那个条约是正确的决定。

ESP.ORIGINAL: We did hold them off. For a while. If we had just had more support, maybe House's robots, the Brotherhood, somebody.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们确实拖住了他们一段时间。如果我们能得到更多的支持，比如豪斯的机器人，兄弟会，或者什么人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellM_aaMission01Russ_000294C4_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm glad the treaty saved the lives of so many brothers and sisters, but I won't accept that it was our only choice.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我很高兴这个条约挽救了这么多兄弟姐妹的生命，但我不能接受这是我们唯一的选择。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellM_aaMission01Russ_000294C4_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You only lose when you stop believing you can win. Fuck the NCR, fuck the pussy-ass Khans, and fuck you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 只有当你不再相信自己能赢时，你才会失败。去你妈的NCR，去你妈的大汗帮，去你妈的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellM_aaMission01Russ_000294C4_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah, Legion ain't in the business of celebrating their fallen foes, are they?
ESP.TRADUIT: 是啊，军团不会去庆祝他们倒下的敌人吧?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellM_aaMission01Russ_000294C6_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Maybe after the dust settles, if the Legion is out of the picture... there'll be another chance for the rangers.
ESP.TRADUIT: 也许等尘埃落定，如果军团出局了...游骑兵还有机会。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaRussellQuest.Loyalty to aaRussellQuest.Loyalty +2
Every Desert Ranger would be dead now if it weren't for the treaty. That includes you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果不是因为这个条约，现在每个沙漠游骑兵都死了。包括你。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're right. Once you're in a fight, you have to see it to the finish.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你是对的。一旦你参加了战斗，你就必须坚持到底。

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's goddamn right. Maybe after the dust settles, if the Legion is out of the picture... they'll be another chance for the rangers.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那是该死的正确答案。 也许在尘埃落定之后，如果军团出局了...或许将是游骑兵的另一个机会。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellM_aaMission01Russ_000294C5_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaRussellQuest.Loyalty to aaRussellQuest.Loyalty +1
aaMission01RussellFinleyDontCare
The Desert Rangers are in the past, and they should stay there. We should focus on finding Glanton.
ESP.TRADUIT: 沙漠游骑兵队已经过去了，他们应该会留在那里。 我们得专心寻找格兰顿。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I can't argue with you on the second part of that statement. We'll have to revisit that bit about the treaty another time.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不同意你的第二部分。关于条约的那部分我们以后再讨论。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellM_aaMission01Russ_000294C7_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaRussellMonument01
You taking in the magnificence of the NCR's grand monument? Nothing like rusty scrap metal to capture the imagination.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你看到NCR宏伟的纪念碑了吗?没有什么比生锈的废金属更能吸引人的想象力了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaRussellMonume_000294CD_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: A giant, iron dick pointed towards the Mojave would be more apt, in my opinion. NCR doesn't shake hands - they fuck you in the ass with a bear cock.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在我看来，一个指向莫哈韦沙漠的巨型铁老二更合适。NCR不握手，他们用熊鸡巴操你的屁眼。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaRussellMonume_000294CD_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you keep bitching about the NCR everywhere we go, this is going to be a brief partnership.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你继续在我们所到之处抱怨NCR，我们就只能短暂合作了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You've had too much of that bear dick crammed up your insides, haven't you? Why don't you just run for senator? Fucking tool.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你已经受够了你肚子里的熊老二了，是吧?你为什么不去竞选参议员呢?该死的工具。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaRussellMonume_00029D18_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaRussellQuest.Loyalty to aaRussellQuest.Loyalty -1
What's wrong with the monument?
ESP.TRADUIT: 纪念碑怎么了？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Everything, my friend. First, it's not true. A paper was signed, it's not like everybody met up and shook hands. Rank and file found out afterwards.
ESP.TRADUIT: 一切,我的朋友。首先，这不是真的。文件都签好了，又不是每个人都见面握手。士兵们后来都知道了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaRussellMonume_00029D1A_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: "Swear an oath to the NCR or hit the bricks," they said. It wasn't enough to erase the rangers, they had to construct this piece of shit.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们说:“要么向NCR宣誓，要么就去死。”这还不足以消灭游骑兵，他们还得造这破东西。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaRussellMonume_00029D1A_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Just look at it... it's as if a gang of mutants were handed an arc welder and some scrap metal, then told, "Get to it." It's an insult.
ESP.TRADUIT: 看看它......这就好像把一个电弧焊机和一些废金属交给一群变种人，然后告诉他们，“开始吧。”这是一种侮辱。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaRussellMonume_00029D1A_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Can't you just ignore that thing like everybody else?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你不能像其他人一样忽略那件事吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: No, I can't. It's a giant mockery of the entire Mojave, built to remind us that we need the NCR. Fucking bullshit.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不,我不能。这是对整个莫哈韦沙漠的巨大嘲弄，是为了提醒我们需要NCR。他妈的狗屎。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaRussellMonume_00029D19_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: A guy named Vickers said you could help us locate Cholla Mountain.
ESP.TRADUIT: 有个叫维克斯的人说你能帮我们找到仙人掌山脉。

ESP.ORIGINAL: A guy, huh? Wait, that isn't Russell I see with you, is it? Shit, it is! Ugly as ever. Wait, what the hell do ya'll want with Cholla Mountain?
ESP.TRADUIT: 一个人，嗯？等等，我看到和你在一起的不是拉塞尔吗？他妈的，是的！一如既往的丑。等等，你到底想要去仙人掌山做什么？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Handley [040298EA] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\MaleAdult08\aaRussellM_aaMission01Hand_000298F0_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaRussellMission01.HandleyMet to 1
aaMission01HandleyIntroDick
I'd rather not say.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我宁可不说。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, I'd rather not tell you how to get there. Cholla Mountain is in my jurisdiction, and I need to know why you're heading there.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，我不想告诉你怎么去那里。仙人掌山在我的管辖范围内，我需要知道你为什么要去那里。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Handley [040298EA] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\MaleAdult08\aaRussellM_aaMission01Hand_000298F3_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: We need to speak with Hendershot about a man named Glanton. We're pursuing a bounty on him.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们要和亨德肖特谈谈一个正在被我们追捕的人，他叫格兰顿。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm happy to help you and Russell, but I hope you know what you're getting into. I typically make a point to talk prospectors out of going there.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我很高兴能帮助你和拉塞尔，但我希望你知道自己在做什么。我通常会说服勘探者不要去那里。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Handley [040298EA] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\MaleAdult08\aaRussellM_aaMission01Hand_000298F4_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Cholla Mountain was a pre-war disposal site for nuclear waste, with miles of underground tunnels. It's not far from the Divide, actually.
ESP.TRADUIT: 仙人掌山是战前的核废料处理场，地下隧道绵延数英里。实际上，它离分水岭不远。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Handley [040298EA] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\MaleAdult08\aaRussellM_aaMission01Hand_000298F4_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Thing is, that place has always been brimming with radiation, and therefore... ghouls. Hordes of them, from what I hear.
ESP.TRADUIT: 问题是，那个地方一直充满着辐射，因此......食尸鬼。据我所知，有一大群。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Handley [040298EA] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\MaleAdult08\aaRussellM_aaMission01Hand_000298F4_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: On top of that, Hendershot's a paranoid nutjob who doesn't like unexpected guests. Honestly, I don't know anyone who's come back from there.
ESP.TRADUIT: 最重要的是，亨德肖特是个偏执的疯子，他不喜欢不速之客。说实话，我不认识从那里回来的人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Handley [040298EA] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\MaleAdult08\aaRussellM_aaMission01Hand_000298F4_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If I can't dissuade you, here's the spot on your map. Only reason I'm telling you is because I know who Glanton is, and I hope you catch him.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果我不能劝阻你，这就是你地图上的地点。我告诉你的唯一原因是我知道格兰顿是谁，希望你能抓住他。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Handley [040298EA] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\MaleAdult08\aaRussellM_aaMission01Hand_000298F4_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Of course, I'm obligated to help a fellow ranger. You and Russell are always welcome here. Be safe in there, and watch your ass.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当然，我有义务帮助我的同伴。这里随时欢迎你和拉塞尔。在那边小心点，小心点。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Handley [040298EA] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\MaleAdult08\aaRussellM_aaMission01Hand_000298F4_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setstage aaRussellMission01 25 aaRussellRef.startconversation playerref, aaMission01RussellHandleyPost01
So you and Russell were in the Desert Rangers together?
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以你和拉塞尔曾一起待在沙漠游骑兵吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah, humped a lot of miles together, fought the same Legion fucks, saved each other's lives at least twice. Wasn't bound to last, though.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是啊，一起走了很多路，和同一个军团打过仗，至少两次救过对方的命。但这并不一定会持续下去。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Handley [040298EA] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\MaleAdult08\aaRussellM_aaMission01Hand_000298F6_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I can't blame him for not going along with the treaty. We all lost something that day.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不能因为他不遵守条约而责怪他。那天我们都失去了一些东西。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Handley [040298EA] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\MaleAdult08\aaRussellM_aaMission01Hand_000298F6_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I and a lot of other rangers lost our identities, and Russell... who I can see is seething over this topic... lost his family. Sorry, brother.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我和其他游骑兵失去了身份，拉塞尔...据我所知，他对这件事非常愤怒......失去了他的家人。对不起,兄弟。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Handley [040298EA] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\MaleAdult08\aaRussellM_aaMission01Hand_000298F6_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So how's it feel to be a sellout?
ESP.TRADUIT: 被出卖的感觉如何？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Listen, Me and most every other swinging dick in the rangers went along with the treaty, and a lot of us are still serving together.
ESP.TRADUIT: 听着，我和游骑兵里的大部分混球都是遵守条约的，我们很多人现在还在一起服役。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Handley [040298EA] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\MaleAdult08\aaRussellM_aaMission01Hand_00029D13_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Nobody liked it, but we knew it was necessary. The NCR is the only thing holding back the Legion now, and it's stronger because of us.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没人喜欢，但我们知道这是必要的。NCR现在是唯一能阻止军团前进的力量，因为我们，它变得更强大。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Handley [040298EA] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\MaleAdult08\aaRussellM_aaMission01Hand_00029D13_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What Russell probably hasn't told you is that we were outnumbered ten to one in the field most of the time. It was the treaty... or annihilation.
ESP.TRADUIT: 拉塞尔可能没有告诉你的是，大多数时候我们在场上的人数是十比一。 这是条约...或溃败。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Handley [040298EA] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\MaleAdult08\aaRussellM_aaMission01Hand_00029D13_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why'd you join the NCR? Why not walk away, like Russell?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你为什么要加入NCR?为什么不像拉塞尔那样离开呢？

ESP.ORIGINAL: The Desert Rangers were a brotherhood, just like the NCR Rangers today. The banner changed, but the fight was basically the same.
ESP.TRADUIT: 沙漠游骑兵是兄弟情谊，就像今天的NCR游骑兵一样。横幅变了，但战斗基本上是一样的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Handley [040298EA] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\MaleAdult08\aaRussellM_aaMission01Hand_00029D15_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: None of us thought any less of Russell for walking away. Some of the guys respected it, and a handful joined him.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们没人会因为拉塞尔的离开而看轻他。一些人尊重它，少数人加入了他。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Handley [040298EA] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\MaleAdult08\aaRussellM_aaMission01Hand_00029D15_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's a hard thing to break ranks with your brothers and sisters in arms. I couldn't stand the thought of letting them fight without me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 和你的兄弟姐妹们划清界限是件很困难的事。我无法忍受让他们独自战斗。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Handley [040298EA] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\MaleAdult08\aaRussellM_aaMission01Hand_00029D15_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What's it like being in the NCR, as opposed to the Desert Rangers?
ESP.TRADUIT: 跟沙漠游骑兵相比，在NCR是什么感觉？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I hate dealing with the POG's and shitbirds, but at least we have manpower backing us up. The rangers are solid, no question about it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我讨厌和军队的混蛋打交道，但至少我们有人力支持。游骑兵很可靠，这是毫无疑问的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Handley [040298EA] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\MaleAdult08\aaRussellM_aaMission01Hand_00029D14_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Would I prefer to be a Desert Ranger? Maybe. Would I rather be a part of something that can kick the shit of Caesar's Legion? Definitely.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我愿意当沙漠游骑兵吗?也许吧。那我更想成为能打败凯撒军团的一员吗?肯定。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Handley [040298EA] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\MaleAdult08\aaRussellM_aaMission01Hand_00029D14_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaMission01RussellHandleyPost01
If you'd have told me that Handley would end up a loyal citizen of the NCR, I'd have told you to stop using chems.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你告诉我汉德利会成为NCR的忠实公民，我就会告诉你别再嗑药了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellM_aaMission01Russ_00029D17_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Handley hated the NCR back when the treaty was signed. I thought he might leave with me. I guess time wearing their uniform changed things.
ESP.TRADUIT: 汉德利在条约签署时就痛恨NCR。我以为他会跟我一起走。我猜是时间改变了他们的制服。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellM_aaMission01Russ_00029D17_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaRussellMission01RussellTitusDeadBark
Respice finem.
ESP.TRADUIT: 有志者，事竟成
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellM_aaRussellMissio_0002A54E_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: <Speech Check>
That's true. I suppose that's a little bit better than getting made damnatio memoriae by the Legion.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是真的。我想这总比被军团留下的诅咒记忆好一点吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaRussellMonume_0002A96B_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: As a symbol, it's offensive to those of us who resist assimilation, but it also lets people know that the Desert Rangers had the NCR's respect.
ESP.TRADUIT: 作为一个象征，它冒犯了我们这些抵制同化的人，但它也让人们知道沙漠游骑兵得到了NCR的尊重。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaRussellMonume_0002A96B_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Deep down, the NCR knows they can't really hold the Mojave. They can only feign ownership through negotiation. The monument is proof.
ESP.TRADUIT: 实际上，NCR知道他们控制不了莫哈韦沙漠。他们只能通过谈判来假装拥有。纪念碑就是证明。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaRussellMonume_0002A96B_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaRussellQuest.Loyalty to aaRussellQuest.Loyalty +2
For better or for worse, the monument ensures people won't forget the Desert Rangers.
ESP.TRADUIT: 无论是好是坏，这座纪念碑确保人们不会忘记沙漠游骑兵。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Nobody surrendered, fucko. For future reference, keep your dumb fucking opinions to yourself.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没有人投降,操。为了以后的参考，把你的蠢想法留着吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaRussellQuest.Loyalty to aaRussellQuest.Loyalty -1
The Desert Rangers surrendered. They would've been lucky to get a plaque, much less a monument.
ESP.TRADUIT: 沙漠游骑兵投降了。如果他们能得到一块牌匾就太幸运了，更别说纪念碑了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I see. Thanks for clearing that up for me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我懂了。谢谢你帮我澄清。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Any time.
ESP.TRADUIT: 随时。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaRussellMonume_0002A96D_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Would you shut up about the goddamn rangers? I'm fucking sick of hearing your bullshit.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你能不能别再提该死的游骑兵了？我他妈听腻了你的废话。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Then don't ask questions, douchebag. You might get answers that are upsetting to your delicate sensibilities.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那就别问了，混蛋。你可能会得到一些让你敏感的情绪不安的答案。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaRussellMonume_0002A96E_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaRussellQuest.Loyalty to aaRussellQuest.Loyalty -1
Life is water, not stone. People change with circumstances.
ESP.TRADUIT: 生命是水，不是石头。 人会随着环境而变化。

ESP.ORIGINAL: What kind of philosophical crap is that? Water and stones? Really? I get your point, though. If you get too entrenched, time will pass you by.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是什么狗屁哲学?水和石头?真的吗?不过我明白你的意思了。如果你太固执，时间会从你身边流逝。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellM_aaRussellHandle_0002A972_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I've always been a little hard on some of the guys who went NCR... which was most of them, but still. Maybe I shouldn't judge them so much.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我一直对一些去NCR的人有点苛刻...大部分都是，但还是。也许我不该对他们评头论足。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellM_aaRussellHandle_0002A972_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaRussellQuest.Loyalty to aaRussellQuest.Loyalty +1
Handley seems like a practical guy. He just adapted.
ESP.TRADUIT: 汉德利看起来是个很实际的人。他只是适应了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah, most of them did the same. It's still a little disappointing to see him in an NCR uniform, but at least he's doing all right.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是啊，大部分人都这么做了。看到他穿着NCR的制服还是有点让人失望，但至少他做得很好。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellM_aaRussellHandle_0002A973_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Handley sold out to save his skin, just like the others. When the NCR goes, he'll go with them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 和其他人一样，汉德利为了自保出卖了自己。当NCR走了，他会跟他们一起走。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Careful, you didn't know him like I did. He was sharp in the field, probably still is. You got no right to cast judgement on the man.
ESP.TRADUIT: 小心点，你不像我那么了解他。他在战场上很聪明，也许现在仍然如此。你没有权利对他进行评判。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellM_aaRussellHandle_0002A974_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm [%], and I'm new in town.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我是 [%], 新来的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm Sheriff Wayne Richardson. Been the law in town for three years now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我是韦恩·理查德森治安官。 在镇上已经三年了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wayne Richardson [0400B313] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\MaleAdult09\aaRussellM_aaMission01Sher_0002A97B_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Note the walls and our militia. Don't make trouble here. We are proud citizens of the NCR, and its laws will be enforced. Understand?
ESP.TRADUIT: 注意城墙和我们的民兵。别在这儿惹麻烦。我们是自豪的NCR公民，它的法律将得到执行。明白吗?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wayne Richardson [0400B313] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\MaleAdult09\aaRussellM_aaMission01Sher_0002A97B_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You got it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我马上照办。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Good. I hope your time in Silverwood is productive.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好。希望你在银木镇的日子有收获。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wayne Richardson [0400B313] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\MaleAdult09\aaRussellM_aaMission01Sher_0002A97F_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Whatever you say, bub. You're not a good conversationalist, are you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 不管你怎么说，伙计。你不是个健谈的人，对吧？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm short on words, but long on action. Fuck up here, and there won't be a trial. You'll be goddamn gecko shit, got it? Now get the fuck out.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我话不多，喜欢直接行动。 他妈的在这里，不会有审判。 你会成为该死的蜥蜴屎，明白吗？ 现在滚出去。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wayne Richardson [0400B313] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\MaleAdult09\aaRussellM_aaMission01Sher_0002A981_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: <Remain Silent>
ESP.TRADUIT: <保持沉默>

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Annoyed}Don't mock me, you twit. I'll split your fucking head open and leave you for the geckos if you so much as loiter in my town. Get the fuck out.
ESP.TRADUIT: {生气}别嘲笑我，你这个笨蛋。如果你再在我的镇上游荡，我就把你的头劈开，然后把你丢给蜥蜴。滚出去。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wayne Richardson [0400B313] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\MaleAdult09\aaRussellM_aaMission01Sher_0002A980_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why is the town hiring Glanton? Shouldn't the militia take care of the tribals?
ESP.TRADUIT: 小镇为什么要雇佣格兰顿？难道民兵不能搞定部落吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: If they could, they would. We can't leave the town undefended. There's always the risk of a Legion raiding party.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果可以，他们会的。我们不能让这座城市失去防御。军团偷袭的风险总是存在的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wayne Richardson [0400B313] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\MaleAdult09\aaRussellM_aaMission01Sher_0002A983_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I wanted to speak with you about the scouting mission.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想跟你谈谈侦察任务的事。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah, it's a quick scouting mission to the other side of the canyon. Lopez family settled there a few weeks back, we haven't heard from them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是啊，我们要去峡谷的另一边快速侦察。洛佩兹一家几周前在那定居，我们还没收到他们的消息。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wayne Richardson [0400B313] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\MaleAdult09\aaRussellM_aaMission01Sher_0002AAAD_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Normally they swing by town every Sunday for supplies, but we haven't seen them in weeks. I suspect the worst, but I want to be sure.
ESP.TRADUIT: 通常他们每周日都会来镇上买补给，但我们已经好几个星期没见到他们了。我怀疑是最坏的情况，但我想确定一下。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wayne Richardson [0400B313] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\MaleAdult09\aaRussellM_aaMission01Sher_0002AAAD_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: All I would need you to do is verify their status. There's three adults and two children, one of them an infant. The pay is 100 caps.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我只需要你核实他们的身份。有三个大人和两个孩子，其中一个是婴儿。工资是100瓶盖。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wayne Richardson [0400B313] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\MaleAdult09\aaRussellM_aaMission01Sher_0002AAAD_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If it is the Sand Wolves, that'll show that they're back in the area. The main group always sends out raiding parties in their vicinity.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果是沙狼，那就说明他们又回来了。大部队总是在附近派出突袭小队。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wayne Richardson [0400B313] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\MaleAdult09\aaRussellM_aaMission01Sher_0002AAAD_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So, are you up for the job?
ESP.TRADUIT: 那么，你能胜任这份工作吗?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wayne Richardson [0400B313] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\MaleAdult09\aaRussellM_aaMission01Sher_0002AAAD_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaRussellMission01.Volunteer to 1
Same deal stands. 100 caps for a quick jaunt to the Lopez shack.
ESP.TRADUIT: 同样的道理。100个瓶盖，去洛佩兹小屋。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wayne Richardson [0400B313] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\MaleAdult09\aaRussellM_aaMission01Sher_0002AAB2_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Animals. Fucking animals. You see what we're up against now?
ESP.TRADUIT: 畜生，该死的畜生！看到我们现在面对的是什么了吗?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wayne Richardson [0400B313] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\MaleAdult09\aaRussellM_aaMission01Sher_0002AABD_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Look, there's been a development with Glanton. Speak with the mayor, and he'll give you the details. Go on, I'm expecting a courier.
ESP.TRADUIT: 格兰顿那边有进展了。跟市长谈谈，他会告诉你细节。去吧，我在等邮差。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wayne Richardson [0400B313] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\MaleAdult09\aaRussellM_aaMission01Sher_0002AABD_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setstage aaRussellMission01 130
I checked out the Lopez residence. They're all dead, except for one kid who was missing.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我调查了洛佩兹的住处。他们都死了，除了一个孩子失踪了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sure, I'll do it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好，我知道了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Good, here's the spot on your map. Keep your eyes open for Sand Wolves while you're out there.
ESP.TRADUIT: 很好，这就是你地图上的地点。你们出去的时候要注意沙狼。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wayne Richardson [0400B313] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\MaleAdult09\aaRussellM_aaMission01Sher_0002AAB0_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setstage aaRussellMission01 126
I need more time to think about it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我需要更多的时间考虑。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Very well, but just keep in mind the fact that those settlers' lives may be in jeopardy.
ESP.TRADUIT: 很好，但请记住，这些定居者的生命可能处于危险之中。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wayne Richardson [0400B313] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\MaleAdult09\aaRussellM_aaMission01Sher_0002AAB1_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaRussellMission01LopezShackBark
Jesus, they killed most of them, took the kids, wait, no... I'm gonna be fucking sick.
ESP.TRADUIT: 天啊，他们杀了大部分人，带走了孩子，等等，不...我他妈的要吐了
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Fear Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellM_aaRussellMissio_0002AAB7_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaRussellMission01PostBattlePostMayerBark
We need to see what became of the Sand Wolves, though I don't know if I can stomach the sight of any more blood today.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们得看看沙狼后来怎么样了，不过我不知道今天还能不能再看到更多的血。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellM_aaRussellMissio_0002AAC3_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaMission01RussellPostTitusConvo
Never thought I'd see that fuck again, much less get a shot at him. What you've done for me... I don't how to say it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没想到还能再见到那混蛋，更别说有机会杀他了。你为我所做的...我不知道该怎么说。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellM_aaMission01Russ_0002AAC6_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I spent most of my life thinking of how I'd kill him, the ways I'd hurt him. It was over so fast. I just couldn't imagine finding him here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我大半辈子都在想我该怎么杀了他，我该怎么伤害他。一切都结束得太快了。我只是无法想象在这里找到他。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellM_aaMission01Russ_0002AAC6_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I can't believe he's dead. His corpse is still warm, right over there, but it hasn't sunk in.
ESP.TRADUIT: 真不敢相信他死了。他的尸体还热着，就在那里，但还没沉下去。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellM_aaMission01Russ_0002AAC6_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaRussellQuest.Loyalty to aaRussellQuest.Loyalty +4 set aaRussellMission01.PostTitus to 2
I never told you, but I knew that centurion. I knew him well. He was the man who enslaved me, burned my face. Tried to kill me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我从没告诉过你，但我认识那个百夫长。我很了解他。他是奴役我的人，烧伤了我的脸。他想杀我。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellM_aaMission01Russ_0002AAC7_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I can't believe he's dead. His corpse is still warm, right over there, but it hasn't sunk in.
ESP.TRADUIT: 真不敢相信他死了。他的尸体还热着，就在那里，但还没沉下去。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaRussellQuest.Loyalty to aaRussellQuest.Loyalty +2
aaRussellMission01PostTitusBark
aaMission01RussellSWMassacreConvoStart
Glanton did this... and we let him get away. I mean, the Sand Wolves were rough, but I wouldn't do this to animals.
ESP.TRADUIT: 格兰顿这样做...我们让他跑了。我是说，沙狼很野蛮，但我不会这样对待动物。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellM_aaMission01Russ_0002AACC_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: This... it reminds me of when the Legion came, what they did to my tribe. How did we let this happen?
ESP.TRADUIT: 这个...让我想起了军团来的时候，他们对我的部落做了什么。我们怎么会让这一切发生?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellM_aaMission01Russ_0002AACC_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaMission01RussellPostMayor01Convo
Mayor's a real piece of work, huh?
ESP.TRADUIT: 市长真是个大人物，哈？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellM_aaMission01Russ_0002AACE_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Look, I think we've been working well together. But I have something I need to say. I want Glanton, but I won't fight this entire town to get him.
ESP.TRADUIT: 听着，我觉得我们合作得很好。但我有话要说。我想找到格兰顿，但我不会为了干掉他而和全镇的人战斗。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellM_aaMission01Russ_0002AACE_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You want to fight Legionaries, deathclaws, raiders, whatever, I'm with you. But if you make a move on Glanton in town, I'm walking.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你想跟军团，死亡之爪，掠夺者干，不管怎样，我都支持你。但如果你对格兰顿有所行动，我就走了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellM_aaMission01Russ_0002AACE_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Don't take it the wrong way - it just had to be said. Are we good?
ESP.TRADUIT: 别误会，我就是要说出来。我们还好吗?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellM_aaMission01Russ_0002AACE_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Relax. I'm crazy, not stupid.
ESP.TRADUIT: 放松。我是疯了，不是蠢。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Whatever you say. Good to know you aren't going to play this like a psycho.
ESP.TRADUIT: 无论你说什么。很高兴知道你不会表现得像个疯子。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellM_aaMission01Russ_0002AAD3_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I have no intention of moving on Glanton until he's out of town. We'll just have to be patient.
ESP.TRADUIT: 格兰顿出城之前我是不会去找他的。我们要有耐心。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Good to hear it. I figured you were in that frame of mind, I just wanted to certain.
ESP.TRADUIT: 很高兴听你这么说。我知道你当时在想什么，我只是想确定一下。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellM_aaMission01Russ_0002AAD2_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaRussellQuest.Loyalty to aaRussellQuest.Loyalty +1
I'm taking Glanton one way or another. Anybody that gets in my way is a liability.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不管怎样，我都要带走格兰顿。任何妨碍我的人都是不利因素。

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's precisely what I was afraid of. That's why bounty hunters get a bad reputation, because of homicidal maniacs like you. Get a fucking grip.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这正是我所担心的。这就是赏金猎人臭名昭著的原因，就因为你这样的杀人狂。控制住自己。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellM_aaMission01Russ_0002AAD4_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaRussellQuest.Loyalty to aaRussellQuest.Loyalty -1
Ok, Mayor. I'll help the town, but I want 1,000 caps up front. Do you have a plan?
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，市长。我会帮助镇里的人，但我要求预付一千瓶盖。你有什么计划吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Done! A plan? Well, uh... you should recruit a new militia, man the walls... and I'll move non-combatants into the mine.
ESP.TRADUIT: 完成了!一个计划吗?嗯,嗯...你应该招募一支新的民兵，守卫城墙...我会让非战斗人员进入矿井。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mayor Brandon [0400B315] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\MaleAdult09\aaRussellM_aaMission01Mayo_0002AAD6_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: setstage aaRussellMission01 160
player.additem caps001 1000
I'm glad it happened - looks like a job well done.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我很高兴它发生了，看起来做得很好。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You don't mean that. You can't, or you're just like him. Like those craven peons hiding behind the walls. Insects, all of them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你不是那个意思。你不能，否则你就跟他一样。就像那些躲在墙后的胆小鬼工。都是虫豸。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't know how... how I can live with this. You, Glanton, the lot of humanity... you make me fucking sick.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不知道怎么...我怎么能忍受得了。你，格兰顿，很多人性...你真让我恶心。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaRussellQuest.Loyalty to aaRussellQuest.Loyalty -1
I'm glad it happened - looks like a job well done.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我很高兴它发生了，看起来做得很好。

ESP.ORIGINAL: The Legion didn't give us a choice, Russell. Glanton was one step ahead. We have to let him go.
ESP.TRADUIT: 军团没给我们选择的机会，拉塞尔。格兰顿领先一步。我们得放他走。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Goddamn, I'd hate to do that. This is exactly what I fought against, innocent people getting butchered.
ESP.TRADUIT: 该死，我可不想这么做。这正是我所反对的，无辜的人被屠杀。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellM_aaMission01Russ_0002AEFC_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Some of the warriors would've gone down fighting, but the rest... Glanton had no right. You ever go after him again, I want to be there.
ESP.TRADUIT: 有些战士会在战斗中倒下，但剩下的...格兰顿没有这个权利。你再去找他，我也要去。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellM_aaMission01Russ_0002AEFC_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaRussellQuest.Loyalty to aaRussellQuest.Loyalty +1
You don't mean that. You can't, or you're just like him. Like those craven peons hiding behind the walls. Insects, all of them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你不是那个意思。你不能，否则你就跟他一样。就像那些躲在墙后的胆小鬼工。都是虫豸。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't know how... how I can live with this. You, Glanton, the lot of humanity... you make me fucking sick.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不知道怎么...我怎么能忍受得了。你，格兰顿，很多人性...你真让我恶心。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaRussellQuest.Loyalty to aaRussellQuest.Loyalty -1
I'm sure most of these savages had it coming. Hell, we've all got it coming.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我相信这些野蛮人都是自找的。见鬼，我们都是这样。

ESP.ORIGINAL: <Speech Check>
We didn't do this - Glanton did. He'll get what's coming to him, in this life or the next.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不是我们干的，是格兰顿干的。他会得到报应的，不管是今生还是来世。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Some of the warriors would've gone down fighting, but the rest... Glanton had no right. You ever go after him again, I want to be there.
ESP.TRADUIT: 有些战士会在战斗中倒下，但剩下的...格兰顿没有这个权利。你再去找他，我也要去。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellM_aaMission01Russ_0002C3F0_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Glanton killed all the Sand Wolves, women and children included. Their blood is on your hands.
ESP.TRADUIT: 格兰顿杀死了所有的沙狼，包括妇女和儿童。你的双手沾满了他们的鲜血。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I can tell from the look in your eyes that the aftermath was horrifying. Weigh that passing horror against the agony of a prolonged struggle.
ESP.TRADUIT: 从你的眼神中我能看出来后果很可怕。权衡一下短暂的恐怖和长期斗争的痛苦。.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mayor Brandon [0400B315] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\MaleAdult09\aaRussellM_aaMission01Mayo_0002AEF9_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Just look around this town, consider the lives he's saved. I know we did the right thing.
ESP.TRADUIT: 看看这个小镇，想想他救了多少人。我知道我们做的是对的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mayor Brandon [0400B315] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\MaleAdult09\aaRussellM_aaMission01Mayo_0002AEF9_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Those savages were less than animals, with no souls. Glanton's blade was guided by God. His will be done.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那些野蛮人连动物都不如，没有灵魂。格兰顿的剑是由上帝指引的。他的旨意必成全。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mayor Brandon [0400B315] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\MaleAdult09\aaRussellM_aaMission01Mayo_0002AEF9_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaMayorBrandonREF.removefromfaction aaSilverwoodFaction

setstage aaRussellMission01 185 aaRussellREF.SetCombatStyle FollowersCombatStyleMelee set aaRussellREF.CombatStyleRanged to 0 set aaRussellREF.CombatStyleMelee to 1 set aaRussellMission01.KillMayor to 1 aaRussellRef.evp
The Sand Wolves are finished. Caruthers Canyon is yours.
ESP.TRADUIT: 沙狼完蛋了。卡拉瑟斯峡谷是你的了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I can tell from the look in your eyes that the aftermath was horrifying. Weigh that passing horror against the agony of a prolonged struggle.
ESP.TRADUIT: 从你的眼神中我能看出来后果很可怕。权衡一下短暂的恐怖和长期斗争的痛苦。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mayor Brandon [0400B315] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\MaleAdult09\aaRussellM_aaMission01Mayo_0002AEFA_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Because of the actions by you and Glanton, this canyon can finally be at peace. The Sand Wolves would not bend, so they were broken.
ESP.TRADUIT: 因为你和格兰顿的行动，这个峡谷终于得到了安宁。沙狼不肯屈服，所以他们被打败了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mayor Brandon [0400B315] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\MaleAdult09\aaRussellM_aaMission01Mayo_0002AEFA_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Just look around this town, consider the lives he's saved. I know we did the right thing.
ESP.TRADUIT: 看看这个小镇，想想他救了多少人。我知道我们做的是对的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mayor Brandon [0400B315] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\MaleAdult09\aaRussellM_aaMission01Mayo_0002AEFA_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Those savages were less than animals, with no souls. Glanton's blade was guided by God. His will be done.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那些野蛮人连动物都不如，没有灵魂。格兰顿的剑是由上帝指引的。他的旨意必成全。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mayor Brandon [0400B315] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\MaleAdult09\aaRussellM_aaMission01Mayo_0002AEFA_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaMayorBrandonREF.removefromfaction aaSilverwoodFaction

setstage aaRussellMission01 185 aaRussellREF.SetCombatStyle FollowersCombatStyleMelee set aaRussellREF.CombatStyleRanged to 0 set aaRussellREF.CombatStyleMelee to 1 set aaRussellMission01.KillMayor to 1 aaRussellRef.evp
Glanton performed his duties admirably. All of the Sand Wolves are dead now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 格兰顿出色地完成了他的工作。现在所有的沙狼都死了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: The poor creatures. They couldn't acknowledge the inevitable tide of progress, so they drowned.
ESP.TRADUIT: 可怜的生物。他们不能承认进步的潮流是不可避免的，所以他们淹死了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mayor Brandon [0400B315] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\MaleAdult09\aaRussellM_aaMission01Mayo_0002AEFB_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Because of the actions by you and Glanton, this canyon can finally be at peace. The Sand Wolves would not bend, so they were broken.
ESP.TRADUIT: 因为你和格兰顿的行动，这个峡谷终于得到了安宁。沙狼不肯屈服，所以他们被打败了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mayor Brandon [0400B315] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\MaleAdult09\aaRussellM_aaMission01Mayo_0002AEFB_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Glanton's blade was guided by God. His will be done.
ESP.TRADUIT: 格兰顿的剑是由上帝指引的。他的旨意必成全。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mayor Brandon [0400B315] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\MaleAdult09\aaRussellM_aaMission01Mayo_0002AEFB_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaMayorBrandonREF.removefromfaction aaSilverwoodFaction

setstage aaRussellMission01 185 aaRussellREF.SetCombatStyle FollowersCombatStyleMelee set aaRussellREF.CombatStyleRanged to 0 set aaRussellREF.CombatStyleMelee to 1 set aaRussellMission01.KillMayor to 1 aaRussellRef.evp
I convinced the sheriff to order your records. They'll be here soon.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我说服治安官整理了你的档案。他们马上就到。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Got discharged in '51, been wandering ever since. Came here for work, but ain't had any luck just yet.
ESP.TRADUIT: 51年出院，从那以后就一直流浪。我是来工作的，但运气不是很好。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hobo Charlie [0400D8ED] (mod) Quest : ([0400B29B]aaSilverwoodDialogue) Generic Dialogue for Persistent NPC's EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\MaleOld01\aaSilverwo_aaHoboYourStory_0002AF00_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Nobody even believes I was in the service, they just laugh at me. I keep asking that shithead sheriff to get my records.
ESP.TRADUIT: 甚至没人相信我服役过，他们只是嘲笑我。我一直让那个白痴治安官拿我的档案给他们看。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hobo Charlie [0400D8ED] (mod) Quest : ([0400B29B]aaSilverwoodDialogue) Generic Dialogue for Persistent NPC's EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\MaleOld01\aaSilverwo_aaHoboYourStory_0002AF00_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What's your story?
ESP.TRADUIT: 说说你的故事好吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Thank you! That'll show those assholes what I done. Three combat tours, twenty-five kills, and, well... I can't quite recall.
ESP.TRADUIT: 谢谢你！让那些混蛋看看我做了什么。三次战斗，25次杀敌，还有...我记不清了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hobo Charlie [0400D8ED] (mod) Quest : ([0400B29B]aaSilverwoodDialogue) Generic Dialogue for Persistent NPC's EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\MaleOld01\aaSilverwo_aaHoboYourStory_0002AF12_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm indebted to you, stranger. Here, take this bit of change I've been holding on to, please.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我很感激你，陌生人。给，拿着我一直拿着的零钱。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hobo Charlie [0400D8ED] (mod) Quest : ([0400B29B]aaSilverwoodDialogue) Generic Dialogue for Persistent NPC's EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\MaleOld01\aaSilverwo_aaHoboYourStory_0002AF12_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, that's too bad.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯，这太糟糕了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah, but I manage. There's always whiskey!
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，但我能应付。只要有威士忌!
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hobo Charlie [0400D8ED] (mod) Quest : ([0400B29B]aaSilverwoodDialogue) Generic Dialogue for Persistent NPC's EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\MaleOld01\aaSilverwo_aaHoboYourStory_0002AF04_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I can try to convince the sheriff to get your records.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我可以说服治安官把你的记录拿来。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You'd do that for Charlie? You can try, but that sheriff has a sequoia lodged up his ass, won't budge on paperwork. Asshole!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你会为了查理这么做?你可以试试，但那个治安官的屁股里塞了颗红杉，在文书工作上不肯让步。混蛋!
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hobo Charlie [0400D8ED] (mod) Quest : ([0400B29B]aaSilverwoodDialogue) Generic Dialogue for Persistent NPC's EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\MaleOld01\aaSilverwo_aaHoboYourStory_0002AF05_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: But hey, even if you try, I appreciate it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但是，即使你试过，我也很感激。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hobo Charlie [0400D8ED] (mod) Quest : ([0400B29B]aaSilverwoodDialogue) Generic Dialogue for Persistent NPC's EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\MaleOld01\aaSilverwo_aaHoboYourStory_0002AF05_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaSWUnmarked.CharlieFate to 1
What can you tell me about Silverwood?
ESP.TRADUIT: 关于银木镇你知道什么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ain't a bad place, just a little wild for most folk. As long as the mine keeps producing, people will keep coming.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这地方不错，只是对大多数人来说有点野。只要矿井还在生产，就会有人来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hobo Charlie [0400D8ED] (mod) Quest : ([0400B29B]aaSilverwoodDialogue) Generic Dialogue for Persistent NPC's EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\MaleOld01\aaSilverwo_aaHoboAboutTown_0002AF22_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You just have to be careful outside of town. Heathen Shit Wolves will cut your pecker off and sing a song about it, then throw it at the walls.
ESP.TRADUIT: 出了城你得小心点。异教徒屎狼会把你的丁丁割下来唱首歌，然后扔到墙上。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hobo Charlie [0400D8ED] (mod) Quest : ([0400B29B]aaSilverwoodDialogue) Generic Dialogue for Persistent NPC's EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\MaleOld01\aaSilverwo_aaHoboAboutTown_0002AF22_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I wanted to see if you could make a request for Charlie's service records.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想看看你能不能申请查看查理的服役记录。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Don't tell me you believed that bum. You did, didn't you? I've seen guys like him for years, wearing old fatigues and moaning about their service.
ESP.TRADUIT: 别告诉我你相信那个混蛋。你说了，不是吗?我多年来见过像他这样的人，穿着旧制服，抱怨他们的服务。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wayne Richardson [0400B313] (mod) Quest : ([0400B29B]aaSilverwoodDialogue) Generic Dialogue for Persistent NPC's EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\MaleAdult09\aaSilverwo_aaSheriffHoboRe_0002AF0B_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Almost all of them are full of shit. They're just conning patriotic citizens into giving up extra caps. Sorry, I won't waste my time on it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 几乎所有人都是一派胡言。他们只是在哄骗爱国公民放弃额外的瓶盖。对不起，我不会在这上面浪费时间。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wayne Richardson [0400B313] (mod) Quest : ([0400B29B]aaSilverwoodDialogue) Generic Dialogue for Persistent NPC's EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\MaleAdult09\aaSilverwo_aaSheriffHoboRe_0002AF0B_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaSheriffHoboRecords01Bribe
You know, I've been remiss in my duties. I'll mail off the request for his records right away. You have yourself a good day.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你知道，我一直在玩忽职守。我马上把他的记录寄出去。祝你今天过得愉快。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wayne Richardson [0400B313] (mod) Quest : ([0400B29B]aaSilverwoodDialogue) Generic Dialogue for Persistent NPC's EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\MaleAdult09\aaSilverwo_aaSheriffHoboRe_0002AF0C_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: player.removeitem caps001 500
set aaSWUnmarked.CharlieFate to 2
<Pay 500 caps> What if I were to make a generous donation to the sheriff's office?
ESP.TRADUIT: <支付500瓶盖>如果我给治安官办公室慷慨捐款呢?

ESP.ORIGINAL: Attempting to bribe an NCR official is a felony offense, stranger. You'd best walk on before I throw your ass in jail.
ESP.TRADUIT: 试图贿赂NCR官员是重罪，陌生人。在我把你扔进监狱之前，你最好快点走。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wayne Richardson [0400B313] (mod) Quest : ([0400B29B]aaSilverwoodDialogue) Generic Dialogue for Persistent NPC's EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\MaleAdult09\aaSilverwo_aaSheriffHoboRe_0002AF0D_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: How about some caps? I've got a few with me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 一些瓶盖怎么样?我有一些。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaSheriffHoboRecordsSpeech
Ok, ok. I'll mail out the request for Charlie's records. Just... keep this to yourself, ok?
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧,好吧。我会把查理的记录寄出去。只是...你自己留着，好吗?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wayne Richardson [0400B313] (mod) Quest : ([0400B29B]aaSilverwoodDialogue) Generic Dialogue for Persistent NPC's EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\MaleAdult09\aaSilverwo_aaSheriffHoboRe_0002AF0E_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaSWUnmarked.CharlieFate to 2
Are you telling me an elected official of the NCR is denying services to a veteran?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你是说NCR的民选官员拒绝为退伍军人提供服务吗?

ESP.ORIGINAL: You have no idea how much paperwork goes through here. Requisitions, inventory, arrest reports, grievances, all of it handled by me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你不知道这里有多少文件要处理。申请单，库存，逮捕报告，申诉，都是我处理的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wayne Richardson [0400B313] (mod) Quest : ([0400B29B]aaSilverwoodDialogue) Generic Dialogue for Persistent NPC's EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\MaleAdult09\aaSilverwo_aaSheriffHoboRe_0002AF0F_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I know you mean well, but I don't have time for Charlie's records. Sorry, I can't help you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我知道你是好意，但我没时间查查理的记录。对不起，我帮不了你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wayne Richardson [0400B313] (mod) Quest : ([0400B29B]aaSilverwoodDialogue) Generic Dialogue for Persistent NPC's EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\MaleAdult09\aaSilverwo_aaSheriffHoboRe_0002AF0F_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So you have to send out a letter, right? How hard can it be?
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以你要寄出一封信，对吗?能有多难呢?

ESP.ORIGINAL: Get Charlie's records here, or I'll make stamps out your eyelids and mail your guts to Shady Sands.
ESP.TRADUIT: 把查理的记录拿来，否则我就在你眼皮上盖上章再把你的内脏寄到沙荫市。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Shit fire, I'm on it! Right away! Darleen, get me those VA request forms, now!
ESP.TRADUIT: 该死，我这就去!马上!达琳，快给我退伍军人申请表格!
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wayne Richardson [0400B313] (mod) Quest : ([0400B29B]aaSilverwoodDialogue) Generic Dialogue for Persistent NPC's EmotionType : Fear Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\MaleAdult09\aaSilverwo_aaSheriffHoboRe_0002AF10_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaSWUnmarked.CharlieFate to 2
Nevermind, this is useless.
ESP.TRADUIT: 算了吧，这没什么用。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Have a nice day.
ESP.TRADUIT: 祝你今天愉快。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Wayne Richardson [0400B313] (mod) Quest : ([0400B29B]aaSilverwoodDialogue) Generic Dialogue for Persistent NPC's EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\MaleAdult09\aaSilverwo_aaSheriffHoboRe_0002AF11_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I can't accept that. I was happy to help.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不能接受。我很乐意帮忙。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Bless you, stranger! I'm indebted to you. You need anything, Charlie's here for you!
ESP.TRADUIT: 祝福你,陌生人!我很感激你，无论你需要什么，查理都在这儿!
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hobo Charlie [0400D8ED] (mod) Quest : ([0400B29B]aaSilverwoodDialogue) Generic Dialogue for Persistent NPC's EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\MaleOld01\aaSilverwo_aaHoboYourStory_0002AF15_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: rewardkarma 50
Thank you. I was happy to help.
ESP.TRADUIT: 谢谢你！我很乐意帮忙。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm indebted to you. You need anything, Charlie's here for you!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我很感激你，不管你需要什么，查理都在这儿!
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hobo Charlie [0400D8ED] (mod) Quest : ([0400B29B]aaSilverwoodDialogue) Generic Dialogue for Persistent NPC's EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\MaleOld01\aaSilverwo_aaHoboYourStory_0002AF16_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: player.additem caps001 50
Why stay with the Khans if they're a sinking ship? There are other opportunities.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果大汗帮这艘船要沉了，为什么还要留在他们身边？还有其他机会不是吗。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Really? Please, tell me about these exciting opportunities.
ESP.TRADUIT: 真的吗?请告诉我这些令人兴奋的机会。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Finley [04021397] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\MaleAdult06\aaRussellM_aaFinleyWhyKhan_0002AF18_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaFinleyWhyKhansFollowers
The Followers, huh? I always heard they were a bunch of pussies, helping people for no reason. I'll think about it, though.
ESP.TRADUIT: 天启追随者?我一直听说他们是一群娘们，毫无理由地帮助别人。不过我会考虑的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Finley [04021397] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\MaleAdult06\aaRussellM_aaFinleyWhyKhan_0002AF1C_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaSWUnmarked.FinleyFate to 4
The Followers would help you, no questions asked. It would be a fresh start.
ESP.TRADUIT: 天启追随者会帮你，不会多问。这将是一个全新的开始。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaFinleyWhyKhansOnYourOwn
That... I can understand, but an oath to the Khans ain't something you just walk away from. I'll think on it, though.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那我能理解，但对大汗帮的誓言不是一走了之的事。不过我会考虑的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Finley [04021397] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\MaleAdult06\aaRussellM_aaFinleyWhyKhan_0002AF1E_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaSWUnmarked.FinleyFate to 3 aaRussellRef.Sayto Player aaRussellMission01RussellAdviceBark
You don't need the Khans or anybody else. Be your own man and walk alone.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你不需要大汗帮或其他任何人。做你自己，一个人走。

ESP.ORIGINAL: On second thought, you'd be better off sticking with the Khans.
ESP.TRADUIT: 转念一想，你还是跟着大汗帮比较好。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Uh, ok... that's what I was gonna do anyway.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯,好吧...反正我也要这么做。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Finley [04021397] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\MaleAdult06\aaRussellM_aaFinleyWhyKhan_0002AF1F_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaSWUnmarked.FinleyFate to 2
What's your story?
ESP.TRADUIT: 说说你的故事好吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, partner, it's funny. My wife up and left me for some loan shark in Reno, so moved here to get back on my feet. Business has been a-boomin'!
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，搭档，这很有趣。我老婆离开了我去新里诺找了个放高利贷的人，所以我搬到这里来重新生活。生意一直很兴隆!
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joe Briggs [0400AE6B] (mod) Quest : ([0400B29B]aaSilverwoodDialogue) Generic Dialogue for Persistent NPC's EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaSilverwo_aaBriggsYourSto_0002AF23_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I've managed to save up enough to open up a chain of saloons, I just don't know if it would work. My instinct is to stay here and keep saving.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我攒了足够的钱来开一家连锁酒吧，我不知道这行不行。我的直觉是留在这里，继续存钱。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joe Briggs [0400AE6B] (mod) Quest : ([0400B29B]aaSilverwoodDialogue) Generic Dialogue for Persistent NPC's EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaSilverwo_aaBriggsYourSto_0002AF23_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What can you tell me about Silverwood?
ESP.TRADUIT: 关于银木镇你知道什么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Partner, this little town is growing fast, and the mine is churning out money. I was damn lucky to get this place set up when I did.
ESP.TRADUIT: 伙计，这个小镇发展得很快，而这个矿也在赚钱。我很幸运能在那时候建好这个地方。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joe Briggs [0400AE6B] (mod) Quest : ([0400B29B]aaSilverwoodDialogue) Generic Dialogue for Persistent NPC's EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaSilverwo_aaBriggsThisTow_0002AF2C_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sheriff can be a little rough sometimes, but I wouldn't want his job, trying to corral all these miners, hookers, and hobos.
ESP.TRADUIT: 治安官有时会有点粗暴，但我可不想做他的工作，把矿工，妓女和流浪汉都关起来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joe Briggs [0400AE6B] (mod) Quest : ([0400B29B]aaSilverwoodDialogue) Generic Dialogue for Persistent NPC's EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaSilverwo_aaBriggsThisTow_0002AF2C_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Only thing holding back this town is the crazy tribals, always killing settlers and travelers. Crazy savages don't know it's a losing battle.
ESP.TRADUIT: 唯一阻碍这个小镇发展的就是那些疯狂的部落，他们总是杀害定居者和旅行者。疯狂的野蛮人不知道这是一场必输的战斗。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joe Briggs [0400AE6B] (mod) Quest : ([0400B29B]aaSilverwoodDialogue) Generic Dialogue for Persistent NPC's EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaSilverwo_aaBriggsThisTow_0002AF2C_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: But once we clear out the Sand Wolves, I reckon Caruthers Canyon will be right prosperous, I kid you not.
ESP.TRADUIT: 一旦我们清除了沙狼，我想卡拉瑟斯峡谷会很繁荣，我不骗你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joe Briggs [0400AE6B] (mod) Quest : ([0400B29B]aaSilverwoodDialogue) Generic Dialogue for Persistent NPC's EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaSilverwo_aaBriggsThisTow_0002AF2C_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What's up with all these posters?
ESP.TRADUIT: 这些海报是怎么回事？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, hell fire, I haven't told you about the greatest filmmaker alive? Sit back and prepare to be mesmerized!
ESP.TRADUIT: 天啊，我还没跟你说过世上最伟大的电影制作人?坐好，准备被迷住吧!
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joe Briggs [0400AE6B] (mod) Quest : ([0400B29B]aaSilverwoodDialogue) Generic Dialogue for Persistent NPC's EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaSilverwo_aaBriggsPosters_0002AF2B_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Behold, the fine cinema of Mr. Albert C. Breach, who produces the finest films made since the Great War.
ESP.TRADUIT: 看，艾伯特·C·布里奇先生的好电影，他制作了自第一次世界大战以来最好的电影。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joe Briggs [0400AE6B] (mod) Quest : ([0400B29B]aaSilverwoodDialogue) Generic Dialogue for Persistent NPC's EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaSilverwo_aaBriggsPosters_0002AF2B_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hailing from Luna, California, Albert Breach has already produced over three hundred feature films.
ESP.TRADUIT: 来自加州卢纳的艾伯特·布里奇已经制作了300多部故事片。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joe Briggs [0400AE6B] (mod) Quest : ([0400B29B]aaSilverwoodDialogue) Generic Dialogue for Persistent NPC's EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaSilverwo_aaBriggsPosters_0002AF2B_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: His works cover every genre, including drama, comedy, and sex. He also writes works for the stage, like his award-winning play, "Waiting for Hobo."
ESP.TRADUIT: 他的作品涵盖了各种类型，包括戏剧、喜剧和性。他还为舞台创作作品，比如他的获奖剧本《等待流浪汉》
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joe Briggs [0400AE6B] (mod) Quest : ([0400B29B]aaSilverwoodDialogue) Generic Dialogue for Persistent NPC's EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaSilverwo_aaBriggsPosters_0002AF2B_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: My personal favorite is "Ghoul 5 from Goodsprings," a movie about ghouls, resurrection, and catheter tubes. I... always cry at the end.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我个人最喜欢的是《来自清泉镇的5个食尸鬼》，一部关于食尸鬼、复活和导管的电影。我...是总在最后哭。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joe Briggs [0400AE6B] (mod) Quest : ([0400B29B]aaSilverwoodDialogue) Generic Dialogue for Persistent NPC's EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaSilverwo_aaBriggsPosters_0002AF2B_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You've clearly got a winning formula. You should try it in a bigger market.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你显然有一套成功的公式。你应该去更大的市场试试。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You might just be right, partner. After Jenny left me for that sleazeball Jimmy, I sort of lost my nerve. I might just head to Dayglow.
ESP.TRADUIT: 也许你是对的，搭档。自从珍妮为了那个下流的吉米离开我后，我有点失去了勇气。我可能会去日耀城。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joe Briggs [0400AE6B] (mod) Quest : ([0400B29B]aaSilverwoodDialogue) Generic Dialogue for Persistent NPC's EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaSilverwo_aaBriggsYourSto_0002AF28_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaSWUnmarked.BriggsFate to 1
You've got a good thing going here. Play it safe and stick around.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你在这里干得很好。谨慎行事并坚持下去。

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's what most folks keep telling me, and they're probably right. I need to focus on the here and now, quit daydreamin'. Thanks.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是大多数人一直告诉我的，而且他们可能是对的。我需要专注于此时此地，别做白日梦了。谢谢。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joe Briggs [0400AE6B] (mod) Quest : ([0400B29B]aaSilverwoodDialogue) Generic Dialogue for Persistent NPC's EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaSilverwo_aaBriggsYourSto_0002AF2A_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaSWUnmarked.BriggsFate to 2
I don't really have an opinion on the matter - it's your decision.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我对这件事没有什么意见，这是你的决定。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're right, I need to make up my mind. I keep looking to other folks to make the hard choices for me, won't nothin' get done.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你说得对，我得下定决心。我一直指望别人帮我做出艰难的选择，但不会一事无成。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Joe Briggs [0400AE6B] (mod) Quest : ([0400B29B]aaSilverwoodDialogue) Generic Dialogue for Persistent NPC's EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaSilverwo_aaBriggsYourSto_0002AF29_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaRussellMission01RussellAdviceBark
You're just giving out advice left and right, aren't you. Be careful sticking your nose in other people's business. That shit can backfire.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你只是到处给我建议，不是吗。不要干涉别人的事。这玩意可能会适得其反。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellM_aaRussellMissio_0002AF2E_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaKatYourStory
Did you find religion or something?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你找到信仰了吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, it's better than mere religion... God spoke to me when I was in that cave, with death hanging over us all.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，这比单纯的宗教要好...当我在那个洞里的时候，当死亡笼罩着我们的时候，上帝对我说话了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mayor Brandon [0400B315] (mod) Quest : ([0400B29B]aaSilverwoodDialogue) Generic Dialogue for Persistent NPC's EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\MaleAdult09\aaSilverwo_aaMayorFoundRel_0002AF34_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: He told me to take up my true calling, that of the minister. My father always wanted me to follow in his footsteps, but I chose a worldly path.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他让我从事我真正的职业，牧师的职业。我父亲一直想让我追随他的脚步，但我选择了世俗的道路。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mayor Brandon [0400B315] (mod) Quest : ([0400B29B]aaSilverwoodDialogue) Generic Dialogue for Persistent NPC's EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\MaleAdult09\aaSilverwo_aaMayorFoundRel_0002AF34_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Once I finish my current term in office, I will step down and begin work as a minister, possibly open a church here, Lord willing.
ESP.TRADUIT: 一旦我完成我的任期，我会退下来，开始牧师的工作，可能在这里开一个教堂，上帝引导我。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mayor Brandon [0400B315] (mod) Quest : ([0400B29B]aaSilverwoodDialogue) Generic Dialogue for Persistent NPC's EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\MaleAdult09\aaSilverwo_aaMayorFoundRel_0002AF34_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Good luck with that.
ESP.TRADUIT: 祝你好运。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Thank you. You'll be in my prayers!
ESP.TRADUIT: 谢谢你！我会为你祈祷的!
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mayor Brandon [0400B315] (mod) Quest : ([0400B29B]aaSilverwoodDialogue) Generic Dialogue for Persistent NPC's EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\MaleAdult09\aaSilverwo_aaMayorFoundRel_0002AF37_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaSWUnmarked.MayorFate to 3
All due respect, but I think you're making a mistake. You're a politician, not a preacher.
ESP.TRADUIT: 恕我直言，但我觉得你犯了个错误。你是政客，不是传教士。

ESP.ORIGINAL: That was my old life, before I was reborn. However, I am humble, not above reproach, so I will heed your counsel.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那是我重生之前的生活。但我是谦卑的，并非无可指责，所以我会听从你的忠告。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mayor Brandon [0400B315] (mod) Quest : ([0400B29B]aaSilverwoodDialogue) Generic Dialogue for Persistent NPC's EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\MaleAdult09\aaSilverwo_aaMayorFoundRel_0002AF38_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaSWUnmarked.MayorFate to 1
What brings you to Silverwood?
ESP.TRADUIT: 什么风把你吹来银木镇了？

ESP.ORIGINAL: The work. I used to be a fighter in New Reno, but I busted my hand, blew my shot at the title. I heard there was money in the mines, so I moved.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这项工作。我以前在新里诺当过拳手，但我手受伤了，没能拿到冠军。我听说矿井里有钱，所以我就搬来了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sullivan [0401B0D0] (mod) Quest : ([0400B29B]aaSilverwoodDialogue) Generic Dialogue for Persistent NPC's EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaSilverwo_aaSullivanAbout_0002B354_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I've thought about applying for the foreman position, if only to get out of the hard labor. I don't know, though. Mining feels like a dead end.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想过申请领班的职位，哪怕只是为了摆脱繁重的劳动。我不知道。采矿感觉像是一个死胡同。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sullivan [0401B0D0] (mod) Quest : ([0400B29B]aaSilverwoodDialogue) Generic Dialogue for Persistent NPC's EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaSilverwo_aaSullivanAbout_0002B354_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Part of me misses the fight game. It's not all blood and savagery, like people say. There's skill, technique, developed expertise. It's a craft.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我有点怀念格斗比赛。不像人们说的，全是血腥和野蛮，有技能，技术，成熟的专业知识。这是一种艺术。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sullivan [0401B0D0] (mod) Quest : ([0400B29B]aaSilverwoodDialogue) Generic Dialogue for Persistent NPC's EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaSilverwo_aaSullivanAbout_0002B354_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I've thought about opening my own gym, coaching fighters, but it seems like a big risk. In Reno, it's all about connects, reputation. And money.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想过开自己的健身房，教拳手，但似乎风险很大。在新里诺，最重要的是人脉和声誉。还有金钱。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sullivan [0401B0D0] (mod) Quest : ([0400B29B]aaSilverwoodDialogue) Generic Dialogue for Persistent NPC's EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaSilverwo_aaSullivanAbout_0002B354_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Life is short, and you have to follow your passion. You should open up that gym.
ESP.TRADUIT: 生命短暂，你要追随自己的激情。你应该把那个健身房开起来。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Really? You're the first person to tell me that. Maybe it's not so crazy after all. I'll need to save up some more, but maybe... yeah, I'll try it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 真的吗?你是第一个这么告诉我的人。也许也没那么疯狂。我还需要存更多的钱，但是也许...好吧，我试试。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sullivan [0401B0D0] (mod) Quest : ([0400B29B]aaSilverwoodDialogue) Generic Dialogue for Persistent NPC's EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaSilverwo_aaSullivanAbout_0002B35A_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaSWUnmarked.SullivanFate to 3
Being a foreman should be a step up in the world. You should apply.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当领班是一个进步，你应该申请。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I might do that. The pay would certainly be better. Thanks for the advice.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我可能会那样做。薪水肯定会更高。谢谢你的建议。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sullivan [0401B0D0] (mod) Quest : ([0400B29B]aaSilverwoodDialogue) Generic Dialogue for Persistent NPC's EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaSilverwo_aaSullivanAbout_0002B359_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaSWUnmarked.SullivanFate to 2
It's really none of my business. You'll have to decide for yourself.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这真的不关我的事。你得自己决定。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah, I was just thinking out loud. Forget I mentioned it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是啊，我只是在自言自语。就当我没说。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sullivan [0401B0D0] (mod) Quest : ([0400B29B]aaSilverwoodDialogue) Generic Dialogue for Persistent NPC's EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\MaleAdult01Default\aaSilverwo_aaSullivanAbout_0002B358_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaEndingStart
So it happened that the battle over Caruthers Canyon concluded with a decisive victor: the town of Silverwood.
ESP.TRADUIT: 因此，对卡拉瑟斯峡谷的战斗以银木镇决定性的胜利告终。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jimmy from Human Resources [0402B370] (mod) Quest : ([0402B35B]aaRussellEnding) Ending Slideshow for Russell EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellNarratorVoiceType\aaRussellE_aaEndingStart_0002B373_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaRussellEnding.StartTopic to 1 aaRussellNarratorREF.SayTo Player aaEndingStart
The actions of three outsiders, the Courier, Russell and Glanton, had irrevocably changed the canyon.
ESP.TRADUIT: 三个外来者，邮差，拉塞尔和格兰顿的行动，不可逆转地改变了峡谷。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jimmy from Human Resources [0402B370] (mod) Quest : ([0402B35B]aaRussellEnding) Ending Slideshow for Russell

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaRussellEnding.StartTopic to 2 PlaySound OBJProjectorGOATNext; ApplyImageSpaceModifier FadeToBlackAndBackQuickHalfsISFX aaRussellNarratorREF.SayTo Player aaEndingSandWolves
aaEndingSandWolves
With their tribe decimated by Glanton, the remaining Sand Wolves fled Caruthers Canyon, forever traumatized by the destruction of their kin.
ESP.TRADUIT: 随着他们的部落被格兰顿屠杀，剩下的沙狼逃离了卡拉瑟斯峡谷，因为他们的同胞被毁灭而永远受到了创伤。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jimmy from Human Resources [0402B370] (mod) Quest : ([0402B35B]aaRussellEnding) Ending Slideshow for Russell EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellNarratorVoiceType\aaRussellE_aaEndingSandWol_0002B375_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaRussellEnding.SandWolvesTopic to 1 aaRussellNarratorREF.SayTo Player aaEndingSandWolves
Though few in number, the survivors swore an oath to enact vengeance on Glanton - and the courier who failed to stop him.
ESP.TRADUIT: 虽然人数不多，但幸存者发誓要向格兰顿以及未能阻止他的邮差复仇。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jimmy from Human Resources [0402B370] (mod) Quest : ([0402B35B]aaRussellEnding) Ending Slideshow for Russell

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaRussellEnding.SandWolvesTopic to 2 PlaySound OBJProjectorGOATNext; ApplyImageSpaceModifier FadeToBlackAndBackQuickHalfsISFX aaRussellNarratorREF.SayTo Player aaEndingSilverwood
aaEndingSilverwood
With the canyon securely in NCR hands, Silverwood quickly developed into a regional hub for mining and commerce.
ESP.TRADUIT: 随着峡谷被NCR牢牢掌握，银木镇迅速发展成为一个区域性的采矿和商业中心。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jimmy from Human Resources [0402B370] (mod) Quest : ([0402B35B]aaRussellEnding) Ending Slideshow for Russell EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellNarratorVoiceType\aaRussellE_aaEndingSilverw_0002C406_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: SwapTexture aaRussSlideShow01REF "##NVDLC02_End:0" "Russell\Slideshow\Slide_Silverwood";
set aaRussellEnding.SilverwoodTopic to 1 aaRussellNarratorREF.SayTo Player aaEndingSilverwood
Settlers from across California flocked to the town, eager to share in its prosperity. Civilization had made its mark.
ESP.TRADUIT: 来自加州各地的移民纷纷涌入该镇，渴望分享这里的繁荣。文明已经留下了自己的印记。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jimmy from Human Resources [0402B370] (mod) Quest : ([0402B35B]aaRussellEnding) Ending Slideshow for Russell

ESP.ORIGINAL: SwapTexture aaRussSlideShow01REF "##NVDLC02_End:0" "Russell\Slideshow\Slide_Silverwood";
set aaRussellEnding.SilverwoodTopic to 2 aaRussellNarratorREF.SayTo Player aaEndingSilverwood
Within a few years, most of the townsfolk had never heard of the Sand Wolves, though a few... would never forget.
ESP.TRADUIT: 几年之内，镇上大多数人都没听说过沙狼，尽管有一些人...永远不会忘记。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jimmy from Human Resources [0402B370] (mod) Quest : ([0402B35B]aaRussellEnding) Ending Slideshow for Russell

ESP.ORIGINAL: SwapTexture aaRussSlideShow01REF "##NVDLC02_End:0" "Russell\Slideshow\Slide_Silverwood";
set aaRussellEnding.SilverwoodTopic to 3 aaRussellNarratorREF.SayTo Player aaEndingSilverwood
Eventually, word of a great duel in Utah reached town. Travelers said the Courier had died, then rose again to fight the man in black.
ESP.TRADUIT: 最终，犹他州发生了一场大决斗的消息传到了镇上。旅行者们说邮差已经死了，然后又站起来和黑衣人搏斗。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jimmy from Human Resources [0402B370] (mod) Quest : ([0402B35B]aaRussellEnding) Ending Slideshow for Russell

ESP.ORIGINAL: SwapTexture aaRussSlideShow01REF "##NVDLC02_End:0" "Russell\Slideshow\Slide_Silverwood";
set aaRussellEnding.SilverwoodTopic to 4 aaRussellNarratorREF.SayTo Player aaEndingSilverwood
The people of Silverwood prayed for the Courier, though they feared the worst.
ESP.TRADUIT: 银木镇的人们为邮差祈祷，尽管他们担心会发生最坏的情况。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jimmy from Human Resources [0402B370] (mod) Quest : ([0402B35B]aaRussellEnding) Ending Slideshow for Russell

ESP.ORIGINAL: SwapTexture aaRussSlideShow01REF "##NVDLC02_End:0" "Russell\Slideshow\Slide_Silverwood";
aaEndingVickers
{Rehabbed}Prompted by the Courier's timely intervention, Vickers eventually won his fight with substance abuse.
ESP.TRADUIT: {恢复}在邮差及时的干预下，维克斯最终赢得了与药瘾的斗争。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jimmy from Human Resources [0402B370] (mod) Quest : ([0402B35B]aaRussellEnding) Ending Slideshow for Russell EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellNarratorVoiceType\aaRussellE_aaEndingVickers_0002C404_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: SwapTexture aaRussSlideShow01REF "##NVDLC02_End:0" "Russell\Slideshow\Slide_Vickers";
set aaRussellEnding.VickersTopic to 1 aaRussellNarratorREF.SayTo Player aaEndingVickers
Aided by the Followers, he would find new purpose counseling homeless veterans who struggled with alcoholism and addiction to chems.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在天启追随者的帮助下，他找到了一个新的目标:为无家可归的退伍军人提供咨询服务，这些退伍军人正在与酗酒和对药物上瘾作斗争。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jimmy from Human Resources [0402B370] (mod) Quest : ([0402B35B]aaRussellEnding) Ending Slideshow for Russell

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaRussellEnding.VickersTopic to 2 aaRussellNarratorREF.SayTo Player aaEndingVickers
In time, Vickers heard rumors of the Courier's death, but also of his resurrection, and a duel with the man in black.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不久，维克斯听到了邮差死亡的传言，但也听说了他复活并与黑衣人决斗的事。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jimmy from Human Resources [0402B370] (mod) Quest : ([0402B35B]aaRussellEnding) Ending Slideshow for Russell

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaRussellEnding.VickersTopic to 3 aaRussellNarratorREF.SayTo Player aaEndingVickers
He would pray for the Courier... and for justice.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他会为邮差祈祷......也为正义祈祷。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jimmy from Human Resources [0402B370] (mod) Quest : ([0402B35B]aaRussellEnding) Ending Slideshow for Russell

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Dead}Unable to overcome his inner demons, Vickers succumbed to chem abuse not long after his meeting with the Courier.
ESP.TRADUIT: {死亡}无法克服内心的恶魔，维克斯在与邮差会面后不久就屈服于化学药品并最终死于滥用。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jimmy from Human Resources [0402B370] (mod) Quest : ([0402B35B]aaRussellEnding) Ending Slideshow for Russell EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellNarratorVoiceType\aaRussellE_aaEndingVickers_0002C405_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: SwapTexture aaRussSlideShow01REF "##NVDLC02_End:0" "Russell\Slideshow\Slide_Vickers";
set aaRussellEnding.VickersTopic to 1 aaRussellNarratorREF.SayTo Player aaEndingVickers
He would be buried in an unmarked grave near Freeside.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他将被埋在自由城附近的一个无名坟墓里。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jimmy from Human Resources [0402B370] (mod) Quest : ([0402B35B]aaRussellEnding) Ending Slideshow for Russell

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaEndingCharlie
{Dead in battle - records}Having succumbed to his wounds in the defense of Silverwood, Charlie died as he once lived - as a soldier.
ESP.TRADUIT: {战死沙场-记录}查理在保卫银木镇的战斗中负伤而死，他死的时候和他生前一样--作为一名士兵。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jimmy from Human Resources [0402B370] (mod) Quest : ([0402B35B]aaRussellEnding) Ending Slideshow for Russell EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellNarratorVoiceType\aaRussellE_aaEndingCharlie_0002C3F9_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: SwapTexture aaRussSlideShow01REF "##NVDLC02_End:0" "Russell\Slideshow\Slide_Charlie";
set aaRussellEnding.CharlieTopic to 1 aaRussellNarratorREF.SayTo Player aaEndingCharlie
Soon after the battle, his records arrived, verifying his claims of military service.
ESP.TRADUIT: 战争结束后不久，他的档案就寄来了，证实了他曾服兵役的说法。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jimmy from Human Resources [0402B370] (mod) Quest : ([0402B35B]aaRussellEnding) Ending Slideshow for Russell

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaRussellEnding.CharlieTopic to 2 aaRussellNarratorREF.SayTo Player aaEndingCharlie
The townspeople ensured that Charlie was given a proper burial, with full honors, and his name included in a memorial to the fallen.
ESP.TRADUIT: 镇上的人确保为查理举行一个体面的葬礼，并把他的名字列在纪念阵亡将士的名单上。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jimmy from Human Resources [0402B370] (mod) Quest : ([0402B35B]aaRussellEnding) Ending Slideshow for Russell

ESP.ORIGINAL:
set aaRussellEnding.CharlieTopic to 3 PlaySound OBJProjectorGOATNext; ApplyImageSpaceModifier FadeToBlackAndBackQuickHalfsISFX;
If aaSWUnmarked.BriggsFate >= 1 aaRussellNarratorREF.SayTo Player aaEndingBriggs else aaRussellNarratorREF.SayTo Player aaEndingKat endif
{Dead in battle - no records}Having succumbed to his wounds in the defense of Silverwood, Charlie died as he once lived - as a soldier.
ESP.TRADUIT: {战死沙场-没有记录}查理在保卫银木镇的战斗中因伤而死，他死的时候和他生前一样--作为一名士兵。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jimmy from Human Resources [0402B370] (mod) Quest : ([0402B35B]aaRussellEnding) Ending Slideshow for Russell EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellNarratorVoiceType\aaRussellE_aaEndingCharlie_0002C3FA_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: SwapTexture aaRussSlideShow01REF "##NVDLC02_End:0" "Russell\Slideshow\Slide_Charlie";
set aaRussellEnding.CharlieTopic to 1 aaRussellNarratorREF.SayTo Player aaEndingCharlie
Though Charlie's sacrifice was commended by the townspeople, the lack of service records meant he received an anonymous grave outside of town.
ESP.TRADUIT: 尽管查理的牺牲得到了镇上居民的赞扬，但由于没有服役记录，他被安葬在镇外的无名坟墓里。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jimmy from Human Resources [0402B370] (mod) Quest : ([0402B35B]aaRussellEnding) Ending Slideshow for Russell

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaRussellEnding.CharlieTopic to 2 PlaySound OBJProjectorGOATNext; ApplyImageSpaceModifier FadeToBlackAndBackQuickHalfsISFX; If aaSWUnmarked.BriggsFate >= 1 aaRussellNarratorREF.SayTo Player aaEndingBriggs else aaRussellNarratorREF.SayTo Player aaEndingKat endif
{Did not fight in battle, records}Despite his enthusiasm, Charlie was not recruited to aid in the defense of Silverwood.
ESP.TRADUIT: {没有参加战斗，记录}尽管他很热情，查理没有被招募来帮助保卫银木镇。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jimmy from Human Resources [0402B370] (mod) Quest : ([0402B35B]aaRussellEnding) Ending Slideshow for Russell EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellNarratorVoiceType\aaRussellE_aaEndingCharlie_0002C3FB_1.ogg
