ESP.ORIGINAL: SwapTexture aaRussSlideShow01REF "##NVDLC02_End:0" "Russell\Slideshow\Slide_Charlie";
set aaRussellEnding.CharlieTopic to 1 aaRussellNarratorREF.SayTo Player aaEndingCharlie
Nonetheless, his service records soon arrived, verifying his claims of military service.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不过，他的服役记录很快就到了，证实了他的兵役声明。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jimmy from Human Resources [0402B370] (mod) Quest : ([0402B35B]aaRussellEnding) Ending Slideshow for Russell

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaRussellEnding.CharlieTopic to 2 aaRussellNarratorREF.SayTo Player aaEndingCharlie
As a result, he was given employment and free boarding by the mining company, and eventually thrived as an accountant.
ESP.TRADUIT: 结果，他被矿业公司雇佣并免费寄宿，最终成为了一名会计师。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jimmy from Human Resources [0402B370] (mod) Quest : ([0402B35B]aaRussellEnding) Ending Slideshow for Russell

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaRussellEnding.CharlieTopic to 3 PlaySound OBJProjectorGOATNext; ApplyImageSpaceModifier FadeToBlackAndBackQuickHalfsISFX; If aaSWUnmarked.BriggsFate >= 1 aaRussellNarratorREF.SayTo Player aaEndingBriggs else aaRussellNarratorREF.SayTo Player aaEndingKat endif
{Did not fight, no records}Despite his enthusiasm, Charlie was not recruited to aid in the defense of Silverwood.
ESP.TRADUIT: {没有参战，没有记录}尽管查理满腔热情，但他并没有被招募去帮助保卫银木镇。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jimmy from Human Resources [0402B370] (mod) Quest : ([0402B35B]aaRussellEnding) Ending Slideshow for Russell EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellNarratorVoiceType\aaRussellE_aaEndingCharlie_0002C3FC_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: SwapTexture aaRussSlideShow01REF "##NVDLC02_End:0" "Russell\Slideshow\Slide_Charlie";
set aaRussellEnding.CharlieTopic to 1 aaRussellNarratorREF.SayTo Player aaEndingCharlie
With no service records to verify his claims, Charlie would remain dismissed and marginalized by the townsfolk.
ESP.TRADUIT: 由于没有服役记录来证实他的说法，查理将继续被镇上的人排挤和边缘化。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jimmy from Human Resources [0402B370] (mod) Quest : ([0402B35B]aaRussellEnding) Ending Slideshow for Russell

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaRussellEnding.CharlieTopic to 2 aaRussellNarratorREF.SayTo Player aaEndingCharlie
Bitter and broken, he took his own life soon after the battle.
ESP.TRADUIT: 战争结束后不久，痛苦而心碎的他结束了自己的生命。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jimmy from Human Resources [0402B370] (mod) Quest : ([0402B35B]aaRussellEnding) Ending Slideshow for Russell

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaRussellEnding.CharlieTopic to 3 PlaySound OBJProjectorGOATNext; ApplyImageSpaceModifier FadeToBlackAndBackQuickHalfsISFX; If aaSWUnmarked.BriggsFate >= 1 aaRussellNarratorREF.SayTo Player aaEndingBriggs else aaRussellNarratorREF.SayTo Player aaEndingKat endif
{Fought, no records}Reveling in the defense of Silverwood, Charlie's bravery was lauded by the townspeople of Silverwood.
ESP.TRADUIT: {参战，没有记录}查理陶醉在保卫银木镇的过程中，他的勇敢受到了银木镇民的称赞。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jimmy from Human Resources [0402B370] (mod) Quest : ([0402B35B]aaRussellEnding) Ending Slideshow for Russell EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellNarratorVoiceType\aaRussellE_aaEndingCharlie_0002C3FD_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: SwapTexture aaRussSlideShow01REF "##NVDLC02_End:0" "Russell\Slideshow\Slide_Charlie";
set aaRussellEnding.CharlieTopic to 1 aaRussellNarratorREF.SayTo Player aaEndingCharlie
However, without service records to authenticate his past deeds, Charlie remained homeless and unemployed.
ESP.TRADUIT: 然而，由于没有服役记录来证实他过去的行为，查理一直处于无家可归和失业状态。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jimmy from Human Resources [0402B370] (mod) Quest : ([0402B35B]aaRussellEnding) Ending Slideshow for Russell

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaRussellEnding.CharlieTopic to 2 aaRussellNarratorREF.SayTo Player aaEndingCharlie
Though the citizens of Silverwood warmed to Charlie, he grew bitter at the lack of opportunities. Shortly after the battle, he took his own life.
ESP.TRADUIT: 虽然银木镇的居民对查理有所好感，但他却因缺乏机会而变得郁郁寡欢。战争结束后不久，他结束了自己的生命。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jimmy from Human Resources [0402B370] (mod) Quest : ([0402B35B]aaRussellEnding) Ending Slideshow for Russell

ESP.ORIGINAL:
set aaRussellEnding.CharlieTopic to 3 PlaySound OBJProjectorGOATNext; ApplyImageSpaceModifier FadeToBlackAndBackQuickHalfsISFX;
If aaSWUnmarked.BriggsFate >= 1 aaRussellNarratorREF.SayTo Player aaEndingBriggs else aaRussellNarratorREF.SayTo Player aaEndingKat endif
{Fought, records}Reveling in the defense of Silverwood, Charlie's bravery was lauded by the townspeople of Silverwood.
ESP.TRADUIT: {参战，记录}查理陶醉在保卫银木镇的过程中，他的勇敢受到了银木镇民的称赞。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jimmy from Human Resources [0402B370] (mod) Quest : ([0402B35B]aaRussellEnding) Ending Slideshow for Russell EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellNarratorVoiceType\aaRussellE_aaEndingCharlie_0002C3FE_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: SwapTexture aaRussSlideShow01REF "##NVDLC02_End:0" "Russell\Slideshow\Slide_Charlie";
set aaRussellEnding.CharlieTopic to 1 aaRussellNarratorREF.SayTo Player aaEndingCharlie
With his newly-arrived service records in hand, Charlie immediately became a respected figure in Silverwood.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他有了新到的服役记录在手，立刻成为了银木镇一个受人尊敬的人物。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jimmy from Human Resources [0402B370] (mod) Quest : ([0402B35B]aaRussellEnding) Ending Slideshow for Russell

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaRussellEnding.CharlieTopic to 2 aaRussellNarratorREF.SayTo Player aaEndingCharlie
As the previous sheriff had abandoned his office, a collection of citizens urged Charlie to run.
ESP.TRADUIT: 由于前任治安官辞职，一群市民敦促查理参选。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jimmy from Human Resources [0402B370] (mod) Quest : ([0402B35B]aaRussellEnding) Ending Slideshow for Russell

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaRussellEnding.CharlieTopic to 3 aaRussellNarratorREF.SayTo Player aaEndingCharlie
Though initially hesitant, he eventually agreed, and won in a landslide victory. Hobo Charlie was no more - he was now Sheriff Charlie.
ESP.TRADUIT: 虽然他起初犹豫不决，但最终还是同意了，并以压倒性的票选获胜。查理不再是流浪汉，他现在是查理治安官。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jimmy from Human Resources [0402B370] (mod) Quest : ([0402B35B]aaRussellEnding) Ending Slideshow for Russell

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaRussellEnding.CharlieTopic to 4 PlaySound OBJProjectorGOATNext; ApplyImageSpaceModifier FadeToBlackAndBackQuickHalfsISFX; If aaSWUnmarked.BriggsFate >= 1 aaRussellNarratorREF.SayTo Player aaEndingBriggs else aaRussellNarratorREF.SayTo Player aaEndingKat endif
aaEndingHendershot
{Dead}Slain in the bowels of Cholla Mountain, Hendershot's piece of the arms trade would die with him.
ESP.TRADUIT: {死}在仙人掌山脉的深处被杀，亨德肖特的军火贸易将与他一同死去。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jimmy from Human Resources [0402B370] (mod) Quest : ([0402B35B]aaRussellEnding) Ending Slideshow for Russell EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellNarratorVoiceType\aaRussellE_aaEndingHenders_0002C407_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: SwapTexture aaRussSlideShow01REF "##NVDLC02_End:0" "Russell\Slideshow\Slide_Hendershot";
set aaRussellEnding.HendershotTopic to 1 aaRussellNarratorREF.SayTo Player aaEndingHendershot
The Van Graffs quickly moved to secure his clients and solidify their position in the Mojave.
ESP.TRADUIT: 范·格拉夫家族迅速行动以保护他的客户并得以巩固了他们在莫哈韦的地位。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jimmy from Human Resources [0402B370] (mod) Quest : ([0402B35B]aaRussellEnding) Ending Slideshow for Russell

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Abandoned Cholla}Forced to abandon Cholla Mountain due to the inroads of marauding tunnelers, Hendershot tried to re-establish himself in Westside.
ESP.TRADUIT: {废弃的仙人掌山脉}由于挖掘者的入侵，亨德肖特被迫放弃仙人掌山，他试图在西区重建自己。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jimmy from Human Resources [0402B370] (mod) Quest : ([0402B35B]aaRussellEnding) Ending Slideshow for Russell EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellNarratorVoiceType\aaRussellE_aaEndingHenders_0002C408_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: SwapTexture aaRussSlideShow01REF "##NVDLC02_End:0" "Russell\Slideshow\Slide_Hendershot";
set aaRussellEnding.HendershotTopic to 1 aaRussellNarratorREF.SayTo Player aaEndingHendershot
Unfortunately, the Van Graffs saw to his demise before he made his first deal.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不幸的是，范·格拉夫家族在他达成第一笔交易前就目睹了他的死亡。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jimmy from Human Resources [0402B370] (mod) Quest : ([0402B35B]aaRussellEnding) Ending Slideshow for Russell

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Cholla Mountain Saved}With the tunneler threat neutralized by the Courier, Hendershot soon established himself as a major arms dealer.
ESP.TRADUIT: {拯救仙人掌山脉}随着挖掘者的威胁被邮差化解，亨德肖特很快成为了一个重要的军火商。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jimmy from Human Resources [0402B370] (mod) Quest : ([0402B35B]aaRussellEnding) Ending Slideshow for Russell EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellNarratorVoiceType\aaRussellE_aaEndingHenders_0002C409_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: SwapTexture aaRussSlideShow01REF "##NVDLC02_End:0" "Russell\Slideshow\Slide_Hendershot";
set aaRussellEnding.HendershotTopic to 1 aaRussellNarratorREF.SayTo Player aaEndingHendershot
Though the Van Graffs chafed at the presence of strong competition, Hendershot remained safe in Cholla Mountain, and his business thrived.
ESP.TRADUIT: 尽管范·格拉夫家族对激烈的竞争感到恼火，但亨德肖特在仙人掌山仍然很安全，他的生意也很兴隆。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jimmy from Human Resources [0402B370] (mod) Quest : ([0402B35B]aaRussellEnding) Ending Slideshow for Russell

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaRussellEnding.HendershotTopic to 2 aaRussellNarratorREF.SayTo Player aaEndingHendershot
Several of Hendershot's clients shared stories of the Courier's demise in Utah. This concerned Hendershot... until he heard another rumor.
ESP.TRADUIT: 亨德肖特的一些客户分享了邮差在犹他州死亡的故事。这让亨德肖特感到担心...直到他听到另一个谣言。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jimmy from Human Resources [0402B370] (mod) Quest : ([0402B35B]aaRussellEnding) Ending Slideshow for Russell

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaRussellEnding.HendershotTopic to 3 aaRussellNarratorREF.SayTo Player aaEndingHendershot
A wild-eyed smuggler told him that the Courier had risen... and fought the man in black. Hendershot hoped, but he couldn't believe.
ESP.TRADUIT: 一个疯狂的走私犯告诉他邮差已经重新站起来了......和黑衣人打了一架。亨德肖特满怀希望，但他无法相信。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jimmy from Human Resources [0402B370] (mod) Quest : ([0402B35B]aaRussellEnding) Ending Slideshow for Russell

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaEndingFinley
{Dead}Like so many before him, Finley met a violent end at the hands of the Courier.
ESP.TRADUIT: (死)像他之前的许多人一样，芬利在邮差的手中被暴力终结。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jimmy from Human Resources [0402B370] (mod) Quest : ([0402B35B]aaRussellEnding) Ending Slideshow for Russell EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellNarratorVoiceType\aaRussellE_aaEndingFinley_0002C400_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: SwapTexture aaRussSlideShow01REF "##NVDLC02_End:0" "Russell\Slideshow\Slide_Finley";
set aaRussellEnding.FinleyTopic to 1 aaRussellNarratorREF.SayTo Player aaEndingFinley
With his final thoughts on his old friend, Chance, Finley hoped he would find peace in death.
ESP.TRADUIT: 芬利在临终前思念着他的老朋友吉斯，希望他能在死后得到安宁。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jimmy from Human Resources [0402B370] (mod) Quest : ([0402B35B]aaRussellEnding) Ending Slideshow for Russell

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Followers}Moved by the Courier's advice, Finley set out to meet the Followers.
ESP.TRADUIT: {天启追随者}被信使的建议所感动，芬利出发去找天启追随者
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jimmy from Human Resources [0402B370] (mod) Quest : ([0402B35B]aaRussellEnding) Ending Slideshow for Russell EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellNarratorVoiceType\aaRussellE_aaEndingFinley_0002C401_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: SwapTexture aaRussSlideShow01REF "##NVDLC02_End:0" "Russell\Slideshow\Slide_Finley";
set aaRussellEnding.FinleyTopic to 1 aaRussellNarratorREF.SayTo Player aaEndingFinley
Surprised by their compassion, he quickly shed his old identity and set out to heal others. He believed his friend Chance would've wanted it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们的同情让他感到惊讶，他很快摆脱了自己原有的身份，开始帮助他人。他相信他的朋友吉斯会愿意看到的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jimmy from Human Resources [0402B370] (mod) Quest : ([0402B35B]aaRussellEnding) Ending Slideshow for Russell

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Solo - Fiends}Thanks to the Courier's encouragement, Finley grew determined to leave his own mark on the Mojave.
ESP.TRADUIT: {单飞-恶魔帮}多亏了邮差的鼓励，芬利决心在莫哈韦废土上留下自己的印记。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jimmy from Human Resources [0402B370] (mod) Quest : ([0402B35B]aaRussellEnding) Ending Slideshow for Russell EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellNarratorVoiceType\aaRussellE_aaEndingFinley_0002C402_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: SwapTexture aaRussSlideShow01REF "##NVDLC02_End:0" "Russell\Slideshow\Slide_Finley";
set aaRussellEnding.FinleyTopic to 1 aaRussellNarratorREF.SayTo Player aaEndingFinley
Unfortunately, without the structure and support afforded by the Khans, he quickly collapsed into chem abuse.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不幸的是，没有大汗帮提供的组织和支持，他很快就陷入了化学药物滥用中。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jimmy from Human Resources [0402B370] (mod) Quest : ([0402B35B]aaRussellEnding) Ending Slideshow for Russell

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaRussellEnding.FinleyTopic to 2 aaRussellNarratorREF.SayTo Player aaEndingFinley
He then found a new family - the Fiends, where his addiction caused his latent sadism to flourish.
ESP.TRADUIT: 然后，他找到了一个新的家庭--恶魔帮，在那里，他的上瘾使他潜在的施虐癖更加猖獗。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jimmy from Human Resources [0402B370] (mod) Quest : ([0402B35B]aaRussellEnding) Ending Slideshow for Russell

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaRussellEnding.FinleyTopic to 3 aaRussellNarratorREF.SayTo Player aaEndingFinley
In time, he would become one of the most feared raiders in the Mojave Wasteland.
ESP.TRADUIT: 随着时间的推移，他将成为莫哈韦废土上最可怕的掠夺者之一。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jimmy from Human Resources [0402B370] (mod) Quest : ([0402B35B]aaRussellEnding) Ending Slideshow for Russell

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaRussellEnding.FinleyTopic to 4 PlaySound OBJProjectorGOATNext; ApplyImageSpaceModifier FadeToBlackAndBackQuickHalfsISFX; aaRussellNarratorREF.SayTo Player aaEndingCharlie set SomeguyMaster.SpartacusStatus to 1 aaFinleyREF.disable aaFinleyREF.markfordelete
{Remains with Khans}Though disillusioned with their lot in the Mojave, Finley remained loyal to the Khans, if only out of respect to his late friend, Chance.
ESP.TRADUIT: 芬利虽然对他们在莫哈韦沙漠的命运感到失望，但他仍然忠于大汗帮，这只是出于对他已故的朋友吉斯的尊重。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jimmy from Human Resources [0402B370] (mod) Quest : ([0402B35B]aaRussellEnding) Ending Slideshow for Russell EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellNarratorVoiceType\aaRussellE_aaEndingFinley_0002C403_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: SwapTexture aaRussSlideShow01REF "##NVDLC02_End:0" "Russell\Slideshow\Slide_Finley";
set aaRussellEnding.FinleyTopic to 1 aaRussellNarratorREF.SayTo Player aaEndingFinley
In his private moments, he hoped to live long enough to see the Khans revitalized - or mercifully destroyed.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在私底下，他希望能活得足够长，看到大汗帮重新崛起--或者幸运地被消灭。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jimmy from Human Resources [0402B370] (mod) Quest : ([0402B35B]aaRussellEnding) Ending Slideshow for Russell

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaEndingBriggs
{Died in battle}Standing beside his fellow townspeople, Briggs died defending those who could not defend themselves.
ESP.TRADUIT: {战死沙场}布里格斯站在他的同胞身边，为了保护那些不能保护自己的人而牺牲。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jimmy from Human Resources [0402B370] (mod) Quest : ([0402B35B]aaRussellEnding) Ending Slideshow for Russell EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellNarratorVoiceType\aaRussellE_aaEndingBriggs_0002C3F1_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: SwapTexture aaRussSlideShow01REF "##NVDLC02_End:0" "Russell\Slideshow\Slide_Briggs";
set aaRussellEnding.BriggsTopic to 1 aaRussellNarratorREF.SayTo Player aaEndingBriggs
Along with the other fallen defenders, he was given a burial with full honors, and his name was included in a small memorial.
ESP.TRADUIT: 和其他倒下的守卫者一样，他得到了隆重的葬礼，他的名字被列入了一个小型纪念碑。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jimmy from Human Resources [0402B370] (mod) Quest : ([0402B35B]aaRussellEnding) Ending Slideshow for Russell

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaRussellEnding.BriggsTopic to 2 aaRussellNarratorREF.SayTo Player aaEndingBriggs
At his request, he was buried with his posters.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在他的要求下，他和他的电影海报一起被埋葬了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jimmy from Human Resources [0402B370] (mod) Quest : ([0402B35B]aaRussellEnding) Ending Slideshow for Russell

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaRussellEnding.BriggsTopic to 3 PlaySound OBJProjectorGOATNext; ApplyImageSpaceModifier FadeToBlackAndBackQuickHalfsISFX aaRussellNarratorREF.SayTo Player aaEndingKat
{Went to Cali}Emboldened by the Courier's advice, Briggs sold his shares in the saloon and headed west.
ESP.TRADUIT: {去卡利}在邮差的建议下，布里格斯卖掉了他在酒吧的股份，向西出发。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jimmy from Human Resources [0402B370] (mod) Quest : ([0402B35B]aaRussellEnding) Ending Slideshow for Russell EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellNarratorVoiceType\aaRussellE_aaEndingBriggs_0002C3F7_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: SwapTexture aaRussSlideShow01REF "##NVDLC02_End:0" "Russell\Slideshow\Slide_Briggs";
set aaRussellEnding.BriggsTopic to 1 aaRussellNarratorREF.SayTo Player aaEndingBriggs
His unique, cinema-themed saloons quickly flourished, and grew into a popular chain, bringing Briggs wealth and recognition.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他独特的、以电影为主题的酒吧迅速兴起，并发展成为一个受欢迎的连锁店，给布里格斯带来了财富和认可。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jimmy from Human Resources [0402B370] (mod) Quest : ([0402B35B]aaRussellEnding) Ending Slideshow for Russell

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaRussellEnding.BriggsTopic to 2 aaRussellNarratorREF.SayTo Player aaEndingBriggs
He would use his newfound wealth to finance dozens of films, all of them directed by Albert Breach.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他将用新获得的财富资助数十部电影，全部由艾伯特·布里奇执导。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jimmy from Human Resources [0402B370] (mod) Quest : ([0402B35B]aaRussellEnding) Ending Slideshow for Russell

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaRussellEnding.BriggsTopic to 3 aaRussellNarratorREF.SayTo Player aaEndingBriggs
Unfortunately, while visiting the set of "Bride of the Deathclaw", Briggs would be decapitated by a vertibird rotor in a freak accident.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不幸的是，在参观“死亡爪的新娘”片场时，布里格斯在一次意外事故中被飞鸟旋翼斩首。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jimmy from Human Resources [0402B370] (mod) Quest : ([0402B35B]aaRussellEnding) Ending Slideshow for Russell

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaRussellEnding.BriggsTopic to 4 aaRussellNarratorREF.SayTo Player aaEndingBriggs
Mourned by hundreds in the growing film industry, he would be immortalized in a bronze statue outside Albert Breach Studios.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在不断发展的电影行业中，数以百计的人哀悼他，他将在艾伯特·布里奇工作室外的一座青铜雕像中永垂不朽。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jimmy from Human Resources [0402B370] (mod) Quest : ([0402B35B]aaRussellEnding) Ending Slideshow for Russell

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaRussellEnding.BriggsTopic to 5 PlaySound OBJProjectorGOATNext; ApplyImageSpaceModifier FadeToBlackAndBackQuickHalfsISFX aaRussellNarratorREF.SayTo Player aaEndingKat
{Stayed}Resolved to stay in Silverwood, Briggs continued to save his profits and make the most of his opportunities in town.
ESP.TRADUIT: {留守}布里格斯决心留在银木镇，继续节省他的利润并充分利用他在城里的机会。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jimmy from Human Resources [0402B370] (mod) Quest : ([0402B35B]aaRussellEnding) Ending Slideshow for Russell EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellNarratorVoiceType\aaRussellE_aaEndingBriggs_0002C3F8_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: SwapTexture aaRussSlideShow01REF "##NVDLC02_End:0" "Russell\Slideshow\Slide_Briggs";
set aaRussellEnding.BriggsTopic to 1 aaRussellNarratorREF.SayTo Player aaEndingBriggs
Though his business remained successful, he would grow disillusioned with his prospects in Silverwood. He would never marry.
ESP.TRADUIT: 虽然他的生意一直很成功，但他对在银木镇的前景逐渐感到失望。他一直没有结婚。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jimmy from Human Resources [0402B370] (mod) Quest : ([0402B35B]aaRussellEnding) Ending Slideshow for Russell

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaRussellEnding.BriggsTopic to 1 PlaySound OBJProjectorGOATNext; ApplyImageSpaceModifier FadeToBlackAndBackQuickHalfsISFX aaRussellNarratorREF.SayTo Player aaEndingKat
aaEndingKat
{Died in battle}Miss Kat's valiant contribution to the defense of Silverwood surprised many townsfolk, though her death was even more shocking.
ESP.TRADUIT: {阵亡}凯特小姐为保卫银木镇所做的英勇贡献让许多市民感到惊讶，尽管她的死更令人震惊。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jimmy from Human Resources [0402B370] (mod) Quest : ([0402B35B]aaRussellEnding) Ending Slideshow for Russell EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellNarratorVoiceType\aaRussellE_aaEndingKat_0002C40A_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: SwapTexture aaRussSlideShow01REF "##NVDLC02_End:0" "Russell\Slideshow\Slide_Kat";
set aaRussellEnding.KatTopic to 1 aaRussellNarratorREF.SayTo Player aaEndingKat
Despite the objections of a few citizens, Miss Kat was buried with full honors, alongside the other fallen defenders.
ESP.TRADUIT: 尽管有一些市民反对，凯特小姐还是被安葬在了其他倒下的守卫者旁边。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jimmy from Human Resources [0402B370] (mod) Quest : ([0402B35B]aaRussellEnding) Ending Slideshow for Russell

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Did not participate}Shrewdly avoiding the battle with the Legion, Miss Kat continued servicing throngs of enthusiastic clients.
ESP.TRADUIT: (没有参加)凯特小姐精明地避开了与军团的战斗，继续为大批热情的顾客服务。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jimmy from Human Resources [0402B370] (mod) Quest : ([0402B35B]aaRussellEnding) Ending Slideshow for Russell EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellNarratorVoiceType\aaRussellE_aaEndingKat_0002C40B_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: SwapTexture aaRussSlideShow01REF "##NVDLC02_End:0" "Russell\Slideshow\Slide_Kat";
set aaRussellEnding.KatTopic to 1 aaRussellNarratorREF.SayTo Player aaEndingKat
Unfortunately, the peace came at a price - as more families moved in, ordnances against prostitution eventually compelled her to move on.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不幸的是，和平是有代价的--随着更多的家庭搬进来，反对卖淫的法律最终迫使她离开。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jimmy from Human Resources [0402B370] (mod) Quest : ([0402B35B]aaRussellEnding) Ending Slideshow for Russell

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaRussellEnding.KatTopic to 2 aaRussellNarratorREF.SayTo Player aaEndingKat
After leaving town, she travelled to New Reno, where she was rumored to thrive as a fluffer in the pornographic film industry.
ESP.TRADUIT: 离开小镇后，她前往新里诺，据传她在那里作为色情电影业的一个演员助手而茁壮成长。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jimmy from Human Resources [0402B370] (mod) Quest : ([0402B35B]aaRussellEnding) Ending Slideshow for Russell

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Fought in battle}Emboldened by her participation in the defense of Silverwood, Miss Kat used her newfound fame to expand her business.
ESP.TRADUIT: {参战}凯特小姐因参与保卫银木镇的行动而更加大胆，她利用自己新获得的名声扩大了业务。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jimmy from Human Resources [0402B370] (mod) Quest : ([0402B35B]aaRussellEnding) Ending Slideshow for Russell EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellNarratorVoiceType\aaRussellE_aaEndingKat_0002C40C_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: SwapTexture aaRussSlideShow01REF "##NVDLC02_End:0" "Russell\Slideshow\Slide_Kat";
set aaRussellEnding.KatTopic to 1 aaRussellNarratorREF.SayTo Player aaEndingKat
Respected for her commitment to the town's safety, any motions to prohibit prostitution were quickly dismissed as unpatriotic.
ESP.TRADUIT: 由于她对小镇安全的贡献而受到尊重，任何禁止卖淫的提议都很快被认为是不爱国的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jimmy from Human Resources [0402B370] (mod) Quest : ([0402B35B]aaRussellEnding) Ending Slideshow for Russell

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaRussellEnding.KatTopic to 2 aaRussellNarratorREF.SayTo Player aaEndingKat
Eventually she would open her own brothel near Silverwood. Long after the mine dried up, Kat's business would keep the local economy humming.
ESP.TRADUIT: 最终，她在银木镇附近开了一家自己的妓院。在矿山荒废很久之后，凯特的生意仍然维持着当地经济的繁荣。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jimmy from Human Resources [0402B370] (mod) Quest : ([0402B35B]aaRussellEnding) Ending Slideshow for Russell

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaEndingMayor
{Stayed in office}Despite his urge to leave office, Mayor Brandon heeded the Courier's advice and stayed the course.
ESP.TRADUIT: {留在办公室}尽管布兰登市长急于离任，但他听取了邮差的建议，并坚持了下去。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jimmy from Human Resources [0402B370] (mod) Quest : ([0402B35B]aaRussellEnding) Ending Slideshow for Russell EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellNarratorVoiceType\aaRussellE_aaEndingMayor_0002C40D_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: SwapTexture aaRussSlideShow01REF "##NVDLC02_End:0" "Russell\Slideshow\Slide_Mayor";
set aaRussellEnding.MayorTopic to 1 aaRussellNarratorREF.SayTo Player aaEndingMayor
Despite his newfound religiosity, Brandon had acquired a reputation for cowardice and corruption, and was promptly voted out of office.
ESP.TRADUIT: 由于他的新宗教信仰，布兰登获得了懦弱和腐败的名声，并立即被投票下台。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jimmy from Human Resources [0402B370] (mod) Quest : ([0402B35B]aaRussellEnding) Ending Slideshow for Russell

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaRussellEnding.MayorTopic to 2 aaRussellNarratorREF.SayTo Player aaEndingMayor
Eventually he published a memoir of his career. Though the book was a commercial failure, it endured as required reading for students.
ESP.TRADUIT: 最终，他出版了一本关于自己职业生涯的回忆录。尽管这本书在商业上失败了，但作为学生们的必读书目，它依然历久不衰。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jimmy from Human Resources [0402B370] (mod) Quest : ([0402B35B]aaRussellEnding) Ending Slideshow for Russell

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaRussellEnding.MayorTopic to 3 aaRussellNarratorREF.SayTo Player aaEndingMayor
Brandon would live out the rest of his days in obscurity, dying penniless and alone.
ESP.TRADUIT: 布兰登将在默默无闻中度过余生，临终时身无分文，孤独终老。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jimmy from Human Resources [0402B370] (mod) Quest : ([0402B35B]aaRussellEnding) Ending Slideshow for Russell

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Became preacher}Having recieved a life-altering epiphany during the battle for Silverwood, Mayor Brandon soon became Reverend Brandon.
ESP.TRADUIT: {成为传教士}在银木镇的战斗中布兰登获得了改变人生的顿悟，他很快就从市长变成了布兰登牧师。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jimmy from Human Resources [0402B370] (mod) Quest : ([0402B35B]aaRussellEnding) Ending Slideshow for Russell EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellNarratorVoiceType\aaRussellE_aaEndingMayor_0002C40E_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: SwapTexture aaRussSlideShow01REF "##NVDLC02_End:0" "Russell\Slideshow\Slide_Mayor";
set aaRussellEnding.MayorTopic to 1 aaRussellNarratorREF.SayTo Player aaEndingMayor
Determined to stem the tide of debauchery and license in Silverwood, Brandon established the first church in the Canyon.
ESP.TRADUIT: 为了遏制银木镇的放荡和执照泛滥，布兰登在峡谷中建立了第一个教堂。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jimmy from Human Resources [0402B370] (mod) Quest : ([0402B35B]aaRussellEnding) Ending Slideshow for Russell

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaRussellEnding.MayorTopic to 2 aaRussellNarratorREF.SayTo Player aaEndingMayor
However, he would eventually begin an illicit affair with the wife of an unsuspecting deacon.
ESP.TRADUIT: 然而，他最终与一位毫无戒心的执事的妻子发生了不正当的关系。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jimmy from Human Resources [0402B370] (mod) Quest : ([0402B35B]aaRussellEnding) Ending Slideshow for Russell

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaRussellEnding.MayorTopic to 3 aaRussellNarratorREF.SayTo Player aaEndingMayor
When the deacon caught Brandon in the act, he strangled the former mayor to death. It would be ruled as self-defense.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当执事抓到布兰登时，他把前市长勒死了。这被裁定为自卫。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jimmy from Human Resources [0402B370] (mod) Quest : ([0402B35B]aaRussellEnding) Ending Slideshow for Russell

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Dead}Having fallen to Russell's knife, Mayor Brandon was given an obligatory funeral service, even though the townsfolk held him in contempt.
ESP.TRADUIT: (死)镇长布兰登死于拉塞尔的刀下，尽管市民们蔑视他，但他还是被强制举行了葬礼。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jimmy from Human Resources [0402B370] (mod) Quest : ([0402B35B]aaRussellEnding) Ending Slideshow for Russell EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellNarratorVoiceType\aaRussellE_aaEndingMayor_0002D8BA_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: SwapTexture aaRussSlideShow01REF "##NVDLC02_End:0" "Russell\Slideshow\Slide_Mayor";
set aaRussellEnding.MayorTopic to 1 aaRussellNarratorREF.SayTo Player aaEndingMayor
His term as mayor would eventually be commemorated with an ornate toilet constructed in the town hall.
ESP.TRADUIT: 为了纪念他的市长任期，在市政厅修建了一个华丽的厕所。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jimmy from Human Resources [0402B370] (mod) Quest : ([0402B35B]aaRussellEnding) Ending Slideshow for Russell

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaEndingSullivan
{Died in battle}Going against the advice of his fellow miners, Sullivan took an active role in the defense of Silverwood.
ESP.TRADUIT: {战死}沙利文不顾其他矿工的建议，积极参与保卫银木镇。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jimmy from Human Resources [0402B370] (mod) Quest : ([0402B35B]aaRussellEnding) Ending Slideshow for Russell EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellNarratorVoiceType\aaRussellE_aaEndingSulliva_0002C40F_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: SwapTexture aaRussSlideShow01REF "##NVDLC02_End:0" "Russell\Slideshow\Slide_Sullivan";
set aaRussellEnding.SullivanTopic to 1 aaRussellNarratorREF.SayTo Player aaEndingSullivan
In spite of his skill and bravery, he would fall at the hands of attacking Legionaries.
ESP.TRADUIT: 尽管他很有技巧，也很勇敢，但他还是死在了进攻的军团手中。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jimmy from Human Resources [0402B370] (mod) Quest : ([0402B35B]aaRussellEnding) Ending Slideshow for Russell

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaRussellEnding.SullivanTopic to 2 aaRussellNarratorREF.SayTo Player aaEndingSullivan
Mourned by his peers, Sullivan was buried alongside the other defenders, his name included in a memorial for the fallen.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他的同伴们哀悼他，沙利文和其他守卫者一起被埋葬，他的名字也被列入了烈士纪念碑。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jimmy from Human Resources [0402B370] (mod) Quest : ([0402B35B]aaRussellEnding) Ending Slideshow for Russell

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Stayed}Enjoying the security of his position in the mine, Sullivan decided to remain in Silverwood.
ESP.TRADUIT: {留守}沙利文享受着他在矿井中的安全地位，决定留在银木镇。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jimmy from Human Resources [0402B370] (mod) Quest : ([0402B35B]aaRussellEnding) Ending Slideshow for Russell EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellNarratorVoiceType\aaRussellE_aaEndingSulliva_0002C410_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: SwapTexture aaRussSlideShow01REF "##NVDLC02_End:0" "Russell\Slideshow\Slide_Sullivan";
set aaRussellEnding.SullivanTopic to 1 aaRussellNarratorREF.SayTo Player aaEndingSullivan
Though a valued employee, he would eventually be laid off when the mine dried up. After leaving Silverwood, he was never seen again.
ESP.TRADUIT: 虽然他是一名很有价值的员工，但最终当矿井枯竭时，他被解雇了。离开银木镇后，再也没人见过他。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jimmy from Human Resources [0402B370] (mod) Quest : ([0402B35B]aaRussellEnding) Ending Slideshow for Russell

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Becomes foreman}Taking the Courier's advice to heart, Sullivan applied for a foreman position, and to his surprise, was promoted.
ESP.TRADUIT: {成为工头}沙利文将邮差的建议牢记在心，申请工头职位，出乎他的意料，升职了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jimmy from Human Resources [0402B370] (mod) Quest : ([0402B35B]aaRussellEnding) Ending Slideshow for Russell EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellNarratorVoiceType\aaRussellE_aaEndingSulliva_0002C411_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: SwapTexture aaRussSlideShow01REF "##NVDLC02_End:0" "Russell\Slideshow\Slide_Sullivan";
set aaRussellEnding.SullivanTopic to 1 aaRussellNarratorREF.SayTo Player aaEndingSullivan
Known as a fair, competent supervisor, Sullivan had a bright future in the company. Unfortunately, his life was cut short by a cave-in.
ESP.TRADUIT: 沙利文被认为是一位公平、称职的主管，在公司有着光明的前途。不幸的是，他的生命因塌方而短暂。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jimmy from Human Resources [0402B370] (mod) Quest : ([0402B35B]aaRussellEnding) Ending Slideshow for Russell

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaRussellEnding.SullivanTopic to 2 aaRussellNarratorREF.SayTo Player aaEndingSullivan
He would be buried in a nondescript grave outside of town.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他将被埋在城外一个不起眼的坟墓里。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jimmy from Human Resources [0402B370] (mod) Quest : ([0402B35B]aaRussellEnding) Ending Slideshow for Russell

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Moves to Reno}Moved by the Courier's encouragement, Sullivan moved to Reno and opened his own gym.
ESP.TRADUIT: {搬到里诺}在邮差的鼓励下，沙利文搬到了里诺并开设了自己的健身房。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jimmy from Human Resources [0402B370] (mod) Quest : ([0402B35B]aaRussellEnding) Ending Slideshow for Russell EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellNarratorVoiceType\aaRussellE_aaEndingSulliva_0002C412_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: SwapTexture aaRussSlideShow01REF "##NVDLC02_End:0" "Russell\Slideshow\Slide_Sullivan";
set aaRussellEnding.SullivanTopic to 1 aaRussellNarratorREF.SayTo Player aaEndingSullivan
Though he initially struggled, Sullivan eventually gained recognition for his skill as a coach, and would be sponsored by the Bishop Family.
ESP.TRADUIT: 虽然他一开始很挣扎，但沙利文最终以他作为教练的技能获得了认可，并得到了毕肖普家族的赞助。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jimmy from Human Resources [0402B370] (mod) Quest : ([0402B35B]aaRussellEnding) Ending Slideshow for Russell

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaRussellEnding.SullivanTopic to 2 aaRussellNarratorREF.SayTo Player aaEndingSullivan
He would go on to train some of the most successful prize fighters in New Reno.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他将继续在新里诺训练一些最成功的职业拳击手。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jimmy from Human Resources [0402B370] (mod) Quest : ([0402B35B]aaRussellEnding) Ending Slideshow for Russell

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaEndingParmley
{Died in battle}Though a stranger to Silverwood, Parmley selflessly gave his life defending the town and its citizens.
ESP.TRADUIT: {阵亡}帕姆利虽然对银木镇并不熟悉，但他无私地献出了自己的生命来保卫这个城镇和它的市民。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jimmy from Human Resources [0402B370] (mod) Quest : ([0402B35B]aaRussellEnding) Ending Slideshow for Russell EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellE_aaEndingParmley_0002C413_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: SwapTexture aaRussSlideShow01REF "##NVDLC02_End:0" "Russell\Slideshow\Slide_Parmley";
set aaRussellEnding.ParmleyTopic to 1 aaRussellNarratorREF.SayTo Player aaEndingParmley
As such, he was made an honorary citizen, buried beside the other defenders, and his name included in a memorial.
ESP.TRADUIT: 因此，他被授予荣誉公民称号，与其他捍卫者葬在一起，他的名字也被列入了纪念碑。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jimmy from Human Resources [0402B370] (mod) Quest : ([0402B35B]aaRussellEnding) Ending Slideshow for Russell

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Remained a Courier}Avoiding the battle for Silverwood, Parmley resumed his duties as a Courier, delivering parcel across the Southwest.
ESP.TRADUIT: {仍然是邮差}为了避开银木镇的战斗，帕姆利继续担任邮差，在西南地区递送包裹。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jimmy from Human Resources [0402B370] (mod) Quest : ([0402B35B]aaRussellEnding) Ending Slideshow for Russell EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellE_aaEndingParmley_0002C414_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: SwapTexture aaRussSlideShow01REF "##NVDLC02_End:0" "Russell\Slideshow\Slide_Parmley";
set aaRussellEnding.ParmleyTopic to 1 aaRussellNarratorREF.SayTo Player aaEndingParmley
Parmley didn't think about the Courier until he heard rumors of a legendary duel, somewhere in the mountains of Utah.
ESP.TRADUIT: 帕姆利并没有想到信差，直到他听到传闻中的决斗，在犹他州的山区某处。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jimmy from Human Resources [0402B370] (mod) Quest : ([0402B35B]aaRussellEnding) Ending Slideshow for Russell

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaRussellEnding.ParmleyTopic to 2 aaRussellNarratorREF.SayTo Player aaEndingParmley
He heard that the Courier had emerged from the grave to fight a man worse than any other. Some said he fought the devil himself.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他听说有邮差从坟墓里爬出来要和一个比别人更坏的人战斗。有人说他曾与魔鬼搏斗过。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jimmy from Human Resources [0402B370] (mod) Quest : ([0402B35B]aaRussellEnding) Ending Slideshow for Russell

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaRussellEnding.ParmleyTopic to 3 aaRussellNarratorREF.SayTo Player aaEndingParmley
Hearing this, Parmley decided the lifestyle of a courier didn't suit him anymore. He would go on to marry and settle in Redding.
ESP.TRADUIT: 听了这话，帕姆利认为邮差的生活方式不再适合自己了。他将在雷丁结婚并定居下来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jimmy from Human Resources [0402B370] (mod) Quest : ([0402B35B]aaRussellEnding) Ending Slideshow for Russell

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Fought in battle, survived}Irrevocably altered by the crucible of battle, Parmley looked beyond himself for the first time in his life.
ESP.TRADUIT: {参战，幸存}在战斗的考验中，帕姆利在他的生命中第一次超越了自己。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jimmy from Human Resources [0402B370] (mod) Quest : ([0402B35B]aaRussellEnding) Ending Slideshow for Russell EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellE_aaEndingParmley_0002C415_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: SwapTexture aaRussSlideShow01REF "##NVDLC02_End:0" "Russell\Slideshow\Slide_Parmley";
set aaRussellEnding.ParmleyTopic to 1 aaRussellNarratorREF.SayTo Player aaEndingParmley
Determined to make a difference, he enlisted with the NCR, eventually earning the title of Ranger.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他下定决心要有所作为，加入了NCR，最终获得了游骑兵的称号。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jimmy from Human Resources [0402B370] (mod) Quest : ([0402B35B]aaRussellEnding) Ending Slideshow for Russell

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaRussellEnding.ParmleyTopic to 2 aaRussellNarratorREF.SayTo Player aaEndingParmley
Serving in multiple theaters with distinction, Parmley had almost forgotten the Courier when he heard about a duel in the mountains of Utah.
ESP.TRADUIT: 帕姆利曾在多个战场服役，表现出色。当他听说犹他州山上有一场决斗时，他几乎没想起邮差。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jimmy from Human Resources [0402B370] (mod) Quest : ([0402B35B]aaRussellEnding) Ending Slideshow for Russell

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaRussellEnding.ParmleyTopic to 3 aaRussellNarratorREF.SayTo Player aaEndingParmley
Another ranger told Parmley that the Courier had died, and then was resurrected, only to fight the devil himself.
ESP.TRADUIT: 另一个游骑兵告诉帕姆利邮差已经死了，然后又复活了，只是为了和魔鬼搏斗。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jimmy from Human Resources [0402B370] (mod) Quest : ([0402B35B]aaRussellEnding) Ending Slideshow for Russell

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaRussellEnding.ParmleyTopic to 4 aaRussellNarratorREF.SayTo Player aaEndingParmley
Unsure what to believe, Parmley would say a prayer for the Courier, but hesitated to hope.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不知道该相信什么，帕姆利想为信使祈祷，但又犹豫了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jimmy from Human Resources [0402B370] (mod) Quest : ([0402B35B]aaRussellEnding) Ending Slideshow for Russell

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaEndingGlanton
With the blood of the Sand Wolves dripping from his blade, Glanton and his gang set out for new frontiers.
ESP.TRADUIT: 随着沙狼的鲜血从他的刀锋上滴下，格兰顿和他的团伙开始了新的征程。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jimmy from Human Resources [0402B370] (mod) Quest : ([0402B35B]aaRussellEnding) Ending Slideshow for Russell EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellNarratorVoiceType\aaRussellE_aaEndingGlanton_0002C416_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: SwapTexture aaRussSlideShow01REF "##NVDLC02_End:0" "Russell\Slideshow\Slide_Glanton";

set SomeguyMaster.MartinStatus to 1
set aaRussellEnding.GlantonTopic to 1 aaRussellNarratorREF.SayTo Player aaEndingGlanton
Travellers spoke about him in hushed tones, mentioning distant tribes scalped, whole villages destroyed.
ESP.TRADUIT: 旅行者们小声地谈论着他，提到遥远的部落被剥了头皮，整个村庄被毁。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jimmy from Human Resources [0402B370] (mod) Quest : ([0402B35B]aaRussellEnding) Ending Slideshow for Russell

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaRussellEnding.GlantonTopic to 2 aaRussellNarratorREF.SayTo Player aaEndingGlanton
Others said he went to Utah. They spoke of an unholy alliance, then whispered another name: Marko.
ESP.TRADUIT: 其他人说他去了犹他州。他们说了一个邪恶的联盟，然后又小声说了一个名字:马尔科。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jimmy from Human Resources [0402B370] (mod) Quest : ([0402B35B]aaRussellEnding) Ending Slideshow for Russell

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaEndingRussell
{Loyalty 6+}What began as simple bounty job had grown into a powerful experience for Russell, one which would forever alter his identity and outlook.
ESP.TRADUIT: {忠诚6+}对拉塞尔来说，一开始只是一个简单的赏金工作，后来变成了一段强大的经历，这将永远改变他的身份和观点。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jimmy from Human Resources [0402B370] (mod) Quest : ([0402B35B]aaRussellEnding) Ending Slideshow for Russell EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellNarratorVoiceType\aaRussellE_aaEndingRussell_0002C417_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: SwapTexture aaRussSlideShow01REF "##NVDLC02_End:0" "Russell\Slideshow\Slide_Russell";
set aaRussellEnding.RussellTopic to 1 aaRussellNarratorREF.SayTo Player aaEndingRussell
Having grown to trust the Courier, Russell learned that the bonds he found in the Desert Rangers were not entirely unique.
ESP.TRADUIT: 随着对邮差的信任逐渐加深，拉塞尔意识到他在沙漠游骑兵中发现的纽带并不完全是独一无二的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jimmy from Human Resources [0402B370] (mod) Quest : ([0402B35B]aaRussellEnding) Ending Slideshow for Russell

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaRussellEnding.RussellTopic to 2 aaRussellNarratorREF.SayTo Player aaEndingRussell
This new friendship, forged through shared hardships, revived a feeling he hadn't felt in a decade: hope for the Mojave Wasteland - and himself.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这段患难与共的友谊重新唤起了他十年来未曾有过的感觉:对莫哈韦废土和他自己的希望。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jimmy from Human Resources [0402B370] (mod) Quest : ([0402B35B]aaRussellEnding) Ending Slideshow for Russell

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaRussellEnding.RussellTopic to 3 aaRussellNarratorREF.SayTo Player aaEndingRussell
Though Russell would remain haunted by the massacre of the Sand Wolves, he found peace with the demise of his former owner, Titus Vulcanus.
ESP.TRADUIT: 尽管拉塞尔仍被沙狼的屠杀所困扰，但他在前主人提图斯·伏尔甘的死亡中得到了平静。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jimmy from Human Resources [0402B370] (mod) Quest : ([0402B35B]aaRussellEnding) Ending Slideshow for Russell

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaRussellEnding.RussellTopic to 4 aaRussellNarratorREF.SayTo Player aaEndingRussell
Russell hoped he would be able to repay the Courier somehow, though he suspected it wouldn't take long.
ESP.TRADUIT: 拉塞尔希望他能以某种方式报答邮差，尽管他怀疑这不会花很长时间。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jimmy from Human Resources [0402B370] (mod) Quest : ([0402B35B]aaRussellEnding) Ending Slideshow for Russell

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaRussellEnding.RussellTopic to 5 aaRussellNarratorREF.SayTo Player aaEndingRussell
He knew that their greatest challenges were waiting in the Mojave Wasteland, and in distant lands. Because war... war never changes.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他知道在莫哈韦废土和遥远的地方，他们面临着最大的挑战。因为战争...战争永远不会改变。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jimmy from Human Resources [0402B370] (mod) Quest : ([0402B35B]aaRussellEnding) Ending Slideshow for Russell

ESP.ORIGINAL:
set aaRussellEnding.RussellTopic to 6
PlayMusic EndTransitionStinger; ; Ends the looping slide show music
If ( aaRussellEnding.Triggered == 0 ) Player.MoveTo aaRussellEndReturnMarkerREF; ; Teleport player to MWL EndIf
{Loyalty 0-6}What began as simple bounty job had grown into a powerful experience for Russell, one which would forever alter his identity and outlook.
ESP.TRADUIT: {忠诚0-6}对拉塞尔来说，一开始只是一项简单的赏金工作，后来却变成了一项强大的经历，这将永远改变他的身份和观点。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jimmy from Human Resources [0402B370] (mod) Quest : ([0402B35B]aaRussellEnding) Ending Slideshow for Russell EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellNarratorVoiceType\aaRussellE_aaEndingRussell_0002C418_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: SwapTexture aaRussSlideShow01REF "##NVDLC02_End:0" "Russell\Slideshow\Slide_Russell";
set aaRussellEnding.RussellTopic to 1 aaRussellNarratorREF.SayTo Player aaEndingRussell
Though he still longed to see the return of the Desert Rangers, Russell's time with the Courier had softened his outlook on the Mojave Wasteland.
ESP.TRADUIT: 虽然他仍然渴望看到沙漠游骑兵的回归，拉塞尔与邮差的相处软化了他对莫哈韦废土的看法。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jimmy from Human Resources [0402B370] (mod) Quest : ([0402B35B]aaRussellEnding) Ending Slideshow for Russell

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaRussellEnding.RussellTopic to 2 aaRussellNarratorREF.SayTo Player aaEndingRussell
While he hesitated to trust the Courier, Russell knew he'd found a kindred spirit, someone he could count on in coming battles.
ESP.TRADUIT: 虽然他对是否信任邮差犹豫不决，但拉塞尔知道他找到了一个志同道合的人，他可以在未来的战斗中依靠他。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jimmy from Human Resources [0402B370] (mod) Quest : ([0402B35B]aaRussellEnding) Ending Slideshow for Russell

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaRussellEnding.RussellTopic to 3 aaRussellNarratorREF.SayTo Player aaEndingRussell
Though Russell would remain haunted by the massacre of the Sand Wolves, he found peace with the demise of his former owner, Titus Vulcanus.
ESP.TRADUIT: 尽管拉塞尔仍被沙狼的屠杀所困扰，但他在前主人提图斯·伏尔甘的死亡中得到了平静。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jimmy from Human Resources [0402B370] (mod) Quest : ([0402B35B]aaRussellEnding) Ending Slideshow for Russell

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaRussellEnding.RussellTopic to 4 aaRussellNarratorREF.SayTo Player aaEndingRussell
Russell hoped he would be able to repay the Courier somehow, though he suspected it wouldn't take long.
ESP.TRADUIT: 拉塞尔希望他能以某种方式报答邮差，尽管他怀疑这不会花很长时间。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jimmy from Human Resources [0402B370] (mod) Quest : ([0402B35B]aaRussellEnding) Ending Slideshow for Russell

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaRussellEnding.RussellTopic to 5 aaRussellNarratorREF.SayTo Player aaEndingRussell
He knew that their greatest challenges were waiting in the Mojave Wasteland, and in distant lands. Because war... war never changes.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他知道在莫哈韦废土和遥远的地方，他们面临着最大的挑战。因为战争...战争永远不会改变。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jimmy from Human Resources [0402B370] (mod) Quest : ([0402B35B]aaRussellEnding) Ending Slideshow for Russell

ESP.ORIGINAL:
set aaRussellEnding.RussellTopic to 6
PlayMusic EndTransitionStinger; ; Ends the looping slide show music
If ( aaRussellEnding.Triggered == 0 ) Player.MoveTo aaRussellEndReturnMarkerREF; ; Teleport player to MWL EndIf
{Loyalty <0}What began as simple bounty job had grown into a powerful experience for Russell, one which would forever alter his identity and outlook.
ESP.TRADUIT: {忠诚<0}一开始是一项简单的赏金工作，但对拉塞尔来说，这已经成为一项强大的经历，它将永远改变他的身份和观点。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jimmy from Human Resources [0402B370] (mod) Quest : ([0402B35B]aaRussellEnding) Ending Slideshow for Russell EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellNarratorVoiceType\aaRussellE_aaEndingRussell_0002C419_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: SwapTexture aaRussSlideShow01REF "##NVDLC02_End:0" "Russell\Slideshow\Slide_Russell";
set aaRussellEnding.RussellTopic to 1 aaRussellNarratorREF.SayTo Player aaEndingRussell
Wary of the Courier's actions in their travels, Russell began to suspect that their partnership was doomed.
ESP.TRADUIT: 对邮差在他们的旅行中的行为感到警惕，拉塞尔开始怀疑他们的伙伴关系注定要失败。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jimmy from Human Resources [0402B370] (mod) Quest : ([0402B35B]aaRussellEnding) Ending Slideshow for Russell

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaRussellEnding.RussellTopic to 2 aaRussellNarratorREF.SayTo Player aaEndingRussell
He remained bitter about the fate of the Desert Rangers, and often found himself missing the loyalty and trust shared in his old unit.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他仍然对沙漠游骑兵的命运感到痛苦，并经常发现自己想念老单位的忠诚和信任。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jimmy from Human Resources [0402B370] (mod) Quest : ([0402B35B]aaRussellEnding) Ending Slideshow for Russell

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaRussellEnding.RussellTopic to 3 aaRussellNarratorREF.SayTo Player aaEndingRussell
The Courier had delivered Titus Vulcanus to Russell, but at a terrible price. Russell would never forgive himself for allowing Glanton to escape.
ESP.TRADUIT: 邮差把提图斯·伏尔甘交给了拉塞尔，但代价高昂。拉塞尔永远不会原谅自己让格兰顿逃跑。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jimmy from Human Resources [0402B370] (mod) Quest : ([0402B35B]aaRussellEnding) Ending Slideshow for Russell

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaRussellEnding.RussellTopic to 4 aaRussellNarratorREF.SayTo Player aaEndingRussell
He knew that their greatest challenges were waiting in the Mojave Wasteland, and in distant lands. Because war... war never changes.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他知道在莫哈韦废土和遥远的地方，他们面临着最大的挑战。因为战争...战争永远不会改变。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jimmy from Human Resources [0402B370] (mod) Quest : ([0402B35B]aaRussellEnding) Ending Slideshow for Russell

ESP.ORIGINAL:
set aaRussellEnding.RussellTopic to 5 PlayMusic EndTransitionStinger; ; Ends the looping slide show music
If ( aaRussellEnding.Triggered == 0 ) Player.MoveTo aaRussellEndReturnMarkerREF; ; Teleport player to MWL EndIf
aaRussellKillMayor01
That's too much... this asshole wants to talk about God after he hid in the caves, while we saved the fucking town?
ESP.TRADUIT: 这太过分了...我们拯救了这个该死的小镇，他却躲在山洞里，还想谈上帝?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellM_aaRussellKillMa_0002D8BD_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: He's just like the others, not enough balls to stand up and fight, but he'll send Glanton to butcher women and babies!
ESP.TRADUIT: 他和其他人一样，没有足够的勇气站出来战斗，但他会让格兰顿去屠杀女人和婴儿!
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellM_aaRussellKillMa_0002D8BD_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm doing it, and don't you say shit about the town... look in their eyes. They hate him now. The man has to answer for what he's done.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我正在做，你不要说镇上的废话...看着他们的眼睛。，他们现在恨他。 男人必须为他的所作所为负责。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellM_aaRussellKillMa_0002D8BD_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaRussellMission01.KillMayor to 2
There's no need to deliberate. We'll do it together.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没有必要刻意考虑。我们一起干。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Let's move, then.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那么,让我们动起来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellM_aaRussellKillMa_0002D8C2_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaRussellRef.startcombat aaMayorBrandonREF aaMayorBrandonRef.startcombat playerREF
<Speech Check 01>
Fuck that! Fuck the rationalizing, the explanations, the goddamn lies!
ESP.TRADUIT: 去他的吧！去他的合理化，去他的解释，去他的谎言！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellM_aaRussellKillMa_0002D8C4_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: He, he's just like the rest of them, hiding behind his desk, sending better men and women out to die in his place.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他和其他人一样，躲在办公桌后面，派更优秀的人去为他赴死。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellM_aaRussellKillMa_0002D8C4_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Brandon is the NCR. He's a slimy, backstabbing worm, who only wants to use these people, who'll send a man to slaughter women and children.
ESP.TRADUIT: 布兰登是NCR。他是个阴险狡诈的小人，只想利用这些人，派人去屠杀妇女和儿童。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellM_aaRussellKillMa_0002D8C4_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You really want to stand with him? Is that what I'm hearing from you? I thought you were a friend. Someone who could tell right from wrong.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你真的想和他站在一起吗?你是这么跟我说的吗?我以为你是我的朋友。一个能分辨是非的人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellM_aaRussellKillMa_0002D8C4_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: This knife... it's better than any goddamn judge and jury out there. Why should I stop? Tell me. Tell me!
ESP.TRADUIT: 这把刀...这比外面任何法官和陪审团都好。我为什么要停止?告诉我。告诉我!
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellM_aaRussellKillMa_0002D8C4_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hold on, Russell. Listen to me for a moment, and just think this through...
ESP.TRADUIT: 等等,拉塞尔。听我说一会儿，好好想想......

ESP.ORIGINAL: If letting him walk is justice, then I piss on the law. He dies.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果让他逍遥法外就是正义，那我就对法律撒尿。他死定了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellM_aaRussellKillMa_0002D8C5_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaRussellRef.startcombat aaMayorBrandonREF aaMayorBrandonREF.startcombat aaRussellREF
Killing Brandon isn't justice. It's murder.
ESP.TRADUIT: 杀布兰登不是正义，这是谋杀。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I want no part of this.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不想参与。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Fucking coward.
ESP.TRADUIT: 该死的懦夫。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellM_aaRussellKillMa_0002D8C3_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaRussellRef.startcombat aaMayorBrandonREF aaMayorBrandonREF.startcombat aaRussellREF set aaRussellQuest.Loyalty to aaRussellQuest.Loyalty -1
aaRussellKillMayorDontSpeech02
What would a good man do? It's been a long time since I've seen a good man, Courier.
ESP.TRADUIT: 一个好人会怎么做?我已经很久没见过好人了，邮差。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellM_aaRussellKillMa_0002D8C7_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I just... I don't know if I can live with it, seeing what happened here. All these people died for assholes like Brandon.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我只是...看到这里发生的事，我不知道我能不能忍受。这些人都为布兰登这样的混蛋而死。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellM_aaRussellKillMa_0002D8C7_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: But you are my friend. And I do trust you. You haven't let me down yet. I'll find a way to live with this... letting Brandon live.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但你是我的朋友。我相信你。你还没有让我失望。我会想办法忍受的...让布兰登活着。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellM_aaRussellKillMa_0002D8C7_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm going to be there when you go after Glanton, though. You owe me that much.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不过你去找格兰顿的时候我会在场的。你欠我的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellM_aaRussellKillMa_0002D8C7_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaRussellQuest.Loyalty to aaRussellQuest.Loyalty +2
You're my friend, Russell. Trust me when I say it - you're a good man, and you won't do this.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你是我的朋友，拉塞尔。相信我，你是个好人，你不会这么做的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Fuck the consequences.
ESP.TRADUIT: 去他妈的后果。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaRussellRef.startcombat aaMayorBrandonREF aaMayorBrandonREF.startcombat aaRussellREF
If you kill Brandon, there will be consequences.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你杀了布兰登，后果自负。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaRussellMayorDead01
It's done. Let's go home.
ESP.TRADUIT: 完成了。我们回家吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellM_aaRussellMayorD_0002D8CA_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaRussellMission01.KillMayor to 4
I'm no fan of the Legion, but I think you're underestimating them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不是军团的粉丝，但我觉得你低估了他们。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Maybe, maybe not. All I know is they're chunking spears at people armed with assault rifles. The odds are against them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 也许是,也许不是。我只知道他们在用长矛攻击拿着突击步枪的人。他们的胜算不大。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaRussellAskOpi_0002E52C_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You'll eat your words when the Legion takes New Vegas.
ESP.TRADUIT: 等军团攻占新维加斯，你就得收回你的话。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'll eat nothing, because I'll be dead before that happens.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我什么也不吃，因为在那之前我已经死了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaRussellAskOpi_0002E52D_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaRussellQuest.Loyalty to aaRussellQuest.Loyalty -1
You're absolutely right. On that note, we should go kill some legionaries.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你是绝对正确的。说到这，我们应该去杀几个军团兵

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're speaking my language, partner. Lead the way.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你说的是我的语言，搭档。带路。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaRussellAskOpi_0002E52B_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaRussellQuest.Loyalty to aaRussellQuest.Loyalty +1
Since Caesar's dead, what's holding the Legion together?
ESP.TRADUIT: 凯撒死后，是什么让军团凝聚在一起？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Lanius, for the time being. I wouldn't count on it to last, though. The Legion fears Lanius, but he can't inspire them like Caesar did.
ESP.TRADUIT: 拉尼尔斯，暂时。不过我不指望它能持续多久。军团害怕拉尼尔斯，但他不能像凯撒那样激励他们。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaRussellAskOpi_0002E52A_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Under Caesar, the Legion could recover from a loss like Hoover Dam. It could bend due to his charisma and foresight.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在凯撒统治下，军团可以从胡佛水坝的损失中恢复过来。因为他的魅力和远见，它可能会屈服。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaRussellAskOpi_0002E52A_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The first time Lanius loses, the Legion is going to break, and it won't be pretty.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果拉尼尔斯第一次输了，军团就会崩溃，那可不妙。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaRussellAskOpi_0002E52A_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Regional commanders with entire armies will be at each other's throats, all vying for the throne. Even if somebody wins, the system will be broken.
ESP.TRADUIT: 地区指挥官和整个军队将会相互厮杀，争夺王位。即使有人赢了，整个体系也会被破坏。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaRussellAskOpi_0002E52A_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The winner will be just another warlord with an army and slaves, no real ethos, no permanency. That's the end game for the Legion.
ESP.TRADUIT: 胜利者将是另一个拥有军队和奴隶的军阀，没有真正的精神，没有永久性。这是军团的最后一局。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaRussellAskOpi_0002E52A_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So what do you do for fun?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你平时有什么娱乐活动？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Fun? Well, if I'm not on a job, I love a sip of good scotch, the company of a beautiful woman, or a game of poker. Fuck Caravan.
ESP.TRADUIT: 有趣吗?嗯，如果我没有工作，我喜欢喝一口上好的苏格兰威士忌，和美女作伴，或者玩扑克。他妈的商队。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaRussellAskFun_0002E949_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Only thing about poker is that I can be a little... cantankerous if things don't go my way.
ESP.TRADUIT: 打扑克唯一的好处就是我会有点...如果事情不像我想的那样，我就会发脾气。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaRussellAskFun_0002E949_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Last time I played, some asshole beat my flush with four jacks. Bullshit, right? He started laughing, so I smashed a bottle over his head.
ESP.TRADUIT: 上次我玩的时候，有个混蛋用四个j打败了我的同花，狗屎,对吗?他开始笑，我就拿瓶子砸他的头。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaRussellAskFun_0002E949_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I was forcefully escorted from the premises, asked not to return. As if I was the first motherfucker to fight in that shithole. Ridiculous.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我被强行赶了出来，不准再次入内。好像我是第一个在那个鬼地方打架的混蛋。荒谬。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaRussellAskFun_0002E949_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: A wife? You fucking high? No, just... one girl, Mary. Haven't thought about her in... five years? She was special, but it wasn't in the cards.
ESP.TRADUIT: 妻子吗?你他妈的嗑嗨了?没有,只是...一个女孩,玛丽。我还没想过她...五年?她很特别，但已经不可能了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest

ESP.ORIGINAL: Do you have a girlfriend or wife somewhere?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你在哪里有女朋友或妻子吗?

ESP.ORIGINAL: How do you like the bounty hunting business?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你觉得赏金猎人这行怎么样？

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's not bad. The pay is good, you get to see a lot of the wasteland, and it keeps you on your toes, makes you sharp.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这不坏。薪水不错，你能看到很多荒地，这能让你保持警觉，让你思维敏捷。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaRussellAskBou_0002E94A_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Back when I was with the rangers, tracking and stalking enemies was about the greatest pleasure you could experience in the field.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当我还是游骑兵的时候，追踪和跟踪敌人是你在战场上能体验到的最大乐趣。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaRussellAskBou_0002E94A_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're stacking your mind, your body, and your weapon against another human being... well, most of the time they're human.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你用你的思想、你的身体和你的武器去对抗另一个人......嗯，大多数时候他们是人类。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaRussellAskBou_0002E94A_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: After all the waiting, when you do finally catch up to them, nothing beats the red mist. It's... it's better than making a woman climax.
ESP.TRADUIT: 等了这么久，当你终于赶上他们的时候，什么都比不上红雾。这是......总比让女人高潮好。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaRussellAskBou_0002E94A_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaRussellQuest.Killer to 1
Do you really enjoy killing?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你真的喜欢杀人吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Let me be clear. I'm not talking about doing it like some sick fuck who kills homeless hookers with steak knives.
ESP.TRADUIT: 让我说清楚。我说的不是像那些用牛排刀杀死无家可归妓女的变态那样。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaRussellAskBou_0002E94E_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm talking about combat. Survival. I first killed a man when I sixteen, shot a raider through the throat with a .308 from 300 yards. Decent shot.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我说的是战斗，生存。我第一次杀一个人是在十六岁的时候，从300码开外用308口径的手枪射穿了一个掠夺者的喉咙。很酷的镜头。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaRussellAskBou_0002E94E_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It fucked me up, bad. I couldn't stop thinking about the... finality of it. He had ceased to exist because of me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 它把我搞得一团糟。我一直在想...他的结局。他因我而不复存在了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaRussellAskBou_0002E94E_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The second one was a Legionary, caught shrapnel from my grenade during an ambush. He died slowly. I kneeled beside him, watched him go.
ESP.TRADUIT: 第二个是一个军团士兵，在一次伏击中被我的手榴弹弹片击中。他慢慢地死亡。我跪在他身边，看着他死去。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaRussellAskBou_0002E94E_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You watch a man's soul drift out of his pupils, it changes you. Nothing is the same, no matter what anyone says. Wasn't as bad as the first, though.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你看着一个人的灵魂从瞳孔里消失，你就会改变。不管别人怎么说，一切都不一样。不过没第一次那么糟。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaRussellAskBou_0002E94E_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The third one was special. It was a raider, who'd come near our position at night, just wandering, smoking. He had no idea what was coming.
ESP.TRADUIT: 第三个很特别。那是一名掠夺者，在晚上靠近我们的位置，四处游荡，抽着烟。他不知道接下来会发生什么。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaRussellAskBou_0002E94E_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: By that time I was getting good with the knife, and I was strong for my age. Sergeant gave me the nod, so I started slithering towards the raider.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那时我已经很会用刀了，就我的年龄来说，我已经很强壮了。中士向我点头，于是我开始向他潜行。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaRussellAskBou_0002E94E_7.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It was cold that night, lots of stars. Time moves slowly when you're trying to kill a man close-up. You see, smell, hear everything.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那天晚上很冷，星星很多。当你想要杀死一个人时，时间过得很慢。你可以看到，闻到，听到一切。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaRussellAskBou_0002E94E_8.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: He was taking a drag when I jammed that blade into the base of his skull. He went down faster than I expected, almost knocked me off my feet.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我把刀插进他头骨的时候他正在抽烟。他摔倒的速度比我想象的要快，差点把我撞倒。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaRussellAskBou_0002E94E_9.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The first two times I'd been afraid, overwhelmed with empathy. The third time... it was simply exhilarating.
ESP.TRADUIT: 前两次我都很害怕，被同情淹没了。第三次......这简直太令人兴奋了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaRussellAskBou_0002E94E_10.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I could fuck the most beautiful woman alive, drink the finest liquor, smoke the best tobacco, and nothing will ever match that sensation.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我可以和世界上最漂亮的女人做爱，喝最好的酒，抽最好的烟，但没有什么能比得上那种感觉。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaRussellAskBou_0002E94E_11.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It was conquest... and domination. That's the purest instinct for anything that draws breath, and I was determined to feel it again.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是征服...和统治。这是任何能呼吸的东西最纯粹的本能，我决心再次感受它。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaRussellAskBou_0002E94E_12.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Maybe you want to judge me. Maybe not. But deep down, in that part of you that is still an animal, you know it's true: we're born to kill.
ESP.TRADUIT: 也许你想评判我。也许不是。但在你内心深处，那部分仍然是动物，你知道这是真的:我们生来就是要杀人的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaRussellAskBou_0002E94E_13.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaRussellQuest.Killer to 2
I do the job, but I don't get my rocks off by killing people.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我是干这活的，但杀人不是我的目的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah, whatever you say.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，随你怎么说。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaRussellAskBou_0002E950_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I think you and I are on the same page. It's a rush like no other.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你和我的想法是一致的。这种冲动是独一无二的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's it, partner. Good to know that we think alike on this issue.
ESP.TRADUIT: 就是这样,合作伙伴。很高兴知道我们在这个问题上意见一致。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaRussellAskBou_0002E94F_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaRussellQuest.Loyalty to aaRussellQuest.Loyalty +1
aaRussellAskBountyBusinessEnjoyKillingCheckSpeech
By the time I was eighteen, I had over twenty confirmed kills. The fact is... I excelled at killing people, and the rangers respected me for it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 到我十八岁的时候，我已经杀了二十多人。事实是...我擅长杀人，游骑兵因此尊敬我。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaRussellAskBou_0002E959_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I started with the rangers as a beat-up, starving kid with no prospects. When I discovered my talent for killing, it gave me an identity.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我刚加入游骑兵的时候还是个饥肠辘辘，前途渺茫的孩子。当我发现我的杀人天赋时，它给了我一个身份。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaRussellAskBou_0002E959_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The first part of my life was spent in chains, subserviant to another person, with no will of my own.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我生命的前一部分是在枷锁中度过的，臣服于另一个人，没有自己的意志。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaRussellAskBou_0002E959_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: When I learned I could alter a man's place in this world, snuff him out, it was the first time I felt power. I would never be a slave again.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当我知道我可以改变一个人在这个世界上的地位，掐死他，那是我第一次感受到力量。我再也不会做奴隶了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaRussellAskBou_0002E959_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sorry if I've upset your delicate sensibilities, but I won't apologize for killing my enemies, nor for being damn good at it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果我伤害了你的敏感，我很抱歉，但我不会为杀死我的敌人而道歉，也不会为我的演技而道歉。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaRussellAskBou_0002E959_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm not judging you, but the way you talk about it is a little unsettling.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不是在评判你，但你谈论这件事的方式有点让人不安。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You've got good instincts. I'm glad you won't hesitate.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你的直觉很棒。我很高兴你没有犹豫。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You can't, not ever. You start trying to make excuses for the other guy, he'll take advantage of the opportunity, and then you're dead.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你不能，永远不能。当你开始为另一个人找借口，他就会利用这个机会，然后你就死了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaRussellAskBou_0002E958_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Wait, so do you get a hard-on when you kill innocent people? That could be a problem.
ESP.TRADUIT: 等等，你杀了无辜的人后会很激动吗？这可能是个问题。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're not listening. I've never killed an innocent person, and I never will. What I'm talking about is... the contest between you and the enemy.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你没在听。我从来没有杀过无辜的人，也永远不会。我说的是...你和敌人之间的较量。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaRussellAskBou_0002E955_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Whether it's a raider, an outlaw, or some Legion fuck, you know that they're out there, and they'll kill you at the first opportunity.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不管是掠夺者，逃犯，还是军团的混蛋，你知道他们就在那里，他们一有机会就会杀了你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaRussellAskBou_0002E955_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's like a game of poker, except you've bet your life, and the other guy just called. You bluff, you fold, or you lose... and you die.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这就像在玩扑克，只不过你已经赌上了命，而另一个人刚刚叫牌。你要么虚张声势，要么认输，要么输...和死。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaRussellAskBou_0002E955_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm working with a psychopath. Great.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我在和一个精神病患者合作。太好了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're a fucking hypocrite.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你他妈的是个伪君子。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaRussellAskBou_0002E957_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaRussellQuest.Loyalty to aaRussellQuest.Loyalty -1
First things first - I want the money you promised.
ESP.TRADUIT: 首先，我要你答应给我的钱。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Of course, the city would like to extend a gift of 2,000 caps in return for your bravery and service. What of the Sand Wolves?
ESP.TRADUIT: 当然，市政府想向你们赠送2000瓶盖以回报你们的英勇和服务。那么沙狼呢?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mayor Brandon [0400B315] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\MaleAdult09\aaRussellM_aaMission01Mayo_0002ED74_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: player.additem caps001 2000
What's your story?
ESP.TRADUIT: 说说你的故事好吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're not one of those types, are you? Trying to lay lines on me, thinking you'll get complimentary snatch? Won't happen, not ever.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你不是那种人，对吧?你想跟我耍花招，以为你会得到称赞吗?不会发生的，永远不会。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Miss Kat [04005CB2] (mod) Quest : ([0400B29B]aaSilverwoodDialogue) Generic Dialogue for Persistent NPC's EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\FemaleAdult09\aaSilverwo_aaMissKatAboutY_0002ED76_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you want to know my story, it's pretty simple. Dad beat me, I ran off, started working Johns, and now I follow the money.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你想知道我的故事，很简单。爸爸打了我，我跑了，开始替约翰工作，现在我跟着钱走。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Miss Kat [04005CB2] (mod) Quest : ([0400B29B]aaSilverwoodDialogue) Generic Dialogue for Persistent NPC's EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\FemaleAdult09\aaSilverwo_aaMissKatAboutY_0002ED76_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You want more than that, you gotta pay the tax.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你想要更多，就得交税。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Miss Kat [04005CB2] (mod) Quest : ([0400B29B]aaSilverwoodDialogue) Generic Dialogue for Persistent NPC's EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\FemaleAdult09\aaSilverwo_aaMissKatAboutY_0002ED76_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaTalkingKnifeIntro
Hold, outland devil! I, Talking Knife, have followed you for days, waiting to give you my message. Hear my words!
ESP.TRADUIT: 站住！外域,魔鬼!我，说话的奈芙，已经跟踪你好几天了，等着给你我的信息。听我的话!
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Talking Knife [0402F193] (mod) Quest : ([0402F194]aaSWVengeance) Setup for Sand Wolves Ambush EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaSWFemale\aaSWVengea_aaTalkingKnifeI_0002F199_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You did nothing when the dog Glanton came to our camp, and every one of my kin fell under his blade. You saved the camp instead.
ESP.TRADUIT: 格兰顿闯进我们营地的时候，你什么都没做，我所有的亲人都死在他的刀下。你拯救了营地。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Talking Knife [0402F193] (mod) Quest : ([0402F194]aaSWVengeance) Setup for Sand Wolves Ambush EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaSWFemale\aaSWVengea_aaTalkingKnifeI_0002F199_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I have come to kill you. Then, I will kill the dog Glanton. Then I will have a good death.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我是来杀你的。 然后，我会杀了狗格兰顿，然后我就愉快的去死
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Talking Knife [0402F193] (mod) Quest : ([0402F194]aaSWVengeance) Setup for Sand Wolves Ambush EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaSWFemale\aaSWVengea_aaTalkingKnifeI_0002F199_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaSWVengeance.ambushed to 2
aaTalkingKnifeSpeech
You say true? We find Glanton, eat his heart!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你说的真的吗?我们找到格兰顿，吃掉他的心!
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Talking Knife [0402F193] (mod) Quest : ([0402F194]aaSWVengeance) Setup for Sand Wolves Ambush EmotionType : Surprise Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaSWFemale\aaSWVengea_aaTalkingKnifeS_0002F1AA_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You live... for now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你活着......暂时。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Talking Knife [0402F193] (mod) Quest : ([0402F194]aaSWVengeance) Setup for Sand Wolves Ambush EmotionType : Disgust Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaSWFemale\aaSWVengea_aaTalkingKnifeS_0002F1AA_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaSWVengeance.ambushed to 5 aaTalkingKnifeREF.evp
Glanton is close, worshipping the great spirit inside the cave of slow wind. Find him there!
ESP.TRADUIT: 格兰顿就在附近，在慢风洞里膜拜着伟大的精神。在那里找到他!

ESP.ORIGINAL: Your deyaipe!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你去死吧！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Talking Knife [0402F193] (mod) Quest : ([0402F194]aaSWVengeance) Setup for Sand Wolves Ambush EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaSWFemale\aaSWVengea_aaTalkingKnifeS_0002F1AC_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: startcombat player setenemy aaSWRevengeFaction playerfaction
You stop, I pay. Make love, not war. Yah!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你停下，我付。做你爱做的事而不是开战。是的!

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm sorry for what happened to your people, but I couldn't leave the town defenseless.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我为你们的人所发生的事感到抱歉，但我不能手无寸铁地离开这个城镇。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Shut! You are liar! No more words!
ESP.TRADUIT: 闭嘴！你在撒谎！别再说了！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Talking Knife [0402F193] (mod) Quest : ([0402F194]aaSWVengeance) Setup for Sand Wolves Ambush EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaSWFemale\aaSWVengea_aaTalkingKnifeA_0002F1A8_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: startcombat player setenemy aaSWRevengeFaction playerfaction
You should be going after Glanton, not me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你应该去找格兰顿，而不是我。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Thah no! Glanton next, you first! Deyai-yoo, devil!
ESP.TRADUIT: 不!格兰顿下一个，你第一个!Deyai-yoo,魔鬼!
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Talking Knife [0402F193] (mod) Quest : ([0402F194]aaSWVengeance) Setup for Sand Wolves Ambush EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaSWFemale\aaSWVengea_aaTalkingKnifeJ_0002F1A9_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: startcombat player setenemy aaSWRevengeFaction playerfaction
You certainly went to a lot of trouble to get killed. It won't be a good death. <Attack>
ESP.TRADUIT: 你真是费尽心思找死，死得不会太痛快。<攻击>

ESP.ORIGINAL: Deyai-yoo!
ESP.TRADUIT: 死吧！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Talking Knife [0402F193] (mod) Quest : ([0402F194]aaSWVengeance) Setup for Sand Wolves Ambush EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaSWFemale\aaSWVengea_aaTalkingKnifeO_0002F1A7_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: startcombat player setenemy aaSWRevengeFaction playerfaction
aaTalkingKnifeTerrifyingPresence
What are you doing here? This seems like the last place to run a business.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你在这里干嘛?这儿似乎是最不适合做生意的地方。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I used to work for the Gun Runners, till I pissed off the Van Graffs by manufacturing and selling energy weapons.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我曾为军火贩子工作，后来因为制造和销售能源武器惹怒了范·格拉夫家族。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hendershot [04019FF0] (mod) Quest : ([0401BF06]aaHendershotQuest) Hendershot's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\MaleGenericGhoul\aaHendersh_aaHendershotDoi_0002FDFB_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Runners had to choose between keeping me or starting a war with the Van Graffs. They let me go, so I had to run.
ESP.TRADUIT: 贩子们必须在留下我和和范·格拉夫家族开战之间做出选择。他们放我走了，所以我不得不逃跑。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hendershot [04019FF0] (mod) Quest : ([0401BF06]aaHendershotQuest) Hendershot's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\MaleGenericGhoul\aaHendersh_aaHendershotDoi_0002FDFB_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: There aren't many places the Van Graffs won't pursue you, but this is one of them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 范·格拉夫家族不会在很多地方追捕你，但这里是其中之一。
