ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hendershot [04019FF0] (mod) Quest : ([0401BF06]aaHendershotQuest) Hendershot's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\MaleGenericGhoul\aaHendersh_aaHendershotDoi_0002FDFB_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ferals and radiation are supposed to take care of humans, and I've waxed any ghoul mercs stupid enough to walk in here. I guess you're special.
ESP.TRADUIT: 野生动物和辐射应该能照顾人类，我任何愚蠢到可以在这里行走的食尸鬼们打蜡了。我猜你很特别。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hendershot [04019FF0] (mod) Quest : ([0401BF06]aaHendershotQuest) Hendershot's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\MaleGenericGhoul\aaHendersh_aaHendershotDoi_0002FDFB_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: How do you do business with your clients?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你如何与客户做生意？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I meet them at the entrance at predesignated times. It's the only place safe enough for humans, and I keep it under constant surveillance.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我在预定的时间在入口处和他们见面。这是唯一一个对人类足够安全的地方，我一直在监视它。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hendershot [04019FF0] (mod) Quest : ([0401BF06]aaHendershotQuest) Hendershot's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\MaleGenericGhoul\aaHendersh_aaHendershotMee_0002FDFE_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I have a small client list, and those who are lucky enough to get on it follow my guidelines to the letter.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我有一个很小的客户名单，那些有幸进入名单的人会严格按照我的指导方针行事。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hendershot [04019FF0] (mod) Quest : ([0401BF06]aaHendershotQuest) Hendershot's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\MaleGenericGhoul\aaHendersh_aaHendershotMee_0002FDFE_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why do the Van Graffs have it out for you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 为什么范·格拉夫家族要跟你一决雌雄？

ESP.ORIGINAL: The Van Graffs aren't keen on fair trade practices. They want the entire market, and they don't like to compete.
ESP.TRADUIT: 范·格拉夫家族并不热衷于公平贸易。他们想要整个市场，他们不喜欢竞争。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hendershot [04019FF0] (mod) Quest : ([0401BF06]aaHendershotQuest) Hendershot's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\MaleGenericGhoul\aaHendersh_aaHendershotWhy_0002FDFF_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: When they found out I was manufacturing better, cheaper energy weapons, they put a price on my head. Once you're on their list, you never get off it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当他们发现我在制造更好更便宜的能源武器时，他们悬赏要我的命。一旦你上了他们的名单，你就永远无法摆脱。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Hendershot [04019FF0] (mod) Quest : ([0401BF06]aaHendershotQuest) Hendershot's Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\MaleGenericGhoul\aaHendersh_aaHendershotWhy_0002FDFF_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaRussellMission01RecruitHobosBark
A militia of hobos and hussies. Brilliant.
ESP.TRADUIT: 一个由流浪汉和妓女组成的民兵组织。绝妙。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellM_aaRussellMissio_00031280_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaMission01RussellSureAboutThis01
I want you to know I think you're doing the right thing here. It ain't easy to let Glanton slip away, but he'll get his in good time.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想让你知道，我觉得你做的是对的。让格兰顿溜走并不容易，但他会在适当的时候得到他应得的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellM_aaMission01Russ_00031282_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The problem is going to be defending this place. That chickenshit mayor can crow about civic virtue, but most of these people are useless.
ESP.TRADUIT: 问题是如何保护这个地方。那个狗屁市长可以吹嘘公民道德，但那对大多数人都是没用的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellM_aaMission01Russ_00031282_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Give me a week, and I could train a decent militia. But a few hours? It's going to be slim pickings. We'll have to be careful about who we choose.
ESP.TRADUIT: 给我一个星期，我就能训练出一支像样的民兵。但几个小时?这将是一个很小的选择。我们得谨慎选择人选。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellM_aaMission01Russ_00031282_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: We need a force multiplier - traps, mines, turrets. Something like that. You should check with that gimp in the general store, see what he has.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们需要一个力量倍增器，陷阱，地雷，炮塔。就像这样。你应该去杂货店问问那个瘸子，看他有什么。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellM_aaMission01Russ_00031282_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: That sounds like a good idea. I'll do that.
ESP.TRADUIT: 听起来是个好主意。我就这么干。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Good. Believe me, we're gonna need every advantage we can get.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好。相信我，我们需要所有能得到的优势。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellM_aaMission01Russ_00031286_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ok, I'll think about it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好的，我会考虑的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Don't think too long - the Legion is going to take a giant shit on this town if we pussyfoot around.
ESP.TRADUIT: 别想太久，如果我们退缩军团会在这个小镇上大发雷霆的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellM_aaMission01Russ_00031287_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Will you just shut up? I know how to fight a fucking battle.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你能不能闭嘴?我知道怎么打一场该死的战斗。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Aye aye, general. Please, show me how it's done.
ESP.TRADUIT: 原来如此,将军。请告诉我怎么做。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellM_aaMission01Russ_00031288_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaRussellMission01RussellTurretBark
Now we're in business. Might not end up on a cross after all.
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在我们开始做生意了。也许最终不会被钉在十字架上。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellM_aaMission01Russ_0003128A_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaMission01RussellPreBattle01
Look, we're about to get into something we might not come back from. Even if you play every hand perfectly, sometimes you run out of luck.
ESP.TRADUIT: 听着，我们要去做一件我们可能再也回不来的事了。即使你每一手牌都打得很好，有时运气也不会站在你这边。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellM_aaMission01Russ_0003128C_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If I had to choose, this is as good a spot as any. Protecting a town from Legionaries is like something out of a dream for me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果让我选的话，这里是最好的地方。保护一个城镇不受军团的侵扰对我来说就像做梦一样。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellM_aaMission01Russ_0003128C_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Keep your head down out there, partner. Legionaries are bad shots, but not that bad. I'll be right with you, to the end if need be.
ESP.TRADUIT: 小心点，伙计。军团的枪法很差，但也没那么差。我会陪着你的，如果需要的话我会一直陪到最后。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellM_aaMission01Russ_0003128C_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Now... let's go make those plumed fucks wish they never came to this canyon.
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在...让那些长着羽毛的混蛋希望他们从没来过这个峡谷。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellM_aaMission01Russ_0003128C_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaRussellMission01RecruitParmleyBark
Kid's pretty green, but he seems sharp. Might pull through for us.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这孩子很幼稚，但他看起来很聪明。也许能帮我们渡过难关。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([04005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellM_aaRussellMissio_0003128E_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What's your problem with Boone?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你对布恩有什么意见？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Problem? I just don't like the fucker. Maybe it's his First Recon sense of entitlement, or his bullshit thousand yard stare.
ESP.TRADUIT: 问题吗?我就是不喜欢那个混蛋。也许是他第一次侦查时的优越感，或者他那该死的千里眼。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaRussellAskBoo_000466CF_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Real tough guy, killing unarmed women and children. Fuck him and his stupid fucking beret. Only cocksuckers wear those things anyway.
ESP.TRADUIT: 真正的硬汉，杀害手无寸铁的妇女和儿童。操他和他那该死的贝雷帽。只有混蛋才会戴那些东西。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaRussellAskBoo_000466CF_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaRussellAskBoone01Speech
Fine, it's your crew. I'll knock it off. Just don't expect me to be fucking friends with the guy.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，那是你的人。我会停止的。别指望我跟他做朋友。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaRussellAskBoo_000466D4_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaRussellQuest.Boone to 5
Boone is a valuable part of this team, and your remarks are undermining our cohesion. Stop it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 布恩是我们队伍中很有价值的一员，而你的言论正在破坏我们的凝聚力。停下来。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Having a beef with the Legion is hardly anything special around here. The man is an uptight prick, and I've got every right to voice my opinion.
ESP.TRADUIT: 跟军团有过节在这里没什么特别的。那人是个保守的混蛋，我完全有权利表达我的意见。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Anger Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaRussellAskBoo_000466D5_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You and Boone both hate the Legion. Why can't you just focus on your common interests?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你和布恩都讨厌军团。你们为什么就不能专注于你们的共同兴趣呢?

ESP.ORIGINAL: Fuck with Boone again, and I'll cook off the rest of your face over a campfire.
ESP.TRADUIT: 再敢惹布恩，我就把你剩下的脸烧了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're serious? Fuck me! Christ, I... I just didn't know, ok? I'll stop! Not another word, I promise.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你是认真的吗?他妈的我!基督,我...我只是不知道?我要停止!别再说了，我保证。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Fear Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaRussellAskBoo_000466D8_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaRussellQuest.Boone to 5
aaRussellAskBooneGuns
The guys has good eyes and poise, I'll give him that. I didn't realize you relied on him so much. I'll take it down a notch, chief.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我敢肯定，这家伙眼光不错，沉着冷静。我不知道你这么依赖他。我会低调一点的，头儿。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaRussellAskBoo_000466D6_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaRussellQuest.Boone to 5
Boone is an expert spotter and an accomplished marksman, and you know it. We need him.
ESP.TRADUIT: 布恩是鉴赏家也是神枪手，你知道的。我们需要他。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Nevermind.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没关系。

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaRussellAskGlantonDead
aaRussellMaryWho
She was a caravan guard that I met not long after the treaty, when I was earning my salt as a hired gun. She had hair black as a dream.
ESP.TRADUIT: 她是我在条约签订后不久遇到的一个商队守卫，当时我是一名职业枪手，挣着我的薪水。她的头发黑得像梦一样。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaRussellMaryWh_000513BB_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: She was tough... hardest fucking woman I ever met, easily could've been a ranger. That's what I loved about her... she didn't compromise.
ESP.TRADUIT: 她很坚强...是我见过的最厉害的女人，很容易就当上了游骑兵。这就是我爱她的地方...她从不妥协。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaRussellMaryWh_000513BB_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I had little interest in guarding caravans until I met her, then I suddenly became invested in the affair. She noticed.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在遇见她之前我对保护车队没什么兴趣，然后我突然对这件事投入了感情。她注意到了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaRussellMaryWh_000513BB_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: She called me "Rojo", cause of the beard. Not many redheads where she came from, further south. Fuck, I still remember her eyes.
ESP.TRADUIT: 她叫我罗乔，因为我有胡子。在她的家乡，更南边的地方红头发人不多。妈的，我还记得她的眼睛。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Happy Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaRussellMaryWh_000513BB_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: We were close, but not an actual item. It was strictly physical, according to her. Just a passing pleasure out in the wilds.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们很亲密，但不是真正的伴侣。据她说，那完全是肉体上的。只是野外的短暂乐趣。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest

ESP.ORIGINAL: See, she already had a man, Faulk. He was a fat fuck who ran the company. Nice guy, but a fucking pussy. He had money, though.
ESP.TRADUIT: 她已经有男人了，福克。他是个开公司的肥佬。人不错，就是个娘娘腔。不过他有钱。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm the bad guy, you see? The ugly, crazy bastard that you fuck for fun, but never consider settling down with.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我才是坏人，明白吗?一个丑陋又疯狂的混蛋，只为了好玩才跟她上床，却从没想过要安定下来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaRussellMaryWh_000513BB_7.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Once Faulk proposed to her it was a done deal, we had to go our separate ways. I asked her to change her mind... but I wouldn't beg.
ESP.TRADUIT: 一旦福克向她求婚，这就成了定局，我们就得分道扬镳。我想让她改变主意。但我不会乞求。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaRussellMaryWh_000513BB_8.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Maybe I should've begged, just tossed any semblance of pride to the wind... but she might have just laughed at me. God, I loved that bitch.
ESP.TRADUIT: 也许我应该乞求，把所有的骄傲抛到一边...但她可能只是嘲笑我。天啊，我爱死那个婊子了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaRussellMaryWh_000513BB_9.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: No point dwelling on it now. After all, I'll always have my whores.
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在没必要再纠结了。毕竟，我的妓女永远在我身边。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [04004F33] (mod) Quest : ([040054FC]aaRussellQuest) Russell's Companion Quest EmotionType : Sad Audio : \Sound\Voice\Russell.esp\aaRussellVoiceType\aaRussellQ_aaRussellMaryWh_000513BB_10.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So, who was Mary?
ESP.TRADUIT: 那么，玛丽是谁?

ESP.TRADUIT: 告诉市长沙狼的命运。

ESP.TRADUIT: （可选）等亨德肖特来调查安全漏洞。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Bridge Encounter
ESP.TRADUIT: 偶遇布里奇

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ending Slideshow for Russell
ESP.TRADUIT: 结束拉塞尔的结尾幻灯片

ESP.ORIGINAL: Setup for Sand Wolves Ambush
Russell's Perk
ESP.TRADUIT: 拉塞尔的Perk

ESP.ORIGINAL: This perk contains a collection of buffs for Russell.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这个Perk包含了拉塞尔的所有Buff

ESP.ORIGINAL: Swift and Silent
ESP.TRADUIT: 静谧速度

ESP.ORIGINAL: While Russell is a companion, you move 10% faster while sneaking and deliver additional damage with rifles.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当拉塞尔是同伴时，你在潜行时的移动速度会提高10%，并且使用步枪能造成额外伤害。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Russell has returned to the 188 Trading Post.
ESP.TRADUIT: 拉塞尔回到了188贸易站。

ESP.ORIGINAL: This bunk would be an ideal spot to get some much-needed rest.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这个铺位是休息的理想场所。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Do nothing.
ESP.TRADUIT: 什么都不做。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sleep in the bunk.
ESP.TRADUIT: 睡在铺位上。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Russell has given you the Swift and Silent perk.
ESP.TRADUIT: 拉塞尔给你带来了静谧速度的技能。

ESP.ORIGINAL: This railcar will take you to Cholla Mountain.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这辆轨道车将带你前往仙人掌山脉。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Railcar
ESP.TRADUIT: 轨道车

ESP.ORIGINAL: Leave it alone
ESP.TRADUIT: 不去动它

ESP.ORIGINAL: Use the railcar
ESP.TRADUIT: 使用轨道车

ESP.ORIGINAL: Moving with surprising speed, Vulcanus' men overwhelm Russell and take him captive. Giddy over the transaction, the Centurion and his entourage subsequently depart with your former companion in tow, his ultimate fate a mystery.
ESP.TRADUIT: 伏尔甘的随从以惊人的速度制服了拉塞尔并俘虏了他，迅速完成了令你头晕目眩的交易。随后百夫长和他的随从带着你的前同伴离开了，他最终的命运是一个谜。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You've found what appears to be a seasonal campsite for the Sand Wolves. It's uncertain when they will return.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这里似乎是沙狼的季节性露营地。他们什么时候回来还不确定。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Russell now has Desert Ranger Combat Armor, fitted with extra armor and storage designed to help a ranger in front-line combat. It will not count against his carrying capacity.
ESP.TRADUIT: 拉塞尔现在装备了沙漠游骑兵战斗装甲，配备了额外的护甲和存储设计，旨在帮助前线战斗的游骑兵。这不会影响他的负载能力。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You have lost Russell's Swift and Silent perk.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你失去了拉塞尔的静谧速度技能。

ESP.ORIGINAL: This log details Hendershot's dealings with a range of clients. The last entry mentions Glanton, with a notation about "Finley" and the Great Khans.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这份日志详细记录了亨德肖特与一系列客户的交易。最后一个词条提到了格兰顿，还有一个关于“芬利”和大汗帮的注释。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hendershot's Log
ESP.TRADUIT: 亨德肖特的日记

ESP.ORIGINAL: Mayor Brandon has led the town's non-combatants into the mine.
ESP.TRADUIT: 布兰登市长带领镇上的非战斗人员躲进了矿井。

ESP.ORIGINAL: This railcar will take you to the entrance of Cholla Caverns.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这个轨道车将带你去仙人掌洞穴的入口。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Railcar
ESP.TRADUIT: 轨道车

ESP.ORIGINAL: Leave it alone
ESP.TRADUIT: 不去动它

ESP.ORIGINAL: Use the railcar
ESP.TRADUIT: 使用轨道车

ESP.ORIGINAL: Dobbs has installed two turrets outside the main gate.
ESP.TRADUIT: 多布斯在大门外安装了两个炮塔。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Russell has died!
ESP.TRADUIT: 拉塞尔已经死了！

ESP.ORIGINAL: Follower Warning
ESP.TRADUIT: 跟踪者警报

ESP.ORIGINAL:
You stand poised to depart Caruthers Canyon and return to the Mojave Wasteland. Once you leave, you will be unable to return for the foreseeable future.
Are you sure that you're ready to leave?
[You are strongly advised to dismiss all companions (except Russell) before proceeding.]
ESP.TRADUIT:
你准备离开卡拉瑟斯峡谷回到莫哈维废土。一旦你离开，在可预见的未来你将无法再回来。
你确定你准备好离开了吗?
(强烈建议你在继续之前解散所有同伴(拉塞尔除外)。)

ESP.ORIGINAL: Stay in Caruthers Canyon
ESP.TRADUIT: 留在卡拉瑟斯峡谷

ESP.ORIGINAL: Depart for the Mojave Wasteland
ESP.TRADUIT: 前往莫哈维废土

ESP.ORIGINAL: Skip the ending slideshow
ESP.TRADUIT: 跳过结尾幻灯片

ESP.ORIGINAL: In her death throes, the queen ant releases a terrifying screech that beckons the colony to assist her.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在垂死时，蚁后发出一声可怕的尖叫，召唤蚁群来帮助她。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Swarm!
ESP.TRADUIT: 一大群！
